original: BhP_11.01.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.01.001/1 kṛtvā daitya-vadhaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa-rāmo yadubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā daitya vadham kṛṣṇaḥ sarāmaḥ yadubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.001/3 bhuvo 'vatārayad bhāraṃ javiṣṭhaṃ janayan kalim
analyzed: bhuvaḥ vatārayat bhāram javiṣṭham janayan kalim

original: BhP_11.01.002/1 ye kopitāḥ su-bahu pāṇḍu-sutāḥ sapatnair
analyzed: ye kopitāḥ su bahu pāṇḍu sutāḥ sapatnaiḥ

original: BhP_11.01.002/2 durdyūta-helana-kaca-grahaṇādibhis tān
analyzed: durdyūta helana kaca grahaṇa ādibhiḥ tān

original: BhP_11.01.002/3 kṛtvā nimittam itaretarataḥ sametān
analyzed: kṛtvā nimittam itaretaratas sametān

original: BhP_11.01.002/4 hatvā nṛpān niraharat kṣiti-bhāram īśaḥ
analyzed: hatvā nṛpāt niraharat kṣiti bhāram īśaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.003/1 bhū-bhāra-rāja-pṛtanā yadubhir nirasya
analyzed: bhū bhāra rāja pṛtanāḥ yadubhiḥ nirasya

original: BhP_11.01.003/2 guptaiḥ sva-bāhubhir acintayad aprameyaḥ
analyzed: guptaiḥ sva bāhubhiḥ acintayat aprameyaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.003/3 manye 'vaner nanu gato 'py agataṃ hi bhāraṃ
analyzed: manye vaneḥ nanu gataḥ u pi agatam hi bhāram

original: BhP_11.01.003/4 yad yādavaṃ kulam aho aviṣahyam āste
analyzed: yat yādavam kulam aho aviṣahyam āste

original: BhP_11.01.004/1 naivānyataḥ paribhavo 'sya bhavet kathañcin
analyzed: na eva anyatas paribhavaḥ sya bhavet kathañcid

original: BhP_11.01.004/2 mat-saṃśrayasya vibhavonnahanasya nityam
analyzed: mad saṃśrayasya vibhava unnahanasya nityam

original: BhP_11.01.004/3 antaḥ kaliṃ yadu-kulasya vidhāya veṇu-
analyzed: antar kalim yadu kulasya vidhāya veṇu

original: BhP_11.01.004/4 stambasya vahnim iva śāntim upaimi dhāma
analyzed: stambasya vahnim iva śāntim upaimi dhāma

original: BhP_11.01.005/1 evaṃ vyavasito rājan satya-saṅkalpa īśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam vyavasitaḥ rājan satya saṅkalpaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.01.005/3 śāpa-vyājena viprāṇāṃ sañjahre sva-kulaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: śāpa vyājena viprāṇām sañjahre sva kulam vibhuḥ

original: BhP_11.01.006/1 sva-mūrtyā loka-lāvaṇya- nirmuktyā locanaṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: sva mūrtyāḥ loka lāvaṇya nirmuktyā locanam nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.01.006/3 gīrbhis tāḥ smaratāṃ cittaṃ padais tān īkṣatāṃ kriyāḥ
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ tāḥ smaratām cittam padaiḥ tān īkṣatām kriyāḥ

original: BhP_11.01.007/1 ācchidya kīrtiṃ su-ślokāṃ vitatya hy añjasā nu kau
analyzed: ācchidya kīrtim suślokām vitatya hi añjasā nu kau

original: BhP_11.01.007/3 tamo 'nayā tariṣyantīty agāt svaṃ padam īśvaraḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ nayā tariṣyanti iti agāt svam padam īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.01.008/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.01.008/1 brahmaṇyānāṃ vadānyānāṃ nityaṃ vṛddhopasevinām
analyzed: brahmaṇyānām vadānyānām nityam vṛddha upasevinām

original: BhP_11.01.008/3 vipra-śāpaḥ katham abhūd vṛṣṇīnāṃ kṛṣṇa-cetasām
analyzed: vipra śāpaḥ katham abhūt vṛṣṇīnām kṛṣṇa cetasām

original: BhP_11.01.009/1 yan-nimittaḥ sa vai śāpo yādṛśo dvija-sattama
analyzed: yad nimittaḥ sa vai śāpaḥ yādṛśaḥ dvijasattama

original: BhP_11.01.009/3 katham ekātmanāṃ bheda etat sarvaṃ vadasva me
analyzed: katham eka ātmanām bhedaḥ etat sarvam vadasva me

original: BhP_11.01.010/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.01.010/1 bibhrad vapuḥ sakala-sundara-sanniveśaṃ
analyzed: bibhrat vapuḥ sakala sundara sanniveśam

original: BhP_11.01.010/2 karmācaran bhuvi su-maṅgalam āpta-kāmaḥ
analyzed: karma ācaran bhuvi su maṅgalam āpta kāmaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.010/3 āsthāya dhāma ramamāṇa udāra-kīṛtiḥ
analyzed: āsthāya dhāma ramamāṇaḥ udāra kīṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.01.010/4 saṃhartum aicchata kulaṃ sthita-kṛtya-śeṣaḥ
analyzed: saṃhartum aicchata kulam sthita kṛtyaśeṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.011/1 karmāni puṇya-nivahāni su-maṅgalāni
analyzed: karmāni puṇya nivahāni su maṅgalāni

original: BhP_11.01.011/2 gāyaj-jagat-kali-malāpaharāṇi kṛtvā
analyzed: gāyat jagat kali mala apaharāṇi kṛtvā

original: BhP_11.01.011/3 kālātmanā nivasatā yadu-deva-gehe
analyzed: kāla ātmanā nivasatā yadu deva gehe

original: BhP_11.01.011/4 piṇḍārakaṃ samagaman munayo nisṛṣṭāḥ
analyzed: piṇḍārakam samagaman munayaḥ nisṛṣṭāḥ

original: BhP_11.01.012/1 viśvāmitro 'sitaḥ kaṇvo
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ sitaḥ kaṇvaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.012/2 durvāsā bhṛgur aṅgirāḥ
analyzed: durvāsāḥ bhṛguḥ aṅgirāḥ

original: BhP_11.01.012/3 kaśyapo vāmadevo 'trir
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ vāmadevaḥ tris

original: BhP_11.01.012/4 vasiṣṭho nāradādayaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ nārada ādayaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.013/1 krīḍantas tān upavrajya kumārā yadu-nandanāḥ
analyzed: krīḍantaḥ tān upavrajya kumārāḥ yadu nandanāḥ

original: BhP_11.01.013/3 upasaṅgṛhya papracchur avinītā vinīta-vat
analyzed: upasaṅgṛhya papracchuḥ avinītāḥ vinīta vat

original: BhP_11.01.014/1 te veṣayitvā strī-veṣaiḥ sāmbaṃ jāmbavatī-sutam
analyzed: te veṣayitvā strī veṣaiḥ sāmbam jāmbavatī sutam

original: BhP_11.01.014/3 eṣā pṛcchati vo viprā antarvatny asitekṣaṇā
analyzed: eṣā pṛcchati vaḥ viprāḥ antarvatnī asita īkṣaṇā

original: BhP_11.01.015/1 praṣṭuṃ vilajjatī sākṣāt prabrūtāmogha-darśanāḥ
analyzed: praṣṭum vilajjatī sākṣāt prabrūta amogha darśanāḥ

original: BhP_11.01.015/3 prasoṣyantī putra-kāmā kiṃ svit sañjanayiṣyati
analyzed: prasoṣyantī putra kāmā kim svid sañjanayiṣyati

original: BhP_11.01.016/1 evaṃ pralabdhā munayas tān ūcuḥ kupitā nṛpa
analyzed: evam pralabdhāḥ munayaḥ tān ūcuḥ kupitāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_11.01.016/3 janayiṣyati vo mandā muṣalaṃ kula-nāśanam
analyzed: janayiṣyati vaḥ mandāḥ muṣalam kula nāśanam

original: BhP_11.01.017/1 tac chrutvā te 'ti-santrastā vimucya sahasodaram
analyzed: tat śrutvā te tisantrastāḥ vimucya sahasā udaram

original: BhP_11.01.017/3 sāmbasya dadṛśus tasmin muṣalaṃ khalv ayasmayam
analyzed: sāmbasya dadṛśuḥ tasmin muṣalam khalu ayasmayam

original: BhP_11.01.018/1 kiṃ kṛtaṃ manda-bhāgyair naḥ kiṃ vadiṣyanti no janāḥ
analyzed: kim kṛtam mandabhāgyaiḥ naḥ kim vadiṣyanti naḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_11.01.018/3 iti vihvalitā gehān ādāya muṣalaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: iti vihvalitāḥ gehān ādāya muṣalam yayuḥ

original: BhP_11.01.019/1 tac copanīya sadasi parimlāna-mukha-śriyaḥ
analyzed: tat ca upanīya sadasi parimlāna mukha śriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.019/3 rājña āvedayāṃ cakruḥ sarva-yādava-sannidhau
analyzed: rājñaḥ āvedayām cakruḥ sarva yādava sannidhau

original: BhP_11.01.020/1 śrutvāmoghaṃ vipra-śāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca muṣalaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: śrutvā amogham vipra śāpam dṛṣṭvā ca muṣalam nṛpa

original: BhP_11.01.020/3 vismitā bhaya-santrastā babhūvur dvārakaukasaḥ
analyzed: vismitāḥ bhaya santrastāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: BhP_11.01.021/1 tac cūrṇayitvā muṣalaṃ yadu-rājaḥ sa āhukaḥ
analyzed: tat cūrṇayitvā muṣalam yadu rājaḥ saḥ āhukaḥ

original: BhP_11.01.021/3 samudra-salile prāsyal lohaṃ cāsyāvaśeṣitam
analyzed: samudra salile prāsyat loham ca asya avaśeṣitam

original: BhP_11.01.022/1 kaścin matsyo 'grasīl lohaṃ cūrṇāni taralais tataḥ
analyzed: kaścid matsyaḥ grasīt loham cūrṇāni taralaiḥ tatas

original: BhP_11.01.022/3 uhyamānāni velāyāṃ lagnāny āsan kilairakāḥ
analyzed: uhyamānāni velāyām lagnāni āsan

original: BhP_11.01.023/1 matsyo gṛhīto matsya-ghnair jālenānyaiḥ sahārṇave
analyzed: matsyaḥ gṛhītaḥ matsya ghnaiḥ jālena anyaiḥ saha arṇave

original: BhP_11.01.023/3 tasyodara-gataṃ lohaṃ sa śalye lubdhako 'karot
analyzed: tasya udara gatam loham sa śalye karot

original: BhP_11.01.024/1 bhagavān jñāta-sarvārtha īśvaro 'pi tad-anyathā
analyzed: bhagavān jñāta sarva arthaḥ īśvaraḥ tat anyathā

original: BhP_11.01.024/3 kartuṃ naicchad vipra-śāpaṃ kāla-rūpy anvamodata
analyzed: kartum nā aicchat vipra śāpam kālarūpī anvamodata

original: BhP_11.02.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.001/1 govinda-bhuja-guptāyāṃ dvāravatyāṃ kurūdvaha
analyzed: govinda bhuja guptāyām dvāravatyām kuru udvaha

original: BhP_11.02.001/3 avātsīn nārado 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇopāsana-lālasaḥ
analyzed: avātsīt nāradaḥ bhīkṣṇam kṛṣṇa upāsana lālasaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.002/1 ko nu rājann indriyavān mukunda-caraṇāmbujam
analyzed: kaḥ nu rājan indriyavān mukunda caraṇa ambujam

original: BhP_11.02.002/3 na bhajet sarvato-mṛtyur upāsyam amarottamaiḥ
analyzed: na bhajet sarvatas mṛtyuḥ upāsyam amara uttamaiḥ

original: BhP_11.02.003/1 tam ekadā tu devarṣiṃ vasudevo gṛhāgatam
analyzed: tam ekadā tu devarṣim vasudevaḥ gṛha āgatam

original: BhP_11.02.003/3 arcitaṃ sukham āsīnam abhivādyedam abravīt
analyzed: arcitam sukham āsīnam abhivādya idam abravīt

original: BhP_11.02.004/0 śrī-vasudeva uvāca
analyzed: śrī vasudevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.004/1 bhagavan bhavato yātrā svastaye sarva-dehinām
analyzed: bhagavan bhavataḥ yātrā svastaye sarva dehinām

original: BhP_11.02.004/3 kṛpaṇānāṃ yathā pitror uttama-śloka-vartmanām
analyzed: kṛpaṇānām yathā pitroḥ uttama śloka vartmanām

original: BhP_11.02.005/1 bhūtānāṃ deva-caritaṃ duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca
analyzed: bhūtānām deva caritam duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca

original: BhP_11.02.005/3 sukhāyaiva hi sādhūnāṃ tvādṛśām acyutātmanām
analyzed: sukhāya eva hi sādhūnām tvādṛśām acyuta ātmanām

original: BhP_11.02.006/1 bhajanti ye yathā devān devā api tathaiva tān
analyzed: bhajanti ye yathā devān devāḥ api tathā eva tān

original: BhP_11.02.006/3 chāyeva karma-sacivāḥ sādhavo dīna-vatsalāḥ
analyzed: chāyā iva karmasacivāḥ sādhavaḥ dīna vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_11.02.007/1 brahmaṃs tathāpi pṛcchāmo dharmān bhāgavatāṃs tava
analyzed: brahman tathā api pṛcchāmaḥ dharmān bhāgavatān tava

original: BhP_11.02.007/3 yān śrutvā śraddhayā martyo mucyate sarvato bhayāt
analyzed: yān śrutvā śraddhayā martyaḥ mucyate sarvatas bhayāt

original: BhP_11.02.008/1 ahaṃ kila purānantaṃ prajārtho bhuvi mukti-dam
analyzed: aham kila purā anantam prajā arthaḥ bhuvi mukti dam

original: BhP_11.02.008/3 apūjayaṃ na mokṣāya mohito deva-māyayā
analyzed: apūjayam na mokṣāya mohitaḥ deva māyayā

original: BhP_11.02.009/1 yathā vicitra-vyasanād bhavadbhir viśvato-bhayāt
analyzed: yathā vicitra vyasanāt bhavadbhiḥ viśvatas bhayāt

original: BhP_11.02.009/3 mucyema hy añjasaivāddhā tathā naḥ śādhi su-vrata
analyzed: mucyema hi añjasā eva addhā tathā naḥ śādhi suvrata

original: BhP_11.02.010/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.010/1 rājann evaṃ kṛta-praśno vasudevena dhīmatā
analyzed: rājan evam kṛta praśnaḥ vasudevena dhīmatā

original: BhP_11.02.010/3 prītas tam āha devarṣir hareḥ saṃsmārito guṇaiḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ tam āha devarṣiḥ hareḥ saṃsmāritaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.02.011/0 śrī-nārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.011/1 samyag etad vyavasitaṃ bhavatā sātvatarṣabha
analyzed: samyak etat vyavasitam bhavatā sātvata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_11.02.011/3 yat pṛcchase bhāgavatān dharmāṃs tvaṃ viśva-bhāvanān
analyzed: yat pṛcchase bhāgavatān dharmān tvam viśva bhāvanān

original: BhP_11.02.012/1 śruto 'nupaṭhito dhyāta ādṛto vānumoditaḥ
analyzed: śrutaḥ nu paṭhitaḥ dhyātaḥ ādṛtaḥ vā anumoditaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.012/3 sadyaḥ punāti sad-dharmo deva-viśva-druho 'pi hi
analyzed: sadyas punāti saddharmaḥ deva viśva druhaḥ hi

original: BhP_11.02.013/1 tvayā parama-kalyāṇaḥ puṇya-śravaṇa-kīrtanaḥ
analyzed: tvayā parama kalyāṇaḥ puṇya śravaṇa kīrtanaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.013/3 smārito bhagavān adya devo nārāyaṇo mama
analyzed: smāritaḥ bhagavān adya devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ mama

original: BhP_11.02.014/1 atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
analyzed: atrā api udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam

original: BhP_11.02.014/3 ārṣabhāṇāṃ ca saṃvādaṃ videhasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: ārṣabhāṇām ca saṃvādam videhasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.015/1 priyavrato nāma suto manoḥ svāyambhuvasya yaḥ
analyzed: priyavrataḥ nāma sutaḥ manoḥ svāyambhuvasya yaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.015/3 tasyāgnīdhras tato nābhir ṛṣabhas tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: tasya āgnīdhraḥ tatas nābhiḥ ṛṣabhaḥ tad sutaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.016/1 tam āhur vāsudevāṃśaṃ mokṣa-dharma-vivakṣayā
analyzed: tam āhuḥ vāsudeva aṃśam mokṣa dharma vivakṣayā

original: BhP_11.02.016/3 avatīrṇaṃ suta-śataṃ tasyāsīd brahma-pāragam
analyzed: avatīrṇam suta śatam tasya āsīt brahmapāragam

original: BhP_11.02.017/1 teṣāṃ vai bharato jyeṣṭho nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: teṣām vai bharataḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.017/3 vikhyātaṃ varṣam etad yan- nāmnā bhāratam adbhutam
analyzed: vikhyātam varṣam etat yat nāmnā bhāratam adbhutam

original: BhP_11.02.018/1 sa bhukta-bhogāṃ tyaktvemāṃ nirgatas tapasā harim
analyzed: sa bhukta bhogām tyaktvā imām nirgataḥ tapasā harim

original: BhP_11.02.018/3 upāsīnas tat-padavīṃ lebhe vai janṛnabhis tribhiḥ
analyzed: upāsīnaḥ tad padavīm lebhe vai tribhiḥ

original: BhP_11.02.019/1 teṣāṃ nava nava-dvīpa- patayo 'sya samantataḥ
analyzed: teṣām nava navadvīpa patayaḥ sya samantataḥ

original: BhP_11.02.019/3 karma-tantra-praṇetāra ekāśītir dvijātayaḥ
analyzed: karma tantra praṇetāraḥ ekāśītiḥ dvijātayaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.020/1 navābhavan mahā-bhāgā munayo hy artha-śaṃsinaḥ
analyzed: nava abhavan mahābhāgāḥ munayaḥ hi artha śaṃsinaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.020/3 śramaṇā vāta-rasanā ātma-vidyā-viśāradāḥ
analyzed: śramaṇāḥ vāta rasanāḥ ātma vidyā viśāradāḥ

original: BhP_11.02.021/1 kavir havir antarīkṣaḥ prabuddhaḥ pippalāyanaḥ
analyzed: kaviḥ haviḥ antarīkṣaḥ prabuddhaḥ pippalāyanaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.021/3 āvirhotro 'tha drumilaś camasaḥ karabhājanaḥ
analyzed: āvirhotraḥ tha drumilaḥ camasaḥ karabhājanaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.022/1 ta ete bhagavad-rūpaṃ viśvaṃ sad-asad-ātmakam
analyzed: te ete bhagavat rūpam viśvam sadasat ātmakam

original: BhP_11.02.022/3 ātmano 'vyatirekeṇa paśyanto vyacaran mahīm
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vyatirekeṇa paśyantaḥ vyacaran mahīm

original: BhP_11.02.023/1 avyāhateṣṭa-gatayaḥ sura-siddha-sādhya-
analyzed: avyāhata iṣṭa gatayaḥ sura siddha sādhya

original: BhP_11.02.023/2 gandharva-yakṣa-nara-kinnara-nāga-lokān
analyzed: gandharva yakṣa nara kinnara nāga lokān

original: BhP_11.02.023/3 muktāś caranti muni-cāraṇa-bhūtanātha-
analyzed: muktāḥ caranti muni cāraṇa bhūtanātha

original: BhP_11.02.023/4 vidyādhara-dvija-gavāṃ bhuvanāni kāmam
analyzed: vidyādhara dvija gavām bhuvanāni kāmam

original: BhP_11.02.024/1 ta ekadā nimeḥ satram upajagmur yadṛcchayā
analyzed: te ekadā nimeḥ satram upajagmuḥ yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_11.02.024/3 vitāyamānam ṛṣibhir ajanābhe mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: vitāyamānam ṛṣibhiḥ aja nābhe mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.025/1 tān dṛṣṭvā sūrya-saṅkāśān mahā-bhāgavatān nṛpa
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā sūrya saṅkāśān mahā bhāgavatān nṛpa

original: BhP_11.02.025/3 yajamāno 'gnayo viprāḥ sarva evopatasthire
analyzed: yajamānaḥ gnayaḥ viprāḥ sarve eva upatasthire

original: BhP_11.02.026/1 videhas tān abhipretya nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇān
analyzed: videhaḥ tān abhipretya nārāyaṇa parāyaṇān

original: BhP_11.02.026/3 prītaḥ sampūjayāṃ cakre āsana-sthān yathārhataḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ sampūjayām cakre āsana sthān yathārhataḥ

original: BhP_11.02.027/1 tān rocamānān sva-rucā brahma-putropamān nava
analyzed: tān rocamānān sva rucā brahma putra upamān nava

original: BhP_11.02.027/3 papraccha parama-prītaḥ praśrayāvanato nṛpaḥ
analyzed: papraccha parama prītaḥ praśraya avanataḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.028/0 śrī-videha uvāca
analyzed: śrī videhaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.028/1 manye bhagavataḥ sākṣāt pārṣadān vo madhu-dvisaḥ
analyzed: manye bhagavataḥ sākṣāt pārṣadān vaḥ madhudvisaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.028/3 viṣṇor bhūtāni lokānāṃ pāvanāya caranti hi
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ bhūtāni lokānām pāvanāya caranti hi

original: BhP_11.02.029/1 durlabho mānuṣo deho dehināṃ kṣaṇa-bhaṅguraḥ
analyzed: durlabhaḥ mānuṣaḥ dehaḥ dehinām kṣaṇa bhaṅguraḥ

original: BhP_11.02.029/3 tatrāpi durlabhaṃ manye vaikuṇṭha-priya-darśanam
analyzed: tatra api durlabham manye vaikuṇṭha priya darśanam

original: BhP_11.02.030/1 ata ātyantikaṃ kṣemaṃ pṛcchāmo bhavato 'naghāḥ
analyzed: atas ātyantikam kṣemam pṛcchāmaḥ bhavataḥ naghāḥ

original: BhP_11.02.030/3 saṃsāre 'smin kṣaṇārdho 'pi sat-saṅgaḥ śevadhir nṛṇām
analyzed: saṃsāre smin sat saṅgaḥ śevadhiḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.02.031/1 dharmān bhāgavatān brūta yadi naḥ śrutaye kṣamam
analyzed: dharmān bhāgavatān brūta yadi naḥ śrutaye kṣamam

original: BhP_11.02.031/3 yaiḥ prasannaḥ prapannāya dāsyaty ātmānam apy ajaḥ
analyzed: yaiḥ prasannaḥ prapannāya dāsyati ātmānam api ajaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.032/0 śrī-nārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.032/1 evaṃ te niminā pṛṣṭā vasudeva mahattamāḥ
analyzed: evam te niminā pṛṣṭāḥ vasudeva mahattamāḥ

original: BhP_11.02.032/3 pratipūjyābruvan prītyā sa-sadasyartvijaṃ nṛpam
analyzed: pratipūjya abruvan prītyā sasadasyartvijam nṛpam

original: BhP_11.02.033/0 śrī-kavir uvāca
analyzed: śrī kaviḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.033/1 manye 'kutaścid-bhayam acyutasya pādāmbujopāsanam atra nityam
analyzed: manye kutaścid bhayam acyutasya pāda ambuja upāsanam atra nityam

original: BhP_11.02.033/3 udvigna-buddher asad-ātma-bhāvād viśvātmanā yatra nivartate bhīḥ
analyzed: udvigna buddheḥ asat ātma bhāvāt viśvātmanā yatra nivartate bhīḥ

original: BhP_11.02.034/1 ye vai bhagavatā proktā upāyā hy ātma-labdhaye
analyzed: ye vai bhagavatā proktāḥ upāyāḥ hi ātma labdhaye

original: BhP_11.02.034/3 añjaḥ puṃsām aviduṣāṃ viddhi bhāgavatān hi tān
analyzed: añjas puṃsām a viduṣām viddhi bhāgavatān hi tān

original: BhP_11.02.035/1 yān āsthāya naro rājan na pramādyeta karhicit
analyzed: yān āsthāya naraḥ rājan na pramādyeta karhicit

original: BhP_11.02.035/3 dhāvan nimīlya vā netre na skhalen na pated iha
analyzed: dhāvat nimīlya vā netre na skhalet na patet iha

original: BhP_11.02.036/1 kāyena vācā manasendriyair vā buddhyātmanā vānusṛta-svabhāvāt
analyzed: kāyena vācā manasā indriyaiḥ vā buddhi ātmanā vā anusṛta svabhāvāt

original: BhP_11.02.036/3 karoti yad yat sakalaṃ parasmai nārāyaṇāyeti samarpayet tat
analyzed: karoti yat yat sakalam parasmai nārāyaṇāya iti samarpayet tat

original: BhP_11.02.037/1 bhayaṃ dvitīyābhiniveśataḥ syād īśād apetasya viparyayo 'smṛtiḥ
analyzed: bhayam dvitīya abhiniveśataḥ syāt īśāt apetasya smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.02.037/3 tan-māyayāto budha ābhajet taṃ bhaktyaikayeśaṃ guru-devatātmā
analyzed: tad māyayā atas budhaḥ ābhajet tam bhaktyā ekayā īśam guru devatā ātmā

original: BhP_11.02.038/1 avidyamāno 'py avabhāti hi dvayo dhyātur dhiyā svapna-manorathau yathā
analyzed: a vidyamānaḥ pi avabhāti hi dhyātuḥ dhiyā svapna manorathau yathā

original: BhP_11.02.038/3 tat karma-saṅkalpa-vikalpakaṃ mano budho nirundhyād abhayaṃ tataḥ syāt
analyzed: tat karma saṅkalpa vikalpakam manaḥ budhaḥ nirundhyāt abhayam tatas syāt

original: BhP_11.02.039/1 śṛṇvan su-bhadrāṇi rathāṅga-pāṇer janmāni karmāṇi ca yāni loke
analyzed: śṛṇvan su bhadrāṇi rathāṅga pāṇeḥ janmāni karmāṇi ca yāni loke

original: BhP_11.02.039/3 gītāni nāmāni tad-arthakāni gāyan vilajjo vicared asaṅgaḥ
analyzed: gītāni nāmāni tad arthakāni gāyan vilajjaḥ vicaret asaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.040/1 evaṃ-vrataḥ sva-priya-nāma-kīrtyā jātānurāgo druta-citta uccaiḥ
analyzed: evaṃvrataḥ sva priya nāma kīrtyā jāta anurāgaḥ druta cittaḥ uccais

original: BhP_11.02.040/3 hasaty atho roditi rauti gāyaty unmāda-van nṛtyati loka-bāhyaḥ
analyzed: hasati atho roditi rauti gāyati unmādavat nṛtyati loka bāhyaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.041/1 khaṃ vāyum agniṃ salilaṃ mahīṃ ca jyotīṃṣi sattvāni diśo drumādīn
analyzed: kham vāyum agnim salilam mahīm ca jyotīṃṣi sattvāni diśaḥ druma ādīn

original: BhP_11.02.041/3 sarit-samudrāṃś ca hareḥ śarīraṃ yat kiṃ ca bhūtaṃ praṇamed ananyaḥ
analyzed: sarit samudrān ca hareḥ śarīram yat kim ca bhūtam praṇamet ananyaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.042/1 bhaktiḥ pareśānubhavo viraktir anyatra caiṣa trika eka-kālaḥ
analyzed: bhaktiḥ pareśa anubhavaḥ viraktiḥ anyatra ca eṣa trikaḥ ekakālaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.042/3 prapadyamānasya yathāśnataḥ syus tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ kṣud-apāyo 'nu-ghāsam
analyzed: prapadyamānasya yathā aśnataḥ syuḥ tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ kṣudh apāyaḥ nughāsam

original: BhP_11.02.043/1 ity acyutāṅghriṃ bhajato 'nuvṛttyā bhaktir viraktir bhagavat-prabodhaḥ
analyzed: iti acyuta aṅghrim bhajataḥ nu vṛttyā bhaktiḥ viraktiḥ bhagavat prabodhaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.043/3 bhavanti vai bhāgavatasya rājaṃs tataḥ parāṃ śāntim upaiti sākṣāt
analyzed: bhavanti vai bhāgavatasya rājan tatas parām śāntim upaiti sākṣāt

original: BhP_11.02.044/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.044/1 atha bhāgavataṃ brūta yad-dharmo yādṛśo nṛṇām
analyzed: atha bhāgavatam brūta yad dharmaḥ yādṛśaḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.02.044/3 yathācarati yad brūte yair liṅgair bhagavat-priyaḥ
analyzed: yathā ācarati yat brūte yaiḥ liṅgaiḥ bhagavat priyaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.045/0 śrī-havir uvāca
analyzed: śrī haviḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.02.045/1 sarva-bhūteṣu yaḥ paśyed bhagavad-bhāvam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: sarva bhūteṣu yaḥ paśyet bhagavat bhāvam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.045/3 bhūtāni bhagavaty ātmany eṣa bhāgavatottamaḥ
analyzed: bhūtāni bhagavati ātmani eṣa bhāgavata uttamaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.046/1 īsvare tad-adhīneṣu bāliśeṣu dviṣatsu ca
analyzed: īsvare tad adhīneṣu bāliśeṣu dviṣatsu ca

original: BhP_11.02.046/3 prema-maitrī-kṛpopekṣā yaḥ karoti sa madhyamaḥ
analyzed: prema maitrī kṛpā upekṣāḥ yaḥ karoti sa madhyamaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.047/1 arcāyām eva haraye pūjāṃ yaḥ śraddhayehate
analyzed: arcāyām eva haraye pūjām yaḥ śraddhayā īhate

original: BhP_11.02.047/3 na tad-bhakteṣu cānyeṣu sa bhaktaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: na tad bhakteṣu ca anyeṣu sa bhaktaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.048/1 gṛhītvāpīndriyair arthān yo na dveṣṭi na hṛṣyati
analyzed: gṛhītvā api indriyaiḥ arthān yaḥ na dveṣṭi na hṛṣyati

original: BhP_11.02.048/3 viṣṇor māyām idaṃ paśyan sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ māyām idam paśyan sa vai bhāgavata uttamaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.049/1 dehendriya-prāṇa-mano-dhiyāṃ yo janmāpyaya-kṣud-bhaya-tarṣa-kṛcchraiḥ
analyzed: deha indriya prāṇa manaḥ dhiyām yaḥ janma apyaya kṣudh bhaya tarṣa kṛcchraiḥ

original: BhP_11.02.049/3 saṃsāra-dharmair avimuhyamānaḥ smṛtyā harer bhāgavata-pradhānaḥ
analyzed: saṃsāra dharmaiḥ a vimuhyamānaḥ smṛtyā hareḥ bhāgavata pradhānaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.050/1 na kāma-karma-bījānāṃ yasya cetasi sambhavaḥ
analyzed: na kāma karma bījānām yasya cetasi sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.050/3 vāsudevaika-nilayaḥ sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ
analyzed: vāsudeva eka nilayaḥ sa vai bhāgavata uttamaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.051/1 na yasya janma-karmabhyāṃ na varṇāśrama-jātibhiḥ
analyzed: na yasya janma karmabhyām na varṇa āśrama jātibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.02.051/3 sajjate 'sminn ahaṃ-bhāvo dehe vai sa hareḥ priyaḥ
analyzed: sajjate smin ahaṃbhāvaḥ dehe vai sa hareḥ priyaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.052/1 na yasya svaḥ para iti vitteṣv ātmani vā bhidā
analyzed: na yasya svaḥ paraḥ iti vitteṣu ātmani vā bhidā

original: BhP_11.02.052/3 sarva-bhūta-samaḥ śāntaḥ sa vai bhāgavatottamaḥ
analyzed: sarva bhūta samaḥ śāntaḥ sa vai bhāgavata uttamaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.053/1 tri-bhuvana-vibhava-hetave 'py akuṇṭha-
analyzed: tribhuvana vibhava hetave pi akuṇṭha

original: BhP_11.02.053/2 smṛtir ajitātma-surādibhir vimṛgyāt
analyzed: smṛtiḥ ajita ātma sura ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.02.053/3 na calati bhagavat-padāravindāl
analyzed: na calati bhagavat pada aravindāt

original: BhP_11.02.053/4 lava-nimiṣārdham api yaḥ sa vaiṣṇavāgryaḥ
analyzed: lava nimiṣa ardham api yaḥ sa vaiṣṇava agryaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.054/1 bhagavata uru-vikramāṅghri-śākhā- nakha-maṇi-candrikayā nirasta-tāpe
analyzed: bhagavataḥ uru vikrama aṅghri śākhā nakha maṇi candrikayā nirasta tāpe

original: BhP_11.02.054/3 hṛdi katham upasīdatāṃ punaḥ sa prabhavati candra ivodite 'rka-tāpaḥ
analyzed: hṛdi katham upasīdatām punar sa prabhavati candre iva udite rka tāpaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.055/1 visṛjati hṛdayaṃ na yasya sākṣād dharir avaśābhihito 'py aghaugha-nāśaḥ
analyzed: visṛjati hṛdayam na yasya sākṣāt hariḥ avaśa abhihitaḥ pi agha ogha nāśaḥ

original: BhP_11.02.055/3 praṇaya-rasanayā dhṛtāṅghri-padmaḥ sa bhavati bhāgavata-pradhāna uktaḥ
analyzed: praṇaya rasanayā dhṛta aṅghri padmaḥ sa bhavati bhāgavata pradhānaḥ uktaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.03.001/1 parasya viṣṇor īśasya māyinām api mohinīm
analyzed: parasya viṣṇoḥ īśasya māyinām api mohinīm

original: BhP_11.03.001/3 māyāṃ veditum icchāmo bhagavanto bruvantu naḥ
analyzed: māyām veditum icchāmaḥ bhagavantaḥ bruvantu naḥ

original: BhP_11.03.002/1 nānutṛpye juṣan yuṣmad- vaco hari-kathāmṛtam
analyzed: na anutṛpye juṣan yuṣmat vacaḥ hari kathā amṛtam

original: BhP_11.03.002/3 saṃsāra-tāpa-nistapto martyas tat-tāpa-bheṣajam
analyzed: saṃsāra tāpa nistaptaḥ martyaḥ tad tāpa bheṣajam

original: BhP_11.03.003/0 śrī-antarīkṣa uvāca
analyzed: śrī antarīkṣaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.03.003/1 ebhir bhūtāni bhūtātmā mahā-bhūtair mahā-bhuja
analyzed: ebhiḥ bhūtāni bhūta ātmā mahābhūtaiḥ mahā bhuja

original: BhP_11.03.003/3 sasarjoccāvacāny ādyaḥ sva-mātrātma-prasiddhaye
analyzed: sasarja uccāvacāni ādyaḥ sva mātra ātma prasiddhaye

original: BhP_11.03.004/1 evaṃ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni praviṣṭaḥ pañca-dhātubhiḥ
analyzed: evam sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni praviṣṭaḥ pañca dhātubhiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.004/3 ekadhā daśadhātmānaṃ vibhajan juṣate guṇān
analyzed: ekadhā daśadhā ātmānam vibhajan juṣate guṇān

original: BhP_11.03.005/1 guṇair guṇān sa bhuñjāna ātma-pradyotitaiḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: guṇaiḥ guṇān sa bhuñjānaḥ ātma pradyotitaiḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_11.03.005/3 manyamāna idaṃ sṛṣṭam ātmānam iha sajjate
analyzed: manyamānaḥ idam sṛṣṭam ātmānam iha sajjate

original: BhP_11.03.006/1 karmāṇi karmabhiḥ kurvan sa-nimittāni deha-bhṛt
analyzed: karmāṇi karmabhiḥ kurvan sa nimittāni dehabhṛt

original: BhP_11.03.006/3 tat tat karma-phalaṃ gṛhṇan bhramatīha sukhetaram
analyzed: tat tat karma phalam gṛhṇan bhramati iha sukhetaram

original: BhP_11.03.007/1 itthaṃ karma-gatīr gacchan bahv-abhadra-vahāḥ pumān
analyzed: ittham karma gatīḥ gacchan bahu abhadra vahāḥ pumān

original: BhP_11.03.007/3 ābhūta-samplavāt sarga- pralayāv aśnute 'vaśaḥ
analyzed: ā bhūta samplavāt sarga pralayau aśnute vaśaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.008/1 dhātūpaplava āsanne vyaktaṃ dravya-guṇātmakam
analyzed: dhātu upaplave āsanne vyaktam dravya guṇa ātmakam

original: BhP_11.03.008/3 anādi-nidhanaḥ kālo hy avyaktāyāpakarṣati
analyzed: an ādi nidhanaḥ kālaḥ hi avyaktāya apakarṣati

original: BhP_11.03.009/1 śata-varṣā hy anāvṛṣṭir bhaviṣyaty ulbaṇā bhuvi
analyzed: śata varṣāḥ hi anāvṛṣṭiḥ bhaviṣyati ulbaṇā bhuvi

original: BhP_11.03.009/3 tat-kālopacitoṣṇārko lokāṃs trīn pratapiṣyati
BhP_11.03.010/1 pātāla-talam ārabhya saṅkarṣaṇa-mukhānalaḥ
analyzed: pātāla talam ārabhya saṅkarṣaṇa mukha analaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.010/3 dahann ūrdhva-śikho viṣvag vardhate vāyuneritaḥ
analyzed: dahan ūrdhva śikhaḥ vardhate vāyunā īritaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.011/1 saṃvartako megha-gaṇo varṣati sma śataṃ samāḥ
analyzed: saṃvartakaḥ megha gaṇaḥ varṣati sma śatam samāḥ

original: BhP_11.03.011/3 dhārābhir hasti-hastābhir līyate salile virāṭ
analyzed: dhārābhiḥ hasti hastābhiḥ līyate salile virāj

original: BhP_11.03.012/1 tato virājam utsṛjy vairājaḥ puruṣo nṛpa
analyzed: tatas virājam utsṛjya vairājaḥ puruṣaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_11.03.012/3 avyaktaṃ viśate sūkṣmaṃ nirindhana ivānalaḥ
analyzed: avyaktam viśate sūkṣmam nirindhanaḥ iva analaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.013/1 vāyunā hṛta-gandhā bhūḥ salilatvāya kalpate
analyzed: vāyunā hṛta gandhā bhūḥ salila tvāya kalpate

original: BhP_11.03.013/3 salilaṃ tad-dhṛta-rasaṃ jyotiṣṭvāyopakalpate
analyzed: salilam tat hṛta rasam jyotiṣṭvāya upakalpate

original: BhP_11.03.014/1 hṛta-rūpaṃ tu tamasā vāyau jyotiḥ pralīyate
analyzed: hṛta rūpam tu tamasā vāyau jyotiḥ pralīyate

original: BhP_11.03.014/3 hṛta-sparśo 'vakāśena vāyur nabhasi līyate
analyzed: hṛta sparśaḥ vakāśena vāyuḥ nabhasi līyate

original: BhP_11.03.014/5 kālātmanā hṛta-guṇaṃ nabha ātmani līyate
analyzed: kāla ātmanā hṛta guṇam nabhaḥ ātmani līyate

original: BhP_11.03.015/1 indriyāṇi mano buddhiḥ saha vaikārikair nṛpa
analyzed: indriyāṇi manaḥ buddhiḥ saha vaikārikaiḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_11.03.015/3 praviśanti hy ahaṅkāraṃ sva-guṇair aham ātmani
analyzed: praviśanti hi ahaṅkāram sva guṇaiḥ aham ātmani

original: BhP_11.03.016/1 eṣā māyā bhagavataḥ sarga-sthity-anta-kāriṇī
analyzed: eṣā māyā bhagavataḥ sarga sthiti anta kāriṇī

original: BhP_11.03.016/3 tri-varṇā varṇitāsmābhiḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
analyzed: tri varṇā varṇitā asmābhiḥ kim bhūyas śrotum icchasi

original: BhP_11.03.017/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.03.017/1 yathaitām aiśvarīṃ māyāṃ dustarām akṛtātmabhiḥ
analyzed: yathā etām aiśvarīm māyām dustarām akṛtātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.017/3 taranty añjaḥ sthūla-dhiyo maharṣa idam ucyatām
analyzed: taranti añjas sthūla dhiyaḥ mahā ṛṣe idam ucyatām

original: BhP_11.03.018/0 śrī-prabuddha uvāca
analyzed: śrī prabuddhaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.03.018/1 karmāṇy ārabhamāṇānāṃ duḥkha-hatyai sukhāya ca
analyzed: karmāṇi ārabhamāṇānām duḥkha hatyai sukhāya ca

original: BhP_11.03.018/3 paśyet pāka-viparyāsaṃ mithunī-cāriṇāṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: paśyet pāka viparyāsam mithunīcāriṇām nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.03.019/1 nityārtidena vittena durlabhenātma-mṛtyunā
analyzed: nitya ārti dena vittena durlabhena ātma mṛtyunā

original: BhP_11.03.019/3 gṛhāpatyāpta-paśubhiḥ kā prītiḥ sādhitaiś calaiḥ
analyzed: gṛha apatya āpta paśubhiḥ kā prītiḥ sādhitaiḥ calaiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.020/1 evaṃ lokaṃ param vidyān naśvaraṃ karma-nirmitam
analyzed: evam lokam param vidyāt naśvaram karma nirmitam

original: BhP_11.03.020/3 sa-tulyātiśaya-dhvaṃsaṃ yathā maṇḍala-vartinām
analyzed: satulya atiśaya dhvaṃsam yathā maṇḍalavartinām

original: BhP_11.03.021/1 tasmād guruṃ prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreya uttamam
analyzed: tasmāt gurum prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreyaḥ uttamam

original: BhP_11.03.021/3 śābde pare ca niṣṇātaṃ brahmaṇy upaśamāśrayam
analyzed: śābde pare ca niṣṇātam brahmaṇi upaśama āśrayam

original: BhP_11.03.022/1 tatra bhāgavatān dharmān śikṣed gurv-ātma-daivataḥ
analyzed: tatra bhāgavatān dharmān śikṣet guru ātma daivataḥ

original: BhP_11.03.022/3 amāyayānuvṛttyā yais tuṣyed ātmātma-do hariḥ
analyzed: amāyayā anuvṛttyā yaiḥ tuṣyet ātmā ātma daḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_11.03.023/1 sarvato manaso 'saṅgam ādau saṅgaṃ ca sādhuṣu
analyzed: sarvatas saṅgam ādau saṅgam ca sādhuṣu

original: BhP_11.03.023/3 dayāṃ maitrīṃ praśrayaṃ ca bhūteṣv addhā yathocitam
analyzed: dayām maitrīm praśrayam ca bhūteṣu addhā yathocitam

original: BhP_11.03.024/1 śaucaṃ tapas titikṣāṃ ca maunaṃ svādhyāyam ārjavam
analyzed: śaucam tapaḥ titikṣām ca maunam svādhyāyam ārjavam

original: BhP_11.03.024/3 brahmacaryam ahiṃsāṃ ca samatvaṃ dvandva-saṃjñayoḥ
analyzed: brahmacaryam ahiṃsām ca sama tvam dvandva saṃjñayoḥ

original: BhP_11.03.025/1 sarvatrātmeśvarānvīkṣāṃ kaivalyam aniketatām
analyzed: sarvatra ātma īśvara anvīkṣām kaivalyam aniketa tām

original: BhP_11.03.025/3 vivikta-cīra-vasanaṃ santoṣaṃ yena kenacit
analyzed: vivikta cīra vasanam santoṣam yena kenacid

original: BhP_11.03.026/1 śraddhāṃ bhāgavate śāstre 'nindām anyatra cāpi hi
analyzed: śraddhām bhāgavate śāstre nindām anyatra ca api hi

original: BhP_11.03.026/3 mano-vāk-karma-daṇḍaṃ ca satyaṃ śama-damāv api
analyzed: ca satyam śama damau api

original: BhP_11.03.027/1 śravaṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ dhyānaṃ harer adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: śravaṇam kīrtanam dhyānam hareḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.027/3 janma-karma-guṇānāṃ ca tad-arthe 'khila-ceṣṭitam
analyzed: janma karma guṇānām ca tad arthe khila ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_11.03.028/1 iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ tapo japtaṃ vṛttaṃ yac cātmanaḥ priyam
analyzed: iṣṭam dattam tapaḥ japtam vṛttam yat ca ātmanaḥ priyam

original: BhP_11.03.028/3 dārān sutān gṛhān prāṇān yat parasmai nivedanam
analyzed: dārān sutān gṛhān prāṇān yat parasmai nivedanam

original: BhP_11.03.029/1 evaṃ kṛṣṇātma-nātheṣu manuṣyeṣu ca sauhṛdam
analyzed: evam kṛṣṇa ātma nātheṣu manuṣyeṣu ca sauhṛdam

original: BhP_11.03.029/3 paricaryāṃ cobhayatra mahatsu nṛṣu sādhuṣu
analyzed: paricaryām ca ubhayatra mahatsu nṛṣu sādhuṣu

original: BhP_11.03.030/1 parasparānukathanaṃ pāvanaṃ bhagavad-yaśaḥ
analyzed: paraspara anukathanam pāvanam bhagavat yaśaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.030/3 mitho ratir mithas tuṣṭir nivṛttir mitha ātmanaḥ
analyzed: mithas ratiḥ mithas tuṣṭiḥ nivṛttiḥ mithas ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.031/1 smarantaḥ smārayantaś ca mitho 'ghaugha-haraṃ harim
analyzed: smarantaḥ smārayantaḥ ca mithas gha ogha haram harim

original: BhP_11.03.031/3 bhaktyā sañjātayā bhaktyā bibhraty utpulakāṃ tanum
analyzed: bhaktyā sañjātayā bhaktyā bibhrati utpulakām tanum

original: BhP_11.03.032/1 kvacid rudanty acyuta-cintayā kvacid
analyzed: kvacid rudanti acyuta cintayā kvacid

original: BhP_11.03.032/2 dhasanti nandanti vadanty alaukikāḥ
analyzed: dhasanti nandanti vadanti alaukikāḥ

original: BhP_11.03.032/3 nṛtyanti gāyanty anuśīlayanty ajaṃ
analyzed: nṛtyanti gāyanti anuśīlayanti ajam

original: BhP_11.03.032/4 bhavanti tūṣṇīṃ param etya nirvṛtāḥ
analyzed: bhavanti tūṣṇīm param etya nirvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_11.03.033/1 iti bhāgavatān dharmān śikṣan bhaktyā tad-utthayā
analyzed: iti bhāgavatān dharmān śikṣan bhaktyā tad utthayā

original: BhP_11.03.033/3 nārāyaṇa-paro māyām añjas tarati dustarām
analyzed: nārāyaṇa paraḥ māyām añjas tarati dustarām

original: BhP_11.03.034/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.03.034/1 nārāyaṇābhidhānasya brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa abhidhānasya brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.034/3 niṣṭhām arhatha no vaktuṃ yūyaṃ hi brahma-vittamāḥ
analyzed: niṣṭhām arhatha naḥ vaktum yūyam hi brahma vittamāḥ

original: BhP_11.03.035/0 śrī-pippalāyana uvāca
analyzed: śrī pippalāyanaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.03.035/1 sthity-udbhava-pralaya-hetur ahetur asya
analyzed: sthiti udbhava pralaya hetuḥ ahetuḥ asya

original: BhP_11.03.035/2 yat svapna-jāgara-suṣuptiṣu sad bahiś ca
analyzed: yat svapna jāgara suṣuptiṣu sat bahis ca

original: BhP_11.03.035/3 dehendriyāsu-hṛdayāni caranti yena
analyzed: deha indriya asu hṛdayāni caranti yena

original: BhP_11.03.035/4 sañjīvitāni tad avehi paraṃ narendra
analyzed: sañjīvitāni tat avehi param narendra

original: BhP_11.03.036/1 naitan mano viśati vāg uta cakṣur ātmā
analyzed: na etat manaḥ viśati vāc uta cakṣuḥ ātmā

original: BhP_11.03.036/2 prāṇendriyāṇi ca yathānalam arciṣaḥ svāḥ
analyzed: prāṇa indriyāṇi ca yathā analam arciṣaḥ svāḥ

original: BhP_11.03.036/3 śabdo 'pi bodhaka-niṣedhatayātma-mūlam
analyzed: śabdaḥ pi bodhaka niṣedhatayā ātma mūlam

original: BhP_11.03.036/4 arthoktam āha yad-ṛte na niṣedha-siddhiḥ
analyzed: artha uktam āha yat ṛte na niṣedha siddhiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.037/1 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti tri-vṛd ekam ādau
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti trivṛt ekam ādau

original: BhP_11.03.037/2 sūtraṃ mahān aham iti pravadanti jīvam
analyzed: sūtram mahān aham iti pravadanti jīvam

original: BhP_11.03.037/3 jñāna-kriyārtha-phala-rūpatayoru-śakti
analyzed: jñāna kriyā artha phala rūpa tayā uru śakti

original: BhP_11.03.037/4 brahmaiva bhāti sad asac ca tayoḥ paraṃ yat
analyzed: brahma eva bhāti sat asat ca tayoḥ param yat

original: BhP_11.03.038/1 nātmā jajāna na mariṣyati naidhate 'sau
analyzed: na ātmā jajāna na mariṣyati na edhate sau

original: BhP_11.03.038/2 na kṣīyate savana-vid vyabhicāriṇāṃ hi
analyzed: na kṣīyate savana vid vyabhicāriṇām hi

original: BhP_11.03.038/3 sarvatra śaśvad anapāyy upalabdhi-mātraṃ
analyzed: sarvatra śaśvat anapāyi upalabdhi mātram

original: BhP_11.03.038/4 prāṇo yathendriya-balena vikalpitaṃ sat
analyzed: prāṇaḥ yathā indriya balena vikalpitam sat

original: BhP_11.03.039/1 aṇḍeṣu peśiṣu taruṣv aviniściteṣu prāṇo hi jīvam upadhāvati tatra tatra
analyzed: aṇḍeṣu peśiṣu taruṣu a viniściteṣu prāṇaḥ hi jīvam upadhāvati tatra tatra

original: BhP_11.03.039/3 sanne yad indriya-gaṇe 'hami ca prasupte kūṭa-stha āśayam ṛte tad-anusmṛtir naḥ
analyzed: sanne yat indriya gaṇe ca prasupte kūṭasthe āśayam ṛte tad anusmṛtiḥ naḥ

original: BhP_11.03.040/1 yarhy abja-nābha-caraṇaiṣaṇayoru-bhaktyā
analyzed: yarhi abjanābha caraṇa eṣaṇayā uru bhaktyā

original: BhP_11.03.040/2 ceto-malāni vidhamed guṇa-karma-jāni
analyzed: cetaḥ malāni vidhamet guṇa karma jāni

original: BhP_11.03.040/3 tasmin viśuddha upalabhyata ātma-tattvaṃ
analyzed: tasmin viśuddhe upalabhyate ātma tattvam

original: BhP_11.03.040/4 śākṣād yathāmala-dṛśoḥ savitṛ-prakāśaḥ
analyzed: śākṣāt yathā amala dṛśoḥ savitṛ prakāśaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.041/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.03.041/1 karma-yogaṃ vadata naḥ puruṣo yena saṃskṛtaḥ
analyzed: karma yogam vadata naḥ puruṣaḥ yena saṃskṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.041/3 vidhūyehāśu karmāṇi naiṣkarmyaṃ vindate param
analyzed: vidhūya iha āśu karmāṇi naiṣkarmyam vindate param

original: BhP_11.03.042/1 evaṃ praśnam ṛṣīn pūrvam apṛcchaṃ pitur antike
analyzed: evam praśnam ṛṣīn pūrvam apṛccham pituḥ antike

original: BhP_11.03.042/3 nābruvan brahmaṇaḥ putrās tatra kāraṇam ucyatām
analyzed: na abruvan brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ tatra kāraṇam ucyatām

original: BhP_11.03.043/0 śrī-āvirhotra uvāca
analyzed: śrī āvirhotraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.03.043/1 karmākarma vikarmeti veda-vādo na laukikaḥ
analyzed: karma akarma vikarma iti veda vādaḥ na laukikaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.043/3 vedasya ceśvarātmatvāt tatra muhyanti sūrayaḥ
analyzed: vedasya ca īśvara ātma tvāt tatra muhyanti sūrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.044/1 parokṣa-vādo vedo 'yaṃ bālānām anuśāsanam
analyzed: parokṣa vādaḥ vedaḥ yam bālānām anuśāsanam

original: BhP_11.03.044/3 karma-mokṣāya karmāṇi vidhatte hy agadaṃ yathā
analyzed: karma mokṣāya karmāṇi vidhatte hi agadam yathā

original: BhP_11.03.045/1 nācared yas tu vedoktaṃ svayam ajño 'jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: na ācaret yaḥ tu veda uktam svayam ajñaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.045/3 vikarmaṇā hy adharmeṇa mṛtyor mṛtyum upaiti saḥ
analyzed: vikarmaṇā hi adharmeṇa mṛtyoḥ mṛtyum upaiti saḥ

original: BhP_11.03.046/1 vedoktam eva kurvāṇo niḥsaṅgo 'rpitam īśvare
analyzed: veda uktam eva kurvāṇaḥ niḥsaṅgaḥ rpitam īśvare

original: BhP_11.03.046/3 naiṣkarmyaṃ labhate siddhiṃ rocanārthā phala-śrutiḥ
analyzed: naiṣkarmyam labhate siddhim rocana arthā phala śrutiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.047/1 ya āśu hṛdaya-granthiṃ nirjihīṛṣuḥ parātmanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ āśu hṛdaya granthim nirjihīṛṣuḥ parātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.047/3 vidhinopacared devaṃ tantroktena ca keśavam
analyzed: vidhinā upacaret devam tantra uktena ca keśavam

original: BhP_11.03.048/1 labdhvānugraha ācāryāt tena sandarśitāgamaḥ
analyzed: labdhvā anugrahaḥ ācāryāt tena sandarśita āgamaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.048/3 mahā-puruṣam abhyarcen mūrtyābhimatayātmanaḥ
analyzed: mahāpuruṣam abhyarcet mūrtyā abhimatayā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.049/1 śuciḥ sammukham āsīnaḥ prāṇa-saṃyamanādibhiḥ
analyzed: śuciḥ sammukham āsīnaḥ prāṇa saṃyamana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.049/3 piṇḍaṃ viśodhya sannyāsa- kṛta-rakṣo 'rcayed dharim
BhP_11.03.050/1 arcādau hṛdaye cāpi yathā-labdhopacārakaiḥ
analyzed: arcā ādau hṛdaye ca api yathālabdha upacārakaiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.050/3 dravya-kṣity-ātma-liṇgāni niṣpādya prokṣya cāsanam
analyzed: dravya kṣiti ātma liṇgāni niṣpādya prokṣya ca āsanam

original: BhP_11.03.051/1 pādyādīn upakalpyātha sannidhāpya samāhitaḥ
analyzed: pādya ādīn upakalpya atha sannidhāpya samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.051/3 hṛd-ādibhiḥ kṛta-nyāso mūla-mantreṇa cārcayet
analyzed: hṛd ādibhiḥ kṛta nyāsaḥ mūlamantreṇa ca arcayet

original: BhP_11.03.052/1 sāṅgopāṅgāṃ sa-pārṣadāṃ tāṃ tāṃ mūrtiṃ sva-mantrataḥ
analyzed: sa aṅga upāṅgām sa pārṣadām tām tām mūrtim sva mantrataḥ

original: BhP_11.03.052/3 pādyārghyācamanīyādyaiḥ snāna-vāso-vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: pādya arghya ācamanīya ādyaiḥ snāna vāsaḥ vibhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.053/1 gandha-mālyākṣata-sragbhir dhūpa-dīpopahārakaiḥ
analyzed: gandha mālya akṣata sragbhiḥ dhūpa dīpa upahārakaiḥ

original: BhP_11.03.053/3 sāṅgam sampūjya vidhivat stavaiḥ stutvā named dharim
analyzed: sāṅgam sampūjya vidhivat stavaiḥ stutvā namet harim

original: BhP_11.03.054/1 ātmānam tan-mayam dhyāyan mūrtiṃ sampūjayed dhareḥ
analyzed: ātmānam tanmayam dhyāyan mūrtim sampūjayet dhareḥ

original: BhP_11.03.054/3 śeṣām ādhāya śirasā sva-dhāmny udvāsya sat-kṛtam
analyzed: śeṣām ādhāya śirasā sva dhāmni udvāsya satkṛtam

original: BhP_11.03.055/1 evam agny-arka-toyādāv atithau hṛdaye ca yaḥ
analyzed: evam agni arka toya ādau atithau hṛdaye ca yaḥ

original: BhP_11.03.055/3 yajatīśvaram ātmānam acirān mucyate hi saḥ
analyzed: yajati īśvaram ātmānam acirāt mucyate hi saḥ

original: BhP_11.04.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.04.001/1 yāni yānīha karmāṇi yair yaiḥ svacchanda-janmabhiḥ
analyzed: yāni yāni iha karmāṇi yaiḥ yaiḥ svacchanda janmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.04.001/3 cakre karoti kartā vā haris tāni bruvantu naḥ
analyzed: cakre karoti kartā vā hariḥ tāni bruvantu naḥ

original: BhP_11.04.002/0 śrī-drumila uvāca
analyzed: śrī drumilaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.04.002/1 yo vā anantasya gunān anantān anukramiṣyan sa tu bāla-buddhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vai anantasya anantān anukramiṣyan sa tu bāla buddhiḥ

original: BhP_11.04.002/3 rajāṃsi bhūmer gaṇayet kathañcit kālena naivākhila-śakti-dhāmnaḥ
analyzed: rajāṃsi bhūmeḥ gaṇayet kathañcid kālena nā eva akhila śakti dhāmnaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.003/1 bhūtair yadā pañcabhir ātma-sṛṣṭaiḥ
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ yadā pañcabhiḥ ātma sṛṣṭaiḥ

original: BhP_11.04.003/2 puraṃ virājaṃ viracayya tasmin
analyzed: puram virājam viracayya tasmin

original: BhP_11.04.003/3 svāṃśena viṣṭaḥ puruṣābhidhānam
analyzed: sva aṃśena viṣṭaḥ puruṣa abhidhānam

original: BhP_11.04.003/4 avāpa nārāyaṇa ādi-devaḥ
analyzed: avāpa nārāyaṇaḥ ādidevaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.004/1 yat-kāya eṣa bhuvana-traya-sanniveśo
analyzed: yad kāyaḥ eṣa bhuvana traya sanniveśaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.004/2 yasyendriyais tanu-bhṛtām ubhayendriyāṇi
analyzed: yasya indriyaiḥ tanubhṛtām ubhaya indriyāṇi

original: BhP_11.04.004/3 jñānaṃ svataḥ śvasanato balam oja īhā
analyzed: jñānam svatas śvasanataḥ balam ojaḥ īhā

original: BhP_11.04.004/4 sattvādibhiḥ sthiti-layodbhava ādi-kartā
BhP_11.04.005/1 ādāv abhūc chata-dhṛtī rajasāsya sarge
analyzed: ādau abhūt śatadhṛtiḥ rajasā asya sarge

original: BhP_11.04.005/2 viṣṇuḥ sthitau kratu-patir dvija-dharma-setuḥ
BhP_11.04.005/3 rudro 'pyayāya tamasā puruṣaḥ sa ādya
analyzed: rudraḥ pyayāya tamasā puruṣaḥ saḥ ā adya

original: BhP_11.04.005/4 ity udbhava-sthiti-layāḥ satataṃ prajāsu
analyzed: iti udbhava sthiti layāḥ satatam prajāsu

original: BhP_11.04.006/1 dharmasya dakṣa-duhitary ajaniṣṭa mūrtyāṃ
analyzed: dharmasya dakṣa duhitari ajaniṣṭa mūrtyām

original: BhP_11.04.006/2 nārāyaṇo nara ṛṣi-pravaraḥ praśāntaḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ naraḥ ṛṣi pravaraḥ praśāntaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.006/3 naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇam uvāca cacāra karma
analyzed: naiṣkarmya lakṣaṇam uvāca cacāra karma

original: BhP_11.04.006/4 yo 'dyāpi cāsta ṛṣi-varya-niṣevitāṅghriḥ
analyzed: yaḥ dyā api ca āste ṛṣi varya niṣevita aṅghriḥ

original: BhP_11.04.007/1 indro viśaṅkya mama dhāma jighṛkṣatīti
analyzed: indraḥ viśaṅkya mama dhāma jighṛkṣati iti

original: BhP_11.04.007/2 kāmaṃ nyayuṅkta sa-gaṇaṃ sa badary-upākhyam
analyzed: kāmam nyayuṅkta sa gaṇam sa badarī upākhyam

original: BhP_11.04.007/3 gatvāpsaro-gaṇa-vasanta-sumanda-vātaiḥ
analyzed: gatvā apsaraḥ gaṇa vasanta sumanda vātaiḥ

original: BhP_11.04.007/4 strī-prekṣaṇeṣubhir avidhyad atan-mahi-jñaḥ
analyzed: strī prekṣaṇa iṣubhiḥ avidhyat a tad mahi jñaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.008/1 vijñāya śakra-kṛtam akramam ādi-devaḥ
analyzed: vijñāya śakra kṛtam akramam ādidevaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.008/2 prāha prahasya gata-vismaya ejamānān
analyzed: prāha prahasya gata vismayaḥ ejamānān

original: BhP_11.04.008/3 mā bhair vibho madana māruta deva-vadhvo
analyzed: mā bhaiḥ vibho madana māruta deva vadhvaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.008/4 gṛhṇīta no balim aśūnyam imaṃ kurudhvam
analyzed: gṛhṇīta naḥ balim a śūnyam imam kurudhvam

original: BhP_11.04.009/1 itthaṃ bruvaty abhaya-de nara-deva devāḥ
analyzed: ittham bruvati abhaya de naradeva devāḥ

original: BhP_11.04.009/2 sa-vrīḍa-namra-śirasaḥ sa-ghṛṇaṃ tam ūcuḥ
analyzed: sa vrīḍa namra śirasaḥ sa ghṛṇam tam ūcuḥ

original: BhP_11.04.009/3 naitad vibho tvayi pare 'vikṛte vicitraṃ
analyzed: na etat vibho tvayi pare vikṛte vicitram

original: BhP_11.04.009/4 svārāma-dhīra-nikarānata-pāda-padme
BhP_11.04.010/1 tvāṃ sevatāṃ sura-kṛtā bahavo 'ntarāyāḥ
analyzed: tvām sevatām sura kṛtāḥ bahavaḥ ntarāyāḥ

original: BhP_11.04.010/2 svauko vilaṅghya paramaṃ vrajatāṃ padaṃ te
analyzed: svaukaḥ vilaṅghya paramam vrajatām padam te

original: BhP_11.04.010/3 nānyasya barhiṣi balīn dadataḥ sva-bhāgān
analyzed: na anyasya barhiṣi balīn dadataḥ sva bhāgān

original: BhP_11.04.010/4 dhatte padaṃ tvam avitā yadi vighna-mūrdhni
analyzed: dhatte padam tvam avitā yadi vighna mūrdhni

original: BhP_11.04.011/1 kṣut-tṛṭ-tri-kāla-guṇa-māruta-jaihva-śaiṣṇān
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ tri kāla guṇa māruta jaihva śaiṣṇān

original: BhP_11.04.011/2 asmān apāra-jaladhīn atitīrya kecit
analyzed: asmān apāra jaladhīn atitīrya kecid

original: BhP_11.04.011/3 krodhasya yānti viphalasya vaśaṃ pade gor
analyzed: krodhasya yānti viphalasya vaśam pade goḥ

original: BhP_11.04.011/4 majjanti duścara-tapaś ca vṛthotsṛjanti
analyzed: majjanti duścara tapaḥ ca vṛthā utsṛjanti

original: BhP_11.04.012/1 iti pragṛṇatāṃ teṣāṃ striyo 'ty-adbhuta-darśanāḥ
analyzed: iti pragṛṇatām teṣām tyadbhuta darśanāḥ

original: BhP_11.04.012/3 darśayām āsa śuśrūṣāṃ sv-arcitāḥ kurvatīr vibhuḥ
analyzed: darśayām āsa śuśrūṣām su arcitāḥ kurvatīḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_11.04.013/1 te devānucarā dṛṣṭvā striyaḥ śrīr iva rūpiṇīḥ
analyzed: te deva anucarāḥ dṛṣṭvā striyaḥ śrīḥ iva rūpiṇīḥ

original: BhP_11.04.013/3 gandhena mumuhus tāsāṃ rūpaudārya-hata-śriyaḥ
analyzed: gandhena mumuhuḥ tāsām rūpa audārya hata śriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.014/1 tān āha deva-deveśaḥ praṇatān prahasann iva
analyzed: tān āha devadeveśaḥ praṇatān prahasan iva

original: BhP_11.04.014/3 āsām ekatamāṃ vṛṅdhvaṃ sa-varṇāṃ svarga-bhūṣaṇām
analyzed: āsām ekatamām vṛṅdhvam savarṇām svarga bhūṣaṇām

original: BhP_11.04.015/1 om ity ādeśam ādāya natvā taṃ sura-vandinaḥ
analyzed: om iti ādeśam ādāya natvā tam sura vandinaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.015/3 urvaśīm apsaraḥ-śreṣṭhāṃ puraskṛtya divaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: urvaśīm apsaraḥ śreṣṭhām puraskṛtya divam yayuḥ

original: BhP_11.04.016/1 indrāyānamya sadasi śṛṇvatāṃ tri-divaukasām
analyzed: indrāya ānamya sadasi śṛṇvatām tridivaukasām

original: BhP_11.04.016/3 ūcur nārāyaṇa-balaṃ śakras tatrāsa vismitaḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ nārāyaṇa balam śakraḥ tatra āsa vismitaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.017/1 haṃsa-svarūpy avadad acyuta ātma-yogaṃ
analyzed: haṃsa svarūpī avadat acyutaḥ ātma yogam

original: BhP_11.04.017/2 dattaḥ kumāra ṛṣabho bhagavān pitā naḥ
analyzed: dattaḥ kumāraḥ ṛṣabhaḥ bhagavān pitā naḥ

original: BhP_11.04.017/3 viṣṇuḥ śivāya jagatāṃ kalayāvatirṇas
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ śivāya jagatām kalayā avatirṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.017/4 tenāhṛtā madhu-bhidā śrutayo hayāsye
analyzed: tena āhṛtāḥ madhubhidā śrutayaḥ haya āsye

original: BhP_11.04.018/1 gupto 'pyaye manur ilauṣadhayaś ca mātsye
analyzed: guptaḥ pyaye manuḥ ilā oṣadhayaḥ ca mātsye

original: BhP_11.04.018/2 krauḍe hato diti-ja uddharatāmbhasaḥ kṣmām
analyzed: krauḍe hataḥ ditijaḥ uddharatā ambhasaḥ kṣmām

original: BhP_11.04.018/3 kaurme dhṛto 'drir amṛtonmathane sva-pṛṣṭhe
analyzed: kaurme dhṛtaḥ driḥ amṛtonmathane sva pṛṣṭhe

original: BhP_11.04.018/4 grāhāt prapannam ibha-rājam amuñcad ārtam
analyzed: grāhāt prapannam ibha rājam amuñcat ārtam

original: BhP_11.04.019/1 saṃstunvato nipatitān śramaṇān ṛṣīṃś ca
analyzed: saṃstunvataḥ nipatitān śramaṇān ṛṣīn ca

original: BhP_11.04.019/2 śakraṃ ca vṛtra-vadhatas tamasi praviṣṭam
analyzed: śakram ca vṛtra vadhataḥ tamasi praviṣṭam

original: BhP_11.04.019/3 deva-striyo 'sura-gṛhe pihitā anāthā
analyzed: deva striyaḥ sura gṛhe pihitāḥ anāthā

original: BhP_11.04.019/4 jaghne 'surendram abhayāya satāṃ nṛsiṃhe
analyzed: jaghne sura indram abhayāya satām nṛsiṃhe

original: BhP_11.04.020/1 devāsure yudhi ca daitya-patīn surārthe
analyzed: devāsure yudhi ca daitya patīn sura arthe

original: BhP_11.04.020/2 hatvāntareṣu bhuvanāny adadhāt kalābhiḥ
analyzed: hatvā antareṣu bhuvanāni adadhāt kalābhiḥ

original: BhP_11.04.020/3 bhūtvātha vāmana imām aharad baleḥ kṣmāṃ
analyzed: bhūtvā atha vāmanaḥ imām aharat baleḥ kṣmām

original: BhP_11.04.020/4 yācñā-cchalena samadād aditeḥ sutebhyaḥ
analyzed: yācñā chalena samadāt aditeḥ sutebhyaḥ

original: BhP_11.04.021/1 niḥkṣatriyām akṛta gāṃ ca triḥ-sapta-kṛtvo
analyzed: niḥkṣatriyām akṛta gām ca tris sapta kṛtvas

original: BhP_11.04.021/2 rāmas tu haihaya-kulāpyaya-bhārgavāgniḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ tu haihaya kula apyaya bhārgava agniḥ

original: BhP_11.04.021/3 so 'bdhiṃ babandha daśa-vaktram ahan sa-laṅkaṃ
analyzed: saḥ bdhim babandha daśa vaktram ahan sa laṅkam

original: BhP_11.04.021/4 sītā-patir jayati loka-mala-ghna-kīṛtiḥ
analyzed: sītā patiḥ jayati lokam alaghna kīṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.04.022/1 bhūmer bharāvataraṇāya yaduṣv ajanmā
analyzed: bhūmeḥ bhara avataraṇāya yaduṣu ajanmā

original: BhP_11.04.022/2 jātaḥ kariṣyati surair api duṣkarāṇi
analyzed: jātaḥ kariṣyati suraiḥ api duṣkarāṇi

original: BhP_11.04.022/3 vādair vimohayati yajña-kṛto 'tad-arhān
analyzed: vādaiḥ vimohayati tad arhān

original: BhP_11.04.022/4 śūdrān kalau kṣiti-bhujo nyahaniṣyad ante
analyzed: śūdrān kalau kṣitibhujaḥ nyahaniṣyat ante

original: BhP_11.04.023/1 evaṃ-vidhāni janmāni karmāṇi ca jagat-pateḥ
analyzed: evaṃvidhāni janmāni karmāṇi ca jagatpateḥ

original: BhP_11.04.023/3 bhūrīṇi bhūri-yaśaso varṇitāni mahā-bhuja
analyzed: bhūrīṇi bhūri yaśasaḥ varṇitāni mahā bhuja

original: BhP_11.05.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.05.001/1 bhagavantaṃ hariṃ prāyo na bhajanty ātma-vittamāḥ
analyzed: bhagavantam harim prāyas na bhajanti ātma vittamāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.001/3 teṣām aśānta-kāmānāṃ ka niṣṭhāvijitātmanām
analyzed: teṣām aśānta kāmānām ka niṣṭhā avijita ātmanām

original: BhP_11.05.002/0 śrī-camasa uvāca
analyzed: śrī camasaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.05.002/1 mukha-bāhūru-pādebhyaḥ puruṣasyāśramaiḥ saha
analyzed: mukha bāhu ūru pādebhyaḥ puruṣasya āśramaiḥ saha

original: BhP_11.05.002/3 catvāro jajñire varṇā guṇair viprādayaḥ pṛthak
analyzed: catvāraḥ jajñire varṇāḥ guṇaiḥ vipra ādayaḥ pṛthak

original: BhP_11.05.003/1 ya eṣāṃ puruṣaṃ sākṣād ātma-prabhavam īśvaram
analyzed: ye eṣām puruṣam sākṣāt ātma prabhavam īśvaram

original: BhP_11.05.003/3 na bhajanty avajānanti sthānād bhraṣṭāḥ patanty adhaḥ
analyzed: na bhajanti avajānanti sthānāt bhraṣṭāḥ patanti adhas

original: BhP_11.05.004/1 dūre hari-kathāḥ kecid dūre cācyuta-kīrtanāḥ
analyzed: dūre hari kathāḥ kecid dūre ca acyuta kīrtanāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.004/3 striyaḥ śūdrādayaś caiva te 'nukampyā bhavādṛśām
analyzed: striyaḥ śūdra ādayaḥ ca eva te nukampyāḥ bhavādṛśām

original: BhP_11.05.005/1 vipro rājanya-vaiśyau vā hareḥ prāptāḥ padāntikam
analyzed: vipraḥ rājanya vaiśyau vā hareḥ prāptāḥ pada antikam

original: BhP_11.05.005/3 śrautena janmanāthāpi muhyanty āmnāya-vādinaḥ
analyzed: śrautena janmanā atha api muhyanti āmnāya vādinaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.006/1 karmaṇy akovidāḥ stabdhā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍita-māninaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇi akovidāḥ stabdhāḥ mūrkhāḥ paṇḍita māninaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.006/3 vadanti cāṭukān mūḍhā yayā mādhvyā girotsukāḥ
analyzed: vadanti cāṭukān mūḍhāḥ yayā mādhvyā girā utsukāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.007/1 rajasā ghora-saṅkalpāḥ kāmukā ahi-manyavaḥ
analyzed: rajasā ghora saṅkalpāḥ kāmukāḥ ahimanyavaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.007/3 dāmbhikā māninaḥ pāpā vihasanty acyuta-priyān
analyzed: dāmbhikāḥ māninaḥ pāpāḥ vihasanti acyuta priyān

original: BhP_11.05.008/1 vadanti te 'nyonyam upāsita-striyo gṛheṣu maithunya-pareṣu cāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: vadanti te nyonyam upāsita striyaḥ gṛheṣu maithunya pareṣu ca āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.008/3 yajanty asṛṣṭānna-vidhāna-dakṣiṇaṃ vṛttyai paraṃ ghnanti paśūn atad-vidaḥ
analyzed: yajanti a sṛṣṭa anna vidhāna dakṣiṇam vṛttyai param ghnanti paśūn a tad vidaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.009/1 śriyā vibhūtyābhijanena vidyayā tyāgena rūpeṇa balena karmaṇā
analyzed: śriyā vibhūtyā abhijanena vidyayā tyāgena rūpeṇa balena karmaṇā

original: BhP_11.05.009/3 jāta-smayenāndha-dhiyaḥ saheśvarān sato 'vamanyanti hari-priyān khalāḥ
analyzed: jāta smayena andha dhiyaḥ saha īśvarān satas vamanyanti hari priyān khalāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.010/1 sarveṣu śaśvat tanu-bhṛtsv avasthitaṃ
analyzed: sarveṣu śaśvat tanubhṛtsu avasthitam

original: BhP_11.05.010/2 yathā kham ātmānam abhīṣṭam īśvaram
analyzed: yathā kham ātmānam abhīṣṭam īśvaram

original: BhP_11.05.010/3 vedopagītaṃ ca na śṛṇvate 'budhā
analyzed: veda upagītam ca na śṛṇvate budhā

original: BhP_11.05.010/4 mano-rathānāṃ pravadanti vārtayā
analyzed: manorathānām pravadanti vārtayā

original: BhP_11.05.011/1 loke vyavāyāmiṣa-madya-sevā nityā hi jantor na hi tatra codanā
analyzed: loke vyavāya āmiṣa madya sevā nityā hi jantoḥ na hi tatra codanā

original: BhP_11.05.011/3 vyavasthitis teṣu vivāha-yajña surā-grahair āsu nivṛttir iṣṭā
analyzed: vyavasthitiḥ teṣu vivāha yajña surā grahaiḥ āsu nivṛttiḥ iṣṭā

original: BhP_11.05.012/1 dhanaṃ ca dharmaika-phalaṃ yato vai
analyzed: dhanam ca dharma eka phalam yatas vai

original: BhP_11.05.012/2 jñānaṃ sa-vijñānam anupraśānti
analyzed: jñānam sa vijñānam anu praśānti

original: BhP_11.05.012/3 gṛheṣu yuñjanti kalevarasya
analyzed: gṛheṣu yuñjanti kalevarasya

original: BhP_11.05.012/4 mṛtyuṃ na paśyanti duranta-vīryam
analyzed: mṛtyum na paśyanti duranta vīryam

original: BhP_11.05.013/1 yad ghrāṇa-bhakṣo vihitaḥ surāyās tathā paśor ālabhanaṃ na hiṃsā
analyzed: yat ghrāṇa bhakṣaḥ vihitaḥ surāyāḥ tathā paśoḥ ālabhanam na hiṃsā

original: BhP_11.05.013/3 evaṃ vyavāyaḥ prajayā na ratyā imaṃ viśuddhaṃ na viduḥ sva-dharmam
analyzed: evam vyavāyaḥ prajayā na ratyāḥ imam viśuddham na viduḥ svadharmam

original: BhP_11.05.014/1 ye tv anevaṃ-vido 'santaḥ stabdhāḥ sad-abhimāninaḥ
analyzed: ye tu santaḥ stabdhāḥ sat abhimāninaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.014/3 paśūn druhyanti viśrabdhāḥ pretya khādanti te ca tān
analyzed: paśūn druhyanti viśrabdhāḥ pretya khādanti te ca tān

original: BhP_11.05.015/1 dviṣantaḥ para-kāyeṣu svātmānaṃ harim īśvaram
analyzed: dviṣantaḥ para kāyeṣu svātmānam harim īśvaram

original: BhP_11.05.015/3 mṛtake sānubandhe 'smin baddha-snehāḥ patanty adhaḥ
analyzed: mṛtake sānubandhe smin baddhasnehāḥ patanti adhas

original: BhP_11.05.016/1 ye kaivalyam asamprāptā ye cātītāś ca mūḍhatām
analyzed: ye kaivalyam asamprāptāḥ ye ca atītāḥ ca mūḍha tām

original: BhP_11.05.016/3 trai-vargikā hy akṣaṇikā ātmānaṃ ghātayanti te
analyzed: traivargikāḥ hi akṣaṇikāḥ ātmānam ghātayanti te

original: BhP_11.05.017/1 eta ātma-hano 'śāntā ajñāne jñāna-māninaḥ
analyzed: ete ātma hanaḥ śāntāḥ ajñāne jñāna māninaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.017/3 sīdanty akṛta-kṛtyā vai kāla-dhvasta-manorathāḥ
analyzed: sīdanti akṛta kṛtyāḥ vai kāla dhvasta manorathāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.018/1 hitvātma-māyā-racitā gṛhāpatya-suhṛt-striyaḥ
analyzed: hitvā ātma māyā racitāḥ gṛha apatya suhṛd striyaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.018/3 tamo viśanty anicchanto vāsudeva-parāṅ-mukhāḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ viśanti an icchantaḥ vāsudeva parāṅmukhāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.019/0 śrī rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.05.019/1 kasmin kāle sa bhagavān kiṃ varṇaḥ kīdṛśo nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: kasmin kāle sa bhagavān kim varṇaḥ kīdṛśaḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: BhP_11.05.019/3 nāmnā vā kena vidhinā pūjyate tad ihocyatām
analyzed: nāmnā vā kena vidhinā pūjyate tat iha ucyatām

original: BhP_11.05.020/0 śrī-karabhājana uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_11.05.020/1 kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kalir ity eṣu keśavaḥ
analyzed: kṛtam tretā dvāparam ca kaliḥ iti eṣu keśavaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.020/3 nānā-varṇābhidhākāro nānaiva vidhinejyate
analyzed: nānā varṇa abhidhā ākāraḥ nānā eva vidhinā ijyate

original: BhP_11.05.021/1 kṛte śuklaś catur-bāhur jaṭilo valkalāmbaraḥ
analyzed: kṛte śuklaḥ catur bāhuḥ jaṭilaḥ valkala ambaraḥ

original: BhP_11.05.021/3 kṛṣṇājinopavītākṣān bibhrad daṇḍa-kamaṇḍalū
analyzed: kṛṣṇājina upavīta akṣān bibhrat daṇḍa kamaṇḍalū

original: BhP_11.05.022/1 manuṣyās tu tadā śāntā nirvairāḥ suhṛdaḥ samāḥ
analyzed: manuṣyāḥ tu tadā śāntāḥ nirvairāḥ suhṛdaḥ samāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.022/3 yajanti tapasā devaṃ śamena ca damena ca
analyzed: yajanti tapasā devam śamena ca damena ca

original: BhP_11.05.023/1 haṃsaḥ suparṇo vaikuṇṭho dharmo yogeśvaro 'malaḥ
BhP_11.05.023/3 īśvaraḥ puruṣo 'vyaktaḥ paramātmeti gīyate
analyzed: īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ vyaktaḥ paramātmā iti gīyate

original: BhP_11.05.024/1 tretāyāṃ rakta-varṇo 'sau catur-bāhus tri-mekhalaḥ
analyzed: tretāyām sau catur bāhuḥ tri mekhalaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.024/3 hiraṇya-keśas trayy-ātmā sruk-sruvādy-upalakṣaṇaḥ
BhP_11.05.025/1 taṃ tadā manujā devaṃ sarva-deva-mayaṃ harim
analyzed: tam tadā manujāḥ devam sarva deva mayam harim

original: BhP_11.05.025/3 yajanti vidyayā trayyā dharmiṣṭhā brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: yajanti vidyayā trayyā dharmiṣṭhāḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.026/1 viṣṇur yajñaḥ pṛśnigarbhaḥ sarvadeva urukramaḥ
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ yajñaḥ pṛśni garbhaḥ sarva devaḥ uru kramaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.026/3 vṛṣākapir jayantaś ca urugāya itīryate
analyzed: vṛṣākapiḥ jayantaḥ ca urugāyaḥ iti īryate

original: BhP_11.05.027/1 dvāpare bhagavāñ śyāmaḥ pīta-vāsā nijāyudhaḥ
analyzed: dvāpare bhagavān śyāmaḥ pīta vāsāḥ nija āyudhaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.027/3 śrīvatsādibhir aṅkaiś ca lakṣaṇair upalakṣitaḥ
analyzed: śrīvatsa ādibhiḥ aṅkaiḥ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ upalakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.028/1 taṃ tadā puruṣaṃ martyā mahā-rājopalakṣaṇam
analyzed: tam tadā puruṣam martyāḥ mahā rāja upalakṣaṇam

original: BhP_11.05.028/3 yajanti veda-tantrābhyāṃ paraṃ jijñāsavo nṛpa
analyzed: yajanti veda tantrābhyām param jijñāsavaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_11.05.029/1 namas te vāsudevāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ te vāsudevāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca

original: BhP_11.05.029/3 pradyumnāyāniruddhāya tubhyaṃ bhagavate namaḥ
analyzed: pradyumnāya aniruddhāya tubhyam bhagavate namaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.030/1 nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye puruṣāya mahātmane
analyzed: nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye puruṣāya mahātmane

original: BhP_11.05.030/3 viśveśvarāya viśvāya sarva-bhūtātmane namaḥ
analyzed: viśveśvarāya viśvāya sarva bhūta ātmane namaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.031/1 iti dvāpara urv-īśa stuvanti jagad-īśvaram
analyzed: iti dvāpare urvīśa stuvanti jagat īśvaram

original: BhP_11.05.031/3 nānā-tantra-vidhānena kalāv api tathā śṛṇu
analyzed: nānā tantra vidhānena kalau api tathā śṛṇu

original: BhP_11.05.032/1 kṛṣṇa-varṇaṃ tviṣākṛṣṇaṃ sāṅgopāṅgāstra-pārṣadam
analyzed: kṛṣṇa varṇam tviṣā kṛṣṇam sa aṅga upāṅga astra pārṣadam

original: BhP_11.05.032/3 yajñaiḥ saṅkīrtana-prāyair yajanti hi su-medhasaḥ
analyzed: yajñaiḥ saṅkīrtana prāyaiḥ yajanti hi sumedhasaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.033/1 dhyeyaṃ sadā paribhava-ghnam abhīṣṭa-dohaṃ
analyzed: dhyeyam sadā paribhava ghnam abhīṣṭa doham

original: BhP_11.05.033/2 tīrthāspadaṃ śiva-viriñci-nutaṃ śaraṇyam
analyzed: tīrtha āspadam śiva viriñci nutam śaraṇyam

original: BhP_11.05.033/3 bhṛtyārti-haṃ praṇata-pāla bhavābdhi-potaṃ
analyzed: bhṛtya ārti ham praṇata pāla bhava abdhi potam

original: BhP_11.05.033/4 vande mahā-puruṣa te caraṇāravindam
analyzed: vande mahāpuruṣa te caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_11.05.034/1 tyaktvā su-dustyaja-surepsita-rājya-lakṣmīṃ
analyzed: tyaktvā su dustyaja sura īpsita rājya lakṣmīm

original: BhP_11.05.034/2 dharmiṣṭha ārya-vacasā yad agād araṇyam
analyzed: dharmiṣṭhaḥ ārya vacasā yat agāt araṇyam

original: BhP_11.05.034/3 māyā-mṛgaṃ dayitayepsitam anvadhāvad
analyzed: māyāmṛgam dayitayā īpsitam anvadhāvat

original: BhP_11.05.034/4 vande mahā-puruṣa te caraṇāravindam
analyzed: vande mahāpuruṣa te caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_11.05.035/1 evaṃ yugānurūpābhyāṃ bhagavān yuga-vartibhiḥ
analyzed: evam yuga anurūpābhyām bhagavān yuga vartibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.05.035/3 manujair ijyate rājan śreyasām īśvaro hariḥ
analyzed: manujaiḥ ijyate rājan śreyasām īśvaraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_11.05.036/1 kaliṃ sabhājayanty āryā guṇa jñāḥ sāra-bhāginaḥ
analyzed: kalim sabhājayanti āryāḥ guṇa jñāḥ sāra bhāginaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.036/3 yatra saṅkīrtanenaiva sarva-svārtho 'bhilabhyate
analyzed: yatra saṅkīrtanena eva sarva svārthaḥ bhilabhyate

original: BhP_11.05.037/1 na hy ataḥ paramo lābho dehināṃ bhrāmyatām iha
analyzed: na hi atas paramaḥ lābhaḥ dehinām bhrāmyatām iha

original: BhP_11.05.037/3 yato vindeta paramāṃ śāntiṃ naśyati saṃsṛtiḥ
analyzed: yatas vindeta paramām śāntim naśyati saṃsṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.05.038/1 kṛtādiṣu prajā rājan kalāv icchanti sambhavam
analyzed: kṛta ādiṣu prajāḥ rājan kalau icchanti sambhavam

original: BhP_11.05.038/3 kalau khalu bhaviṣyanti nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: kalau khalu bhaviṣyanti nārāyaṇa parāyaṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.039/1 kvacit kvacin mahā-rāja draviḍeṣu ca bhūriśaḥ
analyzed: kvacid kvacid mahā rāja draviḍeṣu ca bhūriśas

original: BhP_11.05.039/3 tāmraparṇī nadī yatra kṛtamālā payasvinī
analyzed: tāmraparṇī nadī yatra kṛtamālā payasvinī

original: BhP_11.05.040/1 kāverī ca mahā-puṇyā pratīcī ca mahā-nadī
analyzed: kāverī ca mahāpuṇyā pratīcī ca mahā nadī

original: BhP_11.05.040/3 ye pibanti jalaṃ tāsāṃ manujā manujeśvara
analyzed: ye pibanti jalam tāsām manujāḥ manuja īśvara

original: BhP_11.05.040/5 prāyo bhaktā bhagavati vāsudeve 'malāśayāḥ
analyzed: prāyas bhaktāḥ bhagavati vāsudeve mala āśayāḥ

original: BhP_11.05.041/1 devarṣi-bhūtāpta-nṛṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ na kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan
analyzed: deva ṛṣi bhūta āpta nṛṇām pitṝṇām na kiṅkaraḥ na ayam ṛṇī ca rājan

original: BhP_11.05.041/3 sarvātmanā yaḥ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇyaṃ gato mukundaṃ parihṛtya kartam
analyzed: sarva ātmanā yaḥ śaraṇam śaraṇyam gataḥ mukundam parihṛtya kartam

original: BhP_11.05.042/1 sva-pāda-mūlam bhajataḥ priyasya tyaktānya-bhāvasya hariḥ pareśaḥ
analyzed: sva pāda mūlam bhajataḥ priyasya tyakta anya bhāvasya hariḥ para īśaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.042/3 vikarma yac cotpatitaṃ kathañcid dhunoti sarvaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: vikarma yat ca utpatitam kathañcid dhunoti sarvam hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.043/0 śrī-nārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_11.05.043/1 dharmān bhāgavatān itthaṃ śrutvātha mithileśvaraḥ
analyzed: dharmān bhāgavatān ittham śrutvā atha mithilā īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.05.043/3 jāyanteyān munīn prītaḥ sopādhyāyo hy apūjayat
analyzed: jāyanteyān munīn prītaḥ sa upādhyāyaḥ hi apūjayat

original: BhP_11.05.044/1 tato 'ntardadhire siddhāḥ sarva-lokasya paśyataḥ
analyzed: tatas ntardadhire siddhāḥ sarva lokasya paśyataḥ

original: BhP_11.05.044/3 rājā dharmān upātiṣṭhann avāpa paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: rājā dharmān upātiṣṭhan avāpa paramām gatim

original: BhP_11.05.045/1 tvam apy etān mahā-bhāga dharmān bhāgavatān śrutān
analyzed: tvam api etān mahābhāga dharmān bhāgavatān śrutān

original: BhP_11.05.045/3 āsthitaḥ śraddhayā yukto niḥsaṅgo yāsyase param
analyzed: āsthitaḥ śraddhayā yuktaḥ niḥsaṅgaḥ yāsyase param

original: BhP_11.05.046/1 yuvayoḥ khalu dampatyor yaśasā pūritaṃ jagat
analyzed: yuvayoḥ khalu dampatyoḥ yaśasā pūritam jagat

original: BhP_11.05.046/3 putratām agamad yad vāṃ bhagavān īśvaro hariḥ
analyzed: putra tām agamat yat vām bhagavān īśvaraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_11.05.047/1 darśanāliṅganālāpaiḥ śayanāsana-bhojanaiḥ
analyzed: darśana āliṅgana ālāpaiḥ śayana āsana bhojanaiḥ

original: BhP_11.05.047/3 ātmā vāṃ pāvitaḥ kṛṣṇe putra-snehaṃ prakurvatoḥ
analyzed: ātmā vām pāvitaḥ kṛṣṇe putra sneham prakurvatoḥ

original: BhP_11.05.048/1 vaireṇa yaṃ nṛpatayaḥ śiśupāla-pauṇḍra-
analyzed: vaireṇa yam nṛpatayaḥ śiśupāla pauṇḍra

original: BhP_11.05.048/2 śālvādayo gati-vilāsa-vilokanādyaiḥ
analyzed: śālva ādayaḥ gati vilāsa vilokana ādyaiḥ

original: BhP_11.05.048/3 dhyāyanta ākṛta-dhiyaḥ śayanāsanādau
analyzed: dhyāyantaḥ ākṛta dhiyaḥ śayana āsana ādau

original: BhP_11.05.048/4 tat-sāmyam āpur anurakta-dhiyāṃ punaḥ kim
analyzed: tad sāmyam āpuḥ anurakta dhiyām punar kim

original: BhP_11.05.049/1 māpatya-buddhim akṛthāḥ kṛṣṇe sarvātmanīśvare
analyzed: mā apatya buddhim akṛthāḥ kṛṣṇe sarva ātmani īśvare

original: BhP_11.05.049/3 māyā-manuṣya-bhāvena gūḍhaiśvarye pare 'vyaye
analyzed: māyā manuṣya bhāvena gūḍha aiśvarye pare vyaye

original: BhP_11.05.050/1 bhū-bhārāsura-rājanya- hantave guptaye satām
analyzed: bhū bhāra asura rājanya hantave guptaye satām

original: BhP_11.05.050/3 avatīrṇasya nirvṛtyai yaśo loke vitanyate
analyzed: avatīrṇasya nirvṛtyai yaśaḥ loke vitanyate

original: BhP_11.05.051/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.05.051/1 etac chrutvā mahā-bhāgo vasudevo 'ti-vismitaḥ
analyzed: etat śrutvā mahābhāgaḥ vasudevaḥ ti vismitaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.051/3 devakī ca mahā-bhāgā jahatur moham ātmanaḥ
analyzed: devakī ca mahābhāgā jahatuḥ moham ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.052/1 itihāsam imaṃ puṇyaṃ dhārayed yaḥ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: itihāsam imam puṇyam dhārayet yaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.05.052/3 sa vidhūyeha śamalaṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpate
analyzed: sa vidhūya iha śamalam brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: BhP_11.06.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.001/1 atha brahmātma-jaiḥ devaiḥ prajeśair āvṛto 'bhyagāt
analyzed: atha brahma ātmajaiḥ devaiḥ prajā īśaiḥ āvṛtaḥ bhyagāt

original: BhP_11.06.001/3 bhavaś ca bhūta-bhavyeśo yayau bhūta-gaṇair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: bhavaḥ ca bhūta bhavya īśaḥ yayau bhūta gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.002/1 indro marudbhir bhagavān ādityā vasavo 'śvinau
analyzed: indraḥ marudbhiḥ bhagavān ādityāḥ vasavaḥ śvinau

original: BhP_11.06.002/3 ṛbhavo 'ṅgiraso rudrā viśve sādhyāś ca devatāḥ
analyzed: ṛbhavaḥ ṅgirasaḥ rudrāḥ viśve sādhyāḥ ca devatāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.003/1 gandharvāpsaraso nāgāḥ siddha-cāraṇa-guhyakāḥ
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ nāgāḥ siddha cāraṇa guhyakāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.003/3 ṛṣayaḥ pitaraś caiva sa-vidyādhara-kinnarāḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ pitaraḥ ca eva savidyādhara kinnarāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.004/1 dvārakām upasañjagmuḥ sarve kṛṣṇa-didṛkṣavaḥ
analyzed: dvārakām upasañjagmuḥ sarve kṛṣṇa didṛkṣavaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.004/3 vapuṣā yena bhagavān nara-loka-manoramaḥ
analyzed: vapuṣā yena bhagavān nara loka manoramaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.004/5 yaśo vitene lokeṣu sarva-loka-malāpaham
analyzed: yaśaḥ vitene lokeṣu sarvaloka mala apaham

original: BhP_11.06.005/1 tasyāṃ vibhrājamānāyāṃ samṛddhāyāṃ maharddhibhiḥ
analyzed: tasyām vibhrājamānāyām samṛddhāyām mahā ṛddhibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.06.005/3 vyacakṣatāvitṛptākṣāḥ kṛṣṇam adbhuta-darśanam
analyzed: vyacakṣata a vitṛpta akṣāḥ kṛṣṇam adbhuta darśanam

original: BhP_11.06.006/1 svargodyānopagair mālyaiś chādayanto yudūttamam
analyzed: svarga udyāna upagaiḥ mālyaiḥ chādayantaḥ yudu uttamam

original: BhP_11.06.006/3 gīrbhiś citra-padārthābhis tuṣṭuvur jagad-īśvaram
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ citra padārthābhiḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ jagat īśvaram

original: BhP_11.06.007/0 śrī-devā ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī devāḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_11.06.007/1 natāḥ sma te nātha padāravindaṃ buddhīndriya-prāṇa-mano-vacobhiḥ
analyzed: natāḥ sma te nātha pada aravindam buddhīndriya prāṇa manaḥ vacobhiḥ

original: BhP_11.06.007/3 yac cintyate 'ntar hṛdi bhāva-yuktair mumukṣubhiḥ karma-mayoru-pāśāt
analyzed: yat cintyate ntar hṛdi bhāva yuktaiḥ mumukṣubhiḥ karma maya uru pāśāt

original: BhP_11.06.008/1 tvaṃ māyayā tri-guṇayātmani durvibhāvyaṃ
analyzed: tvam māyayā triguṇayā ātmani durvibhāvyam

original: BhP_11.06.008/2 vyaktaṃ sṛjasy avasi lumpasi tad-guṇa-sthaḥ
analyzed: vyaktam sṛjasi avasi lumpasi tad guṇa sthaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.008/3 naitair bhavān ajita karmabhir ajyate vai
analyzed: na etaiḥ bhavān ajita karmabhiḥ ajyate vai

original: BhP_11.06.008/4 yat sve sukhe 'vyavahite 'bhirato 'navadyaḥ
analyzed: yat sve sukhe vyavahite bhirataḥ navadyaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.009/1 śuddhir nṛṇāṃ na tu tatheḍya durāśayānāṃ
analyzed: śuddhiḥ nṛṇām na tu tathā īḍya durāśayānām

original: BhP_11.06.009/2 vidyā-śrutādhyayana-dāna-tapaḥ-kriyābhiḥ
analyzed: vidyā śruta adhyayana dāna tapaḥ kriyābhiḥ

original: BhP_11.06.009/3 sattvātmanām ṛṣabha te yaśasi pravṛddha-
analyzed: sattva ātmanām ṛṣabha te yaśasi pravṛddha

original: BhP_11.06.009/4 sac-chraddhayā śravaṇa-sambhṛtayā yathā syāt
analyzed: sat śraddhayā śravaṇa sambhṛtayā yathā syāt

original: BhP_11.06.010/1 syān nas tavāṅghrir aśubhāśaya-dhūmaketuḥ
analyzed: syāt naḥ tava aṅghriḥ aśubha āśaya dhūmaketuḥ

original: BhP_11.06.010/2 kṣemāya yo munibhir ārdra-hṛdohyamānaḥ
analyzed: kṣemāya yaḥ munibhiḥ ārdra hṛdā uhyamānaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.010/3 yaḥ sātvataiḥ sama-vibhūtaya ātmavadbhir
analyzed: yaḥ sātvataiḥ sama vibhūtaye ātmavadbhiḥ

original: BhP_11.06.010/4 vyūhe 'rcitaḥ savanaśaḥ svar-atikramāya
analyzed: vyūhe rcitaḥ savanaśas svaratikramāya

original: BhP_11.06.011/1 yas cintyate prayata-pāṇibhir adhvarāgnau
analyzed: yaḥ cintyate prayata pāṇibhiḥ adhvara agnau

original: BhP_11.06.011/2 trayyā nirukta-vidhineśa havir gṛhītvā
analyzed: trayyāḥ nirukta vidhinā īśa haviḥ gṛhītvā

original: BhP_11.06.011/3 adhyātma-yoga uta yogibhir ātma-māyāṃ
analyzed: adhyātma yogaḥ uta yogibhiḥ ātma māyām

original: BhP_11.06.011/4 jijñāsubhiḥ parama-bhāgavataiḥ parīṣṭaḥ
analyzed: jijñāsubhiḥ parama bhāgavataiḥ parīṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.012/1 paryuṣṭayā tava vibho vana-mālayeyaṃ
analyzed: paryuṣṭayā tava vibho vanamālayā iyam

original: BhP_11.06.012/2 saṃspārdhinī bhagavatī pratipatnī-vac chrīḥ
analyzed: saṃspārdhinī bhagavatī pratipatnī vat śrīḥ

original: BhP_11.06.012/3 yaḥ su-praṇītam amuyārhaṇam ādadan no
analyzed: yaḥ su praṇītam amuyā arhaṇam ādadat naḥ

original: BhP_11.06.012/4 bhūyāt sadāṅghrir aśubhāśaya-dhūmaketuḥ
analyzed: bhūyāt sadā aṅghriḥ aśubha āśaya dhūmaketuḥ

original: BhP_11.06.013/1 ketus tri-vikrama-yutas tri-patat-patāko
BhP_11.06.013/2 yas te bhayābhaya-karo 'sura-deva-camvoḥ
analyzed: yaḥ te sura deva camvoḥ

original: BhP_11.06.013/3 svargāya sādhuṣu khaleṣv itarāya bhūman
analyzed: svargāya sādhuṣu khaleṣu itarāya bhūman

original: BhP_11.06.013/4 padaḥ punātu bhagavan bhajatām aghaṃ naḥ
analyzed: padaḥ punātu bhagavan bhajatām agham naḥ

original: BhP_11.06.014/1 nasy ota-gāva iva yasya vaśe bhavanti
analyzed: nasi otagāvaḥ iva yasya vaśe bhavanti

original: BhP_11.06.014/2 brahmādayas tanu-bhṛto mithur ardyamānāḥ
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ tanubhṛtaḥ mithus ardyamānāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.014/3 kālasya te prakṛti-pūruṣayoḥ parasya
analyzed: kālasya te prakṛti pūruṣayoḥ parasya

original: BhP_11.06.014/4 śaṃ nas tanotu caraṇaḥ puruṣottamasya
analyzed: śam naḥ tanotu caraṇaḥ puruṣottamasya

original: BhP_11.06.015/1 asyāsi hetur udaya-sthiti-saṃyamānām
analyzed: asya asi hetuḥ udaya sthiti saṃyamānām

original: BhP_11.06.015/2 avyakta-jīva-mahatām api kālam āhuḥ
analyzed: avyakta jīva mahatām api kālam āhuḥ

original: BhP_11.06.015/3 so 'yaṃ tri-ṇābhir akhilāpacaye pravṛttaḥ
analyzed: saḥ yam triṇābhiḥ akhila apacaye pravṛttaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.015/4 kālo gabhīra-raya uttama-pūruṣas tvam
analyzed: kālaḥ gabhīra rayaḥ uttama pūruṣaḥ tvam

original: BhP_11.06.016/1 tvattaḥ pumān samadhigamya yayāsya vīryaṃ
analyzed: tvattaḥ pumān samadhigamya yayā asya vīryam

original: BhP_11.06.016/2 dhatte mahāntam iva garbham amogha-vīryaḥ
analyzed: dhatte mahāntam iva garbham amogha vīryaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.016/3 so 'yaṃ tayānugata ātmana āṇḍa-kośaṃ
analyzed: saḥ yam tayā anugataḥ ātmanaḥ āṇḍakośam

original: BhP_11.06.016/4 haimaṃ sasarja bahir āvaraṇair upetam
analyzed: haimam sasarja bahis āvaraṇaiḥ upetam

original: BhP_11.06.017/1 tat tasthūṣaś ca jagataś ca bhavān adhīśo
analyzed: tat ca jagataḥ ca bhavān adhīśo

original: BhP_11.06.017/2 yan māyayottha-guṇa-vikriyayopanītān
analyzed: yat māyayā uttha guṇa vikriyayā upanītān

original: BhP_11.06.017/3 arthāñ juṣann api hṛṣīka-pate na lipto
analyzed: arthām juṣan api hṛṣīka pate na

original: BhP_11.06.017/4 ye 'nye svataḥ parihṛtād api bibhyati sma
analyzed: ye nye svatas parihṛtāt api bibhyati sma

original: BhP_11.06.018/1 smāyāvaloka-lava-darśita-bhāva-hāri-
BhP_11.06.018/2 bhrū-maṇḍala-prahita-saurata-mantra-śauṇḍaiḥ
analyzed: bhrūmaṇḍala prahita saurata mantra śauṇḍaiḥ

original: BhP_11.06.018/3 patnyas tu ṣoḍaśa-sahasram anaṅga-bāṇair
analyzed: patnyaḥ tu ṣoḍaśa sahasram anaṅga bāṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.06.018/4 yasyendriyaṃ vimathituṃ karaṇair na vibhvyaḥ
analyzed: yasya indriyam vimathitum karaṇaiḥ na vibhvyaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.019/1 vibhvyas tavāmṛta-kathoda-vahās tri-lokyāḥ
analyzed: vibhvyaḥ tava amṛta kathā uda vahāḥ trilokyāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.019/2 pādāvane-ja-saritaḥ śamalāni hantum
analyzed: pādāvaneja saritaḥ śamalāni hantum

original: BhP_11.06.019/3 ānuśravaṃ śrutibhir aṅghri-jam aṅga-saṅgais
analyzed: ānuśravam śrutibhiḥ aṅghri jam aṅgasaṅgaiḥ

original: BhP_11.06.019/4 tīrtha-dvayaṃ śuci-ṣadas ta upaspṛśanti
analyzed: tīrtha dvayam śuciṣadaḥ te upaspṛśanti

original: BhP_11.06.020/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.020/1 ity abhiṣṭūya vibudhaiḥ seśaḥ śata-dhṛtir harim
analyzed: iti abhiṣṭūya vibudhaiḥ sa īśaḥ śatadhṛtiḥ harim

original: BhP_11.06.020/3 abhyabhāṣata govindaṃ praṇamyāmbaram āśritaḥ
analyzed: abhyabhāṣata govindam praṇamya ambaram āśritaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.021/0 śrī-brahmovāca
analyzed: śrī brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.021/1 bhūmer bhārāvatārāya purā vijñāpitaḥ prabho
analyzed: bhūmeḥ bhāra avatārāya purā vijñāpitaḥ prabho

original: BhP_11.06.021/3 tvam asmābhir aśeṣātman tat tathaivopapāditam
analyzed: tvam asmābhiḥ aśeṣa ātman tat tathā eva upapāditam

original: BhP_11.06.022/1 dharmaś ca sthāpitaḥ satsu satya-sandheṣu vai tvayā
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca sthāpitaḥ satsu satya sandheṣu vai tvayā

original: BhP_11.06.022/3 kīrtiś ca dikṣu vikṣiptā sarva-loka-malāpahā
analyzed: kīrtiḥ ca dikṣu vikṣiptā sarvaloka mala apahā

original: BhP_11.06.023/1 avatīrya yador vaṃśe bibhrad rūpam anuttamam
analyzed: avatīrya yadoḥ vaṃśe bibhrat rūpam anuttamam

original: BhP_11.06.023/3 karmāṇy uddāma-vṛttāni hitāya jagato 'kṛthāḥ
analyzed: karmāṇi uddāma vṛttāni hitāya jagataḥ kṛthāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.024/1 yāni te caritānīśa manuṣyāḥ sādhavaḥ kalau
analyzed: yāni te caritāni īśa manuṣyāḥ sādhavaḥ kalau

original: BhP_11.06.024/3 śṛṇvantaḥ kīrtayantaś ca tariṣyanty añjasā tamaḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvantaḥ kīrtayantaḥ ca tariṣyanti añjasā tamaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.025/1 yadu-vaṃśe 'vatīrṇasya bhavataḥ puruṣottama
analyzed: yadu vaṃśe vatīrṇasya bhavataḥ puruṣottama

original: BhP_11.06.025/3 śarac-chataṃ vyatīyāya pañca-viṃśādhikaṃ prabho
analyzed: śarad śatam vyatīyāya pañcaviṃśa adhikam prabho

original: BhP_11.06.026/1 nādhunā te 'khilādhāra deva-kāryāvaśeṣitam
analyzed: na adhunā te khila ādhāra deva kārya avaśeṣitam

original: BhP_11.06.026/3 kulaṃ ca vipra-śāpena naṣṭa-prāyam abhūd idam
analyzed: kulam ca vipra śāpena naṣṭa prāyam abhūt idam

original: BhP_11.06.027/1 tataḥ sva-dhāma paramaṃ viśasva yadi manyase
analyzed: tatas sva dhāma paramam viśasva yadi manyase

original: BhP_11.06.027/3 sa-lokāl loka-pālān naḥ pāhi vaikuṇṭha-kiṅkarān
analyzed: salokān lokapālān naḥ pāhi vaikuṇṭha kiṅkarān

original: BhP_11.06.028/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.028/1 avadhāritam etan me yad āttha vibudheśvara
analyzed: avadhāritam etat me yat āttha vibudha īśvara

original: BhP_11.06.028/3 kṛtaṃ vaḥ kāryam akhilaṃ bhūmer bhāro 'vatāritaḥ
analyzed: kṛtam vaḥ kāryam akhilam bhūmeḥ bhāraḥ vatāritaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.029/1 tad idaṃ yādava-kulaṃ vīrya-śaurya-śriyoddhatam
analyzed: tat idam yādava kulam vīrya śaurya śriyā uddhatam

original: BhP_11.06.029/3 lokaṃ jighṛkṣad ruddhaṃ me velayeva mahārṇavaḥ
analyzed: lokam jighṛkṣat ruddham me velayā iva mahā arṇavaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.030/1 yady asaṃhṛtya dṛptānāṃ yadūnāṃ vipulaṃ kulam
analyzed: yadi a saṃhṛtya dṛptānām yadūnām vipulam kulam

original: BhP_11.06.030/3 gantāsmy anena loko 'yam udvelena vinaṅkṣyati
analyzed: gantā asmi anena lokaḥ yam udvelena vinaṅkṣyati

original: BhP_11.06.031/1 idānīṃ nāśa ārabdhaḥ kulasya dvija-śāpa-jaḥ
analyzed: idānīm nāśaḥ ārabdhaḥ kulasya dvija śāpa jaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.031/3 yāsyāmi bhavanaṃ brahmann etad-ante tavānagha
analyzed: yāsyāmi bhavanam brahman etat ante tava anagha

original: BhP_11.06.032/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.032/1 ity ukto loka-nāthena svayam-bhūḥ praṇipatya tam
analyzed: iti uktaḥ loka nāthena svayambhūḥ praṇipatya tam

original: BhP_11.06.032/3 saha deva-gaṇair devaḥ sva-dhāma samapadyata
analyzed: saha deva gaṇaiḥ devaḥ sva dhāma samapadyata

original: BhP_11.06.033/1 atha tasyāṃ mahotpātān dvāravatyāṃ samutthitān
analyzed: atha tasyām mahā utpātān dvāravatyām samutthitān

original: BhP_11.06.033/3 vilokya bhagavān āha yadu-vṛddhān samāgatān
analyzed: vilokya bhagavān āha yadu vṛddhān samāgatān

original: BhP_11.06.034/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.034/1 ete vai su-mahotpātā vyuttiṣṭhantīha sarvataḥ
analyzed: ete vai su mahā utpātāḥ vyuttiṣṭhanti iha sarvatas

original: BhP_11.06.034/3 śāpaś ca naḥ kulasyāsīd brāhmaṇebhyo duratyayaḥ
analyzed: śāpaḥ ca naḥ kulasya āsīt brāhmaṇebhyaḥ duratyayaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.035/1 na vastavyam ihāsmābhir jijīviṣubhir āryakāḥ
analyzed: na vastavyam iha asmābhiḥ jijīviṣubhiḥ āryakāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.035/3 prabhāsaṃ su-mahat-puṇyaṃ yāsyāmo 'dyaiva mā ciram
analyzed: prabhāsam su mahat puṇyam yāsyāmaḥ dyā eva mā ciram

original: BhP_11.06.036/1 yatra snātvā dakṣa-śāpād gṛhīto yakṣmaṇodu-rāṭ
analyzed: yatra snātvā dakṣa śāpāt gṛhītaḥ yakṣmaṇā udurāj

original: BhP_11.06.036/3 vimuktaḥ kilbiṣāt sadyo bheje bhūyaḥ kalodayam
analyzed: vimuktaḥ kilbiṣāt sadyas bheje bhūyas kalā udayam

original: BhP_11.06.037/1 vayaṃ ca tasminn āplutya tarpayitvā pitṝn surān
analyzed: vayam ca tasmin āplutya tarpayitvā pitṝn surān

original: BhP_11.06.037/3 bhojayitvoṣijo viprān nānā-guṇavatāndhasā
analyzed: viprān nānā guṇavatā andhasā

original: BhP_11.06.038/1 teṣu dānāni pātreṣu śraddhayoptvā mahānti vai
analyzed: teṣu dānāni pātreṣu śraddhayā uptvā mahānti vai

original: BhP_11.06.038/3 vṛjināni tariṣyāmo dānair naubhir ivārṇavam
analyzed: vṛjināni tariṣyāmaḥ dānaiḥ naubhiḥ iva arṇavam

original: BhP_11.06.039/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.039/1 evaṃ bhagavatādiṣṭā yādavāḥ kuru-nandana
analyzed: evam bhagavatā ādiṣṭāḥ yādavāḥ kuru nandana

original: BhP_11.06.039/3 gantuṃ kṛta-dhiyas tīrthaṃ syandanān samayūyujan
analyzed: gantum kṛta dhiyaḥ tīrtham syandanān samayūyujan

original: BhP_11.06.040/1 tan nirīkṣyoddhavo rājan śrutvā bhagavatoditam
analyzed: tat nirīkṣya uddhavaḥ rājan śrutvā bhagavatā uditam

original: BhP_11.06.040/3 dṛṣṭvāriṣṭāni ghorāṇi nityaṃ kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ariṣṭāni ghorāṇi nityam kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_11.06.041/1 vivikta upasaṅgamya jagatām īśvareśvaram
analyzed: viviktaḥ upasaṅgamya jagatām īśvara īśvaram

original: BhP_11.06.041/3 praṇamya śirisā pādau prāñjalis tam abhāṣata
analyzed: praṇamya śirisā pādau prāñjaliḥ tam abhāṣata

original: BhP_11.06.042/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.042/1 deva-deveśa yogeśa puṇya-śravaṇa-kīrtana
BhP_11.06.042/3 saṃhṛtyaitat kulaṃ nūnaṃ lokaṃ santyakṣyate bhavān
analyzed: saṃhṛtya etat kulam nūnam lokam santyakṣyate bhavān

original: BhP_11.06.042/5 vipra-śāpaṃ samartho 'pi pratyahan na yad īśvaraḥ
analyzed: vipra śāpam samarthaḥ pi pratyahan na yat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.06.043/1 nāhaṃ tavāṅghri-kamalaṃ kṣaṇārdham api keśava
analyzed: na aham tava aṅghri kamalam kṣaṇa ardham api keśava

original: BhP_11.06.043/3 tyaktuṃ samutsahe nātha sva-dhāma naya mām api
analyzed: tyaktum samutsahe nātha sva dhāma naya mām api

original: BhP_11.06.044/1 tava vikrīḍitaṃ kṛṣṇa nṛnāṃ parama-maṅgalam
analyzed: tava vikrīḍitam kṛṣṇa nṛnām parama maṅgalam

original: BhP_11.06.044/3 karṇa-pīyūṣam āsādya tyajanty anya-spṛhāṃ janāḥ
analyzed: karṇa pīyūṣam āsādya tyajanti anya spṛhām janāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.045/1 śayyāsanāṭana-sthāna- snāna-krīḍāśanādiṣu
analyzed: śayyā āsana aṭana sthāna snāna krīḍā aśana ādiṣu

original: BhP_11.06.045/3 kathaṃ tvāṃ priyam ātmānaṃ vayaṃ bhaktās tyajema hi
analyzed: katham tvām priyam ātmānam vayam bhaktāḥ tyajema hi

original: BhP_11.06.046/1 tvayopabhukta-srag-gandha- vāso-'laṅkāra-carcitāḥ
analyzed: tvayā upabhukta sraj gandha vāsas ulaṅkāra carcitāḥ
