original: BhP_11.06.046/3 ucchiṣṭa-bhojino dāsās tava māyāṃ jayema hi
analyzed: ucchiṣṭa bhojinaḥ dāsāḥ tava māyām jayema hi

original: BhP_11.06.047/1 vāta-vasanā ya ṛṣayaḥ śramaṇā ūrdhra-manthinaḥ
analyzed: vāta vasanāḥ ye ṛṣayaḥ śramaṇāḥ ūrdhra manthinaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.047/3 brahmākhyaṃ dhāma te yānti śāntāḥ sannyāsīno 'malāḥ
analyzed: brahma ākhyam dhāma te yānti śāntāḥ sannyāsīnaḥ malāḥ

original: BhP_11.06.048/1 vayaṃ tv iha mahā-yogin bhramantaḥ karma-vartmasu
analyzed: vayam tu iha mahāyogin bhramantaḥ karma vartmasu

original: BhP_11.06.048/3 tvad-vārtayā tariṣyāmas tāvakair dustaraṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: tvad vārtayā tariṣyāmaḥ tāvakaiḥ dustaram tamaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.049/1 smarantaḥ kīrtayantas te kṛtāni gaditāni ca
analyzed: smarantaḥ kīrtayantaḥ te kṛtāni gaditāni ca

original: BhP_11.06.049/3 gaty-utsmitekṣaṇa-kṣveli yan nṛ-loka-viḍambanam
analyzed: yat nṛ loka viḍambanam

original: BhP_11.06.050/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.06.050/1 evaṃ vijñāpito rājan bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: evam vijñāpitaḥ rājan bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_11.06.050/3 ekāntinaṃ priyaṃ bhṛtyam uddhavaṃ samabhāṣata
analyzed: ekāntinam priyam bhṛtyam uddhavam samabhāṣata

original: BhP_11.07.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.07.001/1 yad āttha māṃ mahā-bhāga tac-cikīrṣitam eva me
analyzed: yat āttha mām mahābhāga eva me

original: BhP_11.07.001/3 brahmā bhavo loka-pālāḥ svar-vāsaṃ me 'bhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: brahmā bhavaḥ lokapālāḥ svar vāsam me bhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.002/1 mayā niṣpāditaṃ hy atra deva-kāryam aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: mayā niṣpāditam hi atra deva kāryam aśeṣatas

original: BhP_11.07.002/3 yad-artham avatīrṇo 'ham aṃśena brahmaṇārthitaḥ
analyzed: yad artham avatīrṇaḥ ham aṃśena brahmaṇā arthitaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.003/1 kulaṃ vai śāpa-nirdagdhaṃ naṅkṣyaty anyonya-vigrahāt
analyzed: kulam vai śāpa nirdagdham naṅkṣyati anyonya vigrahāt

original: BhP_11.07.003/3 samudraḥ saptame hy enāṃ purīṃ ca plāvayiṣyati
analyzed: samudraḥ saptame hi enām purīm ca plāvayiṣyati

original: BhP_11.07.004/1 yarhy evāyaṃ mayā tyakto loko 'yaṃ naṣṭa-maṅgalaḥ
analyzed: yarhi eva ayam mayā tyaktaḥ lokaḥ yam naṣṭa maṅgalaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.004/3 bhaviṣyaty acirāt sādho kalināpi nirākṛtaḥ
analyzed: bhaviṣyati acirāt sādho kalinā api nirākṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.005/1 na vastavyaṃ tvayaiveha mayā tyakte mahī-tale
analyzed: na vastavyam tvayā eva iha mayā tyakte mahī tale

original: BhP_11.07.005/3 jano 'bhadra-rucir bhadra bhaviṣyati kalau yuge
analyzed: janaḥ bhadra ruciḥ bhadra bhaviṣyati kalau yuge

original: BhP_11.07.006/1 tvaṃ tu sarvaṃ parityajya snehaṃ sva-jana-bandhuṣu
analyzed: tvam tu sarvam parityajya sneham sva jana bandhuṣu

original: BhP_11.07.006/3 mayy āveśya manaḥ saṃyak sama-dṛg vicarasva gām
analyzed: mayi āveśya manaḥ saṃyak samadṛś vicarasva gām

original: BhP_11.07.007/1 yad idaṃ manasā vācā cakṣurbhyāṃ śravaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: yat idam manasā vācā cakṣurbhyām śravaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.007/3 naśvaraṃ gṛhyamāṇaṃ ca viddhi māyā-mano-mayam
analyzed: naśvaram gṛhyamāṇam ca viddhi māyā manaḥ mayam

original: BhP_11.07.008/1 puṃso 'yuktasya nānārtho bhramaḥ sa guṇa-doṣa-bhāk
analyzed: puṃsaḥ yuktasya nānārthaḥ bhramaḥ sa guṇa doṣa bhāj

original: BhP_11.07.008/3 karmākarma-vikarmeti guṇa-doṣa-dhiyo bhidā
analyzed: karma akarma vikarma iti guṇa doṣa dhiyaḥ bhidā

original: BhP_11.07.009/1 tasmād yuktendriya-grāmo yukta-citta idam jagat
analyzed: tasmāt yukta indriya grāmaḥ yukta cittaḥ idam jagat

original: BhP_11.07.009/3 ātmanīkṣasva vitatam ātmānaṃ mayy adhīśvare
analyzed: ātmani īkṣasva vitatam ātmānam mayi adhīśvare

original: BhP_11.07.010/1 jñāna-vijñāna-saṃyukta ātma-bhūtaḥ śarīriṇām
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna saṃyuktaḥ ātma bhūtaḥ śarīriṇām

original: BhP_11.07.010/3 atmānubhava-tuṣṭātmā nāntarāyair vihanyase
analyzed: na antarāyaiḥ vihanyase

original: BhP_11.07.011/1 doṣa-buddhyobhayātīto niṣedhān na nivartate
analyzed: doṣa buddhyā ubhaya atītaḥ niṣedhāt na nivartate

original: BhP_11.07.011/3 guṇa-buddhyā ca vihitaṃ na karoti yathārbhakaḥ
analyzed: guṇa buddhyā ca vihitam na karoti yathā arbhakaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.012/1 sarva-bhūta-suhṛc chānto jñāna-vijñāna-niścayaḥ
BhP_11.07.012/3 paśyan mad-ātmakaṃ viśvaṃ na vipadyeta vai punaḥ
analyzed: paśyan mad ātmakam viśvam na vipadyeta vai punar

original: BhP_11.07.013/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.07.013/1 ity ādiṣṭo bhagavatā mahā-bhāgavato nṛpa
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭaḥ bhagavatā mahā bhāgavataḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_11.07.013/3 uddhavaḥ praṇipatyāha tattvaṃ jijñāsur acyutam
analyzed: uddhavaḥ tattvam jijñāsuḥ acyutam

original: BhP_11.07.014/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.07.014/1 yogeśa yoga-vinyāsa yogātman yoga-sambhava
BhP_11.07.014/3 niḥśreyasāya me proktas tyāgaḥ sannyāsa-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: niḥśreyasāya me proktaḥ tyāgaḥ sannyāsa lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.015/1 tyāgo 'yaṃ duṣkaro bhūman kāmānāṃ viṣayātmabhiḥ
analyzed: tyāgaḥ yam duṣkaraḥ bhūman kāmānām viṣaya ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.015/3 sutarāṃ tvayi sarvātmann abhaktair iti me matiḥ
analyzed: sutarām tvayi sarvātman abhaktaiḥ iti me matiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.016/1 so 'haṃ mamāham iti mūḍha-matir vigāḍhas
analyzed: saḥ ham mama aham iti mūḍha matiḥ vigāḍhaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.016/2 tvan-māyayā viracitātmani sānubandhe
analyzed: tvad māyayā viracita ātmani sa anubandhe

original: BhP_11.07.016/3 tat tv añjasā nigaditaṃ bhavatā yathāhaṃ
analyzed: tat tu añjasā nigaditam bhavatā yathā aham

original: BhP_11.07.016/4 saṃsādhayāmi bhagavann anuśādhi bhṛtyam
analyzed: saṃsādhayāmi bhagavan anuśādhi bhṛtyam

original: BhP_11.07.017/1 satyasya te sva-dṛśa ātmana ātmano 'nyaṃ
analyzed: satyasya te svadṛśaḥ ātmanaḥ ātmanaḥ nyaṃ

original: BhP_11.07.017/2 vaktāram īśa vibudheṣv api nānucakṣe
analyzed: vaktāram īśa vibudheṣu api na anucakṣe

original: BhP_11.07.017/3 sarve vimohita-dhiyas tava māyayeme
analyzed: sarve vimohita dhiyaḥ tava māyayā ime

original: BhP_11.07.017/4 brahmādayas tanu-bhṛto bahir-artha-bhāvāḥ
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ tanubhṛtaḥ bahirartha bhāvāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.018/1 tasmād bhavantam anavadyam ananta-pāraṃ
analyzed: tasmāt bhavantam anavadyam ananta pāram

original: BhP_11.07.018/2 sarva-jñam īśvaram akuṇṭha-vikuṇṭha-dhiṣṇyam
BhP_11.07.018/3 nirviṇṇa-dhīr aham u he vṛjinābhitapto
analyzed: nirviṇṇa dhīḥ aham u he vṛjina abhitapto

original: BhP_11.07.018/4 nārāyaṇaṃ nara-sakhaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye
analyzed: nārāyaṇam narasakham śaraṇam prapadye

original: BhP_11.07.019/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.07.019/1 prāyeṇa manujā loke loka-tattva-vicakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: prāyeṇa manujāḥ loke loka tattva vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.019/3 samuddharanti hy ātmānam ātmanaivāśubhāśayāt
analyzed: samuddharanti hi ātmānam ātmanā eva aśubha āśayāt

original: BhP_11.07.020/1 ātmano gurur ātmaiva puruṣasya viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ guruḥ ātmā eva puruṣasya viśeṣataḥ

original: BhP_11.07.020/3 yat pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ śreyo 'sāv anuvindate
analyzed: yat pratyakṣa anumānābhyām śreyaḥ sau anuvindate

original: BhP_11.07.021/1 puruṣatve ca māṃ dhīrāḥ sāṅkhya-yoga-viśāradāḥ
analyzed: puruṣa tve ca mām dhīrāḥ sāṅkhya yoga viśāradāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.021/3 āvistarāṃ prapaśyanti sarva-śakty-upabṛṃhitam
analyzed: āvistarām prapaśyanti sarva śakti upabṛṃhitam

original: BhP_11.07.022/1 eka-dvi-tri-catus-pādo bahu-pādas tathāpadaḥ
analyzed: eka dvi tri catur pādaḥ bahu pādaḥ tathā apadaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.022/3 bahvyaḥ santi puraḥ sṛṣṭās tāsāṃ me pauruṣī priyā
analyzed: bahvyaḥ santi puraḥ sṛṣṭāḥ tāsām me pauruṣī priyā

original: BhP_11.07.023/1 atra māṃ mṛgayanty addhā yuktā hetubhir īśvaram
analyzed: atra mām mṛgayanti addhā yuktāḥ hetubhiḥ īśvaram

original: BhP_11.07.023/3 gṛhyamāṇair guṇair liṅgair agrāhyam anumānataḥ
analyzed: gṛhyamāṇaiḥ guṇaiḥ liṅgaiḥ agrāhyam anumānataḥ

original: BhP_11.07.024/1 atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
analyzed: atrā api udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam

original: BhP_11.07.024/3 avadhūtasya saṃvādaṃ yador amita-tejasaḥ
analyzed: avadhūtasya saṃvādam yadoḥ amita tejasaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.025/1 avadhūtaṃ dviyaṃ kañcic carantam akuto-bhayam
analyzed: avadhūtam kañcid carantam akutobhayam

original: BhP_11.07.025/3 kaviṃ nirīkṣya taruṇaṃ yaduḥ papraccha dharma-vit
analyzed: kavim nirīkṣya taruṇam yaduḥ papraccha dharma vid

original: BhP_11.07.026/0 śrī-yadur uvāca
analyzed: śrī yaduḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.07.026/1 kuto buddhir iyaṃ brahmann akartuḥ su-viśāradā
analyzed: kutas buddhiḥ iyam brahman akartuḥ su viśāradā

original: BhP_11.07.026/3 yām āsādya bhavāl lokaṃ vidvāṃś carati bāla-vat
analyzed: yām āsādya bhavān lokam vidvān carati bāla vat

original: BhP_11.07.027/1 prāyo dharmārtha-kāmeṣu vivitsāyāṃ ca mānavāḥ
analyzed: prāyas dharma artha kāmeṣu vivitsāyām ca mānavāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.027/3 hetunaiva samīhanta āyuṣo yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ
analyzed: hetunā eva samīhante āyuṣaḥ yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.028/1 tvaṃ tu kalpaḥ kavir dakṣaḥ su-bhago 'mṛta-bhāṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tvam tu kalpaḥ kaviḥ dakṣaḥ subhagaḥ mṛta bhāṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.028/3 na kartā nehase kiñcij jaḍonmatta-piśāca-vat
analyzed: na kartā na īhase kiñcid jaḍa unmatta piśāca vat

original: BhP_11.07.029/1 janeṣu dahyamāneṣu kāma-lobha-davāgninā
analyzed: janeṣu dahyamāneṣu kāma lobha davāgninā

original: BhP_11.07.029/3 na tapyase 'gninā mukto gaṅgāmbhaḥ-stha iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: na tapyase gninā muktaḥ gaṅgā ambhaḥ sthaḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.030/1 tvaṃ hi naḥ pṛcchatāṃ brahmann ātmany ānanda-kāraṇam
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ pṛcchatām brahman ātmani ānanda kāraṇam

original: BhP_11.07.030/3 brūhi sparśa-vihīnasya bhavataḥ kevalātmanaḥ
analyzed: brūhi sparśa vihīnasya bhavataḥ kevala ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.031/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.07.031/1 yadunaivaṃ mahā-bhāgo brahmaṇyena su-medhasā
analyzed: yadunā evam mahābhāgaḥ brahmaṇyena sumedhasā

original: BhP_11.07.031/3 pṛṣṭaḥ sabhājitaḥ prāha praśrayāvanataṃ dvijaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ sabhājitaḥ prāha praśraya avanatam dvijaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.032/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: śrī brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.07.032/1 santi me guravo rājan bahavo buddhy-upaśritāḥ
analyzed: santi me guravaḥ rājan bahavaḥ buddhi upaśritāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.032/3 yato buddhim upādāya mukto 'ṭāmīha tān śṛṇu
analyzed: yatas buddhim upādāya tān śṛṇu

original: BhP_11.07.033/1 pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo 'gniś candramā raviḥ
analyzed: pṛthivī vāyuḥ ākāśam āpaḥ gniḥ candramāḥ raviḥ

original: BhP_11.07.033/3 kapoto 'jagaraḥ sindhuḥ pataṅgo madhukṛd gajaḥ
analyzed: kapotaḥ jagaraḥ sindhuḥ pataṅgaḥ madhukṛt gajaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.034/1 madhu-hā hariṇo mīnaḥ piṅgalā kuraro 'rbhakaḥ
analyzed: madhu hā hariṇaḥ mīnaḥ piṅgalā kuraraḥ rbhakaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.034/3 kumārī śara-kṛt sarpa ūrṇanābhiḥ supeśakṛt
analyzed: kumārī śara kṛt sarpaḥ ūrṇanābhiḥ supeśa kṛt

original: BhP_11.07.035/1 ete me guravo rājan catur-viṃśatir āśritāḥ
analyzed: ete me guravaḥ rājan caturviṃśatiḥ āśritāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.035/3 śikṣā vṛttibhir eteṣām anvaśikṣam ihātmanaḥ
analyzed: śikṣāḥ vṛttibhiḥ eteṣām anvaśikṣam iha ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.036/1 yato yad anuśikṣāmi yathā vā nāhuṣātmaja
analyzed: yatas yat anuśikṣāmi yathā vā nāhuṣa ātmaja

original: BhP_11.07.036/3 tat tathā puruṣa-vyāghra nibodha kathayāmi te
analyzed: tat tathā puruṣa vyāghra nibodha kathayāmi te

original: BhP_11.07.037/1 bhūtair ākramyamāṇo 'pi dhīro daiva-vaśānugaiḥ
analyzed: bhūtaiḥ ākramyamāṇaḥ dhīraḥ daiva vaśa anugaiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.037/3 tad vidvān na calen mārgād anvaśikṣaṃ kṣiter vratam
analyzed: tat vidvān na calet mārgāt anvaśikṣam kṣiteḥ vratam

original: BhP_11.07.038/1 śaśvat parārtha-sarvehaḥ parārthaikānta-sambhavaḥ
BhP_11.07.038/3 sādhuḥ śikṣeta bhū-bhṛtto naga-śiṣyaḥ parātmatām
analyzed: sādhuḥ śikṣeta bhūbhṛttaḥ naga śiṣyaḥ para ātmatām

original: BhP_11.07.039/1 prāṇa-vṛttyaiva santuṣyen munir naivendriya-priyaiḥ
analyzed: prāṇa vṛttyā eva santuṣyet muniḥ na eva indriya priyaiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.039/3 jñānaṃ yathā na naśyeta nāvakīryeta vāṅ-manaḥ
analyzed: jñānam yathā na naśyeta na avakīryeta vāc manaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.040/1 viṣayeṣv āviśan yogī nānā-dharmeṣu sarvataḥ
analyzed: viṣayeṣu āviśan yogī nānā dharmeṣu sarvatas

original: BhP_11.07.040/3 guṇa-doṣa-vyapetātmā na viṣajjeta vāyu-vat
analyzed: guṇa doṣa vyapeta ātmā na viṣajjeta vāyu vat

original: BhP_11.07.041/1 pārthiveṣv iha deheṣu praviṣṭas tad-guṇāśrayaḥ
analyzed: pārthiveṣu iha deheṣu praviṣṭaḥ tad guṇa āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.041/3 guṇair na yujyate yogī gandhair vāyur ivātma-dṛk
analyzed: guṇaiḥ na yujyate yogī gandhaiḥ vāyuḥ iva ātma dṛś

original: BhP_11.07.042/1 antarhitaś ca sthira-jaṅgameṣu brahmātma-bhāvena samanvayena
analyzed: antarhitaḥ ca sthira jaṅgameṣu brahma ātmabhāvena samanvayena

original: BhP_11.07.042/3 vyāptyāvyavacchedam asaṅgam ātmano munir nabhastvaṃ vitatasya bhāvayet
analyzed: vyāptyā avyavacchedam asaṅgam ātmanaḥ muniḥ nabhaḥ tvam vitatasya bhāvayet

original: BhP_11.07.043/1 tejo-'b-anna-mayair bhāvair meghādyair vāyuneritaiḥ
analyzed: tejaḥ banna mayaiḥ bhāvaiḥ megha ādyaiḥ vāyunā īritaiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.043/3 na spṛśyate nabhas tadvat kāla-sṛṣṭair guṇaiḥ pumān
analyzed: na spṛśyate nabhaḥ tadvat kāla sṛṣṭaiḥ guṇaiḥ pumān

original: BhP_11.07.044/1 svacchaḥ prakṛtitaḥ snigdho mādhuryas tīrtha-bhūr nṛṇām
BhP_11.07.044/3 muniḥ punāty apāṃ mitram īkṣopasparśa-kīrtanaiḥ
analyzed: muniḥ punāti apām mitram īkṣā upasparśa kīrtanaiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.045/1 tejasvī tapasā dīpto durdharṣodara-bhājanaḥ
analyzed: tejasvī tapasā dīptaḥ durdharṣa udara bhājanaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.045/3 sarva-bhakṣyo 'pi yuktātmā nādatte malam agni-vat
analyzed: sarva bhakṣyaḥ pi yukta ātmā na ādatte malam agni vat

original: BhP_11.07.046/1 kvacic channaḥ kvacit spaṣṭa upāsyaḥ śreya icchatām
analyzed: kvacid channaḥ kvacid spaṣṭaḥ upāsyaḥ śreyaḥ icchatām

original: BhP_11.07.046/3 bhuṅkte sarvatra dātṛṇāṃ dahan prāg-uttarāśubham
analyzed: bhuṅkte sarvatra dātṛṇām dahan prāc uttara aśubham

original: BhP_11.07.047/1 sva-māyayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ sad-asal-lakṣaṇaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: sva māyayā sṛṣṭam idam vibhuḥ

original: BhP_11.07.047/3 praviṣṭa īyate tat-tat- svarūpo 'gnir ivaidhasi
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ īyate tat tat sva rūpaḥ gniḥ iva edhasi

original: BhP_11.07.048/1 visargādyāḥ śmaśānāntā bhāvā dehasya nātmanaḥ
analyzed: visarga ādyāḥ śmaśāna antāḥ bhāvāḥ dehasya na ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.048/3 kalānām iva candrasya kālenāvyakta-vartmanā
analyzed: kalānām iva candrasya kālena avyakta vartmanā

original: BhP_11.07.049/1 kālena hy ogha-vegena bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayau
analyzed: kālena hi ogha vegena bhūtānām prabhava apyayau

original: BhP_11.07.049/3 nityāv api na dṛśyete ātmano 'gner yathārciṣām
analyzed: nityau api na dṛśyete ātmanaḥ gneḥ yathā arciṣām

original: BhP_11.07.050/1 guṇair guṇān upādatte yathā-kālaṃ vimuñcati
analyzed: guṇaiḥ guṇān upādatte yathākālam vimuñcati

original: BhP_11.07.050/3 na teṣu yujyate yogī gobhir gā iva go-patiḥ
analyzed: na teṣu yujyate yogī gobhiḥ gāḥ iva gopatiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.051/1 budhyate sve na bhedena vyakti-stha iva tad-gataḥ
analyzed: budhyate sve na bhedena vyakti sthaḥ iva tadgataḥ

original: BhP_11.07.051/3 lakṣyate sthūla-matibhir ātmā cāvasthito 'rka-vat
analyzed: lakṣyate sthūla matibhiḥ ātmā ca avasthitaḥ rka vat

original: BhP_11.07.052/1 nāti-snehaḥ prasaṅgo vā kartavyaḥ kvāpi kenacit
analyzed: na atisnehaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vā kartavyaḥ kvāpi kenacid

original: BhP_11.07.052/3 kurvan vindeta santāpaṃ kapota iva dīna-dhīḥ
analyzed: kurvan vindeta santāpam kapotaḥ iva dīna dhīḥ

original: BhP_11.07.053/1 kapotaḥ kaścanāraṇye kṛta-nīḍo vanaspatau
analyzed: kapotaḥ kaścana araṇye kṛta nīḍaḥ vanaspatau

original: BhP_11.07.053/3 kapotyā bhāryayā sārdham uvāsa katicit samāḥ
analyzed: kapotyā bhāryayā sārdham uvāsa katicid samāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.054/1 kapotau sneha-guṇita- hṛdayau gṛha-dharmiṇau
analyzed: kapotau sneha guṇita hṛdayau gṛha dharmiṇau

original: BhP_11.07.054/3 dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭyāṅgam aṅgena buddhiṃ buddhyā babandhatuḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭim dṛṣṭyā aṅgam aṅgena buddhim buddhyā babandhatuḥ

original: BhP_11.07.055/1 śayyāsanāṭana-sthāna vārtā-krīḍāśanādikam
analyzed: śayyā āsana aṭana sthāna vārttā krīḍā aśana ādikam

original: BhP_11.07.055/3 mithunī-bhūya viśrabdhau ceratur vana-rājiṣu
analyzed: mithunībhūya viśrabdhau ceratuḥ vana rājiṣu

original: BhP_11.07.056/1 yaṃ yaṃ vāñchati sā rājan tarpayanty anukampitā
analyzed: yam yam vāñchati sā rājan tarpayantī anukampitā

original: BhP_11.07.056/3 taṃ taṃ samanayat kāmaṃ kṛcchreṇāpy ajitendriyaḥ
analyzed: tam tam samanayat kāmam kṛcchreṇa api ajita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.057/1 kapotī prathamaṃ garbhaṃ gṛhṇantī kāla āgate
analyzed: kapotī prathamam garbham gṛhṇantī kāle āgate

original: BhP_11.07.057/3 aṇḍāni suṣuve nīḍe sta-patyuḥ sannidhau satī
analyzed: aṇḍāni suṣuve nīḍe stapatyuḥ sannidhau satī

original: BhP_11.07.058/1 teṣu kāle vyajāyanta racitāvayavā hareḥ
analyzed: teṣu kāle vyajāyanta racita avayavāḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_11.07.058/3 śaktibhir durvibhāvyābhiḥ komalāṅga-tanūruhāḥ
analyzed: śaktibhiḥ durvibhāvyābhiḥ komala aṅga tanūruhāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.059/1 prajāḥ pupuṣatuḥ prītau dampatī putra-vatsalau
analyzed: prajāḥ pupuṣatuḥ prītau dampatī putra vatsalau

original: BhP_11.07.059/3 śṛṇvantau kūjitaṃ tāsāṃ nirvṛtau kala-bhāṣitaiḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvantau kūjitam tāsām nirvṛtau kala bhāṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.060/1 tāsāṃ patatraiḥ su-sparśaiḥ kūjitair mugdha-ceṣṭitaiḥ
analyzed: tāsām patatraiḥ susparśaiḥ kūjitaiḥ mugdha ceṣṭitaiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.060/3 pratyudgamair adīnānāṃ pitarau mudam āpatuḥ
analyzed: pratyudgamaiḥ adīnānām pitarau mudam āpatuḥ

original: BhP_11.07.061/1 snehānubaddha-hṛdayāv anyonyaṃ viṣṇu-māyayā
analyzed: sneha anubaddha hṛdayau anyonyam viṣṇu māyayā

original: BhP_11.07.061/3 vimohitau dīna-dhiyau śiśūn pupuṣatuḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: vimohitau dīna dhiyau śiśūn pupuṣatuḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_11.07.062/1 ekadā jagmatus tāsām annārthaṃ tau kuṭumbinau
analyzed: ekadā jagmatuḥ tāsām anna artham tau kuṭumbinau

original: BhP_11.07.062/3 paritaḥ kānane tasminn arthinau ceratuś ciram
analyzed: paritas kānane tasmin arthinau ceratuḥ ciram

original: BhP_11.07.063/1 dṛṣṭvā tān lubdhakaḥ kaścid yadṛcchāto vane-caraḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tān lubdhakaḥ kaścid yadṛcchātaḥ vanecaraḥ

original: BhP_11.07.063/3 jagṛhe jālam ātatya carataḥ svālayāntike
analyzed: jagṛhe jālam ātatya carataḥ sva ālaya antike

original: BhP_11.07.064/1 kapotaś ca kapotī ca prajā-poṣe sadotsukau
analyzed: kapotaḥ ca kapotī ca prajā poṣe sadā utsukau

original: BhP_11.07.064/3 gatau poṣaṇam ādāya sva-nīḍam upajagmatuḥ
analyzed: gatau poṣaṇam ādāya sva nīḍam upajagmatuḥ

original: BhP_11.07.065/1 kapotī svātmajān vīkṣya bālakān jāla-samvṛtān
analyzed: kapotī sva ātmajān vīkṣya bālakān jāla samvṛtān

original: BhP_11.07.065/3 tān abhyadhāvat krośantī krośato bhṛśa-duḥkhitā
analyzed: tān abhyadhāvat krośantī krośataḥ bhṛśa duḥkhitā

original: BhP_11.07.066/1 sāsakṛt sneha-guṇitā dīna-cittāja-māyayā
analyzed: sā asakṛt sneha guṇitā dīna cittā aja māyayā

original: BhP_11.07.066/3 svayaṃ cābadhyata śicā baddhān paśyanty apasmṛtiḥ
analyzed: svayam ca abadhyata śicā baddhān paśyantī apasmṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.067/1 kapotaḥ svātmajān baddhān ātmano 'py adhikān priyān
analyzed: kapotaḥ sva ātmajān baddhān ātmanaḥ api adhikān priyān

original: BhP_11.07.067/3 bhāryāṃ cātma-samāṃ dīno vilalāpāti-duḥkhitaḥ
analyzed: bhāryām ca ātma samām dīnaḥ vilalāpa ati duḥkhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.068/1 aho me paśyatāpāyam alpa-puṇyasya durmateḥ
analyzed: aho me paśyata apāyam alpa puṇyasya durmateḥ

original: BhP_11.07.068/3 atṛptasyākṛtārthasya gṛhas trai-vargiko hataḥ
analyzed: atṛptasya akṛtārthasya gṛhaḥ traivargikaḥ hataḥ

original: BhP_11.07.069/1 anurūpānukūlā ca yasya me pati-devatā
analyzed: anurūpā anukūlā ca yasya me pati devatā

original: BhP_11.07.069/3 śūnye gṛhe māṃ santyajya putraiḥ svar yāti sādhubhiḥ
analyzed: śūnye gṛhe mām santyajya putraiḥ svar yāti sādhubhiḥ

original: BhP_11.07.070/1 so 'haṃ śūnye gṛhe dīno mṛta-dāro mṛta-prajaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham śūnye gṛhe dīnaḥ mṛta dāraḥ mṛta prajaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.070/3 jijīviṣe kim arthaṃ vā vidhuro duḥkha-jīvitaḥ
analyzed: jijīviṣe kim artham vā vidhuraḥ duḥkha jīvitaḥ

original: BhP_11.07.071/1 tāṃs tathaivāvṛtān śigbhir mṛtyu-grastān viceṣṭataḥ
analyzed: tān tathā eva āvṛtān śigbhiḥ mṛtyu grastān viceṣṭataḥ

original: BhP_11.07.071/3 svayaṃ ca kṛpaṇaḥ śikṣu paśyann apy abudho 'patat
analyzed: svayam ca kṛpaṇaḥ śikṣu paśyan api abudhaḥ patat

original: BhP_11.07.072/1 taṃ labdhvā lubdhakaḥ krūraḥ kapotaṃ gṛha-medhinam
analyzed: tam labdhvā lubdhakaḥ krūraḥ kapotam gṛhamedhinam

original: BhP_11.07.072/3 kapotakān kapotīṃ ca siddhārthaḥ prayayau gṛham
analyzed: kapotakān kapotīm ca siddhārthaḥ prayayau gṛham

original: BhP_11.07.073/1 evaṃ kuṭumby aśāntātmā dvandvārāmaḥ patatri-vat
analyzed: evam kuṭumbī aśānta ātmā dvandva ārāmaḥ patatri vat

original: BhP_11.07.073/3 puṣṇan kuṭumbaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ sānubandho 'vasīdati
analyzed: puṣṇan kuṭumbam kṛpaṇaḥ sa anubandhaḥ vasīdati

original: BhP_11.07.074/1 yaḥ prāpya mānuṣaṃ lokaṃ mukti-dvāram apāvṛtam
analyzed: yaḥ prāpya mānuṣam lokam mukti dvāram apāvṛtam

original: BhP_11.07.074/3 gṛheṣu khaga-vat saktas tam ārūḍha-cyutaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: gṛheṣu khaga vat saktaḥ tam ārūḍha cyutam viduḥ

original: BhP_11.08.001/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: śrī brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.08.001/1 sukham aindriyakaṃ rājan svarge naraka eva ca
analyzed: sukham aindriyakam rājan svarge narake eva ca

original: BhP_11.08.001/3 dehināṃ yad yathā duḥkhaṃ tasmān neccheta tad-budhaḥ
analyzed: dehinām yat yathā duḥkham tasmāt na iccheta tad budhaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.002/1 grāsaṃ su-mṛṣṭaṃ virasaṃ mahāntaṃ stokam eva vā
analyzed: grāsam sumṛṣṭam virasam mahāntam stokam eva vā

original: BhP_11.08.002/3 yadṛcchayaivāpatitaṃ grased ājagaro 'kriyaḥ
analyzed: yadṛcchayā eva āpatitam graset ājagaraḥ kriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.003/1 śayītāhāni bhūrīṇi nirāhāro 'nupakramaḥ
analyzed: bhūrīṇi nirāhāraḥ n upakramaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.003/3 yadi nopanayed grāso mahāhir iva diṣṭa-bhuk
analyzed: yadi nā upanayet grāsaḥ mahā ahiḥ iva diṣṭabhuj

original: BhP_11.08.004/1 ojaḥ-saho-bala-yutaṃ bibhrad deham akarmakam
analyzed: ojaḥ sahaḥ bala yutam bibhrat deham akarmakam

original: BhP_11.08.004/3 śayāno vīta-nidraś ca nehetendriyavān api
analyzed: śayānaḥ vīta nidraḥ ca na īheta indriyavān api

original: BhP_11.08.005/1 muniḥ prasanna-gambhīro durvigāhyo duratyayaḥ
analyzed: muniḥ prasanna gambhīraḥ durvigāhyaḥ duratyayaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.005/3 ananta-pāro hy akṣobhyaḥ stimitoda ivārṇavaḥ
analyzed: ananta pāraḥ hi akṣobhyaḥ stimita udaḥ iva arṇavaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.006/1 samṛddha-kāmo hīno vā nārāyaṇa-paro muniḥ
analyzed: samṛddha kāmaḥ hīnaḥ vā nārāyaṇa paraḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_11.08.006/3 notsarpeta na śuṣyeta saridbhir iva sāgaraḥ
analyzed: na utsarpeta na śuṣyeta saridbhiḥ iva sāgaraḥ

original: BhP_11.08.007/1 dṛṣṭvā striyaṃ deva-māyāṃ tad-bhāvair ajitendriyaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā striyam deva māyām tad bhāvaiḥ ajita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.007/3 pralobhitaḥ pataty andhe tamasy agnau pataṅga-vat
analyzed: pralobhitaḥ patati andhe tamasi agnau pataṅga vat

original: BhP_11.08.008/1 yoṣid-dhiraṇyābharaṇāmbarādi- dravyeṣu māyā-raciteṣu mūḍhaḥ
analyzed: yoṣit hiraṇya ābharaṇa ambara ādi dravyeṣu māyā raciteṣu mūḍhaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.008/3 pralobhitātmā hy upabhoga-buddhyā pataṅga-van naśyati naṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ
analyzed: pralobhita ātmā hi upabhoga buddhyā pataṅga vat naśyati naṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ

original: BhP_11.08.009/1 stokaṃ stokaṃ grased grāsaṃ deho varteta yāvatā
analyzed: stokam stokam graset grāsam dehaḥ varteta yāvatā

original: BhP_11.08.009/3 gṛhān ahiṃsann ātiṣṭhed vṛttiṃ mādhukarīṃ muniḥ
analyzed: gṛhān a hiṃsan ātiṣṭhet vṛttim mādhukarīm muniḥ

original: BhP_11.08.010/1 aṇubhyaś ca mahadbhyaś ca śāstrebhyaḥ kuśalo naraḥ
analyzed: aṇubhyaḥ ca mahadbhyaḥ ca śāstrebhyaḥ kuśalaḥ naraḥ

original: BhP_11.08.010/3 sarvataḥ sāram ādadyāt puṣpebhya iva ṣaṭpadaḥ
analyzed: sarvatas sāram ādadyāt puṣpebhyaḥ iva ṣaṭpadaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.011/1 sāyantanaṃ śvastanaṃ vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣitam
analyzed: sāyantanam śvastanam vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣitam

original: BhP_11.08.011/3 pāṇi-pātrodarāmatro makṣikeva na saṅgrahī
analyzed: pāṇi pātra udara amatraḥ makṣikā iva na saṅgrahī

original: BhP_11.08.012/1 sāyantanaṃ śvastanaṃ vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣukaḥ
analyzed: sāyantanam śvastanam vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣukaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.012/3 makṣikā iva saṅgṛhṇan saha tena vinaśyati
analyzed: makṣikā iva saṅgṛhṇan saha tena vinaśyati

original: BhP_11.08.013/1 padāpi yuvatīṃ bhikṣur na spṛśed dāravīm api
analyzed: padā api yuvatīm bhikṣuḥ na spṛśet dāravīm api

original: BhP_11.08.013/3 spṛśan karīva badhyeta kariṇyā aṅga-saṅgataḥ
analyzed: spṛśan karī iva badhyeta kariṇyā aṅgasaṅgataḥ

original: BhP_11.08.014/1 nādhigacchet striyaṃ prājñaḥ karhicin mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: na adhigacchet striyam prājñaḥ karhicit mṛtyum ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.014/3 balādhikaiḥ sa hanyeta gajair anyair gajo yathā
analyzed: bala adhikaiḥ sa hanyeta gajaiḥ anyaiḥ gajaḥ yathā

original: BhP_11.08.015/1 na deyaṃ nopabhogyaṃ ca lubdhair yad duḥkha-sañcitam
analyzed: na deyam na upabhogyam ca lubdhaiḥ yat duḥkha sañcitam

original: BhP_11.08.015/3 bhuṅkte tad api tac cānyo madhu-hevārthavin madhu
analyzed: bhuṅkte tat api tat ca anyaḥ madhuhā iva artha vid madhu

original: BhP_11.08.016/1 su-duḥkhopārjitair vittair āśāsānāṃ gṛhāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: su duḥkha upārjitaiḥ vittaiḥ āśāsānām gṛha āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.016/3 madhu-hevāgrato bhuṅkte yatir vai gṛha-medhinām
analyzed: madhu hā iva agratas bhuṅkte yatiḥ vai gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_11.08.017/1 grāmya-gītaṃ na śṛṇuyād yatir vana-caraḥ kvacit
analyzed: grāmya gītam na śṛṇuyāt yatiḥ vana caraḥ kvacid

original: BhP_11.08.017/3 śikṣeta hariṇād baddhān mṛgayor gīta-mohitāt
analyzed: śikṣeta hariṇāt baddhāt mṛgayoḥ gīta mohitāt

original: BhP_11.08.018/1 nṛtya-vāditra-gītāni juṣan grāmyāṇi yoṣitām
analyzed: nṛtya vāditra gītāni juṣan grāmyāṇi yoṣitām

original: BhP_11.08.018/3 āsāṃ krīḍanako vaśya ṛṣyaśṛṅgo mṛgī-sutaḥ
analyzed: āsām krīḍanakaḥ vaśyaḥ ṛṣya śṛṅgaḥ mṛgī sutaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.019/1 jihvayāti-pramāthinyā jano rasa-vimohitaḥ
analyzed: jihvayā ati pramāthinyā janaḥ rasa vimohitaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.019/3 mṛtyum ṛcchaty asad-buddhir mīnas tu baḍiśair yathā
analyzed: mṛtyum ṛcchati asat buddhiḥ mīnaḥ tu baḍiśaiḥ yathā

original: BhP_11.08.020/1 indriyāṇi jayanty āśu nirāhārā manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: indriyāṇi jayanti āśu nirāhārāḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.020/3 varjayitvā tu rasanaṃ tan nirannasya vardhate
analyzed: varjayitvā tu rasanam tat nirannasya vardhate

original: BhP_11.08.021/1 tāvaj jitendriyo na syād vijitānyendriyaḥ pumān
analyzed: tāvat jita indriyaḥ na syāt vijita anya indriyaḥ pumān

original: BhP_11.08.021/3 na jayed rasanaṃ yāvaj jitaṃ sarvaṃ jite rase
analyzed: na jayet rasanam yāvat jitam sarvam jite rase

original: BhP_11.08.022/1 piṅgalā nāma veśyāsīd videha-nagare purā
analyzed: piṅgalā nāma veśyā āsīt videha nagare purā

original: BhP_11.08.022/3 tasyā me śikṣitaṃ kiñcin nibodha nṛpa-nandana
analyzed: tasyāḥ me śikṣitam kiñcid nibodha nṛpa nandana

original: BhP_11.08.023/1 sā svairiṇy ekadā kāntaṃ saṅketa upaneṣyatī
analyzed: sā svairiṇī ekadā kāntam saṅkete upaneṣyatī

original: BhP_11.08.023/3 abhūt kāle bahir dvāre bibhratī rūpam uttamam
analyzed: abhūt kāle bahis dvāre bibhratī rūpam uttamam

original: BhP_11.08.024/1 mārga āgacchato vīkṣya puruṣān puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: mārge āgacchataḥ vīkṣya puruṣān puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_11.08.024/3 tān śulka-dān vittavataḥ kāntān mene 'rtha-kāmukī
analyzed: tān śulka dān vittavataḥ kāntān mene ṛtha kāmukī

original: BhP_11.08.025/1 āgateṣv apayāteṣu sā saṅketopajīvinī
analyzed: āgateṣu apayāteṣu sā saṅketa upajīvinī

original: BhP_11.08.025/3 apy anyo vittavān ko 'pi mām upaiṣyati bhūri-daḥ
analyzed: api anyaḥ vittavān kaḥ mām upaiṣyati bhūri daḥ

original: BhP_11.08.026/1 evaṃ durāśayā dhvasta- nidrā dvāry avalambatī
analyzed: evam durāśayā dhvasta nidrā dvāri avalambatī

original: BhP_11.08.026/3 nirgacchantī praviśatī niśīthaṃ samapadyata
analyzed: nirgacchantī praviśatī niśītham samapadyata

original: BhP_11.08.027/1 tasyā vittāśayā śuṣyad- vaktrāyā dīna-cetasaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ vitta āśayā śuṣyat vaktrāyāḥ dīna cetasaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.027/3 nirvedaḥ paramo jajñe cintā-hetuḥ sukhāvahaḥ
analyzed: nirvedaḥ paramaḥ jajñe cintā hetuḥ sukha āvahaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.028/1 tasyā nirviṇṇa-cittāyā gītaṃ śṛṇu yathā mama
analyzed: tasyāḥ nirviṇṇa cittāyāḥ gītam śṛṇu yathā mama

original: BhP_11.08.028/3 nirveda āśā-pāśānāṃ puruṣasya yathā hy asiḥ
analyzed: nirvedaḥ āśā pāśānām puruṣasya yathā hi asiḥ

original: BhP_11.08.029/1 na hy aṅgājāta-nirvedo deha-bandhaṃ jihāsati
analyzed: na hi aṅga ajāta nirvedaḥ deha bandham jihāsati

original: BhP_11.08.029/3 yathā vijñāna-rahito manujo mamatāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: yathā vijñāna rahitaḥ manujaḥ mamatām nṛpa

original: BhP_11.08.030/0 piṅgalovāca
analyzed: piṅgalā uvāca

original: BhP_11.08.030/1 aho me moha-vitatiṃ paśyatāvijitātmanaḥ
analyzed: aho me moha vitatim paśyata avijita ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.030/3 yā kāntād asataḥ kāmaṃ kāmaye yena bāliśā
analyzed: yā kāntāt asataḥ kāmam kāmaye yena bāliśā

original: BhP_11.08.031/1 santaṃ samīpe ramaṇaṃ rati-pradaṃ vitta-pradaṃ nityam imaṃ vihāya
analyzed: santam samīpe ramaṇam rati pradam vitta pradam nityam imam vihāya

original: BhP_11.08.031/3 akāma-daṃ duḥkha-bhayādhi-śoka- moha-pradaṃ tuccham ahaṃ bhaje 'jñā
analyzed: akāma dam duḥkha bhaya ādhi śoka moha pradam tuccham aham bhaje jñā

original: BhP_11.08.032/1 aho mayātmā paritāpito vṛthā sāṅketya-vṛttyāti-vigarhya-vārtayā
analyzed: aho mayā ātmā paritāpitaḥ vṛthā sāṅketya vṛttyā ati vigarhya vārtayā

original: BhP_11.08.032/3 straiṇān narād yārtha-tṛṣo 'nuśocyāt krītena vittaṃ ratim ātmanecchatī
analyzed: straiṇāt narāt yā arthatṛṣaḥ nu śocyāt krītena vittam ratim ātmanā icchatī

original: BhP_11.08.033/1 yad asthibhir nirmita-vaṃśa-vaṃsya-
analyzed: yat asthibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.08.033/2 sthūṇaṃ tvacā roma-nakhaiḥ pinaddham
analyzed: sthūṇam tvacā roma nakhaiḥ pinaddham

original: BhP_11.08.033/3 kṣaran-nava-dvāram agāram etad
analyzed: kṣarat nava dvāram agāram etat

original: BhP_11.08.033/4 viṇ-mūtra-pūrṇaṃ mad upaiti kānyā
analyzed: viṣ mūtra pūrṇam mat upaiti kā anyā

original: BhP_11.08.034/1 videhānāṃ pure hy asminn aham ekaiva mūḍha-dhīḥ
analyzed: videhānām pure hi asmin aham ekā eva mūḍha dhīḥ

original: BhP_11.08.034/3 yānyam icchanty asaty asmād ātma-dāt kāmam acyutāt
analyzed: yā anyam icchantī asatī asmāt ātma dāt kāmam acyutāt

original: BhP_11.08.035/1 suhṛt preṣṭhatamo nātha ātmā cāyaṃ śarīriṇām
analyzed: suhṛd preṣṭhatamaḥ nāthaḥ ātmā ca ayam śarīriṇām

original: BhP_11.08.035/3 taṃ vikrīyātmanaivāhaṃ rame 'nena yathā ramā
analyzed: tam vikrīya ātmanā eva aham rame nena yathā ramā

original: BhP_11.08.036/1 kiyat priyaṃ te vyabhajan kāmā ye kāma-dā narāḥ
analyzed: kiyat priyam te vyabhajan kāmāḥ ye kāma dāḥ narāḥ

original: BhP_11.08.036/3 ādy-antavanto bhāryāyā devā vā kāla-vidrutāḥ
analyzed: ādi antavantaḥ bhāryāyāḥ devāḥ vā kāla vidrutāḥ

original: BhP_11.08.037/1 nūnaṃ me bhagavān prīto viṣṇuḥ kenāpi karmaṇā
analyzed: nūnam me bhagavān prītaḥ viṣṇuḥ kena api karmaṇā

original: BhP_11.08.037/3 nirvedo 'yaṃ durāśāyā yan me jātaḥ sukhāvahaḥ
analyzed: nirvedaḥ yam durāśāyāḥ yat me jātaḥ sukha āvahaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.038/1 maivaṃ syur manda-bhāgyāyāḥ kleśā nirveda-hetavaḥ
analyzed: mā evam syuḥ mandabhāgyāyāḥ kleśāḥ nirveda hetavaḥ

original: BhP_11.08.038/3 yenānubandhaṃ nirhṛtya puruṣaḥ śamam ṛcchati
analyzed: yena anubandham nirhṛtya puruṣaḥ śamam ṛcchati

original: BhP_11.08.039/1 tenopakṛtam ādāya śirasā grāmya-saṅgatāḥ
analyzed: tena upakṛtam ādāya śirasā grāmya saṅga tāḥ

original: BhP_11.08.039/3 tyaktvā durāśāḥ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi tam adhīśvaram
analyzed: tyaktvā durāśāḥ śaraṇam vrajāmi tam adhīśvaram

original: BhP_11.08.040/1 santuṣṭā śraddadhaty etad yathā-lābhena jīvatī
analyzed: santuṣṭā śraddadhatī etat yathā lābhena jīvatī

original: BhP_11.08.040/3 viharāmy amunaivāham ātmanā ramaṇena vai
analyzed: viharāmi amunā eva aham ātmanā ramaṇena vai

original: BhP_11.08.041/1 saṃsāra-kūpe patitaṃ viṣayair muṣitekṣaṇam
analyzed: saṃsāra kūpe patitam viṣayaiḥ muṣita īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_11.08.041/3 grastaṃ kālāhinātmānaṃ ko 'nyas trātum adhīśvaraḥ
analyzed: grastam kāla ahinā ātmānam kaḥ trātum adhīśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.08.042/1 ātmaiva hy ātmano goptā nirvidyeta yadākhilāt
analyzed: ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ goptā nirvidyeta yadā akhilāt

original: BhP_11.08.042/3 apramatta idaṃ paśyed grastaṃ kālāhinā jagat
analyzed: apramattaḥ idam paśyet grastam kāla ahinā jagat

original: BhP_11.08.043/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: śrī brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.08.043/1 evaṃ vyavasita-matir durāśāṃ kānta-tarṣa-jām
analyzed: evam vyavasita matiḥ durāśām kānta tarṣa jām

original: BhP_11.08.043/3 chittvopaśamam āsthāya śayyām upaviveśa sā
analyzed: chittvā upaśamam āsthāya śayyām upaviveśa sā

original: BhP_11.08.044/1 āśā hi paramaṃ duḥkhaṃ nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham
analyzed: āśāḥ hi paramam duḥkham nairāśyam paramam sukham

original: BhP_11.08.044/3 yathā sañchidya kāntāśāṃ sukhaṃ suṣvāpa piṅgalā
analyzed: yathā sañchidya kānta āśām sukham suṣvāpa piṅgalā

original: BhP_11.09.001/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: śrī brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.09.001/1 parigraho hi duḥkhāya yad yat priyatamaṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: parigrahaḥ hi duḥkhāya yat yat priyatamam nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.09.001/3 anantaṃ sukham āpnoti tad vidvān yas tv akiñcanaḥ
analyzed: anantam sukham āpnoti tat vidvān yaḥ tu akiñcanaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.002/1 sāmiṣaṃ kuraraṃ jaghnur balino 'nye nirāmiṣāḥ
analyzed: sa āmiṣam kuraram jaghnuḥ balinaḥ nye nirāmiṣāḥ

original: BhP_11.09.002/3 tadāmiṣaṃ parityajya sa sukhaṃ samavindata
analyzed: tat āmiṣam parityajya sa sukham samavindata

original: BhP_11.09.003/1 na me mānāpamānau sto na cintā geha-putriṇām
analyzed: na me māna apamānau staḥ na cintā geha putriṇām

original: BhP_11.09.003/3 ātma-krīḍa ātma-ratir vicarāmīha bāla-vat
analyzed: ātma krīḍaḥ ātma ratiḥ vicarāmi iha bāla vat

original: BhP_11.09.004/1 dvāv eva cintayā muktau paramānanda āplutau
analyzed: dvau eva cintayā muktau parama ānande āplutau

original: BhP_11.09.004/3 yo vimugdho jaḍo bālo yo guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vimugdhaḥ jaḍaḥ bālaḥ yaḥ guṇebhyaḥ param gataḥ

original: BhP_11.09.005/1 kvacit kumārī tv ātmānaṃ vṛṇānān gṛham āgatān
analyzed: kvacid kumārī tu ātmānam vṛṇānān gṛham āgatān

original: BhP_11.09.005/3 svayaṃ tān arhayām āsa kvāpi yāteṣu bandhuṣu
analyzed: svayam tān arhayām āsa kvāpi yāteṣu bandhuṣu

original: BhP_11.09.006/1 teṣām abhyavahārārthaṃ śālīn rahasi pārthiva
analyzed: teṣām abhyavahāra artham śālīn rahasi pārthiva

original: BhP_11.09.006/3 avaghnantyāḥ prakoṣṭha-sthāś cakruḥ śaṅkhāḥ svanaṃ mahat
analyzed: avaghnantyāḥ prakoṣṭha sthāḥ cakruḥ śaṅkhāḥ svanam mahat

original: BhP_11.09.007/1 sā taj jugupsitaṃ matvā mahatī vṛīḍitā tataḥ
analyzed: sā tat jugupsitam matvā mahatī vṛīḍitā tatas

original: BhP_11.09.007/3 babhañjaikaikaśaḥ śaṅkhān dvau dvau pāṇyor aśeṣayat
analyzed: babhañja ekaikaśas śaṅkhān dvau dvau pāṇyoḥ aśeṣayat

original: BhP_11.09.008/1 ubhayor apy abhūd ghoṣo hy avaghnantyāḥ sva-śaṅkhayoḥ
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api abhūt ghoṣaḥ hi avaghnantyāḥ sva śaṅkhayoḥ

original: BhP_11.09.008/3 tatrāpy ekaṃ nirabhidad ekasmān nābhavad dhvaniḥ
analyzed: tatra api ekam nirabhidat ekasmāt na abhavat dhvaniḥ

original: BhP_11.09.009/1 anvaśikṣam imaṃ tasyā upadeśam arindama
analyzed: anvaśikṣam imam tasyāḥ upadeśam arindama

original: BhP_11.09.009/3 lokān anucarann etān loka-tattva-vivitsayā
BhP_11.09.010/1 vāse bahūnāṃ kalaho bhaved vārtā dvayor api
analyzed: vāse bahūnām kalahaḥ bhavet vārtā dvayoḥ api

original: BhP_11.09.010/3 eka eva vaset tasmāt kumāryā iva kaṅkaṇaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva vaset tasmāt kumāryāḥ iva kaṅkaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.011/1 mana ekatra saṃyuñjyāj jita-śvāso jitāsanaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ ekatra saṃyuñjyāt jita śvāsaḥ jita āsanaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.011/3 vairāgyābhyāsa-yogena dhriyamāṇam atandritaḥ
analyzed: vairāgya abhyāsa yogena dhriyamāṇam atandritaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.012/1 yasmin mano labdha-padaṃ yad etac chanaiḥ śanair muñcati karma-reṇūn
analyzed: yasmin manaḥ labdha padam yat etat śanais śanais muñcati karma reṇūn

original: BhP_11.09.012/3 sattvena vṛddhena rajas tamaś ca vidhūya nirvāṇam upaity anindhanam
analyzed: sattvena vṛddhena rajaḥ tamaḥ ca vidhūya nirvāṇam upaiti an indhanam

original: BhP_11.09.013/1 tadaivam ātmany avaruddha-citto na veda kiñcid bahir antaraṃ vā
analyzed: tadā evam ātmani avaruddha cittaḥ na veda kiñcid bahis antaram vā

original: BhP_11.09.013/3 yatheṣu-kāro nṛpatiṃ vrajantam iṣau gatātmā na dadarśa pārśve
analyzed: yathā iṣukāraḥ nṛpatim vrajantam iṣau gata ātmā na dadarśa pārśve

original: BhP_11.09.014/1 eka-cāry aniketaḥ syād apramatto guhāśayaḥ
analyzed: ekacārī aniketaḥ syāt apramattaḥ guhā āśayaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.014/3 alakṣyamāṇa ācārair munir eko 'lpa-bhāṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: a lakṣyamāṇaḥ ācāraiḥ muniḥ ekaḥ lpa bhāṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.015/1 gṛhārambho hi duḥkhāya viphalaś cādhruvātmanaḥ
analyzed: gṛha ārambhaḥ hi duḥkhāya viphalaḥ ca adhruva ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.015/3 sarpaḥ para-kṛtaṃ veśma praviśya sukham edhate
analyzed: sarpaḥ para kṛtam veśma praviśya sukham edhate

original: BhP_11.09.016/1 eko nārāyaṇo devaḥ pūrva-sṛṣṭaṃ sva-māyayā
analyzed: ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ pūrva sṛṣṭam sva māyayā

original: BhP_11.09.016/3 saṃhṛtya kāla-kalayā kalpānta idam īśvaraḥ
analyzed: saṃhṛtya kāla kalayā kalpa ante idam īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.09.016/5 eka evādvitīyo 'bhūd ātmādhāro 'khilāśrayaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva advitīyaḥ bhūt khila āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.017/1 kālenātmānubhāvena sāmyaṃ nītāsu śaktiṣu
analyzed: kālena ātma anubhāvena sāmyam nītāsu śaktiṣu

original: BhP_11.09.017/3 sattvādiṣv ādi-puruṣaḥ pradhāna-puruṣeśvaraḥ
BhP_11.09.018/1 parāvarāṇāṃ parama āste kaivalya-saṃjñitaḥ
analyzed: parāvarāṇām paramaḥ āste kaivalya saṃjñitaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.018/3 kevalānubhavānanda- sandoho nirupādhikaḥ
BhP_11.09.019/1 kevalātmānubhāvena sva-māyāṃ tri-guṇātmikām
analyzed: kevala ātma anubhāvena sva māyām triguṇa ātmikām

original: BhP_11.09.019/3 saṅkṣobhayan sṛjaty ādau tayā sūtram arindama
analyzed: saṅkṣobhayan sṛjati ādau tayā sūtram arindama

original: BhP_11.09.020/1 tām āhus tri-guṇa-vyaktiṃ sṛjantīṃ viśvato-mukham
analyzed: tām āhuḥ triguṇa vyaktim sṛjantīm viśvatomukham

original: BhP_11.09.020/3 yasmin protam idaṃ viśvaṃ yena saṃsarate pumān
analyzed: yasmin protam idam viśvam yena saṃsarate pumān

original: BhP_11.09.021/1 yathorṇanābhir hṛdayād ūrṇāṃ santatya vaktrataḥ
analyzed: yathā ūrṇanābhiḥ hṛdayāt ūrṇām santatya vaktrataḥ

original: BhP_11.09.021/3 tayā vihṛtya bhūyas tāṃ grasaty evaṃ maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: tayā vihṛtya bhūyas tām grasati evam maheśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.09.022/1 yatra yatra mano dehī dhārayet sakalaṃ dhiyā
analyzed: yatra yatra manaḥ dehī dhārayet sakalam dhiyā

original: BhP_11.09.022/3 snehād dveṣād bhayād vāpi yāti tat-tat-svarūpatām
analyzed: snehāt dveṣāt bhayāt vā api yāti tad tad svarūpa tām

original: BhP_11.09.023/1 kīṭaḥ peśaskṛtaṃ dhyāyan kuḍyāṃ tena praveśitaḥ
analyzed: kīṭaḥ peśaskṛtam dhyāyan kuḍyām tena praveśitaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.023/3 yāti tat-sātmatāṃ rājan pūrva-rūpam asantyajan
analyzed: yāti tad sātmatām rājan pūrva rūpam asantyajān

original: BhP_11.09.024/1 evaṃ gurubhya etebhya eṣā me śikṣitā matiḥ
analyzed: evam gurubhyaḥ etebhyaḥ eṣā me śikṣitā matiḥ

original: BhP_11.09.024/3 svātmopaśikṣitāṃ buddhiṃ śṛṇu me vadataḥ prabho
analyzed: sva ātma upaśikṣitām buddhim śṛṇu me vadataḥ prabho

original: BhP_11.09.025/1 deho gurur mama virakti-viveka-hetur
analyzed: dehaḥ guruḥ mama virakti viveka hetuḥ

original: BhP_11.09.025/2 bibhrat sma sattva-nidhanaṃ satatārty-udarkam
analyzed: bibhrat sma sattva nidhanam satata ārti udarkam

original: BhP_11.09.025/3 tattvāny anena vimṛśāmi yathā tathāpi
analyzed: tattvāni anena vimṛśāmi yathā tathā api

original: BhP_11.09.025/4 pārakyam ity avasito vicarāmy asaṅgaḥ
analyzed: pārakyam iti avasitaḥ vicarāmi asaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.026/1 jāyātmajārtha-paśu-bhṛtya-gṛhāpta-vargān
analyzed: jāyā ātmaja artha paśu bhṛtya gṛha āpta vargān

original: BhP_11.09.026/2 puṣnāti yat-priya-cikīrṣayā vitanvan
analyzed: puṣnāti yat priya cikīrṣayā vitanvan

original: BhP_11.09.026/3 svānte sa-kṛcchram avaruddha-dhanaḥ sa dehaḥ
analyzed: svānte sa kṛcchram avaruddha dhanaḥ sa dehaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.026/4 sṛṣṭvāsya bījam avasīdati vṛkṣa-dharmaḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā asya bījam avasīdati vṛkṣa dharmaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.027/1 jihvaikato 'mum apakarṣati karhi tarṣā
analyzed: jihvā ekatas mum apakarṣati karhi tarṣa

original: BhP_11.09.027/2 śiśno 'nyatas tvag udaraṃ śravaṇaṃ kutaścit
analyzed: śiśnaḥ nyatas tvac udaram śravaṇam kutaścid

original: BhP_11.09.027/3 ghrāṇo 'nyataś capala-dṛk kva ca karma-śaktir
analyzed: ghrāṇaḥ nyataḥ capala dṛś kva ca karma śaktiḥ

original: BhP_11.09.027/4 bahvyaḥ sapatnya iva geha-patiṃ lunanti
analyzed: bahvyaḥ sapatnyaḥ iva gehapatim lunanti

original: BhP_11.09.028/1 sṛṣṭvā purāṇi vividhāny ajayātma-śaktyā
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā purāṇi vividhāni ajayā ātma śaktyā

original: BhP_11.09.028/2 vṛkṣān sarīsṛpa-paśūn khaga-dandaśūkān
analyzed: vṛkṣān sarīsṛpa paśūn khaga danda śūkān

original: BhP_11.09.028/3 tais tair atuṣṭa-hṛdayaḥ puruṣaṃ vidhāya
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ atuṣṭa hṛdayaḥ puruṣam vidhāya

original: BhP_11.09.028/4 brahmāvaloka-dhiṣaṇaṃ mudam āpa devaḥ
analyzed: brahma avaloka dhiṣaṇam mudam āpa devaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.029/1 labdhvā su-durlabham idaṃ bahu-sambhavānte
analyzed: labdhvā su durlabham idam bahu sambhava ante

original: BhP_11.09.029/2 mānuṣyam artha-dam anityam apīha dhīraḥ
analyzed: mānuṣyam artha dam anityam api iha dhīraḥ

original: BhP_11.09.029/3 tūrṇaṃ yateta na pated anu-mṛtyu yāvan
analyzed: tūrṇam yateta na patet anumṛtyu yāvan

original: BhP_11.09.029/4 niḥśreyasāya viṣayaḥ khalu sarvataḥ syāt
analyzed: niḥśreyasāya viṣayaḥ khalu sarvatas syāt

original: BhP_11.09.030/1 evaṃ sañjāta-vairāgyo vijñānāloka ātmani
analyzed: evam sañjāta vairāgyaḥ vijñāna āloke ātmani

original: BhP_11.09.030/3 vicarāmi mahīm etāṃ mukta-saṅgo 'nahaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: vicarāmi mahīm etām mukta saṅgaḥ na ahaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.031/1 na hy ekasmād guror jñānaṃ su-sthiraṃ syāt su-puṣkalam
analyzed: na hi ekasmāt guroḥ jñānam susthiram syāt su puṣkalam

original: BhP_11.09.031/3 brahmaitad advitīyaṃ vai gīyate bahudharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: brahma etat advitīyam vai gīyate bahudhā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.09.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.09.032/1 ity uktvā sa yaduṃ vipras tam āmantrya gabhīra-dhīḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā sa yadum vipraḥ tam āmantrya gabhīra dhīḥ

original: BhP_11.09.032/3 vanditaḥ sv-arcito rājñā yayau prīto yathāgatam
analyzed: vanditaḥ su arcitaḥ rājñā yayau prītaḥ yathāgatam

original: BhP_11.09.033/1 avadhūta-vacaḥ śrutvā pūrveṣāṃ naḥ sa pūrva-jaḥ
analyzed: avadhūta vacaḥ śrutvā pūrveṣām naḥ sa pūrvajaḥ

original: BhP_11.09.033/3 sarva-saṅga-vinirmuktaḥ sama-citto babhūva ha
analyzed: sarva saṅga vinirmuktaḥ samacittaḥ babhūva ha

original: BhP_11.10.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.10.001/1 mayoditeṣv avahitaḥ sva-dharmeṣu mad-āśrayaḥ
analyzed: mayā uditeṣu avahitaḥ svadharmeṣu mad āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.001/3 varṇāśrama-kulācāram akāmātmā samācaret
analyzed: varṇa āśrama kulācāram akāma ātmā samācaret

original: BhP_11.10.002/1 anvīkṣeta viśuddhātmā dehināṃ viṣayātmanām
analyzed: anvīkṣeta viśuddha ātmā dehinām viṣaya ātmanām

original: BhP_11.10.002/3 guṇeṣu tattva-dhyānena sarvārambha-viparyayam
analyzed: guṇeṣu tattva dhyānena sarva ārambha viparyayam

original: BhP_11.10.003/1 suptasya viṣayāloko dhyāyato vā manorathaḥ
analyzed: suptasya viṣaya ālokaḥ dhyāyataḥ vā manorathaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.003/3 nānātmakatvād viphalas tathā bhedātma-dhīr guṇaiḥ
analyzed: nānā ātmaka tvāt viphalaḥ tathā bheda ātma dhīḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.10.004/1 nivṛttaṃ karma seveta pravṛttaṃ mat-paras tyajet
analyzed: nivṛttam karma seveta pravṛttam mad paraḥ tyajet

original: BhP_11.10.004/3 jijñāsāyāṃ sampravṛtto nādriyet karma-codanām
analyzed: jijñāsāyām sampravṛttaḥ karma codanām

original: BhP_11.10.005/1 yamān abhīkṣṇaṃ seveta niyamān mat-paraḥ kvacit
analyzed: yamān abhīkṣṇam seveta niyamān mad paraḥ kvacid

original: BhP_11.10.005/3 mad-abhijñaṃ guruṃ śāntam upāsīta mad-ātmakam
analyzed: mad abhijñam gurum śāntam upāsīta mad ātmakam

original: BhP_11.10.006/1 amāny amatsaro dakṣo nirmamo dṛḍha-sauhṛdaḥ
BhP_11.10.006/3 asatvaro 'rtha-jijñāsur anasūyur amogha-vāk
analyzed: a sa tvaraḥ ṛtha jijñāsuḥ an asūyuḥ a mogha vāc

original: BhP_11.10.007/1 jāyāpatya-gṛha-kṣetra- svajana-draviṇādiṣu
analyzed: jāyā apatya gṛha kṣetra sva jana draviṇa ādiṣu

original: BhP_11.10.007/3 udāsīnaḥ samaṃ paśyan sarveṣv artham ivātmanaḥ
analyzed: udāsīnaḥ samam paśyan sarveṣu artham iva ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.008/1 vilakṣaṇaḥ sthūla-sūkṣmād dehād ātmekṣitā sva-dṛk
analyzed: vilakṣaṇaḥ sthūla sūkṣmāt dehāt ātmā īkṣitā svadṛś

original: BhP_11.10.008/3 yathāgnir dāruṇo dāhyād dāhako 'nyaḥ prakāśakaḥ
analyzed: yathā agniḥ dāruṇaḥ dāhyāt dāhakaḥ prakāśakaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.009/1 nirodhotpatty-aṇu-bṛhan- nānātvaṃ tat-kṛtān guṇān
analyzed: nirodha utpatti aṇu bṛhat nānātvam tad kṛtān guṇān

original: BhP_11.10.009/3 antaḥ praviṣṭa ādhatta evaṃ deha-guṇān paraḥ
analyzed: antar praviṣṭaḥ ādhatte evam deha guṇān paraḥ

original: BhP_11.10.010/1 yo 'sau guṇair viracito deho 'yaṃ puruṣasya hi
analyzed: yaḥ sau guṇaiḥ viracitaḥ dehaḥ yam puruṣasya hi

original: BhP_11.10.010/3 saṃsāras tan-nibandho 'yaṃ puṃso vidyā cchid ātmanaḥ
analyzed: saṃsāraḥ yam puṃsaḥ vidyā chid ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.011/1 tasmāj jijñāsayātmānam ātma-sthaṃ kevalaṃ param
analyzed: tasmāt jijñāsayā ātmānam ātma stham kevalam param

original: BhP_11.10.011/3 saṅgamya nirased etad vastu-buddhiṃ yathā-kramam
analyzed: saṅgamya etat vastu buddhim yathākramam

original: BhP_11.10.012/1 ācāryo 'raṇir ādyaḥ syād ante-vāsy uttarāraṇiḥ
analyzed: ācāryaḥ raṇiḥ ādyaḥ syāt antevāsī uttara araṇiḥ

original: BhP_11.10.012/3 tat-sandhānaṃ pravacanaṃ vidyā-sandhiḥ sukhāvahaḥ
analyzed: tad sandhānam pravacanam vidyā sandhiḥ sukha āvahaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.013/1 vaiśāradī sāti-viśuddha-buddhir dhunoti māyāṃ guṇa-samprasūtām
analyzed: vaiśāradī sā ati viśuddha buddhiḥ dhunoti māyām guṇa samprasūtām

original: BhP_11.10.013/3 gunāṃś ca sandahya yad-ātmam etat svayaṃ ca śāṃyaty asamid yathāgniḥ
analyzed: gunān ca sandahya etat svayam ca śāṃyati a samidh yathā agniḥ

original: BhP_11.10.014/1 athaiṣām karma-kartṝṇāṃ bhoktṝṇāṃ sukha-duḥkhayoḥ
analyzed: atha eṣām karma kartṝṇām bhoktṝṇām sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: BhP_11.10.014/3 nānātvam atha nityatvaṃ loka-kālāgamātmanām
analyzed: nānātvam atha nitya tvam loka kāla āgama ātmanām

original: BhP_11.10.015/1 manyase sarva-bhāvānāṃ saṃsthā hy autpattikī yathā
analyzed: manyase sarva bhāvānām saṃsthā hi autpattikī yathā

original: BhP_11.10.015/3 tat-tad-ākṛti-bhedena jāyate bhidyate ca dhīḥ
analyzed: tad tad ākṛti bhedena jāyate bhidyate ca dhīḥ

original: BhP_11.10.016/1 evam apy aṅga sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ deha-yogataḥ
analyzed: evam api aṅga sarveṣām dehinām deha yogataḥ

original: BhP_11.10.016/3 kālāvayavataḥ santi bhāvā janmādayo 'sakṛt
analyzed: kāla avayavataḥ santi bhāvāḥ sakṛt

original: BhP_11.10.017/1 tatrāpi karmaṇāṃ kartur asvātantryaṃ ca lakṣyate
analyzed: tatra api karmaṇām kartuḥ asvātantryam ca lakṣyate

original: BhP_11.10.017/3 bhoktuś ca duḥkha-sukhayoḥ ko nv artho vivaśaṃ bhajet
analyzed: bhoktuḥ ca duḥkha sukhayoḥ kaḥ nu arthaḥ vivaśam bhajet

original: BhP_11.10.018/1 na dehināṃ sukhaṃ kiñcid vidyate viduṣām api
analyzed: na dehinām sukham kiñcid vidyate viduṣām api

original: BhP_11.10.018/3 tathā ca duḥkhaṃ mūḍhānāṃ vṛthāhaṅkaraṇaṃ param
analyzed: tathā ca duḥkham mūḍhānām vṛthā ahaṅkaraṇam param

original: BhP_11.10.019/1 yadi prāptiṃ vighātaṃ ca jānanti sukha-duḥkhayoḥ
analyzed: yadi prāptim vighātam ca jānanti sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: BhP_11.10.019/3 te 'py addhā na vidur yogaṃ mṛtyur na prabhaved yathā
analyzed: te pi addhā na viduḥ yogam mṛtyuḥ na prabhavet yathā

original: BhP_11.10.020/1 ko 'nv arthaḥ sukhayaty enaṃ kāmo vā mṛtyur antike
analyzed: kaḥ nu arthaḥ sukhayati enam kāmaḥ vā mṛtyuḥ antike

original: BhP_11.10.020/3 āghātaṃ nīyamānasya vadhyasyeva na tuṣṭi-daḥ
analyzed: āghātam nīyamānasya vadhyasya iva na tuṣṭi daḥ

original: BhP_11.10.021/1 śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭa-vad duṣṭaṃ spardhāsūyātyaya-vyayaiḥ
analyzed: śrutam ca dṛṣṭa vat duṣṭam spardhā asūyā atyaya vyayaiḥ

original: BhP_11.10.021/3 bahv-antarāya-kāmatvāt kṛṣi-vac cāpi niṣphalam
analyzed: bahu antarāya kāma tvāt kṛṣi vat ca api niṣphalam

original: BhP_11.10.022/1 antarāyair avihito yadi dharmaḥ sv-anuṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: antarāyaiḥ avihitaḥ yadi dharmaḥ su anuṣṭhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.022/3 tenāpi nirjitaṃ sthānaṃ yathā gacchati tac chṛṇu
analyzed: tena api nirjitam sthānam yathā gacchati tat śṛṇu

original: BhP_11.10.023/1 iṣṭveha devatā yajñaiḥ svar-lokaṃ yāti yājñikaḥ
analyzed: iṣṭvā iha devatāḥ yajñaiḥ svar lokam yāti yājñikaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.023/3 bhuñjīta deva-vat tatra bhogān divyān nijārjitān
analyzed: bhuñjīta deva vat tatra bhogān divyān nija arjitān

original: BhP_11.10.024/1 sva-puṇyopacite śubhre vimāna upagīyate
analyzed: sva puṇya upacite śubhre vimāne upagīyate

original: BhP_11.10.024/3 gandharvair viharan madhye devīnāṃ hṛdya-veṣa-dhṛk
analyzed: gandharvaiḥ viharan madhye devīnām

original: BhP_11.10.025/1 strībhiḥ kāmaga-yānena kiṅkinī-jāla-mālinā
analyzed: strībhiḥ kāmaga yānena kiṅkinī jāla mālinā

original: BhP_11.10.025/3 krīḍan na vedātma-pātaṃ surākrīḍeṣu nirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: krīḍan na veda ātmapātam sura ākrīḍeṣu nirvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.026/1 tāvat sa modate svarge yāvat puṇyaṃ samāpyate
analyzed: tāvat sa modate svarge yāvat puṇyam samāpyate

original: BhP_11.10.026/3 kṣīṇa-punyaḥ pataty arvāg anicchan kāla-cālitaḥ
analyzed: kṣīṇa punyaḥ patati arvāk an icchan kāla cālitaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.027/1 yady adharma-rataḥ saṅgād asatāṃ vājitendriyaḥ
analyzed: yadi adharma rataḥ saṅgāt asatām vā ajita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.027/3 kāmātmā kṛpaṇo lubdhaḥ straiṇo bhūta-vihiṃsakaḥ
analyzed: kāma ātmā kṛpaṇaḥ lubdhaḥ straiṇaḥ bhūta vihiṃsakaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.028/1 paśūn avidhinālabhya preta-bhūta-gaṇān yajan
analyzed: paśūn avidhinā ālabhya preta bhūta gaṇān yajan

original: BhP_11.10.028/3 narakān avaśo jantur gatvā yāty ulbaṇaṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: narakān avaśaḥ jantuḥ gatvā yāti ulbaṇam tamaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.029/1 karmāṇi duḥkhodarkāṇi kurvan dehena taiḥ punaḥ
analyzed: karmāṇi duḥkha udarkāṇi kurvan dehena taiḥ punar

original: BhP_11.10.029/3 deham ābhajate tatra kiṃ sukhaṃ martya-dharmiṇaḥ
analyzed: deham ābhajate tatra kim sukham martya dharmiṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.030/1 lokānāṃ loka-pālānāṃ mad bhayaṃ kalpa-jīvinām
analyzed: lokānām lokapālānām mat bhayam kalpa jīvinām

original: BhP_11.10.030/3 brahmaṇo 'pi bhayaṃ matto dvi-parārdha-parāyuṣaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ bhayam mattaḥ dvi parārdha parāyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.031/1 guṇāḥ sṛjanti karmāṇi guṇo 'nusṛjate guṇān
analyzed: guṇāḥ sṛjanti karmāṇi guṇaḥ nusṛjate guṇān

original: BhP_11.10.031/3 jīvas tu guṇa-saṃyukto bhuṅkte karma-phalāny asau
analyzed: jīvaḥ tu guṇa saṃyuktaḥ bhuṅkte karma phalāni asau

original: BhP_11.10.032/1 yāvat syād guṇa-vaiṣamyaṃ tāvan nānātvam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yāvat syāt guṇa vaiṣamyam tāvat nānātvam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.032/3 nānātvam ātmano yāvat pāratantryaṃ tadaiva hi
analyzed: nānātvam ātmanaḥ yāvat pāratantryam tadā eva hi

original: BhP_11.10.033/1 yāvad asyāsvatantratvaṃ tāvad īśvarato bhayam
analyzed: yāvat asya asvatantra tvam tāvat īśvarataḥ bhayam

original: BhP_11.10.033/3 ya etat samupāsīraṃs te muhyanti śucārpitāḥ
analyzed: ye etat samupāsīran te muhyanti śucā arpitāḥ

original: BhP_11.10.034/1 kāla ātmāgamo lokaḥ svabhāvo dharma eva ca
analyzed: kālaḥ ātma āgamaḥ lokaḥ svabhāvaḥ dharmaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_11.10.034/3 iti māṃ bahudhā prāhur guṇa-vyatikare sati
analyzed: iti mām bahudhā prāhuḥ guṇa vyatikare sati

original: BhP_11.10.035/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.10.035/1 guṇeṣu vartamāno 'pi deha-jeṣv anapāvṛtaḥ
analyzed: guṇeṣu vartamānaḥ pi deha jeṣu anapāvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.10.035/3 guṇair na badhyate dehī badhyate vā kathaṃ vibho
analyzed: guṇaiḥ na badhyate dehī badhyate vā katham vibho

original: BhP_11.10.036/1 kathaṃ varteta viharet kair vā jñāyeta lakṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: katham varteta viharet kaiḥ vā jñāyeta lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.10.036/3 kiṃ bhuñjītota visṛjec chayītāsīta yāti vā
analyzed: kim bhuñjīta uta visṛjet śayīta āsīta yāti vā

original: BhP_11.10.037/1 etad acyuta me brūhi praśnaṃ praśna-vidāṃ vara
analyzed: etat acyuta me brūhi praśnam praśna vidām vara

original: BhP_11.10.037/3 nitya-baddho nitya-mukta eka eveti me bhramaḥ
analyzed: nitya baddhaḥ nitya muktaḥ ekaḥ eva iti me bhramaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.11.001/1 baddho mukta iti vyākhyā guṇato me na vastutaḥ
analyzed: baddhaḥ muktaḥ iti vyākhyā guṇataḥ me na vastutas

original: BhP_11.11.001/3 guṇasya māyā-mūlatvān na me mokṣo na bandhanam
analyzed: guṇasya māyā mūla tvāt na me mokṣaḥ na bandhanam

original: BhP_11.11.002/1 śoka-mohau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ dehāpattiś ca māyayā
analyzed: śoka mohau sukham duḥkham deha āpattiḥ ca māyayā

original: BhP_11.11.002/3 svapno yathātmanaḥ khyātiḥ saṃsṛtir na tu vāstavī
analyzed: svapnaḥ yathā ātmanaḥ khyātiḥ saṃsṛtiḥ na tu vāstavī

original: BhP_11.11.003/1 vidyāvidye mama tanū viddhy uddhava śarīriṇām
analyzed: vidyā avidye mama tanū viddhi uddhava śarīriṇām

original: BhP_11.11.003/3 mokṣa-bandha-karī ādye māyayā me vinirmite
analyzed: mokṣa bandha karī ādye māyayā me vinirmite

original: BhP_11.11.004/1 ekasyaiva mamāṃśasya jīvasyaiva mahā-mate
analyzed: ekasya eva mama aṃśasya jīvasya eva mahāmate

original: BhP_11.11.004/3 bandho 'syāvidyayānādir vidyayā ca tathetaraḥ
analyzed: bandho sya avidyayā anādiḥ vidyayā ca tathā itaraḥ

original: BhP_11.11.005/1 atha baddhasya muktasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ vadāmi te
analyzed: atha baddhasya muktasya vailakṣaṇyam vadāmi te

original: BhP_11.11.005/3 viruddha-dharmiṇos tāta sthitayor eka-dharmiṇi
analyzed: viruddha dharmiṇoḥ tāta sthitayoḥ eka dharmiṇi

original: BhP_11.11.006/1 suparṇāv etau sadṛśau sakhāyau yadṛcchayaitau kṛta-nīḍau ca vṛkṣe
analyzed: suparṇau etau sadṛśau sakhāyau yadṛcchayā etau kṛta nīḍau ca vṛkṣe

original: BhP_11.11.006/3 ekas tayoḥ khādati pippalānnam anyo niranno 'pi balena bhūyān
analyzed: ekaḥ tayoḥ khādati pippala annam anyaḥ nirannaḥ balena bhūyān

original: BhP_11.11.007/1 ātmānam anyaṃ ca sa veda vidvān apippalādo na tu pippalādaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam anyam ca sa veda vidvān a pippalādaḥ na tu pippalādaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.007/3 yo 'vidyayā yuk sa tu nitya-baddho vidyā-mayo yaḥ sa tu nitya-muktaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vidyayā yuj sa tu nitya baddhaḥ vidyā mayaḥ yaḥ sa tu nitya muktaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.008/1 deha-stho 'pi na deha-stho vidvān svapnād yathotthitaḥ
analyzed: deha sthaḥ na deha sthaḥ vidvān svapnāt yathā utthitaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.008/3 adeha-stho 'pi deha-sthaḥ kumatiḥ svapna-dṛg yathā
analyzed: adeha sthaḥ deha sthaḥ kumatiḥ svapna dṛś yathā

original: BhP_11.11.009/1 indriyair indriyārtheṣu guṇair api guṇeṣu ca
analyzed: indriyaiḥ indriya artheṣu guṇaiḥ api guṇeṣu ca

original: BhP_11.11.009/3 gṛhyamāṇeṣv ahaṃ kuryān na vidvān yas tv avikriyaḥ
analyzed: gṛhyamāṇeṣu aham kuryāt na vidvān yaḥ tu avikriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.010/1 daivādhīne śarīre 'smin guṇa-bhāvyena karmaṇā
analyzed: daiva adhīne śarīre smin guṇa bhāvyena karmaṇā

original: BhP_11.11.010/3 vartamāno 'budhas tatra kartāsmīti nibadhyate
analyzed: vartamānaḥ budhaḥ tatra kartāsmi iti nibadhyate

original: BhP_11.11.011/1 evaṃ viraktaḥ śayana āsanāṭana-majjane
analyzed: evam viraktaḥ śayane āsana aṭana majjane

original: BhP_11.11.011/3 darśana-sparśana-ghrāṇa- bhojana-śravaṇādiṣu
analyzed: darśana sparśana ghrāṇa bhojana śravaṇa ādiṣu

original: BhP_11.11.011/5 na tathā badhyate vidvān tatra tatrādayan guṇān
analyzed: na tathā badhyate vidvān tatra tatra adayan guṇān

original: BhP_11.11.012/1 prakṛti-stho 'py asaṃsakto yathā khaṃ savitānilaḥ
analyzed: prakṛti sthaḥ pi asaṃsaktaḥ yathā kham savitā anilaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.012/3 vaiśāradyekṣayāsaṅga- śitayā chinna-saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: vaiśāradya īkṣayā asaṅga śitayā chinna saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.012/5 pratibuddha iva svapnān nānātvād vinivartate
analyzed: pratibuddhaḥ iva svapnāt nānātvāt vinivartate

original: BhP_11.11.014/1 yasya syur vīta-saṅkalpāḥ prāṇendriya-rnano-dhiyām
analyzed: yasya syuḥ vīta saṅkalpāḥ prāṇa indriya rnanaḥ dhiyām

original: BhP_11.11.014/3 vṛttayaḥ sa vinirmukto deha-stho 'pi hi tad-guṇaiḥ
analyzed: vṛttayaḥ sa vinirmuktaḥ hi tad guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.11.015/1 yasyātmā hiṃsyate hiṃsrair yena kiñcid yadṛcchayā
analyzed: yasya ātmā hiṃsyate hiṃsraiḥ yena kiñcid yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_11.11.015/3 arcyate vā kvacit tatra na vyatikriyate budhaḥ
analyzed: arcyate vā kvacid tatra na vyatikriyate budhaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.016/1 na stuvīta na nindeta kurvataḥ sādhv asādhu vā
analyzed: na stuvīta na nindeta kurvataḥ sādhu asādhu vā

original: BhP_11.11.016/3 vadato guṇa-doṣābhyāṃ varjitaḥ sama-dṛṅ muniḥ
analyzed: vadataḥ guṇa doṣābhyām varjitaḥ samadṛś muniḥ

original: BhP_11.11.017/1 na kuryān na vadet kiñcin na dhyāyet sādhv asādhu vā
analyzed: na kuryāt na vadet kiñcid na dhyāyet sādhu asādhu vā

original: BhP_11.11.017/3 ātmārāmo 'nayā vṛttyā vicarej jaḍa-van muniḥ
analyzed: ātma ārāmaḥ nayā vṛttyā vicaret jaḍa vat muniḥ

original: BhP_11.11.018/1 śabda-brahmaṇi niṣṇāto na niṣṇāyāt pare yadi
analyzed: śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ na niṣṇāyāt pare yadi

original: BhP_11.11.018/3 śramas tasya śrama-phalo hy adhenum iva rakṣataḥ
analyzed: śramaḥ tasya śrama phalaḥ hi a dhenum iva rakṣataḥ

original: BhP_11.11.019/1 gāṃ dugdha-dohām asatīṃ ca bhāryāṃ dehaṃ parādhīnam asat-prajāṃ ca
analyzed: gām dugdha dohām asatīm ca bhāryām deham para adhīnam asat prajām ca

original: BhP_11.11.019/3 vittaṃ tv atīrthī-kṛtam aṅga vācaṃ hīnāṃ mayā rakṣati duḥkha-duḥkhī
analyzed: vittam tu a tīrthīkṛtam aṅga vācam hīnām mayā rakṣati duḥkha duḥkhī

original: BhP_11.11.020/1 yasyāṃ na me pāvanam aṅga karma sthity-udbhava-prāṇa-nirodham asya
analyzed: yasyām na me pāvanam aṅga karma sthiti udbhava prāṇa nirodham asya

original: BhP_11.11.020/3 līlāvatārepsita-janma vā syād vandhyāṃ giraṃ tāṃ bibhṛyān na dhīraḥ
analyzed: līlāvatāra īpsita janma vā syāt vandhyām giram tām bibhṛyāt na dhīraḥ

original: BhP_11.11.021/1 evaṃ jijñāsayāpohya nānātva-bhramam ātmani
analyzed: evam jijñāsayā apohya nānātva bhramam ātmani

original: BhP_11.11.021/3 upārameta virajaṃ mano mayy arpya sarva-ge
analyzed: upārameta virajam manaḥ mayi arpya sarvage

original: BhP_11.11.022/1 yady anīśo dhārayituṃ mano brahmaṇi niścalam
analyzed: yadi anīśaḥ dhārayitum manaḥ brahmaṇi niścalam

original: BhP_11.11.022/3 mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirapekṣaḥ samācara
analyzed: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirapekṣaḥ samācara

original: BhP_11.11.023/1 śraddhālur mat-kathāḥ śṛṇvan su-bhadrā loka-pāvanīḥ
analyzed: śraddhāluḥ mad kathāḥ śṛṇvan su bhadrāḥ loka pāvanīḥ

original: BhP_11.11.023/3 gāyann anusmaran karma janma cābhinayan muhuḥ
analyzed: gāyan anusmaran karma janma ca abhinayan muhur

original: BhP_11.11.024/1 mad-arthe dharma-kāmārthān ācaran mad-apāśrayaḥ
analyzed: mad arthe dharma kāma arthān ācaran mad apāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.024/3 labhate niścalāṃ bhaktiṃ mayy uddhava sanātane
analyzed: labhate niścalām bhaktim mayi uddhava sanātane

original: BhP_11.11.025/1 sat-saṅga-labdhayā bhaktyā mayi māṃ sa upāsitā
analyzed: sat saṅga labdhayā bhaktyā mayi mām saḥ upāsitā

original: BhP_11.11.025/3 sa vai me darśitaṃ sadbhir añjasā vindate padam
analyzed: sa vai me darśitam sadbhiḥ añjasā vindate padam

original: BhP_11.11.026/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.11.026/1 sādhus tavottama-śloka mataḥ kīdṛg-vidhaḥ prabho
analyzed: sādhuḥ tava uttamaśloka mataḥ kīdṛgvidhaḥ prabho

original: BhP_11.11.026/3 bhaktis tvayy upayujyeta kīdṛśī sadbhir ādṛtā
analyzed: bhaktiḥ tvayi upayujyeta kīdṛśī sadbhiḥ ādṛtā

original: BhP_11.11.027/1 etan me puruṣādhyakṣa lokādhyakṣa jagat-prabho
analyzed: etat me puruṣādhyakṣa loka adhyakṣa jagatprabho

original: BhP_11.11.027/3 praṇatāyānuraktāya prapannāya ca kathyatām
analyzed: praṇatāya anuraktāya prapannāya ca kathyatām

original: BhP_11.11.028/1 tvaṃ brahma paramaṃ vyoma puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
analyzed: tvam brahma paramam vyoma puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_11.11.028/3 avatīrno 'si bhagavan svecchopātta-pṛthag-vapuḥ
analyzed: avatīḥ naḥ si bhagavan sva icchā upātta pṛthak vapuḥ

original: BhP_11.11.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.11.029/1 kṛpālur akṛta-drohas titikṣuḥ sarva-dehinām
analyzed: kṛpāluḥ a kṛta drohaḥ titikṣuḥ sarva dehinām

original: BhP_11.11.029/3 satya-sāro 'navadyātmā samaḥ sarvopakārakaḥ
BhP_11.11.030/1 kāmair ahata-dhīr dānto mṛduḥ śucir akiñcanaḥ
analyzed: kāmaiḥ ahata dhīḥ dāntaḥ mṛduḥ śuciḥ akiñcanaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.030/3 anīho mita-bhuk śāntaḥ sthiro mac-charaṇo muniḥ
analyzed: anīhaḥ mita bhuj śāntaḥ sthiraḥ mad śaraṇaḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_11.11.031/1 apramatto gabhīrātmā dhṛtimāñ jita-ṣaḍ-guṇaḥ
analyzed: apramattaḥ gabhīra ātmā dhṛtimān jita ṣaḍguṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.031/3 amānī māna-daḥ kalyo maitraḥ kāruṇikaḥ kaviḥ
BhP_11.11.032/1 ājñāyaivaṃ guṇān doṣān mayādiṣṭān api svakān
analyzed: ājñāya evam guṇān doṣān mayā ādiṣṭān api svakān

original: BhP_11.11.032/3 dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān māṃ bhajeta sa tu sattamaḥ
analyzed: dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān mām bhajeta sa tu sattamaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.033/1 jñātvājñātvātha ye vai māṃ yāvān yaś cāsmi yādṛśaḥ
analyzed: jñātvā a jñātvā atha ye vai mām yāvān yaḥ ca asmi yādṛśaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.033/3 bhajanty ananya-bhāvena te me bhaktatamā matāḥ
analyzed: bhajanti ananya bhāvena te me bhaktatamāḥ matāḥ

original: BhP_11.11.034/1 mal-liṅga-mad-bhakta-jana- darśana-sparśanārcanam
analyzed: mad liṅga mad bhakta jana darśana sparśana arcanam

original: BhP_11.11.034/3 paricaryā stutiḥ prahva- guṇa-karmānukīrtanam
analyzed: paricaryā stutiḥ

original: BhP_11.11.035/1 mat-kathā-śravaṇe śraddhā mad-anudhyānam uddhava
analyzed: mad kathā śravaṇe śraddhā mad anudhyānam uddhava

original: BhP_11.11.035/3 sarva-lābhopaharaṇaṃ dāsyenātma-nivedanam
analyzed: sarva lābha upaharaṇam dāsyena ātma nivedanam

original: BhP_11.11.036/1 maj-janma-karma-kathanaṃ mama parvānumodanam
analyzed: mad janma karma kathanam mama parva anumodanam

original: BhP_11.11.036/3 gīta-tāṇḍava-vāditra- goṣṭhībhir mad-gṛhotsavaḥ
analyzed: gīta tāṇḍava vāditra goṣṭhībhiḥ mad gṛha utsavaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.037/1 yātrā bali-vidhānaṃ ca sarva-vārṣika-parvasu
analyzed: yātrā bali vidhānam ca sarva vārṣika parvasu

original: BhP_11.11.037/3 vaidikī tāntrikī dīkṣā madīya-vrata-dhāraṇam
analyzed: vaidikī tāntrikī dīkṣā madīya vrata dhāraṇam

original: BhP_11.11.038/1 mamārcā-sthāpane śraddhā svataḥ saṃhatya codyamaḥ
analyzed: mama arcā sthāpane śraddhā svatas saṃhatya ca udyamaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.038/3 udyānopavanākrīḍa- pura-mandira-karmaṇi
analyzed: udyāna upavana ākrīḍa pura mandira karmaṇi

original: BhP_11.11.039/1 sammārjanopalepābhyāṃ seka-maṇḍala-vartanaiḥ
analyzed: sammārjana upalepābhyām seka maṇḍala vartanaiḥ

original: BhP_11.11.039/3 gṛha-śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mahyaṃ dāsa-vad yad amāyayā
analyzed: gṛha śuśrūṣaṇam mahyam dāsa vat yat amāyayā

original: BhP_11.11.040/1 amānitvam adambhitvaṃ kṛtasyāparikīrtanam
analyzed: amāni tvam adambhi tvam kṛtasya a parikīrtanam

original: BhP_11.11.040/3 api dīpāvalokaṃ me nopayuñjyān niveditam
analyzed: api dīpa avalokam me na upayuñjyāt niveditam

original: BhP_11.11.041/1 yad yad iṣṭatamaṃ loke yac cāti-priyam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yat yat iṣṭatamam loke yat ca atipriyam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.041/3 tat tan nivedayen mahyaṃ tad ānantyāya kalpate
analyzed: tat tat nivedayet mahyam tat ānantyāya kalpate

original: BhP_11.11.042/1 sūryo 'gnir brāhmaṇā gāvo vaiṣṇavaḥ khaṃ maruj jalam
analyzed: sūryaḥ gniḥ brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ kham marut jalam

original: BhP_11.11.042/3 bhūr ātmā sarva-bhūtāni bhadra pūjā-padāni me
analyzed: bhūḥ ātmā sarva bhūtāni bhadra pūjā padāni me

original: BhP_11.11.043/1 sūrye tu vidyayā trayyā haviṣāgnau yajeta mām
analyzed: sūrye tu vidyayā trayyā haviṣā agnau yajeta mām

original: BhP_11.11.043/3 ātithyena tu viprāgrye goṣv aṅga yavasādinā
analyzed: ātithyena tu vipra agrye goṣu aṅga yavasa ādinā

original: BhP_11.11.044/1 vaiṣṇave bandhu-sat-kṛtyā hṛdi khe dhyāna-niṣṭhayā
BhP_11.11.044/3 vāyau mukhya-dhiyā toye dravyais toya-puraḥsaraiḥ
analyzed: vāyau mukhya dhiyā toye dravyaiḥ toya puraḥsaraiḥ

original: BhP_11.11.045/1 sthaṇḍile mantra-hṛdayair bhogair ātmānam ātmani
analyzed: sthaṇḍile mantra hṛdayaiḥ bhogaiḥ ātmānam ātmani

original: BhP_11.11.045/3 kṣetra-jñaṃ sarva-bhūteṣu samatvena yajeta mām
analyzed: kṣetrajñam sarva bhūteṣu sama tvena yajeta mām

original: BhP_11.11.046/1 dhiṣṇyeṣv ity eṣu mad-rūpaṃ śaṅkha-cakra-gadāmbujaiḥ
analyzed: dhiṣṇyeṣu iti eṣu mad rūpam śaṅkha cakra gadā ambujaiḥ

original: BhP_11.11.046/3 yuktaṃ catur-bhujaṃ śāntaṃ dhyāyann arcet samāhitaḥ
analyzed: yuktam caturbhujam śāntam dhyāyan arcet samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.047/1 iṣṭā-pūrtena mām evaṃ yo yajeta samāhitaḥ
analyzed: iṣṭāpūrtena mām evam yaḥ yajeta samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.11.047/3 labhate mayi sad-bhaktiṃ mat-smṛtiḥ sādhu-sevayā
analyzed: labhate mayi sat bhaktim mad smṛtiḥ sādhu sevayā

original: BhP_11.11.048/1 prāyeṇa bhakti-yogena sat-saṅgena vinoddhava
analyzed: prāyeṇa bhakti yogena sat saṅgena vinā uddhava

original: BhP_11.11.048/3 nopāyo vidyate samyak prāyaṇaṃ hi satām aham
analyzed: na upāyaḥ vidyate samyak prāyaṇam hi satām aham

original: BhP_11.11.049/1 athaitat paramaṃ guhyaṃ śṛṇvato yadu-nandana
analyzed: athā etat paramam guhyam śṛṇvataḥ yadunandana

original: BhP_11.11.049/3 su-gopyam api vakṣyāmi tvaṃ me bhṛtyaḥ suhṛt sakhā
analyzed: su gopyam api vakṣyāmi tvam me bhṛtyaḥ suhṛd sakhā

original: BhP_11.12.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.12.001/1 na rodhayati māṃ yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma eva ca
analyzed: na rodhayati mām yogaḥ na sāṅkhyam dharmaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_11.12.001/3 na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo neṣṭā-pūrtaṃ na dakṣiṇā
analyzed: na svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ tyāgaḥ na iṣṭāpūrtam na dakṣiṇā

original: BhP_11.12.002/1 vratāni yajñaś chandāṃsi tīrthāni niyamā yamāḥ
analyzed: vratāni yajñaḥ chandāṃsi tīrthāni niyamāḥ yamāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.002/3 yathāvarundhe sat-saṅgaḥ sarva-saṅgāpaho hi mām
analyzed: yathā avarundhe sat saṅgaḥ sarva saṅga apahaḥ hi mām

original: BhP_11.12.003/1 sat-saṅgena hi daiteyā yātudhānā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ
analyzed: sat saṅgena hi daiteyāḥ yātudhānāḥ mṛgāḥ khagāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.003/3 gandharvāpsaraso nāgāḥ siddhāś cāraṇa-guhyakāḥ
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ nāgāḥ siddhāḥ cāraṇa guhyakāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.004/1 vidyādharā manuṣyeṣu vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ striyo 'ntya-jāḥ
analyzed: vidyādharāḥ manuṣyeṣu vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ striyaḥ ntyajāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.004/3 rajas-tamaḥ-prakṛtayas tasmiṃs tasmin yuge yuge
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ prakṛtayaḥ tasmin tasmin yuge yuge

original: BhP_11.12.005/1 bahavo mat-padaṃ prāptās tvāṣṭra-kāyādhavādayaḥ
analyzed: bahavaḥ mad padam prāptāḥ tvāṣṭra kāyādhava ādayaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.005/3 vṛṣaparvā balir bāṇo mayaś cātha vibhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣaparvā baliḥ bāṇaḥ mayaḥ ca atha vibhīṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.006/1 sugrīvo hanumān ṛkṣo gajo gṛdhro vaṇikpathaḥ
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ hanumān ṛkṣaḥ gajaḥ gṛdhraḥ vaṇikpathaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.006/3 vyādhaḥ kubjā vraje gopyo yajña-patnyas tathāpare
analyzed: vyādhaḥ kubjāḥ vraje gopyaḥ yajñapatnyaḥ tathā apare

original: BhP_11.12.007/1 te nādhīta-śruti-gaṇā nopāsita-mahattamāḥ
analyzed: te na adhīta śruti gaṇāḥ na upāsita mahattamāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.007/3 avratātapta-tapasaḥ mat-saṅgān mām upāgatāḥ
analyzed: avrata a tapta tapasaḥ mad saṅgāt mām upāgatāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.008/1 kevalena hi bhāvena gopyo gāvo nagā mṛgāḥ
analyzed: kevalena hi bhāvena gopyaḥ gāvaḥ nagāḥ mṛgāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.008/3 ye 'nye mūḍha-dhiyo nāgāḥ siddhā mām īyur añjasā
analyzed: ye nye mūḍha dhiyaḥ nāgāḥ siddhāḥ mām īyuḥ añjasā

original: BhP_11.12.009/1 yaṃ na yogena sāṅkhyena dāna-vrata-tapo-'dhvaraiḥ
analyzed: yam na yogena sāṅkhyena dāna vrata tapaḥ adhvaraiḥ

original: BhP_11.12.009/3 vyākhyā-svādhyāya-sannyāsaiḥ prāpnuyād yatnavān api
analyzed: vyākhyā svādhyāya sannyāsaiḥ prāpnuyāt yatnavān api

original: BhP_11.12.010/1 rāmeṇa sārdhaṃ mathurāṃ praṇīte śvāphalkinā mayy anurakta-cittāḥ
analyzed: rāmeṇa sārdham mathurām praṇīte śvāphalkinā mayi anurakta cittāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.010/3 vigāḍha-bhāvena na me viyoga- tīvrādhayo 'nyaṃ dadṛśuḥ sukhāya
analyzed: vigāḍha bhāvena na me viyoga tīvra ādhayaḥ dadṛśuḥ sukhāya

original: BhP_11.12.011/1 tās tāḥ kṣapāḥ preṣṭhatamena nītā mayaiva vṛndāvana-gocareṇa
analyzed: tāḥ tāḥ kṣapāḥ preṣṭhatamena nītāḥ mayā eva vṛndāvana gocareṇa

original: BhP_11.12.011/3 kṣaṇārdha-vat tāḥ punar aṅga tāsāṃ hīnā mayā kalpa-samā babhūvuḥ
analyzed: kṣaṇārdha vat tāḥ punar aṅga tāsām hīnāḥ mayā kalpa samāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: BhP_11.12.012/1 tā nāvidan mayy anuṣaṅga-baddha- dhiyaḥ svam ātmānam adas tathedam
analyzed: tāḥ na avidat mayi anuṣaṅga baddha dhiyaḥ svam ātmānam adaḥ tathā idam

original: BhP_11.12.012/3 yathā samādhau munayo 'bdhi-toye nadyaḥ praviṣṭā iva nāma-rūpe
analyzed: yathā samādhau munayaḥ bdhi toye nadyaḥ praviṣṭāḥ iva nāma rūpe

original: BhP_11.12.013/1 mat-kāmā ramaṇaṃ jāram asvarūpa-vido 'balāḥ
analyzed: mad kāmāḥ ramaṇam jāram a svarūpa vidaḥ balāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.013/3 brahma māṃ paramaṃ prāpuḥ saṅgāc chata-sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: brahma mām paramam prāpuḥ saṅgāt śata sahasraśas

original: BhP_11.12.014/1 tasmāt tvam uddhavotsṛjya codanāṃ praticodanām
analyzed: tasmāt tvam uddhava utsṛjya codanām praticodanām

original: BhP_11.12.014/3 pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca śrotavyaṃ śrutam eva ca
analyzed: pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca śrotavyam śrutam eva ca

original: BhP_11.12.015/1 mām ekam eva śaraṇam ātmānaṃ sarva-dehinām
analyzed: mām ekam eva śaraṇam ātmānam sarva dehinām

original: BhP_11.12.015/3 yāhi sarvātma-bhāvena mayā syā hy akuto-bhayaḥ
analyzed: yāhi sarva ātma bhāvena mayā syāḥ hi akutobhayaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.016/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.12.016/1 saṃśayaḥ śṛṇvato vācaṃ tava yogeśvareśvara
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ śṛṇvataḥ vācam tava yoga īśvara īśvara

original: BhP_11.12.016/3 na nivartata ātma-stho yena bhrāmyati me manaḥ
analyzed: na nivartate ātma sthaḥ yena bhrāmyati me manaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.017/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.12.017/1 sa eṣa jīvo vivara-prasūtiḥ prāṇena ghoṣeṇa guhāṃ praviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa jīvaḥ vivara prasūtiḥ prāṇena ghoṣeṇa guhām praviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.017/3 mano-mayaṃ sūkṣmam upetya rūpaṃ mātrā svaro varṇa iti sthaviṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ mayam sūkṣmam upetya rūpam mātrā svaraḥ varṇaḥ iti sthaviṣṭhaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.018/1 yathānalaḥ khe 'nila-bandhur uṣmā balena dāruṇy adhimathyamānaḥ
analyzed: yathā analaḥ khe nila bandhuḥ uṣmā balena dāruṇi adhimathyamānaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.018/3 aṇuḥ prajāto haviṣā samedhate tathaiva me vyaktir iyaṃ hi vāṇī
analyzed: aṇuḥ prajātaḥ haviṣā samedhate tathā eva me vyaktiḥ iyam hi vāṇī

original: BhP_11.12.019/1 evaṃ gadiḥ karma gatir visargo ghrāṇo raso dṛk sparśaḥ śrutiś ca
analyzed: evam gadiḥ karma gatiḥ visargaḥ ghrāṇaḥ rasaḥ dṛś sparśaḥ śrutiḥ ca

original: BhP_11.12.019/3 saṅkalpa-vijñānam athābhimānaḥ sūtraṃ rajaḥ-sattva-tamo-vikāraḥ
analyzed: saṅkalpa vijñānam atha abhimānaḥ sūtram rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ vikāraḥ

original: BhP_11.12.020/1 ayaṃ hi jīvas tri-vṛd abja-yonir avyakta eko vayasā sa ādyaḥ
analyzed: ayam hi jīvaḥ trivṛt abjayoniḥ avyaktaḥ ekaḥ vayasā saḥ ādyaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.020/3 viśliṣṭa-śaktir bahudheva bhāti bījāni yoniṃ pratipadya yadvat
analyzed: viśliṣṭa śaktiḥ bahudhā iva bhāti bījāni yonim pratipadya yadvat

original: BhP_11.12.021/1 yasminn idaṃ protam aśeṣam otaṃ paṭo yathā tantu-vitāna-saṃsthaḥ
analyzed: yasmin idam protam aśeṣam otam paṭaḥ yathā tantu vitāna saṃsthaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.021/3 ya eṣa saṃsāra-taruḥ purāṇaḥ karmātmakaḥ puṣpa-phale prasūte
analyzed: yaḥ eṣa saṃsāra taruḥ purāṇaḥ karma ātmakaḥ puṣpa phale prasūte

original: BhP_11.12.022/1 dve asya bīje śata-mūlas tri-nālaḥ pañca-skandhaḥ pañca-rasa-prasūtiḥ
analyzed: dve asya bīje śata mūlaḥ tri nālaḥ pañca skandhaḥ pañca rasa prasūtiḥ

original: BhP_11.12.022/3 daśaika-śākho dvi-suparṇa-nīḍas tri-valkalo dvi-phalo 'rkaṃ praviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: daśa eka śākhaḥ dvi suparṇa nīḍaḥ tri valkalaḥ dvi phalaḥ rkam praviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_11.12.023/1 adanti caikaṃ phalam asya gṛdhrā grāme-carā ekam araṇya-vāsāḥ
analyzed: adanti ca ekam phalam asya gṛdhrāḥ grāmecarāḥ ekam araṇya vāsāḥ

original: BhP_11.12.023/3 haṃsā ya ekaṃ bahu-rūpam ijyair māyā-mayaṃ veda sa veda vedam
analyzed: haṃsāḥ yaḥ ekam bahu rūpam ijyaiḥ māyā mayam veda sa veda vedam

original: BhP_11.12.024/1 evaṃ gurūpāsanayaika-bhaktyā vidyā-kuṭhāreṇa śitena dhīraḥ
analyzed: evam guru upāsanayā ekabhaktyā vidyā kuṭhāreṇa śitena dhīraḥ

original: BhP_11.12.024/3 vivṛścya jīvāśayam apramattaḥ sampadya cātmānam atha tyajāstram
analyzed: vivṛścya jīva āśayam apramattaḥ sampadya ca ātmānam atha tyaja astram

original: BhP_11.13.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.13.001/1 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇā buddher na cātmanaḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ buddheḥ na ca ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.001/3 sattvenānyatamau hanyāt sattvaṃ sattvena caiva hi
analyzed: sattvena anyatamau hanyāt sattvam sattvena ca eva hi

original: BhP_11.13.002/1 sattvād dharmo bhaved vṛddhāt puṃso mad-bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: sattvāt dharmaḥ bhavet vṛddhāt puṃsaḥ mad bhakti lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.002/3 sāttvikopāsayā sattvaṃ tato dharmaḥ pravartate
analyzed: sāttvika upāsayā sattvam tatas dharmaḥ pravartate

original: BhP_11.13.003/1 dharmo rajas tamo hanyāt sattva-vṛddhir anuttamaḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ hanyāt sattva vṛddhiḥ anuttamaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.003/3 āśu naśyati tan-mūlo hy adharma ubhaye hate
analyzed: āśu naśyati tad mūlaḥ hi adharmaḥ ubhaye hate

original: BhP_11.13.004/1 āgamo 'paḥ prajā deśaḥ kālaḥ karma ca janma ca
analyzed: āgamaḥ paḥ prajā deśaḥ kālaḥ karma ca janma ca

original: BhP_11.13.004/3 dhyānaṃ mantro 'tha saṃskāro daśaite guṇa-hetavaḥ
analyzed: dhyānam saṃskāraḥ daśā ete guṇa hetavaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.005/1 tat tat sāttvikam evaiṣāṃ yad yad vṛddhāḥ pracakṣate
analyzed: tat tat sāttvikam eva eṣām yat yat vṛddhāḥ pracakṣate

original: BhP_11.13.005/3 nindanti tāmasaṃ tat tad rājasaṃ tad-upekṣitam
analyzed: nindanti tāmasam tat tat rājasam tad upekṣitam

original: BhP_11.13.006/1 sāttvikāny eva seveta pumān sattva-vivṛddhaye
analyzed: sāttvikāni eva seveta pumān sattva vivṛddhaye

original: BhP_11.13.006/3 tato dharmas tato jñānaṃ yāvat smṛtir apohanam
analyzed: tatas dharmaḥ tatas jñānam yāvat smṛtiḥ apohanam

original: BhP_11.13.007/1 veṇu-saṅgharṣa-jo vahnir dagdhvā śāmyati tad-vanam
analyzed: veṇu saṅgharṣa jaḥ vahniḥ dagdhvā śāmyati tat vanam

original: BhP_11.13.007/3 evaṃ guṇa-vyatyaya-jo dehaḥ śāmyati tat-kriyaḥ
analyzed: evam guṇa vyatyaya jaḥ dehaḥ śāmyati tad kriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.008/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.13.008/1 vidanti martyāḥ prāyeṇa viṣayān padam āpadām
analyzed: vidanti martyāḥ prāyeṇa viṣayān padam āpadām

original: BhP_11.13.008/3 tathāpi bhuñjate kṛṣṇa tat kathaṃ śva-kharāja-vat
analyzed: tathā api bhuñjate kṛṣṇa tat katham śva kha rājavat

original: BhP_11.13.009/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.13.009/1 aham ity anyathā-buddhiḥ pramattasya yathā hṛdi
analyzed: aham iti anyathā buddhiḥ pramattasya yathā hṛdi

original: BhP_11.13.009/3 utsarpati rajo ghoraṃ tato vaikārikaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: utsarpati rajaḥ ghoram tatas vaikārikam manaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.010/1 rajo-yuktasya manasaḥ saṅkalpaḥ sa-vikalpakaḥ
analyzed: rajaḥ yuktasya manasaḥ saṅkalpaḥ savikalpakaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.010/3 tataḥ kāmo guṇa-dhyānād duḥsahaḥ syād dhi durmateḥ
analyzed: tatas kāmaḥ guṇa dhyānāt duḥsahaḥ syāt hi durmateḥ

original: BhP_11.13.011/1 karoti kāma-vaśa-gaḥ karmāṇy avijitendriyaḥ
analyzed: karoti kāma vaśagaḥ karmāṇi avijita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.011/3 duḥkhodarkāṇi sampaśyan rajo-vega-vimohitaḥ
analyzed: duḥkha udarkāṇi sampaśyan rajaḥ vega vimohitaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.012/1 rajas-tamobhyāṃ yad api vidvān vikṣipta-dhīḥ punaḥ
analyzed: rajaḥ tamobhyām yat api vidvān vikṣipta dhīḥ punar

original: BhP_11.13.012/3 atandrito mano yuñjan doṣa-dṛṣṭir na sajjate
analyzed: atandritaḥ manaḥ yuñjan doṣadṛṣṭiḥ na sajjate

original: BhP_11.13.013/1 apramatto 'nuyuñjīta mano mayy arpayañ chanaiḥ
analyzed: a pramattaḥ nu yuñjīta manaḥ mayi arpayam śanais

original: BhP_11.13.013/3 anirviṇṇo yathā-kālaṃ jita-śvāso jitāsanaḥ
analyzed: anirviṇṇaḥ yathākālam jita śvāsaḥ jita āsanaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.014/1 etāvān yoga ādiṣṭo mac-chiṣyaiḥ sanakādibhiḥ
analyzed: etāvān yogaḥ ādiṣṭaḥ mad śiṣyaiḥ sanaka ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.13.014/3 sarvato mana ākṛṣya mayy addhāveśyate yathā
analyzed: sarvatas manaḥ ākṛṣya mayi addhā āveśyate yathā

original: BhP_11.13.015/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.13.015/1 yadā tvaṃ sanakādibhyo yena rūpeṇa keśava
analyzed: yadā tvam sanaka ādibhyaḥ yena rūpeṇa keśava

original: BhP_11.13.015/3 yogam ādiṣṭavān etad rūpam icchāmi veditum
analyzed: yogam ādiṣṭavān etat rūpam icchāmi veditum

original: BhP_11.13.016/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.13.016/1 putrā hiraṇyagarbhasya mānasāḥ sanakādayaḥ
analyzed: putrāḥ hiraṇyagarbhasya mānasāḥ sanaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.016/3 papracchuḥ pitaraṃ sūkṣmāṃ yogasyaikāntikīm gatim
analyzed: papracchuḥ pitaram sūkṣmām yogasya aikāntikīm gatim

original: BhP_11.13.017/0 sanakādaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: sanaka ādayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_11.13.017/1 guṇeṣv āviśate ceto guṇāś cetasi ca prabho
analyzed: guṇeṣu āviśate cetaḥ guṇāḥ cetasi ca prabho

original: BhP_11.13.017/3 katham anyonya-santyāgo mumukṣor atititīrṣoḥ
analyzed: katham anyonya san tyāgaḥ mumukṣoḥ atititīrṣoḥ

original: BhP_11.13.018/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.13.018/1 evaṃ pṛṣṭo mahā-devaḥ svayambhūr bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: evam pṛṣṭaḥ mahādevaḥ svayambhuḥ bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.018/3 dhyāyamānaḥ praśna-bījaṃ nābhyapadyata karma-dhīḥ
analyzed: dhyāyamānaḥ praśna bījam na abhyapadyata karma dhīḥ

original: BhP_11.13.019/1 sa mām acintayad devaḥ praśna-pāra-titīrṣayā
analyzed: sa mām acintayat devaḥ praśna pāra titīrṣayā

original: BhP_11.13.019/3 tasyāhaṃ haṃsa-rūpeṇa sakāśam agamaṃ tadā
analyzed: tasya aham haṃsa rūpeṇa sakāśam agamam tadā

original: BhP_11.13.020/1 dṛṣṭvā mām ta upavrajya kṛtva pādābhivandanam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā mām te upavrajya kṛtva pādābhivandanam

original: BhP_11.13.020/3 brahmāṇam agrataḥ kṛtvā papracchuḥ ko bhavān iti
analyzed: brahmāṇam agratas kṛtvā papracchuḥ kaḥ bhavān iti

original: BhP_11.13.021/1 ity ahaṃ munibhiḥ pṛṣṭas tattva-jijñāsubhis tadā
analyzed: iti aham munibhiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ tattva jijñāsubhiḥ tadā

original: BhP_11.13.021/3 yad avocam ahaṃ tebhyas tad uddhava nibodha me
