analyzed: yat avocam aham tebhyaḥ tat uddhava nibodha me

original: BhP_11.13.022/1 vastuno yady anānātva ātmanaḥ praśna īdṛśaḥ
analyzed: vastunaḥ yadi anānātve ātmanaḥ praśnaḥ īdṛśaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.022/3 kathaṃ ghaṭeta vo viprā vaktur vā me ka āśrayaḥ
analyzed: katham ghaṭeta vaḥ viprāḥ vaktuḥ vā me kaḥ āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.023/1 pañcātmakeṣu bhūteṣu samāneṣu ca vastutaḥ
analyzed: pañca ātmakeṣu bhūteṣu samāneṣu ca vastutas

original: BhP_11.13.023/3 ko bhavān iti vaḥ praśno vācārambho hy anarthakaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ bhavān iti vaḥ praśnaḥ vācā ārambhaḥ hi anarthakaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.024/1 manasā vacasā dṛṣṭyā gṛhyate 'nyair apīndriyaiḥ
analyzed: manasā vacasā dṛṣṭyā gṛhyate nyaiḥ api indriyaiḥ

original: BhP_11.13.024/3 aham eva na matto 'nyad iti budhyadhvam añjasā
analyzed: aham eva na mattaḥ nyat iti budhyadhvam añjasā

original: BhP_11.13.025/1 guṇeṣv āviśate ceto guṇāś cetasi ca prajāḥ
analyzed: guṇeṣu āviśate cetaḥ guṇāḥ cetasi ca prajāḥ

original: BhP_11.13.025/3 jīvasya deha ubhayaṃ guṇāś ceto mad-ātmanaḥ
analyzed: jīvasya dehaḥ ubhayam guṇāḥ cetaḥ mad ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.026/1 guṇeṣu cāviśac cittam abhīkṣṇaṃ guṇa-sevayā
analyzed: guṇeṣu ca āviśat cittam abhīkṣṇam guṇa sevayā

original: BhP_11.13.026/3 guṇāś ca citta-prabhavā mad-rūpa ubhayaṃ tyajet
analyzed: guṇāḥ ca citta prabhavāḥ mad rūpe ubhayam tyajet

original: BhP_11.13.027/1 jāgrat svapnaḥ suṣuptaṃ ca guṇato buddhi-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: jāgrat svapnaḥ suṣuptam ca guṇataḥ buddhi vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.027/3 tāsāṃ vilakṣaṇo jīvaḥ sākṣitvena viniścitaḥ
analyzed: tāsām vilakṣaṇaḥ jīvaḥ sākṣi tvena viniścitaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.028/1 yarhi saṃsṛti-bandho 'yam ātmano guṇa-vṛtti-daḥ
analyzed: yarhi saṃsṛti bandhaḥ yam ātmanaḥ guṇa vṛtti daḥ

original: BhP_11.13.028/3 mayi turye sthito jahyāt tyāgas tad guṇa-cetasām
analyzed: mayi turye sthitaḥ jahyāt tyāgaḥ tat guṇa cetasām

original: BhP_11.13.029/1 ahaṅkāra-kṛtaṃ bandham ātmano 'rtha-viparyayam
analyzed: ahaṅkāra kṛtam bandham ātmanaḥ rtha viparyayam

original: BhP_11.13.029/3 vidvān nirvidya saṃsāra- cintāṃ turye sthitas tyajet
analyzed: vidvān nirvidya saṃsāra cintām turye sthitaḥ tyajet

original: BhP_11.13.030/1 yāvan nānārtha-dhīḥ puṃso na nivarteta yuktibhiḥ
analyzed: yāvat nānārtha dhīḥ puṃsaḥ na nivarteta yuktibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.13.030/3 jāgarty api svapann ajñaḥ svapne jāgaraṇaṃ yathā
analyzed: jāgarti api svapan ajñaḥ svapne jāgaraṇam yathā

original: BhP_11.13.031/1 asattvād ātmano 'nyeṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ tat-kṛtā bhidā
analyzed: asattvāt ātmanaḥ nyeṣām bhāvānām tad kṛtāḥ bhidā

original: BhP_11.13.031/3 gatayo hetavaś cāsya mṛṣā svapna-dṛśo yathā
analyzed: gatayaḥ hetavaḥ ca asya mṛṣā svapna dṛśaḥ yathā

original: BhP_11.13.032/1 yo jāgare bahir anukṣaṇa-dharmiṇo 'rthān
analyzed: yaḥ jāgare bahis anu kṣaṇa dharmiṇaḥ rthān

original: BhP_11.13.032/2 bhuṅkte samasta-karaṇair hṛdi tat-sadṛkṣān
analyzed: bhuṅkte samasta karaṇaiḥ hṛdi tad sadṛkṣān

original: BhP_11.13.032/3 svapne suṣupta upasaṃharate sa ekaḥ
analyzed: svapne suṣupte upasaṃharate saḥ ekaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.032/4 smṛty-anvayāt tri-guṇa-vṛtti-dṛg indriyeśaḥ
BhP_11.13.033/1 evaṃ vimṛśya guṇato manasas try-avasthā
analyzed: evam vimṛśya guṇataḥ manasaḥ tri avasthā

original: BhP_11.13.033/2 man-māyayā mayi kṛtā iti niścitārthāḥ
analyzed: mad māyayā mayi kṛtāḥ iti niścita arthāḥ

original: BhP_11.13.033/3 sañchidya hārdam anumāna-sad-ukti-tīkṣṇa
analyzed: sañchidya hārdam anumāna sat ukti tīkṣṇa

original: BhP_11.13.033/4 jñānāsinā bhajata mākhila-saṃśayādhim
analyzed: jñāna asinā bhajata mā akhila saṃśaya ādhim

original: BhP_11.13.034/1 īkṣeta vibhramam idaṃ manaso vilāsaṃ
analyzed: īkṣeta vibhramam idam manasaḥ vilāsam

original: BhP_11.13.034/2 dṛṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭam ati-lolam alāta-cakram
analyzed: dṛṣṭam vinaṣṭam ati lolam alāta cakram

original: BhP_11.13.034/3 vijñānam ekam urudheva vibhāti māyā
analyzed: vijñānam ekam urudhā iva vibhāti māyā

original: BhP_11.13.034/4 svapnas tridhā guṇa-visarga-kṛto vikalpaḥ
analyzed: svapnaḥ tridhā guṇa visarga kṛtaḥ vikalpaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.035/1 dṛṣṭim tataḥ pratinivartya nivṛtta-tṛṣṇas
analyzed: dṛṣṭim tatas pratinivartya nivṛtta tṛṣṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.035/2 tūṣṇīṃ bhaven nija-sukhānubhavo nirīhaḥ
analyzed: tūṣṇīm bhavet nija sukha anubhavaḥ nirīhaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.035/3 sandṛśyate kva ca yadīdam avastu-buddhyā
analyzed: san dṛśyate kva ca yadi idam avastu buddhyā

original: BhP_11.13.035/4 tyaktaṃ bhramāya na bhavet smṛtir ā-nipātāt
analyzed: tyaktam bhramāya na bhavet smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.13.036/1 dehaṃ ca naśvaram avasthitam utthitaṃ vā
analyzed: deham ca naśvaram avasthitam utthitam vā

original: BhP_11.13.036/2 siddho na paśyati yato 'dhyagamat svarūpam
analyzed: siddhaḥ na paśyati yatas dhī agamat sva rūpam

original: BhP_11.13.036/3 daivād apetam atha daiva-vaśād upetaṃ
analyzed: daivāt apetam atha daiva vaśāt upetam

original: BhP_11.13.036/4 vāso yathā parikṛtaṃ madirā-madāndhaḥ
analyzed: vāsaḥ yathā parikṛtam madirā mada andhaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.037/1 deho 'pi daiva-vaśa-gaḥ khalu karma yāvat
analyzed: dehaḥ pi daiva vaśagaḥ khalu karma yāvat

original: BhP_11.13.037/2 svārambhakaṃ pratisamīkṣata eva sāsuḥ
analyzed: sva ārambhakam pratisamīkṣate eva sāsuḥ

original: BhP_11.13.037/3 taṃ sa-prapañcam adhirūḍha-samādhi-yogaḥ
analyzed: tam sa prapañcam adhirūḍha samādhi yogaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.037/4 svāpnaṃ punar na bhajate pratibuddha-vastuḥ
analyzed: svāpnam punar na bhajate pratibuddha vastuḥ

original: BhP_11.13.038/1 mayaitad uktaṃ vo viprā guhyaṃ yat sāṅkhya-yogayoḥ
analyzed: mayā etat uktam vaḥ viprāḥ guhyam yat sāṅkhya yogayoḥ

original: BhP_11.13.038/3 jānīta māgataṃ yajñaṃ yuṣmad-dharma-vivakṣayā
analyzed: jānīta mā āgatam yajñam yuṣmad dharma vivakṣayā

original: BhP_11.13.039/1 ahaṃ yogasya sāṅkhyasya satyasyartasya tejasaḥ
analyzed: aham yogasya sāṅkhyasya satyasya ṛtasya tejasaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.039/3 parāyaṇaṃ dvija-śreṣṭhāḥ śriyaḥ kīrter damasya ca
analyzed: parāyaṇam dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ śriyaḥ kīrteḥ damasya ca

original: BhP_11.13.040/1 māṃ bhajanti guṇāḥ sarve nirguṇaṃ nirapekṣakam
analyzed: mām bhajanti guṇāḥ sarve nirguṇam nirapekṣakam

original: BhP_11.13.040/3 suhṛdaṃ priyam ātmānaṃ sāmyāsaṅgādayo 'guṇāḥ
analyzed: suhṛdam priyam ātmānam sāmya asaṅga ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.13.041/1 iti me chinna-sandehā munayaḥ sanakādayaḥ
analyzed: iti me chinna sandehāḥ munayaḥ sanaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_11.13.041/3 sabhājayitvā parayā bhaktyāgṛṇata saṃstavaiḥ
analyzed: sabhājayitvā parayā bhaktyā agṛṇata saṃstavaiḥ

original: BhP_11.13.042/1 tair ahaṃ pūjitaḥ saṃyak saṃstutaḥ paramarṣibhiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ aham pūjitaḥ saṃyak saṃstutaḥ parama ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.13.042/3 pratyeyāya svakaṃ dhāma paśyataḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ
analyzed: pratyeyāya svakam dhāma paśyataḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.14.001/1 vadanti kṛṣṇa śreyāṃsi bahūni brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: vadanti kṛṣṇa śreyāṃsi bahūni brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.001/3 teṣāṃ vikalpa-prādhānyam utāho eka-mukhyatā
analyzed: teṣām vikalpa prādhānyam uta aho eka mukhya tā

original: BhP_11.14.002/1 bhavatodāhṛtaḥ svāmin bhakti-yogo 'napekṣitaḥ
analyzed: bhavatā udāhṛtaḥ svāmin bhakti yogaḥ na apekṣitaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.002/3 nirasya sarvataḥ saṅgaṃ yena tvayy āviśen manaḥ
analyzed: nirasya sarvatas saṅgam yena tvayi āviśet manaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.003/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.14.003/1 kālena naṣṭā pralaye vāṇīyaṃ veda-saṃjñitā
analyzed: kālena naṣṭā pralaye vāṇī iyam veda saṃjñitā

original: BhP_11.14.003/3 mayādau brahmaṇe proktā dharmo yasyāṃ mad-ātmakaḥ
analyzed: mayā ādau brahmaṇe proktā dharmaḥ yasyām mad ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.004/1 tena proktā sva-putrāya manave pūrva-jāya sā
analyzed: tena proktā sva putrāya manave pūrvajāya sā

original: BhP_11.14.004/3 tato bhṛgv-ādayo 'gṛhṇan sapta brahma-maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas bhṛgu ādayaḥ gṛhṇan sapta brahma mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.005/1 tebhyaḥ pitṛbhyas tat-putrā deva-dānava-guhyakāḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ tad putrāḥ deva dānava guhyakāḥ

original: BhP_11.14.005/3 manuṣyāḥ siddha-gandharvāḥ sa-vidyādhara-cāraṇāḥ
analyzed: manuṣyāḥ siddha gandharvāḥ savidyādhara cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.14.006/1 kindevāḥ kinnarā nāgā rakṣaḥ-kimpuruṣādayaḥ
BhP_11.14.006/3 bahvyas teṣāṃ prakṛtayo rajaḥ-sattva-tamo-bhuvaḥ
analyzed: bahvyaḥ teṣām prakṛtayaḥ rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.007/1 yābhir bhūtāni bhidyante bhūtānāṃ patayas tathā
analyzed: yābhiḥ bhūtāni bhidyante bhūtānām patayaḥ tathā

original: BhP_11.14.007/3 yathā-prakṛti sarveṣāṃ citrā vācaḥ sravanti hi
analyzed: yathāprakṛti sarveṣām citrāḥ vācaḥ sravanti hi

original: BhP_11.14.008/1 evaṃ prakṛti-vaicitryād bhidyante matayo nṛṇām
analyzed: evam prakṛti vaicitryāt bhidyante matayaḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.14.008/3 pāramparyeṇa keṣāñcit pāṣaṇḍa-matayo 'pare
analyzed: pāramparyeṇa keṣāñcid pare

original: BhP_11.14.009/1 man-māyā-mohita-dhiyaḥ puruṣāḥ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: mad māyā mohita dhiyaḥ puruṣāḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_11.14.009/3 śreyo vadanty anekāntaṃ yathā-karma yathā-ruci
analyzed: śreyaḥ vadanti anekāntam yathākarma yathāruci

original: BhP_11.14.010/1 dharmam eke yaśaś cānye kāmaṃ satyaṃ damaṃ śamam
analyzed: dharmam eke yaśaḥ ca anye kāmam satyam damam śamam

original: BhP_11.14.010/3 anye vadanti svārthaṃ vā aiśvaryaṃ tyāga-bhojanam
analyzed: anye vadanti sva artham vai aiśvaryam tyāga bhojanam

original: BhP_11.14.010/5 kecid yajñaṃ tapo dānaṃ vratāni niyamān yamān
analyzed: kecid yajñam tapaḥ dānam vratāni niyamān yamān

original: BhP_11.14.011/1 ādy-anta-vanta evaiṣāṃ lokāḥ karma-vinirmitāḥ
analyzed: ādi antavantaḥ eva eṣām lokāḥ karma vinirmitāḥ

original: BhP_11.14.011/3 duḥkhodarkās tamo-niṣṭhāḥ kṣudrā mandāḥ śucārpitāḥ
analyzed: duḥkha udarkāḥ tamaḥ niṣṭhāḥ kṣudrāḥ mandāḥ śucā arpitāḥ

original: BhP_11.14.012/1 mayy arpitātmanaḥ sabhya nirapekṣasya sarvataḥ
analyzed: mayi arpita ātmanaḥ sabhya nirapekṣasya sarvatas

original: BhP_11.14.012/3 mayātmanā sukhaṃ yat tat kutaḥ syād viṣayātmanām
analyzed: mayā ātmanā sukham yat tat kutas syāt viṣaya ātmanām

original: BhP_11.14.013/1 akiñcanasya dāntasya śāntasya sama-cetasaḥ
analyzed: akiñcanasya dāntasya śāntasya sama cetasaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.013/3 mayā santuṣṭa-manasaḥ sarvāḥ sukha-mayā diśaḥ
analyzed: mayā santuṣṭa manasaḥ sarvāḥ sukha mayāḥ diśaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.014/1 na pārameṣṭhyaṃ na mahendra-dhiṣṇyaṃ
analyzed: na pārameṣṭhyam na mahendra dhiṣṇyam

original: BhP_11.14.014/2 na sārvabhaumaṃ na rasādhipatyam
analyzed: na sārvabhaumam na rasa ādhipatyam

original: BhP_11.14.014/3 na yoga-siddhīr apunar-bhavaṃ vā
analyzed: na yoga siddhīḥ apunarbhavam vā

original: BhP_11.14.014/4 mayy arpitātmecchati mad vinānyat
analyzed: mayi arpita ātmā icchati mat vinā anyat

original: BhP_11.14.015/1 na tathā me priyatama ātma-yonir na śaṅkaraḥ
analyzed: na tathā me priyatamaḥ ātmayoniḥ na śaṅkaraḥ

original: BhP_11.14.015/3 na ca saṅkarṣaṇo na śrīr naivātmā ca yathā bhavān
analyzed: na ca saṅkarṣaṇaḥ na śrīḥ na eva ātmā ca yathā bhavān

original: BhP_11.14.016/1 nirapekṣaṃ muniṃ śāntaṃ nirvairaṃ sama-darśanam
analyzed: nirapekṣam munim śāntam nirvairam samadarśanam

original: BhP_11.14.016/3 anuvrajāmy ahaṃ nityaṃ pūyeyety aṅghri-reṇubhiḥ
analyzed: anuvrajāmi aham nityam aṅghri reṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_11.14.017/1 niṣkiñcanā mayy anurakta-cetasaḥ śāntā mahānto 'khila-jīva-vatsalāḥ
analyzed: niṣkiñcanāḥ mayi anurakta cetasaḥ śāntāḥ khila jīva vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_11.14.017/3 kāmair anālabdha-dhiyo juṣanti te yan nairapekṣyaṃ na viduḥ sukhaṃ mama
analyzed: kāmaiḥ anālabdha dhiyaḥ juṣanti te yat nairapekṣyam na viduḥ sukham mama

original: BhP_11.14.018/1 bādhyamāno 'pi mad-bhakto viṣayair ajitendriyaḥ
analyzed: bādhyamānaḥ pi mad bhaktaḥ viṣayaiḥ ajita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.018/3 prāyaḥ pragalbhayā bhaktyā viṣayair nābhibhūyate
analyzed: prāyas pragalbhayā bhaktyā viṣayaiḥ na abhibhūyate

original: BhP_11.14.019/1 yathāgniḥ su-samṛddhārciḥ karoty edhāṃsi bhasmasāt
analyzed: yathā agniḥ su samṛddha arciḥ karoti edhāṃsi bhasmasāt

original: BhP_11.14.019/3 tathā mad-viṣayā bhaktir uddhavaināṃsi kṛtsnaśaḥ
analyzed: tathā mad viṣayā bhaktiḥ uddhava enāṃsi kṛtsnaśas

original: BhP_11.14.020/1 na sādhayati māṃ yogo na sāṅkhyaṃ dharma uddhava
analyzed: na sādhayati mām yogaḥ na sāṅkhyam dharmaḥ uddhava

original: BhP_11.14.020/3 na svādhyāyas tapas tyāgo yathā bhaktir mamorjitā
analyzed: na svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ tyāgaḥ yathā bhaktiḥ mama ūrjitā

original: BhP_11.14.021/1 bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ śraddhayātmā priyaḥ satām
analyzed: bhaktyā aham ekayā grāhyaḥ śraddhayā ātmā priyaḥ satām

original: BhP_11.14.021/3 bhaktiḥ punāti man-niṣṭhā śva-pākān api sambhavāt
analyzed: bhaktiḥ punāti manniṣṭhā śvapākān api sambhavāt

original: BhP_11.14.022/1 dharmaḥ satya-dayopeto vidyā vā tapasānvitā
analyzed: dharmaḥ satya dayā upetaḥ vidyā vā tapasā anvitā

original: BhP_11.14.022/3 mad-bhaktyāpetam ātmānaṃ na samyak prapunāti hi
analyzed: mad bhaktyā apetam ātmānam na samyak prapunāti hi

original: BhP_11.14.023/1 kathaṃ vinā roma-harṣaṃ dravatā cetasā vinā
analyzed: katham vinā romaharṣam dravatā cetasā vinā

original: BhP_11.14.023/3 vinānandāśru-kalayā śudhyed bhaktyā vināśayaḥ
analyzed: vinā ānanda aśru kalayā śudhyet bhaktyā vinā āśayaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.024/1 vāg gadgadā dravate yasya cittaṃ rudaty abhīkṣṇaṃ hasati kvacic ca
analyzed: vāc gadgadā dravate yasya cittam rudati abhīkṣṇam hasati kvacid ca

original: BhP_11.14.024/3 vilajja udgāyati nṛtyate ca mad-bhakti-yukto bhuvanaṃ punāti
analyzed: vilajjaḥ udgāyati nṛtyate ca mad bhakti yuktaḥ bhuvanam punāti

original: BhP_11.14.025/1 yathāgninā hema malaṃ jahāti dhmātaṃ punaḥ svaṃ bhajate ca rūpam
analyzed: yathā agninā hema malam jahāti dhmātam punar svam bhajate ca rūpam

original: BhP_11.14.025/3 ātmā ca karmānuśayaṃ vidhūya mad-bhakti-yogena bhajaty atho mām
analyzed: ātmā ca karma anuśayam vidhūya mad bhakti yogena bhajati atho mām

original: BhP_11.14.026/1 yathā yathātmā parimṛjyate 'sau mat-puṇya-gāthā-śravaṇābhidhānaiḥ
analyzed: yathā yathā ātmā parimṛjyate mad puṇya gāthā śravaṇa abhidhānaiḥ

original: BhP_11.14.026/3 tathā tathā paśyati vastu sūkṣmaṃ cakṣur yathaivāñjana-samprayuktam
analyzed: tathā tathā paśyati vastu sūkṣmam cakṣuḥ yathā eva añjana samprayuktam

original: BhP_11.14.027/1 viṣayān dhyāyataś cittaṃ viṣayeṣu viṣajjate
analyzed: viṣayān dhyāyataḥ cittam viṣayeṣu viṣajjate

original: BhP_11.14.027/3 mām anusmarataś cittaṃ mayy eva pravilīyate
analyzed: mām anusmarataḥ cittam mayi eva pravilīyate

original: BhP_11.14.028/1 tasmād asad-abhidhyānaṃ yathā svapna-manoratham
analyzed: tasmāt asat abhidhyānam yathā svapna manoratham

original: BhP_11.14.028/3 hitvā mayi samādhatsva mano mad-bhāva-bhāvitam
analyzed: hitvā mayi samādhatsva manaḥ mad bhāva bhāvitam

original: BhP_11.14.029/1 strīṇāṃ strī-saṅgināṃ saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dūrata ātmavān
analyzed: strīṇām strī saṅginām saṅgam tyaktvā dūratas ātmavān

original: BhP_11.14.029/3 kṣeme vivikta āsīnaś cintayen mām atandritaḥ
analyzed: kṣeme vivikte āsīnaḥ cintayet mām atandritaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.030/1 na tathāsya bhavet kleśo bandhaś cānya-prasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: na tathā asya bhavet kleśaḥ bandhaḥ ca anya prasaṅgataḥ

original: BhP_11.14.030/3 yoṣit-saṅgād yathā puṃso yathā tat-saṅgi-saṅgataḥ
analyzed: yoṣit saṅgāt yathā puṃsaḥ yathā tad saṅgi saṅgataḥ

original: BhP_11.14.031/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.14.031/1 yathā tvām aravindākṣa yādṛśaṃ vā yad-ātmakam
analyzed: yathā tvām aravinda akṣa yādṛśam vā yad ātmakam

original: BhP_11.14.031/3 dhyāyen mumukṣur etan me dhyānaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
analyzed: dhyāyet mumukṣuḥ etat me dhyānam tvam vaktum arhasi

original: BhP_11.14.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.14.032/1 sama āsana āsīnaḥ sama-kāyo yathā-sukham
analyzed: same āsane āsīnaḥ sama kāyaḥ yathāsukham

original: BhP_11.14.032/3 hastāv utsaṅga ādhāya sva-nāsāgra-kṛtekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: hastau utsaṅge ādhāya sva nāsā agra kṛta īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.033/1 prāṇasya śodhayen mārgaṃ pūra-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ
analyzed: prāṇasya śodhayet mārgam pūra kumbhaka recakaiḥ

original: BhP_11.14.033/3 viparyayeṇāpi śanair abhyasen nirjitendriyaḥ
analyzed: viparyayeṇa api śanais abhyaset nirjita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.034/1 hṛdy avicchinam oṃkāraṃ ghaṇṭā-nādaṃ bisorṇa-vat
analyzed: hṛdi a vicchinam oṃkāram ghaṇṭā nādam bisa ūrṇa vat

original: BhP_11.14.034/3 prāṇenodīrya tatrātha punaḥ saṃveśayet svaram
analyzed: prāṇena udīrya tatra atha punar saṃveśayet svaram

original: BhP_11.14.035/1 evaṃ praṇava-saṃyuktaṃ prāṇam eva samabhyaset
analyzed: evam praṇava saṃyuktam prāṇam eva samabhyaset

original: BhP_11.14.035/3 daśa-kṛtvas tri-ṣavaṇaṃ māsād arvāg jitānilaḥ
analyzed: daśa kṛtvas triṣavaṇam māsāt arvāk jita anilaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.036/1 hṛt-puṇḍarīkam antaḥ-stham ūrdhva-nālam adho-mukham
BhP_11.14.036/3 dhyātvordhva-mukham unnidram aṣṭa-patraṃ sa-karṇikam
analyzed: dhyātvā ūrdhva mukham unnidram aṣṭa patram sa karṇikam

original: BhP_11.14.037/1 karṇikāyāṃ nyaset sūrya- somāgnīn uttarottaram
analyzed: karṇikāyām nyaset sūrya soma agnīn uttarottaram

original: BhP_11.14.037/3 vahni-madhye smared rūpaṃ mamaitad dhyāna-maṅgalam
analyzed: smaret

original: BhP_11.14.038/1 samaṃ praśāntaṃ su-mukhaṃ dīrgha-cāru-catur-bhujam
analyzed: samam praśāntam sumukham dīrgha cāru catur bhujam

original: BhP_11.14.038/3 su-cāru-sundara-grīvaṃ su-kapolaṃ śuci-smitam
analyzed: su cāru sundara grīvam su kapolam śuci smitam

original: BhP_11.14.039/1 samāna-karṇa-vinyasta- sphuran-makara-kuṇḍalam
BhP_11.14.039/3 hemāmbaraṃ ghana-śyāmaṃ śrīvatsa-śrī-niketanam
BhP_11.14.040/1 śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-padma- vanamālā-vibhūṣitam
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra gadā padma vanamālā vibhūṣitam

original: BhP_11.14.040/3 nūpurair vilasat-pādaṃ kaustubha-prabhayā yutam
analyzed: nūpuraiḥ vilasat pādam kaustubha prabhayā yutam

original: BhP_11.14.041/1 dyumat-kirīṭa-kaṭaka- kaṭi-sūtrāṅgadāyutam
analyzed: dyumat kirīṭa kaṭaka kaṭi sūtra aṅgada āyutam

original: BhP_11.14.041/3 sarvāṅga-sundaraṃ hṛdyaṃ prasāda-sumukhekṣanam
analyzed: sarva aṅga sundaram hṛdyam prasāda su mukha īkṣanam

original: BhP_11.14.042/1 su-kumāram abhidhyāyet sarvāṅgeṣu mano dadhat
analyzed: sukumāram abhidhyāyet sarva aṅgeṣu manaḥ dadhat

original: BhP_11.14.042/3 indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo manasākṛṣya tan manaḥ
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriyārthebhyaḥ manasā ākṛṣya tat manaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.042/5 buddhyā sārathinā dhīraḥ praṇayen mayi sarvataḥ
analyzed: buddhyā sārathinā dhīraḥ praṇayet mayi sarvatas

original: BhP_11.14.043/1 tat sarva-vyāpakaṃ cittam ākṛṣyaikatra dhārayet
analyzed: tat sarva vyāpakam cittam ākṛṣya ekatra dhārayet

original: BhP_11.14.043/3 nānyāni cintayed bhūyaḥ su-smitaṃ bhāvayen mukham
analyzed: na anyāni cintayet bhūyas su smitam bhāvayet mukham

original: BhP_11.14.044/1 tatra labdha-padaṃ cittam ākṛṣya vyomni dhārayet
analyzed: tatra labdha padam cittam ākṛṣya vyomni dhārayet

original: BhP_11.14.044/3 tac ca tyaktvā mad-āroho na kiñcid api cintayet
analyzed: tat ca tyaktvā mad ārohaḥ na kiñcid api cintayet

original: BhP_11.14.045/1 evaṃ samāhita-matir mām evātmānam ātmani
analyzed: evam samāhita matiḥ mām eva ātmānam ātmani

original: BhP_11.14.045/3 vicaṣṭe mayi sarvātman jyotir jyotiṣi saṃyutam
analyzed: vicaṣṭe mayi sarva ātman jyotiḥ jyotiṣi saṃyutam

original: BhP_11.14.046/1 dhyānenetthaṃ su-tīvreṇa yuñjato yogino manaḥ
analyzed: dhyānena ittham su tīvreṇa yuñjataḥ yoginaḥ manaḥ

original: BhP_11.14.046/3 saṃyāsyaty āśu nirvāṇaṃ dravya jñāna-kriyā-bhramaḥ
analyzed: saṃyāsyati āśu nirvāṇam dravya jñāna kriyā bhramaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.15.001/1 jitendriyasya yuktasya jita-śvāsasya yoginaḥ
analyzed: jita indriyasya yuktasya jita śvāsasya yoginaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.001/3 mayi dhārayataś ceta upatiṣṭhanti siddhayaḥ
analyzed: mayi dhārayataḥ cetaḥ upatiṣṭhanti siddhayaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.002/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.15.002/1 kayā dhāraṇayā kā svit kathaṃ vā siddhir acyuta
analyzed: kayā dhāraṇayā kā svid katham vā siddhiḥ acyuta

original: BhP_11.15.002/3 kati vā siddhayo brūhi yogināṃ siddhi-do bhavān
analyzed: kati vā siddhayaḥ brūhi yoginām siddhi daḥ bhavān

original: BhP_11.15.003/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.15.003/1 siddhayo 'ṣṭādaśa proktā dhāraṇā yoga-pāra-gaiḥ
analyzed: siddhayaḥ ṣṭādaśa proktāḥ dhāraṇāḥ yoga pāragaiḥ

original: BhP_11.15.003/3 tāsām aṣṭau mat-pradhānā daśaiva guṇa-hetavaḥ
analyzed: tāsām aṣṭau mad pradhānāḥ daśa eva guṇa hetavaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.004/1 aṇimā mahimā mūrter laghimā prāptir indriyaiḥ
analyzed: aṇimā mahimā mūrteḥ laghimā prāptiḥ indriyaiḥ

original: BhP_11.15.004/3 prākāmyaṃ śruta-dṛṣṭeṣu śakti-preraṇam īśitā
BhP_11.15.005/1 guṇeṣv asaṅgo vaśitā yat-kāmas tad avasyati
analyzed: guṇeṣu asaṅgaḥ vaśitā yad kāmaḥ tat avasyati

original: BhP_11.15.005/3 etā me siddhayaḥ saumya aṣṭāv autpattikā matāḥ
analyzed: etāḥ me siddhayaḥ saumya aṣṭau autpattikāḥ matāḥ

original: BhP_11.15.006/1 anūrmimattvaṃ dehe 'smin dūra-śravaṇa-darśanam
analyzed: anūrmimattvam dehe smin dūra śravaṇa darśanam

original: BhP_11.15.006/3 mano-javaḥ kāma-rūpaṃ para-kāya-praveśanam
analyzed: manojavaḥ kāmarūpam parakāyapraveśanam

original: BhP_11.15.007/1 svacchanda-mṛtyur devānāṃ saha-krīḍānudarśanam
analyzed: svacchanda mṛtyuḥ devānām saha krīḍā anudarśanam

original: BhP_11.15.007/3 yathā-saṅkalpa-saṃsiddhir ājñāpratihatā gatiḥ
analyzed: yathā saṅkalpa saṃsiddhiḥ ājñā a pratihatā gatiḥ

original: BhP_11.15.008/1 tri-kāla-jñatvam advandvaṃ para-cittādy-abhijñatā
BhP_11.15.008/3 agny-arkāmbu-viṣādīnāṃ pratiṣṭambho 'parājayaḥ
analyzed: agni arka ambu viṣa ādīnām parājayaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.009/1 etāś coddeśataḥ proktā yoga-dhāraṇa-siddhayaḥ
analyzed: etāḥ ca uddeśataḥ proktāḥ yoga dhāraṇa siddhayaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.009/3 yayā dhāraṇayā yā syād yathā vā syān nibodha me
analyzed: yayā dhāraṇayā yā syāt yathā vā syāt nibodha me

original: BhP_11.15.010/1 bhūta-sūkṣmātmani mayi tan-mātraṃ dhārayen manaḥ
analyzed: dhārayet

original: BhP_11.15.010/3 aṇimānam avāpnoti tan-mātropāsako mama
analyzed: aṇimānam avāpnoti tanmātra upāsakaḥ mama

original: BhP_11.15.011/1 mahat-tattvātmani mayi yathā-saṃsthaṃ mano dadhat
analyzed: mahat tattva ātmani mayi yathāsaṃstham manaḥ dadhat

original: BhP_11.15.011/3 mahimānam avāpnoti bhūtānāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak
analyzed: mahimānam avāpnoti bhūtānām ca pṛthak pṛthak

original: BhP_11.15.012/1 paramāṇu-maye cittaṃ bhūtānāṃ mayi rañjayan
analyzed: paramāṇu maye cittam bhūtānām mayi rañjayan

original: BhP_11.15.012/3 kāla-sūkṣmārthatāṃ yogī laghimānam avāpnuyāt
analyzed: avāpnuyāt

original: BhP_11.15.013/1 dhārayan mayy ahaṃ-tattve mano vaikārike 'khilam
analyzed: dhārayat mayi aham tattve manaḥ vaikārike khilam

original: BhP_11.15.013/3 sarvendriyāṇām ātmatvaṃ prāptiṃ prāpnoti man-manāḥ
analyzed: sarva indriyāṇām ātma tvam prāptim prāpnoti manmanāḥ

original: BhP_11.15.014/1 mahaty ātmani yaḥ sūtre dhārayen mayi mānasam
analyzed: mahati ātmani yaḥ sūtre dhārayet mayi mānasam

original: BhP_11.15.014/3 prākāmyaṃ pārameṣṭhyaṃ me vindate 'vyakta-janmanaḥ
analyzed: prākāmyam pārameṣṭhyam me vindate vyakta janmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.015/1 viṣṇau try-adhīśvare cittaṃ dhārayet kāla-vigrahe
analyzed: dhārayet

original: BhP_11.15.015/3 sa īśitvam avāpnoti kṣetrajña-kṣetra-codanām
analyzed: saḥ īśitvam avāpnoti kṣetrajña kṣetra codanām

original: BhP_11.15.016/1 nārāyaṇe turīyākhye bhagavac-chabda-śabdite
analyzed: nārāyaṇe turīya ākhye bhagavat śabda śabdite

original: BhP_11.15.016/3 mano mayy ādadhad yogī mad-dharmā vaśitām iyāt
analyzed: manaḥ mayi ādadhat yogī mad dharmā vaśitām iyāt

original: BhP_11.15.017/1 nirguṇe brahmaṇi mayi dhārayan viśadaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: nirguṇe brahmaṇi mayi dhārayan viśadam manaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.017/3 paramānandam āpnoti yatra kāmo 'vasīyate
analyzed: parama ānandam āpnoti yatra kāmaḥ vasīyate

original: BhP_11.15.018/1 śvetadvīpa-patau cittaṃ śuddhe dharma-maye mayi
analyzed: śvetadvīpa patau cittam śuddhe dharma maye mayi

original: BhP_11.15.018/3 dhārayañ chvetatāṃ yāti ṣaḍ-ūrmi-rahito naraḥ
analyzed: yāti ṣaṣ ūrmi rahitaḥ naraḥ

original: BhP_11.15.019/1 mayy ākāśātmani prāṇe manasā ghoṣam udvahan
analyzed: mayi ākāśa ātmani prāṇe manasā ghoṣam udvahan

original: BhP_11.15.019/3 tatropalabdhā bhūtānāṃ haṃso vācaḥ śṛṇoty asau
analyzed: tatra upalabdhāḥ bhūtānām haṃsaḥ vācaḥ śṛṇoti asau

original: BhP_11.15.020/1 cakṣus tvaṣṭari saṃyojya tvaṣṭāram api cakṣuṣi
analyzed: cakṣuḥ tvaṣṭari saṃyojya tvaṣṭāram api cakṣuṣi

original: BhP_11.15.020/3 māṃ tatra manasā dhyāyan viśvaṃ paśyati dūrataḥ
analyzed: mām tatra manasā dhyāyan viśvam paśyati dūratas

original: BhP_11.15.021/1 mano mayi su-saṃyojya dehaṃ tad-anuvāyunā
analyzed: manaḥ mayi su saṃyojya deham tadanu vāyunā

original: BhP_11.15.021/3 mad-dhāraṇānubhāvena tatrātmā yatra vai manaḥ
analyzed: mad dhāraṇa anubhāvena tatra ātmā yatra vai manaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.022/1 yadā mana upādāya yad yad rūpaṃ bubhūṣati
analyzed: yadā manaḥ upādāya yat yat rūpam bubhūṣati

original: BhP_11.15.022/3 tat tad bhaven mano-rūpaṃ mad-yoga-balam āśrayaḥ
analyzed: tat tat bhavet manaḥ rūpam mad yoga balam āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.023/1 para-kāyaṃ viśan siddha ātmānaṃ tatra bhāvayet
analyzed: para kāyam viśan siddhaḥ ātmānam tatra bhāvayet

original: BhP_11.15.023/3 piṇḍaṃ hitvā viśet prāṇo vāyu-bhūtaḥ ṣaḍaṅghri-vat
BhP_11.15.024/1 pārṣṇyāpīḍya gudaṃ prāṇaṃ hṛd-uraḥ-kaṇṭha-mūrdhasu
analyzed: pārṣṇyā āpīḍya gudam prāṇam hṛd uraḥ kaṇṭha mūrdhasu

original: BhP_11.15.024/3 āropya brahma-randhreṇa brahma nītvotsṛjet tanum
analyzed: āropya brahmarandhreṇa brahma nītvā utsṛjet tanum

original: BhP_11.15.025/1 vihariṣyan surākrīḍe mat-sthaṃ sattvaṃ vibhāvayet
analyzed: vihariṣyan sura ākrīḍe mad stham sattvam vibhāvayet

original: BhP_11.15.025/3 vimānenopatiṣṭhanti sattva-vṛttīḥ sura-striyaḥ
analyzed: vimānena upatiṣṭhanti sattva vṛttīḥ sura striyaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.026/1 yathā saṅkalpayed buddhyā yadā vā mat-paraḥ pumān
analyzed: yathā saṅkalpayet buddhyā yadā vā mad paraḥ pumān

original: BhP_11.15.026/3 mayi satye mano yuñjaṃs tathā tat samupāśnute
analyzed: mayi satye manaḥ yuñjan tathā tat samupāśnute

original: BhP_11.15.027/1 yo vai mad-bhāvam āpanna īśitur vaśituḥ pumān
analyzed: yaḥ vai mad bhāvam āpannaḥ īśituḥ vaśituḥ pumān

original: BhP_11.15.027/3 kutaścin na vihanyeta tasya cājñā yathā mama
analyzed: kutaścid na tasya ca ājñā yathā mama

original: BhP_11.15.028/1 mad-bhaktyā śuddha-sattvasya yogino dhāraṇā-vidaḥ
analyzed: mad bhaktyā śuddha sattvasya yoginaḥ dhāraṇā vidaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.028/3 tasya trai-kālikī buddhir janma-mṛtyūpabṛṃhitā
analyzed: tasya traikālikī buddhiḥ janma mṛtyu upabṛṃhitā

original: BhP_11.15.029/1 agny-ādibhir na hanyeta muner yoga-mayaṃ vapuḥ
analyzed: agni ādibhiḥ na muneḥ yoga mayam vapuḥ

original: BhP_11.15.029/3 mad-yoga-śānta-cittasya yādasām udakaṃ yathā
analyzed: mad yoga śānta cittasya yādasām udakam yathā

original: BhP_11.15.030/1 mad-vibhūtīr abhidhyāyan śrīvatsāstra-vibhūṣitāḥ
analyzed: mad vibhūtīḥ abhidhyāyan śrīvatsa astra vibhūṣitāḥ

original: BhP_11.15.030/3 dhvajātapatra-vyajanaiḥ sa bhaved aparājitaḥ
analyzed: dhvaja āta patra vyajanaiḥ sa bhavet aparājitaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.031/1 upāsakasya mām evaṃ yoga-dhāraṇayā muneḥ
analyzed: upāsakasya mām evam yoga dhāraṇayā muneḥ

original: BhP_11.15.031/3 siddhayaḥ pūrva-kathitā upatiṣṭhanty aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: siddhayaḥ pūrva kathitāḥ upatiṣṭhanti aśeṣatas

original: BhP_11.15.032/1 jitendriyasya dāntasya jita-śvāsātmano muneḥ
analyzed: jita indriyasya dāntasya jita śvāsa ātmanaḥ muneḥ

original: BhP_11.15.032/3 mad-dhāraṇāṃ dhārayataḥ kā sā siddhiḥ su-durlabhā
analyzed: mad dhāraṇām dhārayataḥ kā sā siddhiḥ su durlabhā

original: BhP_11.15.033/1 antarāyān vadanty etā yuñjato yogam uttamam
analyzed: antarāyān vadanti etāḥ yuñjataḥ yogam uttamam

original: BhP_11.15.033/3 mayā sampadyamānasya kāla-kṣapaṇa-hetavaḥ
analyzed: mayā sampadyamānasya kāla kṣapaṇa hetavaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.034/1 janmauṣadhi-tapo-mantrair yāvatīr iha siddhayaḥ
analyzed: janma auṣadhi tapaḥ mantraiḥ yāvatīḥ iha siddhayaḥ

original: BhP_11.15.034/3 yogenāpnoti tāḥ sarvā nānyair yoga-gatiṃ vrajet
analyzed: yogena āpnoti tāḥ sarvāḥ na anyaiḥ yoga gatim vrajet

original: BhP_11.15.035/1 sarvāsām api siddhīnāṃ hetuḥ patir ahaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: sarvāsām api siddhīnām hetuḥ patiḥ aham prabhuḥ

original: BhP_11.15.035/3 ahaṃ yogasya sāṅkhyasya dharmasya brahma-vādinām
analyzed: aham yogasya sāṅkhyasya dharmasya brahma vādinām

original: BhP_11.15.036/1 aham ātmāntaro bāhyo 'nāvṛtaḥ sarva-dehinām
analyzed: aham ātmā antaraḥ bāhyaḥ na āvṛtaḥ sarva dehinām

original: BhP_11.15.036/3 yathā bhūtāni bhūteṣu bahir antaḥ svayaṃ tathā
analyzed: yathā bhūtāni bhūteṣu bahis antar svayam tathā

original: BhP_11.16.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.16.001/1 tvaṃ brahma paramaṃ sākṣād anādy-antam apāvṛtam
analyzed: tvam brahma paramam sākṣāt anādi antam apāvṛtam

original: BhP_11.16.001/3 sarveṣām api bhāvānāṃ trāṇa-sthity-apyayodbhavaḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām api bhāvānām trāṇa sthiti apyaya udbhavaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.002/1 uccāvaceṣu bhūteṣu durjñeyam akṛtātmabhiḥ
analyzed: uccāvaceṣu bhūteṣu durjñeyam akṛtātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.16.002/3 upāsate tvāṃ bhagavan yāthā-tathyena brāhmaṇāḥ
analyzed: upāsate tvām bhagavan yāthātathyena brāhmaṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.16.003/1 yeṣu yeṣu ca bhūteṣu bhaktyā tvāṃ paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: yeṣu yeṣu ca bhūteṣu bhaktyā tvām parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.003/3 upāsīnāḥ prapadyante saṃsiddhiṃ tad vadasva me
analyzed: upāsīnāḥ prapadyante saṃsiddhim tat vadasva me

original: BhP_11.16.004/1 gūḍhaś carasi bhūtātmā bhūtānāṃ bhūta-bhāvana
analyzed: gūḍhaḥ carasi bhūta ātmā bhūtānām bhūta bhāvana

original: BhP_11.16.004/3 na tvāṃ paśyanti bhūtāni paśyantaṃ mohitāni te
analyzed: na tvām paśyanti bhūtāni paśyantam mohitāni te

original: BhP_11.16.005/1 yāḥ kāś ca bhūmau divi vai rasāyāṃ vibhūtayo dikṣu mahā-vibhūte
analyzed: yāḥ kāḥ ca bhūmau divi vai rasāyām vibhūtayaḥ dikṣu mahā vibhūte

original: BhP_11.16.005/3 tā mahyam ākhyāhy anubhāvitās te namāmi te tīrtha-padāṅghri-padmam
analyzed: tāḥ mahyam ākhyāhi anubhāvitāḥ te namāmi te tīrtha pada aṅghri padmam

original: BhP_11.16.006/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.16.006/1 evam etad ahaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ praśnaṃ praśna-vidāṃ vara
analyzed: evam etat aham pṛṣṭaḥ praśnam praśna vidām vara

original: BhP_11.16.006/3 yuyutsunā vinaśane sapatnair arjunena vai
analyzed: yuyutsunā vinaśane sapatnaiḥ arjunena vai

original: BhP_11.16.007/1 jñātvā jñāti-vadhaṃ garhyam adharmaṃ rājya-hetukam
analyzed: jñātvā jñāti vadham garhyam adharmam rājya hetukam

original: BhP_11.16.007/3 tato nivṛtto hantāhaṃ hato 'yam iti laukikaḥ
analyzed: tatas nivṛttaḥ hantā aham hataḥ yam iti laukikaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.008/1 sa tadā puruṣa-vyāghro yuktyā me pratibodhitaḥ
analyzed: sa tadā puruṣa vyāghraḥ yuktyā me pratibodhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.008/3 abhyabhāṣata mām evaṃ yathā tvaṃ raṇa-mūrdhani
analyzed: abhyabhāṣata mām evam yathā tvam raṇa mūrdhani

original: BhP_11.16.009/1 aham ātmoddhavāmīṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ suhṛd īśvaraḥ
analyzed: aham ātmā uddhava amīṣām bhūtānām suhṛd īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.16.009/3 ahaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni teṣāṃ sthity-udbhavāpyayaḥ
analyzed: aham sarvāṇi bhūtāni teṣām sthiti udbhava apyayaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.010/1 ahaṃ gatir gatimatāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham
analyzed: aham gatiḥ gatimatām kālaḥ kalayatām aham

original: BhP_11.16.010/3 gunāṇāṃ cāpy ahaṃ sāmyaṃ guṇiny autpattiko guṇaḥ
analyzed: ca api aham sāmyam guṇini autpattikaḥ guṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.011/1 guṇinām apy ahaṃ sūtraṃ mahatāṃ ca mahān aham
analyzed: guṇinām api aham sūtram mahatām ca mahān aham

original: BhP_11.16.011/3 sūkṣmāṇām apy ahaṃ jīvo durjayānām ahaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: sūkṣmāṇām api aham jīvaḥ durjayānām aham manaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.012/1 hiraṇyagarbho vedānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ praṇavas tri-vṛt
analyzed: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ vedānām mantrāṇām praṇavaḥ trivṛt

original: BhP_11.16.012/3 akṣarāṇām a-kāro 'smi padāni cchandusām aham
analyzed: akṣarāṇām akāraḥ smi padāni chandusām aham

original: BhP_11.16.013/1 indro 'haṃ sarva-devānāṃ vasūnām asmi havya-vāṭ
analyzed: indraḥ ham sarva devānām vasūnām asmi havyavāṭ

original: BhP_11.16.013/3 ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇū rudrāṇāṃ nīla-lohitaḥ
analyzed: ādityānām aham viṣṇuḥ rudrāṇām nīlalohitaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.014/1 brahmarṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ rājarṣīṇām ahaṃ manuḥ
analyzed: brahmarṣīṇām bhṛguḥ aham rājarṣīṇām aham manuḥ

original: BhP_11.16.014/3 devarṣīṇāṃ nārado 'haṃ havirdhāny asmi dhenuṣu
analyzed: devarṣīṇām nāradaḥ ham havirdhānī asmi dhenuṣu

original: BhP_11.16.015/1 siddheśvarāṇāṃ kapilaḥ suparṇo 'haṃ patatriṇām
analyzed: siddheśvarāṇām kapilaḥ suparṇaḥ haṃ patatriṇām

original: BhP_11.16.015/3 prajāpatīnāṃ dakṣo 'haṃ pitṝṇām aham aryamā
analyzed: prajāpatīnām dakṣaḥ ham pitṝṇām aham aryamā

original: BhP_11.16.016/1 māṃ viddhy uddhava daityānāṃ prahlādam asureśvaram
analyzed: mām viddhi uddhava daityānām prahlādam asura īśvaram

original: BhP_11.16.016/3 somaṃ nakṣatrauṣadhīnāṃ dhaneśaṃ yakṣa-rakṣasām
analyzed: somam nakṣatra oṣadhīnām dhana īśam yakṣa rakṣasām

original: BhP_11.16.017/1 airāvataṃ gajendrāṇāṃ yādasāṃ varuṇaṃ prabhum
analyzed: airāvatam gaja indrāṇām yādasām varuṇam prabhum

original: BhP_11.16.017/3 tapatāṃ dyumatāṃ sūryaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca bhū-patim
analyzed: tapatām dyumatām sūryam manuṣyāṇām ca bhūpatim

original: BhP_11.16.018/1 uccaiḥśravās turaṅgāṇāṃ dhātūnām asmi kāñcanam
analyzed: uccaiḥśravāḥ turaṅgāṇām dhātūnām asmi kāñcanam

original: BhP_11.16.018/3 yamaḥ saṃyamatāṃ cāham sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ
analyzed: yamaḥ saṃyamatām ca aham sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ

original: BhP_11.16.019/1 nāgendrāṇām ananto 'haṃ mṛgendraḥ śṛṅgi-daṃṣṭriṇām
analyzed: nāga indrāṇām anantaḥ ham mṛgendraḥ śṛṅgi daṃṣṭriṇām

original: BhP_11.16.019/3 āśramāṇām ahaṃ turyo varṇānāṃ prathamo 'nagha
analyzed: āśramāṇām aham turyaḥ varṇānām prathamaḥ nagha

original: BhP_11.16.020/1 tīrthānāṃ srotasāṃ gaṅgā samudraḥ sarasām aham
analyzed: tīrthānām srotasām gaṅgā samudraḥ sarasām aham

original: BhP_11.16.020/3 āyudhānāṃ dhanur ahaṃ tripura-ghno dhanuṣmatām
analyzed: āyudhānām dhanuḥ aham tripura ghnaḥ dhanuṣmatām

original: BhP_11.16.021/1 dhiṣṇyānām asmy ahaṃ merur gahanānāṃ himālayaḥ
analyzed: dhiṣṇyānām asmi aham meruḥ gahanānām himālayaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.021/3 vanaspatīnām aśvattha oṣadhīnām ahaṃ yavaḥ
analyzed: vanaspatīnām aśvatthaḥ oṣadhīnām aham yavaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.022/1 purodhasāṃ vasiṣṭho 'haṃ brahmiṣṭhānāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: purodhasām vasiṣṭhaḥ ham brahmiṣṭhānām bṛhaspatiḥ

original: BhP_11.16.022/3 skando 'haṃ sarva-senānyām agraṇyāṃ bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: skandaḥ ham sarva senānyām agraṇyām bhagavān ajaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.023/1 yajñānāṃ brahma-yajño 'haṃ vratānām avihiṃsanam
analyzed: yajñānām brahmayajñaḥ ham vratānām a vihiṃsanam

original: BhP_11.16.023/3 vāyv-agny-arkāmbu-vāg-ātmā śucīnām apy ahaṃ śuciḥ
analyzed: vāyu agni arka ambu vāc ātmā śucīnām api aham śuciḥ

original: BhP_11.16.024/1 yogānām ātma-saṃrodho mantro 'smi vijigīṣatām
analyzed: yogānām ātma saṃrodhaḥ smi vijigīṣatām

original: BhP_11.16.024/3 ānvīkṣikī kauśalānāṃ vikalpaḥ khyāti-vādinām
analyzed: ānvīkṣikī kauśalānām vikalpaḥ khyāti vādinām

original: BhP_11.16.025/1 strīṇāṃ tu śatarūpāhaṃ puṃsāṃ svāyambhuvo manuḥ
analyzed: strīṇām tu śatarūpā aham puṃsām svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ

original: BhP_11.16.025/3 nārāyaṇo munīnāṃ ca kumāro brahmacāriṇām
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ munīnām ca kumāraḥ brahmacāriṇām

original: BhP_11.16.026/1 dharmāṇām asmi sannyāsaḥ kṣemāṇām abahir-matiḥ
analyzed: dharmāṇām asmi sannyāsaḥ kṣemāṇām abahirmatiḥ

original: BhP_11.16.026/3 guhyānāṃ su-nṛtaṃ maunaṃ mithunānām ajas tv aham
analyzed: guhyānām su nṛtam maunam mithunānām ajaḥ tu aham

original: BhP_11.16.027/1 saṃvatsaro 'smy animiṣām ṛtūnāṃ madhu-mādhavau
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ smi animiṣām ṛtūnām madhu mādhavau

original: BhP_11.16.027/3 māsānāṃ mārgaśīrṣo 'haṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ tathābhijit
analyzed: māsānām mārgaśīrṣaḥ haṃ nakṣatrāṇām tathā abhijit

original: BhP_11.16.028/1 ahaṃ yugānāṃ ca kṛtaṃ dhīrāṇāṃ devalo 'sitaḥ
analyzed: aham yugānām ca kṛtam dhīrāṇām sitaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.028/3 dvaipāyano 'smi vyāsānāṃ kavīnāṃ kāvya ātmavān
analyzed: dvaipāyanaḥ smi vyāsānām kavīnām kāvyaḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_11.16.029/1 vāsudevo bhagavatāṃ tvaṃ tu bhāgavateṣv aham
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ bhagavatām tvam tu bhāgavateṣu aham

original: BhP_11.16.029/3 kimpuruṣānāṃ hanumān vidyādhrāṇāṃ sudarśanaḥ
analyzed: kimpuruṣānām hanumān vidyādhrāṇām sudarśanaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.030/1 ratnānāṃ padma-rāgo 'smi padma-kośaḥ su-peśasām
analyzed: ratnānām padmarāgaḥ smi padma kośaḥ supeśasām

original: BhP_11.16.030/3 kuśo 'smi darbha-jātīnāṃ gavyam ājyaṃ haviḥṣv aham
analyzed: kuśaḥ smi darbha jātīnām gavyam ājyam haviḥṣu aham

original: BhP_11.16.031/1 vyavasāyinām ahaṃ lakṣmīḥ kitavānāṃ chala-grahaḥ
analyzed: vyavasāyinām aham lakṣmīḥ kitavānām chalagrahaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.031/3 titikṣāsmi titikṣūṇāṃ sattvaṃ sattvavatām aham
analyzed: titikṣā asmi titikṣūṇām sattvam sattvavatām aham

original: BhP_11.16.032/1 ojaḥ saho balavatāṃ karmāhaṃ viddhi sātvatām
analyzed: ojaḥ sahaḥ balavatām karma aham viddhi sātvatām

original: BhP_11.16.032/3 sātvatāṃ nava-mūrtīnām ādi-mūrtir ahaṃ parā
analyzed: sātvatām nava mūrtīnām ādi mūrtiḥ aham parā

original: BhP_11.16.033/1 viśvāvasuḥ pūrvacittir gandharvāpsarasām aham
analyzed: viśvāvasuḥ pūrva cittiḥ gandharva apsarasām aham

original: BhP_11.16.033/3 bhūdharāṇām ahaṃ sthairyaṃ gandha-mātram ahaṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: bhūdharāṇām aham sthairyam gandha mātram aham bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.034/1 apāṃ rasaś ca paramas tejiṣṭhānāṃ vibhāvasuḥ
analyzed: apām rasaḥ ca paramaḥ tejiṣṭhānām vibhāvasuḥ

original: BhP_11.16.034/3 prabhā sūryendu-tārāṇāṃ śabdo 'haṃ nabhasaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: prabhā sūrya indu tārāṇām śabdaḥ haṃ nabhasaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_11.16.035/1 brahmaṇyānāṃ balir ahaṃ vīrāṇām aham arjunaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇyānām baliḥ aham vīrāṇām aham arjunaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.035/3 bhūtānāṃ sthitir utpattir ahaṃ vai pratisaṅkramaḥ
analyzed: bhūtānām sthitiḥ utpattiḥ aham vai pratisaṅkramaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.036/1 gaty-ukty-utsargopādānam ānanda-sparśa-lakṣanam
BhP_11.16.036/3 āsvāda-śruty-avaghrāṇam ahaṃ sarvendriyendriyam
analyzed: āsvāda śruti avaghrāṇam aham sarva indriya indriyam

original: BhP_11.16.037/1 pṛthivī vāyur ākāśa āpo jyotir ahaṃ mahān
analyzed: pṛthivī vāyuḥ ākāśaḥ āpaḥ jyotiḥ aham mahān

original: BhP_11.16.037/3 vikāraḥ puruṣo 'vyaktaṃ rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaḥ param
analyzed: vikāraḥ puruṣaḥ vyaktam rajaḥ sattvam tamaḥ param

original: BhP_11.16.037/5 aham etat prasaṅkhyānaṃ jñānaṃ tattva-viniścayaḥ
analyzed: aham etat prasaṅkhyānam jñānam tattva viniścayaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.038/1 mayeśvareṇa jīvena guṇena guṇinā vinā
analyzed: mayā īśvareṇa jīvena guṇena guṇinā vinā

original: BhP_11.16.038/3 sarvātmanāpi sarveṇa na bhāvo vidyate kvacit
analyzed: sarva ātmanā api sarveṇa na bhāvaḥ vidyate kvacid

original: BhP_11.16.039/1 saṅkhyānaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ kālena kriyate mayā
analyzed: saṅkhyānam paramāṇūnām kālena kriyate mayā

original: BhP_11.16.039/3 na tathā me vibhūtīnāṃ sṛjato 'ṇḍāni koṭiśaḥ
analyzed: na tathā me vibhūtīnām sṛjataḥ ṇḍāni koṭiśas

original: BhP_11.16.040/1 tejaḥ śrīḥ kīrtir aiśvaryaṃ hrīs tyāgaḥ saubhagaṃ bhagaḥ
analyzed: tejaḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ aiśvaryam hrīḥ tyāgaḥ saubhagam bhagaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.040/3 vīryaṃ titikṣā vijñānaṃ yatra yatra sa me 'ṃśakaḥ
analyzed: vīryam titikṣā vijñānam yatra yatra sa me ṃśakaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.041/1 etās te kīrtitāḥ sarvāḥ saṅkṣepeṇa vibhūtayaḥ
analyzed: etāḥ te kīrtitāḥ sarvāḥ saṅkṣepeṇa vibhūtayaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.041/3 mano-vikārā evaite yathā vācābhidhīyate
analyzed: manaḥ vikārāḥ eva ete yathā vācā abhidhīyate

original: BhP_11.16.042/1 vācaṃ yaccha mano yaccha prāṇān yacchedriyāṇi ca
analyzed: vācam yaccha manaḥ yaccha prāṇān yaccha idriyāṇi ca

original: BhP_11.16.042/3 ātmānam ātmanā yaccha na bhūyaḥ kalpase 'dhvane
analyzed: ātmānam ātmanā yaccha na bhūyas kalpase dhvane

original: BhP_11.16.043/1 yo vai vāṅ-manasī saṃyag asaṃyacchan dhiyā yatiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vai vāc manasī saṃyak a saṃyacchan dhiyā yatiḥ

original: BhP_11.16.043/3 tasya vrataṃ tapo dānaṃ sravaty āma-ghaṭāmbu-vat
analyzed: tasya vratam tapaḥ dānam sravati āma ghaṭa ambu vat

original: BhP_11.16.044/1 tasmād vaco manaḥ prāṇān niyacchen mat-parāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt vacaḥ manaḥ prāṇān niyacchet mad parāyaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.16.044/3 mad-bhakti-yuktayā buddhyā tataḥ parisamāpyate
analyzed: mad bhakti yuktayā buddhyā tatas parisamāpyate

original: BhP_11.17.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.17.001/1 yas tvayābhihitaḥ pūrvaṃ dharmas tvad-bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvayā abhihitaḥ pūrvam dharmaḥ tvad bhakti lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.001/3 varṇāśamācāravatāṃ sarveṣāṃ dvi-padām api
analyzed: varṇa āśama ācāravatām sarveṣām dvipadām api

original: BhP_11.17.002/1 yathānuṣṭhīyamānena tvayi bhaktir nṛṇāṃ bhavet
analyzed: yathā anuṣṭhīyamānena tvayi bhaktiḥ nṛṇām bhavet

original: BhP_11.17.002/3 sva-dharmeṇāravindākṣa tan mamākhyātum arhasi
analyzed: svadharmeṇa aravinda akṣa tat mama ākhyātum arhasi

original: BhP_11.17.003/1 purā kila mahā-bāho dharmaṃ paramakaṃ prabho
analyzed: purā kila mahā bāho dharmam paramakam prabho

original: BhP_11.17.003/3 yat tena haṃsa-rūpeṇa brahmaṇe 'bhyāttha mādhava
analyzed: yat tena haṃsa rūpeṇa brahmaṇe bhyāttha mādhava

original: BhP_11.17.004/1 sa idānīṃ su-mahatā kālenāmitra-karśana
analyzed: saḥ idānīm su mahatā kālena amitra karśana

original: BhP_11.17.004/3 na prāyo bhavitā martya- loke prāg anuśāsitaḥ
analyzed: na prāyas bhavitā martya loke prāk anuśāsitaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.005/1 vaktā kartāvitā nānyo dharmasyācyuta te bhuvi
analyzed: vaktā kartā avitā nā anyaḥ dharmasya acyuta te bhuvi

original: BhP_11.17.005/3 sabhāyām api vairiñcyāṃ yatra mūrti-dharāḥ kalāḥ
analyzed: sabhāyām api vairiñcyām yatra mūrti dharāḥ kalāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.006/1 kartrāvitrā pravaktrā ca bhavatā madhusūdana
analyzed: kartrā avitrā pravaktrā ca bhavatā madhusūdana

original: BhP_11.17.006/3 tyakte mahī-tale deva vinaṣṭaṃ kaḥ pravakṣyati
analyzed: tyakte mahī tale deva vinaṣṭam kaḥ pravakṣyati

original: BhP_11.17.007/1 tat tvaṃ naḥ sarva-dharma-jña dharmas tvad-bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tat tvam naḥ sarva dharma jña dharmaḥ tvad bhakti lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.007/3 yathā yasya vidhīyeta tathā varṇaya me prabho
analyzed: yathā yasya vidhīyeta tathā varṇaya me prabho

original: BhP_11.17.008/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.17.008/1 itthaṃ sva-bhṛtya-mukhyena pṛṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān hariḥ
analyzed: ittham sva bhṛtya mukhyena pṛṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān hariḥ

original: BhP_11.17.008/3 prītaḥ kṣemāya martyānāṃ dharmān āha sanātanān
analyzed: prītaḥ kṣemāya martyānām dharmān āha sanātanān

original: BhP_11.17.009/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.17.009/1 dharmya eṣa tava praśno naiḥśreyasa-karo nṛṇām
analyzed: dharmyaḥ eṣa tava praśnaḥ naiḥśreyasa karaḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.17.009/3 varṇāśramācāravatāṃ tam uddhava nibodha me
analyzed: varṇa āśrama ācāravatām tam uddhava nibodha me

original: BhP_11.17.010/1 ādau kṛta-yuge varṇo nṛṇāṃ haṃsa iti smṛtaḥ
analyzed: ādau kṛta yuge varṇaḥ nṛṇām haṃsaḥ iti smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.010/3 kṛta-kṛtyāḥ prajā jātyā tasmāt kṛta-yugaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: kṛtakṛtyāḥ prajāḥ jātyā tasmāt kṛta yugam viduḥ

original: BhP_11.17.011/1 vedaḥ praṇava evāgre dharmo 'haṃ vṛṣa-rūpa-dhṛk
analyzed: vedaḥ praṇavaḥ eva agre dharmaḥ ham vṛṣa rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_11.17.011/3 upāsate tapo-niṣṭhā haṃsaṃ māṃ mukta-kilbiṣāḥ
analyzed: upāsate tapaḥ niṣṭhāḥ haṃsam mām mukta kilbiṣāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.012/1 tretā-mukhe mahā-bhāga prāṇān me hṛdayāt trayī
analyzed: tretā mukhe mahābhāga prāṇāt me hṛdayāt trayī

original: BhP_11.17.012/3 vidyā prādurabhūt tasyā aham āsaṃ tri-vṛn makhaḥ
analyzed: vidyā prādurabhūt tasyāḥ aham āsam trivṛt makhaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.013/1 vipra-kṣatriya-viṭ-śūdrā mukha-bāhūru-pāda-jāḥ
analyzed: vipra kṣatriya viś śūdrāḥ mukha bāhu ūru pāda jāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.013/3 vairājāt puruṣāj jātā ya ātmācāra-lakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: vairājāt puruṣāt jātāḥ ye ātma ācāra lakṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.014/1 gṛhāśramo jaghanato brahmacaryaṃ hṛdo mama
analyzed: gṛhāśramaḥ jaghanataḥ brahmacaryam hṛdaḥ mama

original: BhP_11.17.014/3 vakṣaḥ-sthalād vane-vāsaḥ sannyāsaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ
analyzed: vakṣaḥsthalāt vanevāsaḥ sannyāsaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.015/1 varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca janma-bhūmy-anusāriṇīḥ
analyzed: varṇānām āśramāṇām ca janma bhūmi anusāriṇīḥ

original: BhP_11.17.015/3 āsan prakṛtayo nṝnāṃ nīcair nīcottamottamāḥ
analyzed: āsan prakṛtayaḥ nṝnām nīcais nīca uttamottamāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.016/1 śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ santoṣaḥ kṣāntir ārjavam
analyzed: śamaḥ damaḥ tapaḥ śaucam santoṣaḥ kṣāntiḥ ārjavam

original: BhP_11.17.016/3 mad-bhaktiś ca dayā satyaṃ brahma-prakṛtayas tv imāḥ
analyzed: mad bhaktiḥ ca dayā satyam brahma prakṛtayaḥ tu imāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.017/1 tejo balaṃ dhṛtiḥ śauryaṃ titikṣaudāryam udyamaḥ
analyzed: tejaḥ balam dhṛtiḥ śauryam titikṣā audāryam udyamaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.017/3 sthairyaṃ brahmanyam aiśvaryaṃ kṣatra-prakṛtayas tv imāḥ
analyzed: sthairyam brahmanyam aiśvaryam kṣatra prakṛtayaḥ tu imāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.018/1 āstikyaṃ dāna-niṣṭhā ca adambho brahma-sevanam
analyzed: āstikyam dāna niṣṭhā ca adambhaḥ brahma sevanam

original: BhP_11.17.018/3 atuṣṭir arthopacayair vaiśya-prakṛtayas tv imāḥ
analyzed: atuṣṭiḥ artha upacayaiḥ vaiśya prakṛtayaḥ tu imāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.019/1 śuśrūṣaṇaṃ dvija-gavāṃ devānāṃ cāpy amāyayā
analyzed: śuśrūṣaṇam dvija gavām devānām ca api amāyayā

original: BhP_11.17.019/3 tatra labdhena santoṣaḥ śūdra-prakṛtayas tv imāḥ
analyzed: tatra labdhena santoṣaḥ śūdra prakṛtayaḥ tu imāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.020/1 aśaucam anṛtaṃ steyaṃ nāstikyaṃ śuṣka-vigrahaḥ
analyzed: aśaucam anṛtam steyam nāstikyam śuṣka vigrahaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.020/3 kāmaḥ krodhaś ca tarṣaś ca sa bhāvo 'ntyāvasāyinām
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ ca tarṣaḥ ca sa bhāvaḥ ntyāvasāyinām

original: BhP_11.17.021/1 ahiṃsā satyam asteyam akāma-krodha-lobhatā
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam a kāma krodha lobha tā

original: BhP_11.17.021/3 bhūta-priya-hitehā ca dharmo 'yaṃ sārva-varṇikaḥ
analyzed: bhūta priya hita īhā ca dharmaḥ yam sārvavarṇikaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.022/1 dvitīyaṃ prāpyānupūrvyāj janmopanayanaṃ dvijaḥ
analyzed: dvitīyam prāpya ānupūrvyāt janma upanayanam dvijaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.022/3 vasan guru-kule dānto brahmādhīyīta cāhūtaḥ
analyzed: vasan guru kule dāntaḥ brahma adhīyīta ca āhūtaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.023/1 mekhalājina-daṇḍākṣa- brahma-sūtra-kamaṇḍalūn
analyzed: mekhalā ajina daṇḍa akṣa brahmasūtra kamaṇḍalūn

original: BhP_11.17.023/3 jaṭilo 'dhauta-dad-vāso 'rakta-pīṭhaḥ kuśān dadhat
analyzed: jaṭilaḥ rakta pīṭhaḥ kuśān dadhat

original: BhP_11.17.024/1 snāna-bhojana-homeṣu japoccāre ca vāg-yataḥ
analyzed: snāna bhojana homeṣu japa uccāre ca vāgyataḥ

original: BhP_11.17.024/3 na cchindyān nakha-romāṇi kakṣopastha-gatāny api
analyzed: na chindyāt nakha romāṇi kakṣa upastha gatāni api

original: BhP_11.17.025/1 reto nāvakirej jātu brahma-vrata-dharaḥ svayam
analyzed: retaḥ na avakiret jātu brahmavrata dharaḥ svayam

original: BhP_11.17.025/3 avakīrṇe 'vagāhyāpsu yatāsus tri-padāṃ japet
analyzed: avakīrṇe vagāhya apsu yata asuḥ tripadām japet

original: BhP_11.17.026/1 agny-arkācārya-go-vipra- guru-vṛddha-surāñ śuciḥ
analyzed: agni arka ācārya go vipra guru vṛddha surām śuciḥ

original: BhP_11.17.026/3 samāhita upāsīta sandhye dve yata-vāg japan
analyzed: samāhitaḥ upāsīta sandhye dve yata vāc japan

original: BhP_11.17.027/1 ācāryaṃ māṃ vijānīyān nāvanmanyeta karhicit
analyzed: ācāryam mām vijānīyāt karhicit

original: BhP_11.17.027/3 na martya-buddhyāsūyeta sarva-deva-mayo guruḥ
analyzed: na martya buddhyā asūyeta sarva deva mayaḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_11.17.028/1 sāyaṃ prātar upānīya bhaikṣyaṃ tasmai nivedayet
analyzed: sāyam prātar upānīya bhaikṣyam tasmai nivedayet

original: BhP_11.17.028/3 yac cānyad apy anujñātam upayuñjīta saṃyataḥ
analyzed: yat ca anyat api anujñātam upayuñjīta saṃyataḥ

original: BhP_11.17.029/1 śuśrūṣamāṇa ācāryaṃ sadopāsīta nīca-vat
analyzed: śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ ācāryam sadā upāsīta nīca vat

original: BhP_11.17.029/3 yāna-śayyāsana-sthānair nāti-dūre kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: yāna śayyā āsana sthānaiḥ na ati dūre kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_11.17.030/1 evaṃ-vṛtto guru-kule vased bhoga-vivarjitaḥ
analyzed: evaṃvṛttaḥ guru kule vaset bhoga vivarjitaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.030/3 vidyā samāpyate yāvad bibhrad vratam akhaṇḍitam
analyzed: vidyā samāpyate yāvat bibhrat vratam akhaṇḍitam

original: BhP_11.17.031/1 yady asau chandasāṃ lokam ārokṣyan brahma-viṣṭapam
analyzed: yadi asau chandasām lokam ārokṣyan brahma viṣṭapam

original: BhP_11.17.031/3 gurave vinyased dehaṃ svādhyāyārthaṃ bṛhad-vrataḥ
analyzed: gurave vinyaset deham svādhyāya artham bṛhat vrataḥ

original: BhP_11.17.032/1 agnau gurāv ātmani ca sarva-bhūteṣu māṃ param
analyzed: agnau gurau ātmani ca sarva bhūteṣu mām param

original: BhP_11.17.032/3 apṛthag-dhīr upasīta brahma-varcasvy akalmaṣaḥ
analyzed: apṛthak dhīḥ upasīta brahma varcasvī akalmaṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.033/1 strīṇāṃ nirīkṣaṇa-sparśa- saṃlāpa-kṣvelanādikam
analyzed: strīṇām nirīkṣaṇa sparśa saṃlāpa kṣvelana ādikam

original: BhP_11.17.033/3 prāṇino mithunī-bhūtān agṛhastho 'gratas tyajet
analyzed: prāṇinaḥ mithunībhūtān agṛha sthaḥ gratas tyajet

original: BhP_11.17.034/1 śaucam ācamanaṃ snānaṃ sandhyopāstir mamārcanam
analyzed: śaucam ācamanam snānam sandhyā upāstiḥ mama arcanam

original: BhP_11.17.034/3 tīrtha-sevā japo 'spṛśyā- bhakṣyāsambhāṣya-varjanam
analyzed: tīrtha sevā spṛśyā bhakṣya a sambhāṣya varjanam

original: BhP_11.17.035/1 sarvāśrama-prayukto 'yaṃ niyamaḥ kula-nandana
analyzed: sarva āśrama prayuktaḥ yam niyamaḥ kula nandana

original: BhP_11.17.035/3 mad-bhāvaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu mano-vāk-kāya-saṃyamaḥ
analyzed: mad bhāvaḥ sarva bhūteṣu manaḥ vāc kāya saṃyamaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.036/1 evaṃ bṛhad-vrata-dharo brāhmaṇo 'gnir iva jvalan
analyzed: evam bṛhat vrata dharaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ gniḥ iva jvalan

original: BhP_11.17.036/3 mad-bhaktas tīvra-tapasā dagdha-karmāśayo 'malaḥ
BhP_11.17.037/1 athānantaram āvekṣyan yathā-jijñāsitāgamaḥ
analyzed: atha anantaram āvekṣyan yathā jijñāsita āgamaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.037/3 gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā snāyād gurv-anumoditaḥ
analyzed: gurave dakṣiṇām dattvā snāyāt guru anumoditaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.038/1 gṛhaṃ vanaṃ vopaviśet pravrajed vā dvijottamaḥ
analyzed: gṛham vanam vā upaviśet pravrajet vā dvijottamaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.038/3 āśramād āśramaṃ gacchen nānyathāmat-paraś caret
analyzed: āśramāt āśramam gacchet na anyathā mad paraḥ caret

original: BhP_11.17.039/1 gṛhārthī sadṛśīṃ bhāryām udvahed ajugupsitām
analyzed: gṛha arthī sadṛśīm bhāryām udvahet a jugupsitām

original: BhP_11.17.039/3 yavīyasīṃ tu vayasā yaṃ sa-varṇām anu kramāt
analyzed: yavīyasīm tu vayasā yam savarṇām anu kramāt

original: BhP_11.17.040/1 ijyādhyayana-dānāni sarveṣāṃ ca dvi-janmanām
analyzed: ijyā adhyayana dānāni sarveṣām ca dvijanmanām

original: BhP_11.17.040/3 pratigraho 'dhyāpanaṃ ca brāhmaṇasyaiva yājanam
analyzed: pratigrahaḥ dhyāpanam ca brāhmaṇasya eva yājanam

original: BhP_11.17.041/1 pratigrahaṃ manyamānas tapas-tejo-yaśo-nudam
analyzed: pratigraham manyamānaḥ tapaḥ tejaḥ yaśaḥ nudam

original: BhP_11.17.041/3 anyābhyām eva jīveta śilair vā doṣa-dṛk tayoḥ
analyzed: anyābhyām eva jīveta śilaiḥ vā doṣa dṛś tayoḥ

original: BhP_11.17.042/1 brāhmaṇasya hi deho 'yaṃ kṣudra-kāmāya neṣyate
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya hi dehaḥ yam kṣudra kāmāya na iṣyate

original: BhP_11.17.042/3 kṛcchrāya tapase ceha pretyānanta-sukhāya ca
analyzed: kṛcchrāya tapase ca iha pretya ananta sukhāya ca

original: BhP_11.17.043/1 śiloñcha-vṛttyā parituṣṭa-citto dharmaṃ mahāntaṃ virajaṃ juṣāṇaḥ
analyzed: śila uñcha vṛttyā parituṣṭa cittaḥ dharmam mahāntam virajam juṣāṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.043/3 mayy arpitātmā gṛha eva tiṣṭhan nāti-prasaktaḥ samupaiti śāntim
analyzed: mayi arpita ātmā gṛhe eva tiṣṭhan na ati prasaktaḥ samupaiti śāntim

original: BhP_11.17.044/1 samuddharanti ye vipraṃ sīdantaṃ mat-parāyaṇam
analyzed: samuddharanti ye vipram sīdantam mad parāyaṇam

original: BhP_11.17.044/3 tān uddhariṣye na cirād āpadbhyo naur ivārṇavāt
analyzed: tān uddhariṣye na cirāt āpadbhyaḥ nauḥ iva arṇavāt

original: BhP_11.17.045/1 sarvāḥ samuddhared rājā piteva vyasanāt prajāḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ samuddharet rājā pitā iva vyasanāt prajāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.045/3 ātmānam ātmanā dhīro yathā gaja-patir gajān
analyzed: ātmānam ātmanā dhīraḥ yathā gajapatiḥ gajān

original: BhP_11.17.046/1 evaṃ-vidho nara-patir vimānenārka-varcasā
analyzed: evaṃvidhaḥ narapatiḥ vimānena arka varcasā

original: BhP_11.17.046/3 vidhūyehāśubhaṃ kṛtsnam indreṇa saha modate
analyzed: vidhūya iha aśubham kṛtsnam indreṇa saha modate

original: BhP_11.17.047/1 sīdan vipro vaṇig-vṛttyā paṇyair evāpadaṃ taret
analyzed: sīdan vipraḥ vaṇigvṛttyā paṇyaiḥ eva āpadam taret

original: BhP_11.17.047/3 khaḍgena vāpadākrānto na śva-vṛttyā kathañcana
analyzed: khaḍgena vā āpad ākrāntaḥ na śvavṛttyā kathañcana

original: BhP_11.17.048/1 vaiśya-vṛttyā tu rājanyo jīven mṛgayayāpadi
analyzed: vaiśya vṛttyā tu rājanyaḥ jīvet mṛgayayā āpadi

original: BhP_11.17.048/3 cared vā vipra-rūpeṇa na śva-vṛttyā kathañcana
analyzed: caret vā vipra rūpeṇa na śvavṛttyā kathañcana

original: BhP_11.17.049/1 śūdra-vṛttiṃ bhajed vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kāru-kaṭa-kriyām
analyzed: śūdra vṛttim bhajet vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kāru kaṭa kriyām

original: BhP_11.17.049/3 kṛcchrān mukto na garhyeṇa vṛttiṃ lipseta karmaṇā
analyzed: kṛcchrāt muktaḥ na garhyeṇa vṛttim lipseta karmaṇā

original: BhP_11.17.050/1 vedādhyāya-svadhā-svāhā- baly-annādyair yathodayam
analyzed: veda adhyāya svadhā svāhā bali annādyaiḥ yathodayam

original: BhP_11.17.050/3 devarṣi-pitṛ-bhūtāni mad-rūpāṇy anv-ahaṃ yajet
analyzed: deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni mad rūpāṇi anvaham yajet

original: BhP_11.17.051/1 yadṛcchayopapannena śuklenopārjitena vā
analyzed: yadṛcchayā upapannena śuklena upārjitena vā

original: BhP_11.17.051/3 dhanenāpīḍayan bhṛtyān nyāyenaivāharet kratūn
analyzed: dhanena āpīḍayan bhṛtyān nyāyena eva āharet kratūn

original: BhP_11.17.052/1 kuṭumbeṣu na sajjeta na pramādyet kuṭumby api
analyzed: kuṭumbeṣu na sajjeta na pramādyet kuṭumbī api

original: BhP_11.17.052/3 vipaścin naśvaraṃ paśyed adṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭa-vat
analyzed: vipaścit naśvaram paśyet adṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭa vat

original: BhP_11.17.053/1 putra-dārāpta-bandhūnāṃ saṅgamaḥ pāntha-saṅgamaḥ
analyzed: putra dāra āpta bandhūnām saṅgamaḥ pāntha saṅgamaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.053/3 anu-dehaṃ viyanty ete svapno nidrānugo yathā
analyzed: anudeham viyanti ete svapnaḥ nidrā anugaḥ yathā

original: BhP_11.17.054/1 itthaṃ parimṛśan mukto gṛheṣv atithi-vad vasan
analyzed: ittham parimṛśan muktaḥ gṛheṣu atithi vat vasan

original: BhP_11.17.054/3 na gṛhair anubadhyeta nirmamo nirahaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: na gṛhaiḥ anubadhyeta nirmamaḥ nirahaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.055/1 karmabhir gṛha-medhīyair iṣṭvā mām eva bhaktimān
analyzed: karmabhiḥ gṛhamedhīyaiḥ iṣṭvā mām eva bhaktimān

original: BhP_11.17.055/3 tiṣṭhed vanaṃ vopaviśet prajāvān vā parivrajet
analyzed: tiṣṭhet vanam vā upaviśet prajāvān vā parivrajet

original: BhP_11.17.056/1 yas tv āsakta-matir gehe putra-vittaiṣaṇāturaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu āsakta matiḥ gehe putra vitta eṣaṇā āturaḥ

original: BhP_11.17.056/3 straiṇaḥ kṛpaṇa-dhīr mūḍho mamāham iti badhyate
analyzed: straiṇaḥ kṛpaṇa dhīḥ mūḍhaḥ mama aham iti badhyate

original: BhP_11.17.057/1 aho me pitarau vṛddhau bhāryā bālātmajātmajāḥ
analyzed: aho me pitarau vṛddhau bhāryāḥ bāla ātmaja ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.057/3 anāthā mām ṛte dīnāḥ kathaṃ jīvanti duḥkhitāḥ
analyzed: anāthāḥ mām ṛte dīnāḥ katham jīvanti duḥkhitāḥ

original: BhP_11.17.058/1 evaṃ gṛhāśayākṣipta- hṛdayo mūḍha-dhīr ayam
analyzed: evam gṛha āśaya ākṣipta hṛdayaḥ mūḍha dhīḥ ayam

original: BhP_11.17.058/3 atṛptas tān anudhyāyan mṛto 'ndhaṃ viśate tamaḥ
analyzed: atṛptaḥ tān anudhyāyan mṛtaḥ ndham viśate tamaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.18.001/1 vanaṃ vivikṣuḥ putreṣu bhāryāṃ nyasya sahaiva vā
analyzed: vanam vivikṣuḥ putreṣu bhāryām nyasya saha eva vā

original: BhP_11.18.001/3 vana eva vasec chāntas tṛtīyaṃ bhāgam āyuṣaḥ
analyzed: vane eva vaset śāntaḥ tṛtīyam bhāgam āyuṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.002/1 kanda-mūla-phalair vanyair medhyair vṛttiṃ prakalpayet
analyzed: kanda mūla phalaiḥ vanyaiḥ medhyaiḥ vṛttim prakalpayet

original: BhP_11.18.002/3 vasīta valkalaṃ vāsas tṛṇa-parṇājināni vā
analyzed: vasīta valkalam vāsaḥ tṛṇa parṇa ajināni vā

original: BhP_11.18.003/1 keśa-roma-nakha-śmaśru- malāni bibhṛyād dataḥ
analyzed: keśa roma nakha śmaśru malāni bibhṛyāt

original: BhP_11.18.003/3 na dhāved apsu majjeta tri kālaṃ sthaṇḍile-śayaḥ
analyzed: na dhāvet apsu majjeta tris kālam sthaṇḍileśayaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.004/1 grīṣme tapyeta pañcāgnīn varṣāsv āsāra-ṣāḍ jale
analyzed: grīṣme tapyeta pañca agnīn varṣāsu āsāra sāh jale

original: BhP_11.18.004/3 ākaṇtha-magnaḥ śiśira evaṃ vṛttas tapaś caret
analyzed: ā kaṇtha magnaḥ śiśire evam vṛttaḥ tapaḥ caret

original: BhP_11.18.005/1 agni-pakvaṃ samaśnīyāt kāla-pakvam athāpi vā
analyzed: agni pakvam samaśnīyāt kāla pakvam atha api vā

original: BhP_11.18.005/3 ulūkhalāśma-kuṭṭo vā dantolūkhala eva vā
analyzed: ulūkhala aśma kuṭṭaḥ vā danta ulūkhalaḥ eva vā

original: BhP_11.18.006/1 svayaṃ sañcinuyāt sarvam ātmano vṛtti-kāraṇam
analyzed: svayam sañcinuyāt sarvam ātmanaḥ vṛtti kāraṇam

original: BhP_11.18.006/3 deśa-kāla-balābhijño nādadītānyadāhṛtam
analyzed: deśa kāla bala abhijñaḥ na ādadīta anyat āhṛtam

original: BhP_11.18.007/1 vanyaiś caru-puroḍāśair nirvapet kāla-coditān
analyzed: vanyaiḥ caru puroḍāśaiḥ nirvapet kāla coditān

original: BhP_11.18.007/3 na tu śrautena paśunā māṃ yajeta vanāśramī
analyzed: na tu śrautena paśunā mām yajeta vana āśramī

original: BhP_11.18.008/1 agnihotraṃ ca darśaś ca paurṇamāsaś ca pūrva-vat
analyzed: agnihotram ca darśaḥ ca paurṇamāsaḥ ca pūrvavat

original: BhP_11.18.008/3 cāturmāsyāni ca muner āmnātāni ca naigamaiḥ
analyzed: cāturmāsyāni ca muneḥ āmnātāni ca naigamaiḥ

original: BhP_11.18.009/1 evaṃ cīrṇena tapasā munir dhamani-santataḥ
analyzed: evam cīrṇena tapasā muniḥ dhamanisantataḥ

original: BhP_11.18.009/3 māṃ tapo-mayam ārādhya ṛṣi-lokād upaiti mām
analyzed: mām tapaḥ mayam ārādhya ṛṣi lokāt upaiti mām

original: BhP_11.18.010/1 yas tv etat kṛcchrataś cīrṇaṃ tapo niḥśreyasaṃ mahat
analyzed: yaḥ tu etat kṛcchratas cīrṇam tapaḥ niḥśreyasam mahat

original: BhP_11.18.010/3 kāmāyālpīyase yuñjyād bāliśaḥ ko 'paras tataḥ
analyzed: kāmāya alpīyase yuñjyāt bāliśaḥ paraḥ tatas

original: BhP_11.18.011/1 yadāsau niyame 'kalpo jarayā jāta-vepathuḥ
analyzed: yadā asau niyame kalpaḥ jarayā jāta vepathuḥ

original: BhP_11.18.011/3 ātmany agnīn samāropya mac-citto 'gniṃ samāviśet
analyzed: ātmani agnīn samāropya mad cittaḥ gnim samāviśet

original: BhP_11.18.012/1 yadā karma-vipākeṣu lokeṣu nirayātmasu
analyzed: yadā karma vipākeṣu lokeṣu niraya ātmasu

original: BhP_11.18.012/3 virāgo jāyate samyaṅ nyastāgniḥ pravrajet tataḥ
analyzed: virāgaḥ jāyate samyak nyasta agniḥ pravrajet tatas

original: BhP_11.18.013/1 iṣṭvā yathopadeśaṃ māṃ dattvā sarva-svam ṛtvije
analyzed: iṣṭvā yathopadeśam mām dattvā sarva svam ṛtvije

original: BhP_11.18.013/3 agnīn sva-prāṇa āveśya nirapekṣaḥ parivrajet
analyzed: agnīn sva prāṇe āveśya nirapekṣaḥ parivrajet

original: BhP_11.18.014/1 viprasya vai sannyasato devā dārādi-rūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: viprasya vai sannyasataḥ devāḥ dāra ādi rūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.014/3 vighnān kurvanty ayaṃ hy asmān ākramya samiyāt param
analyzed: vighnān kurvanti ayam hi asmān ākramya samiyāt param

original: BhP_11.18.015/1 bibhṛyāc cen munir vāsaḥ kaupīnācchādanaṃ param
analyzed: bibhṛyāt ced muniḥ vāsaḥ kaupīna ācchādanam param

original: BhP_11.18.015/3 tyaktaṃ na daṇḍa-pātrābhyām anyat kiñcid anāpadi
analyzed: tyaktam na daṇḍa pātrābhyām anyat kiñcid anāpadi

original: BhP_11.18.016/1 dṛṣṭi-pūtaṃ nyaset pādaṃ vastra-pūtaṃ pibej jalam
analyzed: dṛṣṭi pūtam nyaset pādam vastra pūtam pibet jalam

original: BhP_11.18.016/3 satya-pūtāṃ vaded vācaṃ manaḥ-pūtaṃ samācaret
analyzed: satya pūtām vadet vācam manaḥ pūtam samācaret

original: BhP_11.18.017/1 maunānīhānilāyāmā daṇḍā vāg-deha-cetasām
BhP_11.18.017/3 na hy ete yasya santy aṅga veṇubhir na bhaved yatiḥ
analyzed: na hi ete yasya santi aṅga veṇubhiḥ na bhavet yatiḥ

original: BhP_11.18.018/1 bhikṣāṃ caturṣu varṇeṣu vigarhyān varjayaṃś caret
analyzed: bhikṣām caturṣu varṇeṣu vigarhyān varjayan caret

original: BhP_11.18.018/3 saptāgārān asaṅkḷptāṃs tuṣyel labdhena tāvatā
analyzed: sapta agārān asaṅkḷptān tuṣyet labdhena tāvatā

original: BhP_11.18.019/1 bahir jalāśayaṃ gatvā tatropaspṛśya vāg-yataḥ
analyzed: bahis jalāśayam gatvā tatra upaspṛśya vāgyataḥ

original: BhP_11.18.019/3 vibhajya pāvitaṃ śeṣaṃ bhuñjītāśeṣam āhṛtam
analyzed: vibhajya pāvitam śeṣam bhuñjīta aśeṣam āhṛtam

original: BhP_11.18.020/1 ekaś caren mahīm etāṃ niḥsaṅgaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ caret mahīm etām niḥsaṅgaḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.020/3 ātma-krīḍa ātma-rata ātma-vān sama-darśanaḥ
analyzed: ātma krīḍaḥ ātma rataḥ ātmavān samadarśanaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.021/1 vivikta-kṣema-śaraṇo mad-bhāva-vimalāśayaḥ
analyzed: vivikta kṣema śaraṇaḥ mad bhāva vimala āśayaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.021/3 ātmānaṃ cintayed ekam abhedena mayā muniḥ
analyzed: ātmānam cintayet ekam abhedena mayā muniḥ

original: BhP_11.18.022/1 anvīkṣetātmano bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca jñāna-niṣṭhayā
analyzed: anvīkṣeta ātmanaḥ bandham mokṣam ca jñāna niṣṭhayā

original: BhP_11.18.022/3 bandha indriya-vikṣepo mokṣa eṣāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ
analyzed: bandhaḥ indriya vikṣepaḥ mokṣaḥ eṣām ca saṃyamaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.023/1 tasmān niyamya ṣaḍ-vargaṃ mad-bhāvena caren muniḥ
analyzed: tasmāt niyamya ṣaḍvargam mad bhāvena caret muniḥ

original: BhP_11.18.023/3 viraktaḥ kṣudra-kāmebhyo labdhvātmani sukhaṃ mahat
analyzed: viraktaḥ kṣudra kāmebhyaḥ labdhvā ātmani sukham mahat

original: BhP_11.18.024/1 pura-grāma-vrajān sārthān bhikṣārthaṃ praviśaṃś caret
analyzed: pura grāma vrajān sārthān bhikṣā artham praviśan caret

original: BhP_11.18.024/3 puṇya-deśa-saric-chaila- vanāśrama-vatīṃ mahīm
analyzed: puṇya deśa sarit śaila vana āśramavatīm mahīm

original: BhP_11.18.025/1 vānaprasthāśrama-padeṣv abhīkṣṇaṃ bhaikṣyam ācaret
analyzed: vānaprastha āśrama padeṣu abhīkṣṇam bhaikṣyam ācaret

original: BhP_11.18.025/3 saṃsidhyaty āśv asammohaḥ śuddha-sattvaḥ śilāndhasā
analyzed: saṃsidhyati āśu asammohaḥ śuddha sattvaḥ śilāndhasā

original: BhP_11.18.026/1 naitad vastutayā paśyed dṛśyamānaṃ vinaśyati
analyzed: na etat vastu tayā paśyet dṛśyamānam vinaśyati

original: BhP_11.18.026/3 asakta-citto viramed ihāmutra-cikīrṣitāt
analyzed: asakta cittaḥ viramet iha amutra cikīrṣitāt

original: BhP_11.18.027/1 yad etad ātmani jagan mano-vāk-prāṇa-saṃhatam
analyzed: yat etat ātmani jagat manaḥ vāc prāṇa saṃhatam

original: BhP_11.18.027/3 sarvaṃ māyeti tarkeṇa sva-sthas tyaktvā na tat smaret
analyzed: sarvam māyā iti tarkeṇa svasthaḥ tyaktvā na tat smaret

original: BhP_11.18.028/1 jñāna-niṣṭho virakto vā mad-bhakto vānapekṣakaḥ
analyzed: jñāna niṣṭhaḥ viraktaḥ vā mad bhaktaḥ vā anapekṣakaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.028/3 sa-liṅgān āśramāṃs tyaktvā cared avidhi-gocaraḥ
analyzed: saliṅgān āśramān tyaktvā caret avidhi gocaraḥ

original: BhP_11.18.029/1 budho bālaka-vat krīḍet kuśalo jaḍa-vac caret
analyzed: budhaḥ bālaka vat krīḍet kuśalaḥ jaḍa vat caret

original: BhP_11.18.029/3 vaded unmatta-vad vidvān go-caryāṃ naigamaś caret
analyzed: vadet unmatta vat vidvān gocaryām naigamaḥ caret

original: BhP_11.18.030/1 veda-vāda-rato na syān na pāṣaṇḍī na haitukaḥ
analyzed: veda vāda rataḥ na syāt na pāṣaṇḍī na haitukaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.030/3 śuṣka-vāda-vivāde na kañcit pakṣaṃ samāśrayet
analyzed: śuṣka vāda vivāde na kañcid pakṣam samāśrayet

original: BhP_11.18.031/1 nodvijeta janād dhīro janaṃ codvejayen na tu
analyzed: na udvijeta janāt dhīraḥ janam ca udvejayet na tu

original: BhP_11.18.031/3 ati-vādāṃs titikṣeta nāvamanyeta kañcana
analyzed: ativādān titikṣeta na avamanyeta kañcana

original: BhP_11.18.031/5 deham uddiśya paśu-vad vairaṃ kuryān na kenacit
analyzed: deham uddiśya paśu vat vairam kuryāt na kenacid

original: BhP_11.18.032/1 eka eva paro hy ātmā bhūteṣv ātmany avasthitaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva paraḥ hi ātmā bhūteṣu ātmani avasthitaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.032/3 yathendur uda-pātreṣu bhūtāny ekātmakāni ca
analyzed: yathā induḥ uda pātreṣu bhūtāni eka ātmakāni ca

original: BhP_11.18.033/1 alabdhvā na viṣīdeta kāle kāle 'śanaṃ kvacit
analyzed: a labdhvā na viṣīdeta kāle kāle śanam kvacid

original: BhP_11.18.033/3 labdhvā na hṛṣyed dhṛtimān ubhayaṃ daiva-tantritam
analyzed: labdhvā na hṛṣyet dhṛtimān ubhayam daiva tantritam

original: BhP_11.18.034/1 āhārārthaṃ samīheta yuktaṃ tat-prāṇa-dhāraṇam
analyzed: āhāra artham samīheta yuktam tat prāṇadhāraṇam

original: BhP_11.18.034/3 tattvaṃ vimṛśyate tena tad vijñāya vimucyate
analyzed: tattvam vimṛśyate tena tat vijñāya vimucyate

original: BhP_11.18.035/1 yadṛcchayopapannānnam adyāc chreṣṭham utāparam
analyzed: yadṛcchayā upapanna annam adyāt śreṣṭham uta aparam

original: BhP_11.18.035/3 tathā vāsas tathā śayyāṃ prāptaṃ prāptaṃ bhajen muniḥ
analyzed: tathā vāsaḥ tathā śayyām prāptam prāptam bhajet muniḥ

original: BhP_11.18.036/1 śaucam ācamanaṃ snānaṃ na tu codanayā caret
analyzed: śaucam ācamanam snānam na tu codanayā caret

original: BhP_11.18.036/3 anyāṃś ca niyamāñ jñānī yathāhaṃ līlayeśvaraḥ
analyzed: anyān ca jñānī yathā aham līlayā īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.18.037/1 na hi tasya vikalpākhyā yā ca mad-vīkṣayā hatā
analyzed: na hi tasya vikalpa ākhyā yā ca mad vīkṣayā hatā

original: BhP_11.18.037/3 ā-dehāntāt kvacit khyātis tataḥ sampadyate mayā
analyzed: ādehāntāt kvacid khyātiḥ tatas sampadyate mayā

original: BhP_11.18.038/1 duḥkhodarkeṣu kāmeṣu jāta-nirveda ātmavān
analyzed: duḥkha udarkeṣu kāmeṣu jāta nirvedaḥ ātmavān

original: BhP_11.18.038/3 ajjñāsita-mad-dharmo muniṃ gurum upavrajet
analyzed: munim gurum upavrajet

original: BhP_11.18.039/1 tāvat paricared bhaktaḥ śraddhāvān anasūyakaḥ
analyzed: tāvat paricaret bhaktaḥ śraddhāvān anasūyakaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.039/3 yāvad brahma vijānīyān mām eva gurum ādṛtaḥ
analyzed: yāvat brahma vijānīyāt mām eva gurum ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.040/1 yas tv asaṃyata-ṣaḍ-vargaḥ pracaṇḍendriya-sārathiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu asaṃyata ṣaḍvargaḥ pracaṇḍa indriya sārathiḥ

original: BhP_11.18.040/3 jñāna-vairāgya-rahitas tri-daṇḍam upajīvati
analyzed: jñāna vairāgya rahitaḥ tridaṇḍam upajīvati

original: BhP_11.18.041/1 surān ātmānam ātma-sthaṃ nihnute māṃ ca dharma-hā
analyzed: surān ātmānam ātma stham nihnute mām ca dharma hā

original: BhP_11.18.041/3 avipakva-kaṣāyo 'smād amuṣmāc ca vihīyate
analyzed: a vipakva kaṣāyaḥ smāt amuṣmāt ca vihīyate

original: BhP_11.18.042/1 bhikṣor dharmaḥ śamo 'hiṃsā tapa īkṣā vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: bhikṣoḥ dharmaḥ śamaḥ hiṃsā tapaḥ īkṣā vanaukasaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.042/3 gṛhiṇo bhūta-rakṣejyā dvijasyācārya-sevanam
analyzed: gṛhiṇaḥ bhūta rakṣā ijyā dvijasya ācārya sevanam

original: BhP_11.18.043/1 brahmacaryaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ santoṣo bhūta-sauhṛdam
analyzed: brahmacaryam tapaḥ śaucam santoṣaḥ bhūta sauhṛdam

original: BhP_11.18.043/3 gṛhasthasyāpy ṛtau gantuḥ sarveṣāṃ mad-upāsanam
analyzed: gṛhasthasya api ṛtau gantuḥ sarveṣām mad upāsanam

original: BhP_11.18.044/1 iti māṃ yaḥ sva-dharmeṇa bhajen nityam ananya-bhāk
analyzed: iti mām yaḥ svadharmeṇa bhajet nityam ananya bhāj

original: BhP_11.18.044/3 sarva-bhūteṣu mad-bhāvo mad-bhaktiṃ vindate dṛḍhām
analyzed: sarva bhūteṣu mad bhāvaḥ mad bhaktim vindate dṛḍhām

original: BhP_11.18.045/1 bhaktyoddhavānapāyinyā sarva-loka-maheśvaram
analyzed: bhaktyā uddhava anapāyinyā sarva loka maheśvaram

original: BhP_11.18.045/3 sarvotpatty-apyayaṃ brahma kāraṇaṃ mopayāti saḥ
analyzed: sarva utpatti apyayam brahma kāraṇam mā upayāti saḥ

original: BhP_11.18.046/1 iti sva-dharma-nirṇikta- sattvo nirjñāta-mad-gatiḥ
analyzed: iti svadharma nirṇikta sattvaḥ nirjñāta mad gatiḥ

original: BhP_11.18.046/3 jñāna-vijñāna-sampanno na cirāt samupaiti mām
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna sampannaḥ na cirāt samupaiti mām

original: BhP_11.18.047/1 varṇāśramavatāṃ dharma eṣa ācāra-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: varṇa āśramavatām dharmaḥ eṣaḥ ācāra lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.18.047/3 sa eva mad-bhakti-yuto niḥśreyasa-karaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva mad bhakti yutaḥ niḥśreyasa karaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_11.18.048/1 etat te 'bhihitaṃ sādho bhavān pṛcchati yac ca mām
analyzed: etat te bhihitam sādho bhavān pṛcchati yat ca mām

original: BhP_11.18.048/3 yathā sva-dharma-saṃyukto bhakto māṃ samiyāt param
analyzed: yathā svadharma saṃyuktaḥ bhaktaḥ mām samiyāt param

original: BhP_11.19.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.19.001/1 yo vidyā-śruta-sampannaḥ ātmavān nānumānikaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vidyā śruta sampannaḥ ātmavān na ānumānikaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.001/3 mayā-mātram idaṃ jñātvā jñānaṃ ca mayi sannyaset
analyzed: idam jñātvā jñānam ca mayi san nyaset

original: BhP_11.19.002/1 jñāninas tv aham eveṣṭaḥ svārtho hetuś ca sammataḥ
analyzed: jñāninaḥ tu aham eva iṣṭaḥ svārthaḥ hetuḥ ca sammataḥ

original: BhP_11.19.002/3 svargaś caivāpavargaś ca nānyo 'rtho mad-ṛte priyaḥ
analyzed: svargaḥ ca eva apavargaḥ ca na anyaḥ rthaḥ mad ṛte priyaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.003/1 jñāna-vijñāna-saṃsiddhāḥ padaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vidur mama
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna saṃsiddhāḥ padam śreṣṭham viduḥ mama

original: BhP_11.19.003/3 jñānī priyatamo 'to me jñānenāsau bibharti mām
analyzed: jñānī me jñānena asau bibharti mām

original: BhP_11.19.004/1 tapas tīrthaṃ japo dānaṃ pavitrāṇītarāṇi ca
analyzed: tapaḥ tīrtham japaḥ dānam pavitrāṇi itarāṇi ca

original: BhP_11.19.004/3 nālaṃ kurvanti tāṃ siddhiṃ yā jñāna-kalayā kṛtā
analyzed: na alam kurvanti tām siddhim yā jñāna kalayā kṛtā

original: BhP_11.19.005/1 tasmāj jñānena sahitaṃ jñātvā svātmānam uddhava
analyzed: tasmāt jñānena sahitam jñātvā svātmānam uddhava

original: BhP_11.19.005/3 jñāna-vijñāna-sampanno bhaja māṃ bhakti-bhāvataḥ
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna sampannaḥ bhaja mām bhakti bhāvataḥ

original: BhP_11.19.006/1 jñāna-vijñāna-yajñena mām iṣṭvātmānam ātmani
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna yajñena mām iṣṭvā ātmānam ātmani

original: BhP_11.19.006/3 sarva-yajña-patiṃ māṃ vai saṃsiddhiṃ munayo 'gaman
analyzed: sarva yajñapatim mām vai saṃsiddhim munayaḥ gaman

original: BhP_11.19.007/1 tvayy uddhavāśrayati yas tri-vidho vikāro
analyzed: tvayi uddhava āśrayati yaḥ trividhaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.007/2 māyāntarāpatati nādy-apavargayor yat
analyzed: māyā antarā āpatati na ādi apavargayoḥ yat

original: BhP_11.19.007/3 janmādayo 'sya yad amī tava tasya kiṃ syur
analyzed: janma ādayaḥ sya yat amī tava tasya kim syuḥ

original: BhP_11.19.007/4 ādy-antayor yad asato 'sti tad eva madhye
analyzed: ādi antayoḥ yat asatoḥ sti tat eva madhye

original: BhP_11.19.008/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.19.008/1 jñānaṃ viśuddhaṃ vipulaṃ yathaitad vairāgya-vijñāna-yutaṃ purāṇam
analyzed: jñānam viśuddham vipulam yathā etat vairāgya vijñāna yutam purāṇam

original: BhP_11.19.008/3 ākhyāhi viśveśvara viśva-mūrte tvad-bhakti-yogaṃ ca mahad-vimṛgyam
analyzed: ākhyāhi viśveśvara viśvamūrte tvad bhakti yogam ca mahat vimṛgyam

original: BhP_11.19.009/1 tāpa-trayeṇābhihatasya ghore santapyamānasya bhavādhvanīśa
analyzed: tāpa trayeṇa abhihatasya ghore santapyamānasya bhava adhvani īśa

original: BhP_11.19.009/3 paśyāmi nānyac charaṇaṃ tavāṅghri- dvandvātapatrād amṛtābhivarṣāt
analyzed: paśyāmi nā anyat śaraṇam tava aṅghri dvandva ātapatrāt amṛta abhivarṣāt

original: BhP_11.19.010/1 daṣṭaṃ janaṃ sampatitaṃ bile 'smin kālāhinā kṣudra-sukhoru-tarṣam
analyzed: daṣṭam janam sampatitam bile smin kāla ahinā kṣudra sukha uru tarṣam

original: BhP_11.19.010/3 samuddharainaṃ kṛpayāpavargyair vacobhir āsiñca mahānubhāva
analyzed: samuddhara enam kṛpayā āpavargyaiḥ vacobhiḥ āsiñca mahā anubhāva

original: BhP_11.19.011/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.19.011/1 ittham etat purā rājā bhīṣmaṃ dharma-bhṛtāṃ varam
analyzed: ittham etat purā rājā bhīṣmam dharma bhṛtām varam

original: BhP_11.19.011/3 ajāta-śatruḥ papraccha sarveṣāṃ no 'nuśṛṇvatām
analyzed: ajātaśatruḥ papraccha sarveṣām naḥ nu śṛṇvatām

original: BhP_11.19.012/1 nivṛtte bhārate yuddhe suhṛn-nidhana-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: nivṛtte bhārate yuddhe suhṛd nidhana vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.012/3 śrutvā dharmān bahūn paścān mokṣa-dharmān apṛcchata
analyzed: śrutvā dharmān bahūn paścāt mokṣa dharmān apṛcchata

original: BhP_11.19.013/1 tān ahaṃ te 'bhidhāsyāmi deva-vrata-makhāc chrutān
analyzed: tān aham te bhidhāsyāmi deva vrata makhāt śrutān

original: BhP_11.19.013/3 jñāna-vairāgya-vijñāna- śraddhā-bhakty-upabṛṃhitān
analyzed: jñāna vairāgya vijñāna śraddhā bhakti

original: BhP_11.19.014/1 navaikādaśa pañca trīn bhāvān bhūteṣu yena vai
analyzed: nava ekādaśa pañca trīn bhāvān bhūteṣu yena vai

original: BhP_11.19.014/3 īkṣetāthāikam apy eṣu taj jñānaṃ mama niścitam
analyzed: api eṣu tat jñānam mama niścitam

original: BhP_11.19.015/1 etad eva hi vijñānaṃ na tathaikena yena yat
analyzed: etat eva hi vijñānam na tathā ekena yena yat

original: BhP_11.19.015/3 sthity-utpatty-apyayān paśyed bhāvānāṃ tri-guṇātmanām
analyzed: sthiti utpatti apyayān paśyet bhāvānām triguṇa ātmanām

original: BhP_11.19.016/1 ādāv ante ca madhye ca sṛjyāt sṛjyaṃ yad anviyāt
analyzed: ādau ante ca madhye ca sṛjyāt sṛjyam yat anviyāt

original: BhP_11.19.016/3 punas tat-pratisaṅkrāme yac chiṣyeta tad eva sat
analyzed: punar tad pratisaṅkrāme yat śiṣyeta tat eva sat

original: BhP_11.19.017/1 śrutiḥ pratyakṣam aitihyam anumānaṃ catuṣṭayam
analyzed: śrutiḥ pratyakṣam aitihyam anumānam catuṣṭayam

original: BhP_11.19.017/3 pramāṇeṣv anavasthānād vikalpāt sa virajyate
analyzed: pramāṇeṣu anavasthānāt vikalpāt sa virajyate

original: BhP_11.19.018/1 karmaṇāṃ pariṇāmitvād ā-viriñcyād amaṅgalam
analyzed: karmaṇām pariṇāmi tvāt ā viriñcyāt amaṅgalam

original: BhP_11.19.018/3 vipaścin naśvaraṃ paśyed adṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭa-vat
analyzed: vipaścit naśvaram paśyet adṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭa vat

original: BhP_11.19.019/1 bhakti-yogaḥ puraivoktaḥ prīyamāṇāya te 'nagha
analyzed: bhakti yogaḥ purā eva uktaḥ prīyamāṇāya te nagha

original: BhP_11.19.019/3 punaś ca kathayiṣyāmi mad-bhakteḥ kāraṇaṃ paraṃ
analyzed: punar ca kathayiṣyāmi mad bhakteḥ kāraṇam param

original: BhP_11.19.020/1 śraddhāmṛta-kathāyāṃ me śaśvan mad-anukīrtanam
analyzed: śraddhā amṛta kathāyām me śaśvat mad anukīrtanam

original: BhP_11.19.020/3 pariniṣṭhā ca pūjāyāṃ stutibhiḥ stavanaṃ mama
analyzed: pariniṣṭhā ca pūjāyām stutibhiḥ stavanam mama

original: BhP_11.19.021/1 ādaraḥ paricaryāyāṃ sarvāṅgair abhivandanam
analyzed: ādaraḥ paricaryāyām sarva aṅgaiḥ abhivandanam

original: BhP_11.19.021/3 mad-bhakta-pūjābhyadhikā sarva-bhūteṣu man-matiḥ
analyzed: mad bhakta pūjā abhyadhikā sarva bhūteṣu mad matiḥ

original: BhP_11.19.022/1 mad-artheṣv aṅga-ceṣṭā ca vacasā mad-guṇeraṇam
analyzed: mad artheṣu aṅga ceṣṭā ca vacasā mad guṇa īraṇam

original: BhP_11.19.022/3 mayy arpaṇaṃ ca manasaḥ sarva-kāma-vivarjanam
analyzed: mayi arpaṇam ca manasaḥ sarva kāma vivarjanam

original: BhP_11.19.023/1 mad-arthe 'rtha-parityāgo bhogasya ca sukhasya ca
analyzed: mad arthe ṛtha parityāgaḥ bhogasya ca sukhasya ca

original: BhP_11.19.023/3 iṣṭaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ mad-arthaṃ yad vrataṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: iṣṭam dattam hutam japtam mad artham yat vratam tapaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.024/1 evaṃ dharmair manuṣyāṇām uddhavātma-nivedinām
analyzed: evam dharmaiḥ manuṣyāṇām uddhava ātma nivedinām

original: BhP_11.19.024/3 mayi sañjāyate bhaktiḥ ko 'nyo 'rtho 'syāvaśiṣyate
analyzed: mayi sañjāyate bhaktiḥ kaḥ sya avaśiṣyate

original: BhP_11.19.025/1 yadātmany arpitaṃ cittaṃ śāntaṃ sattvopabṛṃhitam
analyzed: yadā ātmani arpitam cittam śāntam sattva upabṛṃhitam

original: BhP_11.19.025/3 dharmaṃ jñānaṃ sa vairāgyam aiśvaryaṃ cābhipadyate
analyzed: dharmam jñānam sa vairāgyam aiśvaryam ca abhipadyate

original: BhP_11.19.026/1 yad arpitaṃ tad vikalpe indriyaiḥ paridhāvati
analyzed: yat arpitam tat vikalpe indriyaiḥ paridhāvati

original: BhP_11.19.026/3 rajas-valaṃ cāsan-niṣṭhaṃ cittaṃ viddhi viparyayam
analyzed: rajasvalam ca asat niṣṭham cittam viddhi viparyayam

original: BhP_11.19.027/1 dharmo mad-bhakti-kṛt prokto jñānaṃ caikātmya-darśanam
analyzed: dharmaḥ mad bhakti kṛt proktaḥ jñānam ca aikātmya darśanam

original: BhP_11.19.027/3 guṇesv asaṅgo vairāgyam aiśvaryaṃ cāṇimādayaḥ
analyzed: guṇesu asaṅgaḥ vairāgyam aiśvaryam ca aṇima ādayaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.028/1 śrī-uddhava uvāca yamaḥ kati-vidhaḥ prokto
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca yamaḥ katividhaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.028/3 niyamo vāri-karṣaṇa kaḥ śamaḥ ko damaḥ kṛṣṇa
analyzed: niyamaḥ vā arikarṣaṇa kaḥ śamaḥ kaḥ damaḥ kṛṣṇa

original: BhP_11.19.029/1 kā titikṣā dhṛtiḥ prabho kiṃ dānaṃ kiṃ tapaḥ śauryaṃ
analyzed: kā titikṣā dhṛtiḥ prabho kim dānam kim tapaḥ śauryam

original: BhP_11.19.029/3 kim satyam ṛtam ucyate kas tyāgaḥ kiṃ dhanaṃ ceṣṭaṃ
analyzed: kim satyam ṛtam ucyate kaḥ tyāgaḥ kim dhanam ca iṣṭam

original: BhP_11.19.030/1 ko yajñaḥ kā ca dakṣiṇā puṃsaḥ kiṃ svid balaṃ śrīman
analyzed: kaḥ yajñaḥ kā ca dakṣiṇā puṃsaḥ kim svid balam śrīman

original: BhP_11.19.030/3 bhago lābhaś ca keśava kā vidyā hrīḥ parā kā śrīḥ
analyzed: bhagaḥ lābhaḥ ca keśava kā vidyā hrīḥ parā kā śrīḥ

original: BhP_11.19.031/1 kiṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham eva ca kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ kaś ca mūrkhaḥ
analyzed: kim sukham duḥkham eva ca kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ kaḥ ca mūrkhaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.031/3 kaḥ panthā utpathaś ca kaḥ kaḥ svargo narakaḥ kaḥ svit
analyzed: kaḥ panthāḥ utpathaḥ ca kaḥ kaḥ svargaḥ narakaḥ kaḥ svid

original: BhP_11.19.032/1 ko bandhur uta kiṃ gṛham ka āḍhyaḥ ko daridro vā
analyzed: kaḥ bandhuḥ uta kim gṛham kaḥ āḍhyaḥ kaḥ daridraḥ vā

original: BhP_11.19.032/3 kṛpaṇaḥ kaḥ ka īśvaraḥ etān praśnān mama brūhi
analyzed: kṛpaṇaḥ kaḥ kaḥ īśvaraḥ etān praśnān mama brūhi

original: BhP_11.19.032/5 viparītāṃś ca sat-pate śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: viparītān ca satpate śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.19.033/1 ahiṃsā satyam asteyam asaṅgo hrīr asañcayaḥ
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam asteyam a saṅgaḥ hrīḥ a sañcayaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.033/3 āstikyaṃ brahmacaryaṃ ca maunaṃ sthairyaṃ kṣamābhayam
analyzed: āstikyam brahmacaryam ca maunam sthairyam kṣamā abhayam

original: BhP_11.19.034/1 śaucaṃ japas tapo homaḥ śraddhātithyaṃ mad-arcanam
analyzed: śaucam japaḥ tapaḥ homaḥ śraddhā ātithyam mad arcanam

original: BhP_11.19.034/3 tīrthāṭanaṃ parārthehā tuṣṭir ācārya-sevanam
analyzed: tīrtha aṭanam parārtha īhā tuṣṭiḥ ācārya sevanam

original: BhP_11.19.035/1 ete yamāḥ sa-niyamā ubhayor dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
analyzed: ete yamāḥ sa niyamāḥ ubhayoḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ

original: BhP_11.19.035/3 puṃsām upāsitās tāta yathā-kāmaṃ duhanti hi
analyzed: puṃsām upāsitāḥ tāta yathākāmam duhanti hi

original: BhP_11.19.036/1 śamo man-niṣṭhatā buddher dama indriya-saṃyamaḥ
analyzed: śamaḥ manniṣṭha tā buddheḥ damaḥ indriya saṃyamaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.036/3 titikṣā duḥkha-sammarṣo jihvopastha-jayo dhṛtiḥ
BhP_11.19.037/1 daṇḍa-nyāsaḥ paraṃ dānaṃ kāma-tyāgas tapaḥ smṛtam
BhP_11.19.037/3 svabhāva-vijayaḥ śauryaṃ satyaṃ ca sama-darśanam
analyzed: svabhāva vijayaḥ śauryam satyam ca sama darśanam

original: BhP_11.19.038/1 anyac ca sunṛtā vāṇī kavibhiḥ parikīrtitā
analyzed: anyat ca su nṛtā vāṇī kavibhiḥ parikīrtitā

original: BhP_11.19.038/3 karmasv asaṅgamaḥ śaucaṃ tyāgaḥ sannyāsa ucyate
analyzed: karmasu asaṅgamaḥ śaucam tyāgaḥ sannyāsaḥ ucyate
