original: BhP_11.19.039/1 dharma iṣṭaṃ dhanaṃ nṝṇāṃ yajño 'haṃ bhagavattamaḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ iṣṭam dhanam nṝṇām yajñaḥ haṃ bhagavattamaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.039/3 dakṣiṇā jñāna-sandeśaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ paraṃ balam
BhP_11.19.040/1 bhago ma aiśvaro bhāvo lābho mad-bhaktir uttamaḥ
analyzed: bhagaḥ me aiśvaraḥ bhāvaḥ lābhaḥ mad bhaktiḥ uttamaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.040/3 vidyātmani bhidā-bādho jugupsā hrīr akarmasu
analyzed: vidyā ātmani bhidā abādhaḥ jugupsā hrīḥ a karmasu

original: BhP_11.19.041/1 śrīr guṇā nairapekṣyādyāḥ sukhaṃ duḥkha-sukhātyayaḥ
analyzed: śrīḥ guṇāḥ nairapekṣya ādyāḥ sukham duḥkha sukha atyayaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.041/3 duḥkhaṃ kāma-sukhāpekṣā paṇḍito bandha-mokṣa-vit
analyzed: duḥkham kāma sukha apekṣā paṇḍitaḥ bandha mokṣa vid

original: BhP_11.19.042/1 mūrkho dehādy-ahaṃ-buddhiḥ panthā man-nigamaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: mūrkhaḥ deha ādi aham buddhiḥ panthāḥ mad nigamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.042/3 utpathaś citta-vikṣepaḥ svargaḥ sattva-guṇodayaḥ
BhP_11.19.043/1 narakas tama-unnāho bandhur gurur ahaṃ sakhe
analyzed: narakaḥ bandhuḥ guruḥ aham sakhe

original: BhP_11.19.043/3 gṛhaṃ śarīraṃ mānuṣyaṃ guṇāḍhyo hy āḍhya ucyate
analyzed: gṛham śarīram mānuṣyam guṇa āḍhyaḥ hi āḍhyaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_11.19.044/1 daridro yas tv asantuṣṭaḥ kṛpaṇo yo 'jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: daridraḥ yaḥ tu asantuṣṭaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ yaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.044/3 guṇeṣv asakta-dhīr īśo guṇa-saṅgo viparyayaḥ
analyzed: guṇeṣu asakta dhīḥ īśaḥ guṇa saṅgaḥ viparyayaḥ

original: BhP_11.19.045/1 eta uddhava te praśnāḥ sarve sādhu nirūpitāḥ
analyzed: ete uddhava te praśnāḥ sarve sādhu nirūpitāḥ

original: BhP_11.19.045/3 kiṃ varṇitena bahunā lakṣaṇaṃ guṇa-doṣayoḥ
analyzed: kim varṇitena bahunā lakṣaṇam guṇa doṣayoḥ

original: BhP_11.19.045/5 guṇa-doṣa-dṛśir doṣo guṇas tūbhaya-varjitaḥ
analyzed: guṇa doṣa dṛśiḥ doṣaḥ guṇaḥ tu ubhaya varjitaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.20.001/1 vidhiś ca pratiṣedhaś ca nigamo hīśvarasya te
analyzed: vidhiḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ ca nigamaḥ hi īśvarasya te

original: BhP_11.20.001/3 avekṣate 'raviṇḍākṣa guṇaṃ doṣaṃ ca karmaṇām
analyzed: avekṣate raviṇḍa akṣa guṇam doṣam ca karmaṇām

original: BhP_11.20.002/1 varṇāśrama-vikalpaṃ ca pratilomānulomajam
analyzed: varṇa āśrama vikalpam ca pratiloma anuloma jam

original: BhP_11.20.002/3 dravya-deśa-vayaḥ-kālān svargaṃ narakam eva ca
analyzed: dravya deśa vayaḥ kālān svargam narakam eva ca

original: BhP_11.20.003/1 guṇa-doṣa-bhidā-dṛṣṭim antareṇa vacas tava
analyzed: guṇa doṣa bhidā dṛṣṭim antareṇa vacaḥ tava

original: BhP_11.20.003/3 niḥśreyasaṃ kathaṃ nṝṇāṃ niṣedha-vidhi-lakṣaṇam
analyzed: niḥśreyasam katham nṝṇām niṣedha vidhi lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_11.20.004/1 pitṛ-deva-manuṣyānāṃ vedaś cakṣus taveśvara
analyzed: pitṛ deva manuṣyānām vedaḥ cakṣuḥ tava īśvara

original: BhP_11.20.004/3 śreyas tv anupalabdhe 'rthe sādhya-sādhanayor api
analyzed: śreyaḥ tu anupalabdhe rthe sādhya sādhanayoḥ api

original: BhP_11.20.005/1 guṇa-doṣa-bhidā-dṛṣṭir nigamāt te na hi svataḥ
analyzed: guṇa doṣa bhidā dṛṣṭiḥ nigamāt te na hi svatas

original: BhP_11.20.005/3 nigamenāpavādaś ca bhidāyā iti ha bhramaḥ
analyzed: nigamena apavādaḥ ca bhidāyāḥ iti ha bhramaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.006/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.20.006/1 yogās trayo mayā proktā nṝṇāṃ śreyo-vidhitsayā
analyzed: yogāḥ trayaḥ mayā proktāḥ nṝṇām śreyaḥ vidhitsayā

original: BhP_11.20.006/3 jñānaṃ karma ca bhaktiś ca nopāyo 'nyo 'sti kutracit
analyzed: jñānam karma ca bhaktiḥ ca na upāyaḥ kutracid

original: BhP_11.20.007/1 nirviṇṇānāṃ jñāna-yogo nyāsinām iha karmasu
analyzed: nirviṇṇānām jñāna yogaḥ nyāsinām iha karmasu

original: BhP_11.20.007/3 teṣv anirviṇṇa-cittānāṃ karma-yogas tu kāminām
analyzed: teṣu anirviṇṇa cittānām karma yogaḥ tu kāminām

original: BhP_11.20.008/1 yadṛcchayā mat-kathādau jāta-śraddhas tu yaḥ pumān
BhP_11.20.008/3 na nirviṇṇo nāti-sakto bhakti-yogo 'sya siddhi-daḥ
analyzed: na nirviṇṇaḥ na atisaktaḥ bhakti yogaḥ siddhi daḥ

original: BhP_11.20.009/1 tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā
analyzed: tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā

original: BhP_11.20.009/3 mat-kathā-śravaṇādau vā śraddhā yāvan na jāyate
analyzed: mad kathā śravaṇa ādau vā śraddhā yāvat na jāyate

original: BhP_11.20.010/1 sva-dharma-stho yajan yajñair anāśīḥ-kāma uddhava
analyzed: svadharma sthaḥ yajan yajñaiḥ anāśīḥkāmaḥ uddhava

original: BhP_11.20.010/3 na yāti svarga-narakau yady anyan na samācaret
analyzed: na yāti svarga narakau yadi anyat na samācaret

original: BhP_11.20.011/1 asmiṃl loke vartamānaḥ sva-dharma-stho 'naghaḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: asmin loke vartamānaḥ svadharma sthaḥ naghaḥ śuciḥ

original: BhP_11.20.011/3 jñānaṃ viśuddham āpnoti mad-bhaktiṃ vā yadṛcchayā
analyzed: jñānam viśuddham āpnoti mad bhaktim vā yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_11.20.012/1 svargiṇo 'py etam icchanti lokaṃ nirayiṇas tathā
analyzed: svargiṇaḥ pi etam icchanti lokam nirayiṇaḥ tathā

original: BhP_11.20.012/3 sādhakaṃ jñāna-bhaktibhyām ubhayaṃ tad-asādhakam
BhP_11.20.013/1 na naraḥ svar-gatiṃ kāṅkṣen nārakīṃ vā vicakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: na naraḥ svar gatim kāṅkṣet nārakīm vā vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.013/3 nemaṃ lokaṃ ca kāṅkṣeta dehāveśāt pramādyati
analyzed: na imam lokam ca kāṅkṣeta deha āveśāt pramādyati

original: BhP_11.20.014/1 etad vidvān purā mṛtyor abhavāya ghaṭeta saḥ
analyzed: etat vidvān purā mṛtyoḥ abhavāya ghaṭeta saḥ

original: BhP_11.20.014/3 apramatta idaṃ jñātvā martyam apy artha-siddhi-dam
analyzed: apramattaḥ idam jñātvā martyam api artha siddhi dam

original: BhP_11.20.015/1 chidyamānaṃ yamair etaiḥ kṛta-nīḍaṃ vanaspatim
analyzed: chidyamānam yamaiḥ etaiḥ kṛta nīḍam vanaspatim

original: BhP_11.20.015/3 khagaḥ sva-ketam utsṛjya kṣemaṃ yāti hy alampaṭaḥ
analyzed: khagaḥ sva ketam utsṛjya kṣemam yāti hi alampaṭaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.016/1 aho-rātraiś chidyamānaṃ buddhvāyur bhaya-vepathuḥ
analyzed: ahorātraiḥ chidyamānam buddhvā āyuḥ bhaya vepathuḥ

original: BhP_11.20.016/3 mukta-saṅgaḥ paraṃ buddhvā nirīha upaśāmyati
analyzed: mukta saṅgaḥ param buddhvā nirīhaḥ upaśāmyati

original: BhP_11.20.017/1 nṛ-deham ādyaṃ su-labhaṃ su-durlabhaṃ
analyzed: nṛ deham ādyam sulabham su durlabham

original: BhP_11.20.017/2 plavaṃ su-kalpaṃ guru-karṇadhāram
analyzed: plavam su kalpam guru karṇadhāram

original: BhP_11.20.017/3 mayānukūlena nabhasvateritaṃ
analyzed: mayā anukūlena nabhasvatā īritam

original: BhP_11.20.017/4 pumān bhavābdhiṃ na taret sa ātma-hā
analyzed: pumān bhava abdhim na taret saḥ ātma hā

original: BhP_11.20.018/1 yadārambheṣu nirviṇṇo viraktaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: yadā ārambheṣu nirviṇṇaḥ viraktaḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.018/3 abhyāsenātmano yogī dhārayed acalaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: abhyāsena ātmanaḥ yogī dhārayet acalam manaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.019/1 dhāryamāṇaṃ mano yarhi bhrāmyad aśv anavasthitam
analyzed: dhāryamāṇam manaḥ yarhi bhrāmyat aśu anavasthitam

original: BhP_11.20.019/3 atandrito 'nurodhena mārgeṇātma-vaśaṃ nayet
analyzed: atandritaḥ nurodhena mārgeṇa ātma vaśam nayet

original: BhP_11.20.020/1 mano-gatiṃ na visṛjej jita-prāṇo jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: manogatim na visṛjet jita prāṇaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.020/3 sattva-sampannayā buddhyā mana ātma-vaśaṃ nayet
analyzed: sattva sampannayā buddhyā manaḥ ātma vaśam nayet

original: BhP_11.20.021/1 eṣa vai paramo yogo manasaḥ saṅgrahaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: eṣa vai paramaḥ yogaḥ manasaḥ saṅgrahaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.021/3 hṛdaya-jñatvam anvicchan damyasyevārvato muhuḥ
analyzed: hṛdaya jña tvam anvicchan damyasya iva arvataḥ muhur

original: BhP_11.20.022/1 sāṅkhyena sarva-bhāvānāṃ pratilomānulomataḥ
analyzed: sāṅkhyena sarva bhāvānām pratiloma anulomataḥ

original: BhP_11.20.022/3 bhavāpyayāv anudhyāyen mano yāvat prasīdati
analyzed: bhava apyayau anudhyāyet manaḥ yāvat prasīdati

original: BhP_11.20.023/1 nirviṇṇasya viraktasya puruṣasyokta-vedinaḥ
analyzed: nirviṇṇasya viraktasya puruṣasya ukta vedinaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.023/3 manas tyajati daurātmyaṃ cintitasyānucintayā
analyzed: manaḥ tyajati daurātmyam cintitasya anucintayā

original: BhP_11.20.024/1 yamādibhir yoga-pathair ānvīkṣikyā ca vidyayā
analyzed: yama ādibhiḥ yoga pathaiḥ ānvīkṣikyā ca vidyayā

original: BhP_11.20.024/3 mamārcopāsanābhir vā nānyair yogyaṃ smaren manaḥ
analyzed: mama arcā upāsanābhiḥ vā na anyaiḥ yogyam smaret manaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.025/1 yadi kuryāt pramādena yogī karma vigarhitam
analyzed: yadi kuryāt pramādena yogī karma vigarhitam

original: BhP_11.20.025/3 yogenaiva dahed aṃho nānyat tatra kadācana
analyzed: yogena eva dahet aṃhaḥ na anyat tatra kadācana

original: BhP_11.20.026/1 sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sa guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
analyzed: sve sve dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sa guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.026/3 karmaṇāṃ jāty-aśuddhānām anena niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇām jāti aśuddhānām anena niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.026/5 guṇa-doṣa-vidhānena saṅgānāṃ tyājanecchayā
analyzed: guṇa doṣa vidhānena saṅgānām tyājana icchayā

original: BhP_11.20.027/1 jāta-śraddho mat-kathāsu nirviṇṇaḥ sarva-karmasu
analyzed: jāta śraddhaḥ mad kathāsu nirviṇṇaḥ sarva karmasu

original: BhP_11.20.027/3 veda duḥkhātmakān kāmān parityāge 'py anīśvaraḥ
analyzed: veda duḥkha ātmakān kāmān parityāge pi anīśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.20.028/1 tato bhajeta māṃ prītaḥ śraddhālur dṛḍha-niścayaḥ
analyzed: tatas bhajeta mām prītaḥ śraddhāluḥ dṛḍha niścayaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.028/3 juṣamāṇaś ca tān kāmān duḥkhodarkāṃś ca garhayan
analyzed: juṣamāṇaḥ ca tān kāmān duḥkha udarkān ca garhayan

original: BhP_11.20.029/1 proktena bhakti-yogena bhajato māsakṛn muneḥ
analyzed: proktena bhakti yogena bhajataḥ mā asakṛt muneḥ

original: BhP_11.20.029/3 kāmā hṛdayyā naśyanti sarve mayi hṛdi sthite
analyzed: kāmāḥ hṛdayyāḥ naśyanti sarve mayi hṛdi sthite

original: BhP_11.20.030/1 bhidyate hṛdaya-granthiś chidyante sarva-saṃśayāḥ
analyzed: bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṃśayāḥ

original: BhP_11.20.030/3 kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi mayi dṛṣṭe 'khilātmani
analyzed: kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi mayi dṛṣṭe khilātmani

original: BhP_11.20.031/1 tasmān mad-bhakti-yuktasya yogino vai mad-ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt mad bhakti yuktasya yoginaḥ vai mad ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.031/3 na jñānaṃ na ca vairāgyaṃ prāyaḥ śreyo bhaved iha
analyzed: na jñānam na ca vairāgyam prāyas śreyaḥ bhavet iha

original: BhP_11.20.032/1 yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat
analyzed: yat karmabhiḥ yat tapasā jñāna vairāgyataḥ ca yat

original: BhP_11.20.032/3 yogena dāna-dharmeṇa śreyobhir itarair api
analyzed: yogena dāna dharmeṇa śreyobhiḥ itaraiḥ api

original: BhP_11.20.033/1 sarvaṃ mad-bhakti-yogena mad-bhakto labhate 'ñjasā
analyzed: sarvam mad bhakti yogena mad bhaktaḥ labhate ñjasā

original: BhP_11.20.033/3 svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati
analyzed: svarga apavargam mad dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati

original: BhP_11.20.034/1 na kiñcit sādhavo dhīrā bhaktā hy ekāntino mama
analyzed: na kiñcid sādhavaḥ dhīrāḥ bhaktāḥ hi ekāntinaḥ mama

original: BhP_11.20.034/3 vāñchanty api mayā dattaṃ kaivalyam apunar-bhavam
analyzed: vāñchanti api mayā dattam kaivalyam apunarbhavam

original: BhP_11.20.035/1 nairapekṣyaṃ paraṃ prāhur niḥśreyasam analpakam
analyzed: nairapekṣyam param prāhuḥ niḥśreyasam analpakam

original: BhP_11.20.035/3 tasmān nirāśiṣo bhaktir nirapekṣasya me bhavet
analyzed: tasmāt bhaktiḥ nirapekṣasya me bhavet

original: BhP_11.20.036/1 na mayy ekānta-bhaktānāṃ guṇa-doṣodbhavā guṇāḥ
analyzed: na mayi ekānta bhaktānām guṇa doṣa udbhavāḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.20.036/3 sādhūnāṃ sama-cittānāṃ buddheḥ param upeyuṣām
analyzed: sādhūnām samacittānām buddheḥ param upeyuṣām

original: BhP_11.20.037/1 evam etān mayā diṣṭān anutiṣṭhanti me pathaḥ
analyzed: evam etān mayā diṣṭān anutiṣṭhanti me pathaḥ

original: BhP_11.20.037/3 kṣemaṃ vindanti mat-sthānaṃ yad brahma paramaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: kṣemam vindanti mat sthānam yat brahma paramam viduḥ

original: BhP_11.21.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.21.001/1 ya etān mat-patho hitvā bhakti-jñāna-kriyātmakān
analyzed: yaḥ etān mad pathaḥ hitvā bhakti jñāna kriyā ātmakān

original: BhP_11.21.001/3 kṣudrān kāmāṃś calaiḥ prāṇair juṣantaḥ saṃsaranti te
analyzed: kṣudrān kāmān calaiḥ prāṇaiḥ juṣantaḥ saṃsaranti te

original: BhP_11.21.002/1 sve sve 'dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sa guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
analyzed: sve sve dhikāre yā niṣṭhā sa guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.002/3 viparyayas tu doṣaḥ syād ubhayor eṣa niścayaḥ
analyzed: viparyayaḥ tu doṣaḥ syāt ubhayoḥ eṣa niścayaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.003/1 śuddhy-aśuddhī vidhīyete samāneṣv api vastuṣu
analyzed: śuddhi aśuddhī vidhīyete samāneṣu api vastubhiḥ

original: BhP_11.21.003/3 dravyasya vicikitsārthaṃ guṇa-doṣau śubhāśubhau
analyzed: dravyasya vicikitsā artham guṇa doṣau śubha aśubhau

original: BhP_11.21.003/5 dharmārthaṃ vyavahārārthaṃ yātrārtham iti cānagha
analyzed: dharma artham vyavahāra artham yātrā artham iti ca anagha

original: BhP_11.21.004/1 darśito 'yaṃ mayācāro
analyzed: darśitaḥ yam mayā ācāraḥ

original: BhP_11.21.004/2 dharmam udvahatāṃ dhuram
analyzed: dharmam udvahatām dhuram

original: BhP_11.21.005/1 bhūmy-ambv-agny-anilākāśā bhūtānāṃ pañca-dhātavaḥ
analyzed: bhūmi ambu agni anila ākāśāḥ bhūtānām pañca dhātavaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.005/3 ā-brahma-sthāvarādīnāṃ śārīrā ātma-saṃyutāḥ
analyzed: ā brahma sthāvara ādīnām śārīrāḥ ātma saṃyutāḥ

original: BhP_11.21.006/1 vedena nāma-rūpāṇi viṣamāṇi sameṣv api
analyzed: vedena nāma rūpāṇi viṣamāṇi sameṣu api

original: BhP_11.21.006/3 dhātuṣūddhava kalpyanta eteṣāṃ svārtha-siddhaye
analyzed: dhātuṣu uddhava kalpyante eteṣām sva artha siddhaye

original: BhP_11.21.007/1 deśa-kālādi-bhāvānāṃ vastūnāṃ mama sattama
analyzed: deśa kāla ādi bhāvānām vastūnām mama sattama

original: BhP_11.21.007/3 guṇa-doṣau vidhīyete niyamārthaṃ hi karmaṇām
analyzed: guṇa doṣau vidhīyete niyama artham hi karmaṇām

original: BhP_11.21.008/1 akṛṣṇa-sāro deśānām abrahmaṇyo 'sucir bhavet
analyzed: a kṛṣṇa sāraḥ deśānām a brahmaṇyaḥ suciḥ bhavet

original: BhP_11.21.008/3 kṛṣṇa-sāro 'py asauvīra- kīkaṭāsaṃskṛteriṇam
BhP_11.21.009/1 karmaṇyo guṇavān kālo dravyataḥ svata eva vā
analyzed: karmaṇyaḥ guṇavān kālaḥ dravyataḥ svatas eva vā

original: BhP_11.21.009/3 yato nivartate karma sa doṣo 'karmakaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: yatas nivartate karma sa doṣaḥ karmakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.010/1 dravyasya śuddhy-aśuddhī ca dravyeṇa vacanena ca
analyzed: dravyasya śuddhi aśuddhī ca dravyeṇa vacanena ca

original: BhP_11.21.010/3 saṃskāreṇātha kālena mahatvālpatayātha vā
analyzed: saṃskāreṇa atha kālena mahatva alpatayā atha vā

original: BhP_11.21.011/1 śaktyāśaktyātha vā buddhyā samṛddhyā ca yad ātmane
analyzed: śaktyā aśaktyā atha vā buddhyā samṛddhyā ca yat ātmane

original: BhP_11.21.011/3 aghaṃ kurvanti hi yathā deśāvasthānusārataḥ
analyzed: agham kurvanti hi yathā deśa avasthā anusārataḥ

original: BhP_11.21.012/1 dhānya-dārv-asthi-tantūnāṃ rasa-taijasa-carmaṇām
analyzed: dhānya dāru asthi tantūnām rasa taijasa carmaṇām

original: BhP_11.21.012/3 kāla-vāyv-agni-mṛt-toyaiḥ pārthivānāṃ yutāyutaiḥ
analyzed: kāla vāyu agni mṛd toyaiḥ pārthivānām yuta ayutaiḥ

original: BhP_11.21.013/1 amedhya-liptaṃ yad yena gandha-lepaṃ vyapohati
analyzed: amedhya liptam yat yena gandha lepam vyapohati

original: BhP_11.21.013/3 bhajate prakṛtiṃ tasya tac chaucaṃ tāvad iṣyate
analyzed: bhajate prakṛtim tasya tat śaucam tāvat iṣyate

original: BhP_11.21.014/1 snāna-dāna-tapo-'vasthā- vīrya-saṃskāra-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: snāna dāna tapaḥ vasthāḥ vīrya saṃskāra karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.21.014/3 mat-smṛtyā cātmanaḥ śaucaṃ śuddhaḥ karmācared dvijaḥ
analyzed: mad smṛtyā ca ātmanaḥ śaucam śuddhaḥ karma ācaret dvijaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.015/1 mantrasya ca parijñānaṃ karma-śuddhir mad-arpaṇam
analyzed: mantrasya ca parijñānam karma śuddhiḥ mad arpaṇam

original: BhP_11.21.015/3 dharmaḥ sampadyate ṣaḍbhir adharmas tu viparyayaḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ sampadyate ṣaḍbhiḥ adharmaḥ tu viparyayaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.016/1 kvacid guṇo 'pi doṣaḥ syād doṣo 'pi vidhinā guṇaḥ
analyzed: kvacid guṇaḥ u pi doṣaḥ syāt doṣaḥ u pi vidhinā guṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.016/3 guṇa-doṣārtha-niyamas tad-bhidām eva bādhate
analyzed: eva bādhate

original: BhP_11.21.017/1 samāna-karmācaraṇaṃ patitānāṃ na pātakam
analyzed: samāna karma ācaraṇam patitānām na pātakam

original: BhP_11.21.017/3 autpattiko guṇaḥ saṅgo na śayānaḥ pataty adhaḥ
analyzed: autpattikaḥ guṇaḥ saṅgaḥ na śayānaḥ patati adhas

original: BhP_11.21.018/1 yato yato nivarteta vimucyeta tatas tataḥ
analyzed: yatas yatas nivarteta vimucyeta tatas tatas

original: BhP_11.21.018/3 eṣa dharmo nṛṇāṃ kṣemaḥ śoka-moha-bhayāpahaḥ
analyzed: eṣa dharmaḥ nṛṇām kṣemaḥ śoka moha bhaya apahaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.019/1 viṣayeṣu guṇādhyāsāt puṃsaḥ saṅgas tato bhavet
analyzed: viṣayeṣu guṇa adhyāsāt puṃsaḥ saṅgaḥ tatas bhavet

original: BhP_11.21.019/3 saṅgāt tatra bhavet kāmaḥ kāmād eva kalir nṛṇām
analyzed: saṅgāt tatra bhavet kāmaḥ kāmāt eva kaliḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.21.020/1 kaler durviṣahaḥ krodhas tamas tam anuvartate
analyzed: kaleḥ durviṣahaḥ krodhaḥ tamaḥ tam anuvartate

original: BhP_11.21.020/3 tamasā grasyate puṃsaś cetanā vyāpinī drutam
analyzed: tamasā grasyate puṃsaḥ cetanā vyāpinī drutam

original: BhP_11.21.021/1 tayā virahitaḥ sādho jantuḥ śūnyāya kalpate
analyzed: tayā virahitaḥ sādho jantuḥ śūnyāya kalpate

original: BhP_11.21.021/3 tato 'sya svārtha-vibhraṃśo mūrcchitasya mṛtasya ca
analyzed: sva artha vibhraṃśaḥ mūrcchitasya mṛtasya ca

original: BhP_11.21.022/1 viṣayābhiniveśena nātmānaṃ veda nāparam
analyzed: viṣaya abhiniveśena na ātmānam veda na aparam

original: BhP_11.21.022/3 vṛkṣa jīvikayā jīvan vyarthaṃ bhastreva yaḥ śvasan
analyzed: vṛkṣa jīvikayā jīvan vyartham bhastrā iva yaḥ śvasan

original: BhP_11.21.023/1 phala-śrutir iyaṃ nṝṇāṃ na śreyo rocanaṃ param
analyzed: phala śrutiḥ iyam nṝṇām na śreyaḥ rocanam param

original: BhP_11.21.023/3 śreyo-vivakṣayā proktaṃ yathā bhaiṣajya-rocanam
analyzed: śreyaḥ vivakṣayā proktam yathā bhaiṣajyarocanam

original: BhP_11.21.024/1 utpattyaiva hi kāmeṣu prāṇeṣu sva-janeṣu ca
analyzed: utpattyā eva hi kāmeṣu prāṇeṣu sva janeṣu ca

original: BhP_11.21.024/3 āsakta-manaso martyā ātmano 'nartha-hetuṣu
analyzed: āsakta manasaḥ martyāḥ ātmanaḥ nartha hetuṣu

original: BhP_11.21.025/1 natān aviduṣaḥ svārthaṃ bhrāmyato vṛjinādhvani
analyzed: natān a viduṣaḥ sva artham bhrāmyataḥ vṛjina adhvani

original: BhP_11.21.025/3 kathaṃ yuñjyāt punas teṣu tāṃs tamo viśato budhaḥ
analyzed: katham yuñjyāt punar teṣu tān tamaḥ viśataḥ budhaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.026/1 evaṃ vyavasitaṃ kecid avijñāya kubuddhayaḥ
analyzed: evam vyavasitam kecid a vijñāya ku buddhayaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.026/3 phala-śrutiṃ kusumitāṃ na veda-jñā vadanti hi
analyzed: phala śrutim kusumitām na veda jñāḥ vadanti hi

original: BhP_11.21.027/1 kāminaḥ kṛpaṇā lubdhāḥ puṣpeṣu phala-buddhayaḥ
analyzed: kāminaḥ kṛpaṇāḥ lubdhāḥ puṣpeṣu phala buddhayaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.027/3 agni-mugdhā dhūma-tāntāḥ svaṃ lokaṃ na vidanti te
analyzed: agni mugdhāḥ dhūma tāntāḥ svam lokam na vidanti te

original: BhP_11.21.028/1 na te mām aṅga jānanti hṛdi-sthaṃ ya idaṃ yataḥ
analyzed: na te mām aṅga jānanti hṛdistham yaḥ idam yatas

original: BhP_11.21.028/3 uktha-śastrā hy asu-tṛpo yathā nīhāra-cakṣuṣaḥ
analyzed: uktha śastrāḥ hi asutṛpaḥ yathā nīhāra cakṣuṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.029/1 te me matam avijñāya parokṣaṃ viṣayātmakāḥ
analyzed: te me matam a vijñāya parokṣam viṣaya ātmakāḥ

original: BhP_11.21.029/3 hiṃsāyāṃ yadi rāgaḥ syād yajña eva na codanā
analyzed: hiṃsāyām yadi rāgaḥ syāt yajñaḥ eva na codanā

original: BhP_11.21.030/1 hiṃsā-vihārā hy ālabdhaiḥ paśubhiḥ sva-sukhecchayā
analyzed: hiṃsā vihārāḥ hi ālabdhaiḥ paśubhiḥ sva sukha icchayā

original: BhP_11.21.030/3 yajante devatā yajñaiḥ pitṛ-bhūta-patīn khalāḥ
analyzed: yajante devatāḥ yajñaiḥ pitṛ bhūta patīn khalāḥ

original: BhP_11.21.031/1 svapnopamam amuṃ lokam asantaṃ śravaṇa-priyam
analyzed: svapna upamam amum lokam asantam śravaṇa priyam

original: BhP_11.21.031/3 āśiṣo hṛdi saṅkalpya tyajanty arthān yathā vaṇik
analyzed: āśiṣaḥ hṛdi saṅkalpya tyajantī arthān yathā vaṇij

original: BhP_11.21.032/1 rajaḥ-sattva-tamo-niṣṭhā rajaḥ-sattva-tamo-juṣaḥ
analyzed: rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ niṣṭhāḥ rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ juṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.21.032/3 upāsata indra-mukhyān devādīn na yathaiva mām
analyzed: upāsate indra mukhyān deva ādīn na yathā eva mām

original: BhP_11.21.033/1 iṣṭveha devatā yajñair gatvā raṃsyāmahe divi
analyzed: iṣṭvā iha devatāḥ yajñaiḥ gatvā raṃsyāmahe divi

original: BhP_11.21.033/3 tasyānta iha bhūyāsma mahā-śālā mahā-kulāḥ
analyzed: tasya ante iha bhūyāsma mahā śālāḥ mahā kulāḥ

original: BhP_11.21.034/1 evaṃ puṣpitayā vācā vyākṣipta-manasāṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: evam puṣpitayā vācā vyākṣipta manasām nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.21.034/3 mānināṃ cāti-lubdhānāṃ mad-vārtāpi na rocate
analyzed: māninām ca ati lubdhānām mad vārtā api na rocate

original: BhP_11.21.035/1 vedā brahmātma-viṣayās tri-kāṇḍa-viṣayā ime
analyzed: vedāḥ brahma ātma viṣayāḥ trikāṇḍa viṣayāḥ ime

original: BhP_11.21.035/3 parokṣa-vādā ṛṣayaḥ parokṣaṃ mama ca priyam
analyzed: parokṣa vādāḥ ṛṣayaḥ parokṣam mama ca priyam

original: BhP_11.21.036/1 śabda-brahma su-durbodhaṃ prāṇendriya-mano-mayam
analyzed: śabdabrahma su durbodham prāṇa indriya manaḥ mayam

original: BhP_11.21.036/3 ananta-pāraṃ gambhīraṃ durvigāhyaṃ samudra-vat
analyzed: ananta pāram gambhīram durvigāhyam samudra vat

original: BhP_11.21.037/1 mayopabṛṃhitaṃ bhūmnā brahmaṇānanta-śaktinā
analyzed: mayā upabṛṃhitam bhūmnā brahmaṇā ananta śaktinā

original: BhP_11.21.037/3 bhūteṣu ghoṣa-rūpeṇa viseṣūrṇeva lakṣyate
analyzed: bhūteṣu ghoṣa rūpeṇa viseṣūrṇā iva lakṣyate

original: BhP_11.21.038/1 yathorṇanābhir hṛdayād ūrṇām udvamate mukhāt
analyzed: yathā ūrṇanābhiḥ hṛdayāt ūrṇām udvamate mukhāt

original: BhP_11.21.038/3 ākāśād ghoṣavān prāṇo manasā sparśa-rūpiṇā
analyzed: ākāśāt ghoṣavān prāṇaḥ manasā sparśa rūpiṇā

original: BhP_11.21.039/1 chando-mayo 'mṛta-mayaḥ sahasra-padavīṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: chandaḥ mayaḥ mṛta mayaḥ sahasra padavīm prabhuḥ

original: BhP_11.21.039/3 oṃkārād vyañjita-sparśa- svaroṣmāntastha-bhūṣitām
analyzed: oṃkārāt vyañjita sparśa svara ūṣma anta stha bhūṣitām

original: BhP_11.21.040/1 vicitra-bhāṣā-vitatāṃ chandobhiś catur-uttaraiḥ
analyzed: vicitra bhāṣā vitatām chandobhiḥ catur uttaraiḥ

original: BhP_11.21.040/3 ananta-pārāṃ bṛhatīṃ sṛjaty ākṣipate svayam
analyzed: ananta pārām bṛhatīm sṛjati ākṣipate svayam

original: BhP_11.21.041/1 gāyatry uṣṇig anuṣṭup ca bṛhatī paṅktir eva ca
analyzed: gāyatrī uṣṇih anuṣṭubh ca bṛhatī paṅktiḥ eva ca

original: BhP_11.21.041/3 triṣṭub jagaty aticchando hy atyaṣṭy-atijagad-virāṭ
analyzed: triṣṭubh jagatī aticchandaḥ hi atyaṣṭi atijagat virāj

original: BhP_11.21.042/1 kiṃ vidhatte kim ācaṣṭe kim anūdya vikalpayet
analyzed: kim vidhatte kim ācaṣṭe kim anūdya vikalpayet

original: BhP_11.21.042/3 ity asyā hṛdayaṃ loke nānyo mad veda kaścana
analyzed: iti asyāḥ hṛdayam loke na anyaḥ mat veda kaścana

original: BhP_11.21.043/1 māṃ vidhatte 'bhidhatte māṃ vikalpyāpohyate tv aham
analyzed: mām vidhatte bhidhatte mām vikalpya apohyate tu aham

original: BhP_11.21.043/3 etāvān sarva-vedārthaḥ śabda āsthāya māṃ bhidām
analyzed: etāvān sarva veda arthaḥ śabdaḥ āsthāya mām bhidām

original: BhP_11.21.043/5 māyā-mātram anūdyānte pratiṣidhya prasīdati
analyzed: māyā mātram anūdya ante pratiṣidhya prasīdati

original: BhP_11.22.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.22.001/1 kati tattvāni viśveśa saṅkhyātāny ṛṣibhiḥ prabho
analyzed: kati tattvāni viśveśa saṅkhyātāni ṛṣibhiḥ prabho

original: BhP_11.22.001/3 navaikādaśa pañca trīṇy āttha tvam iha śuśruma
analyzed: nava ekādaśa pañca trīṇi āttha tvam iha śuśruma

original: BhP_11.22.002/1 kecit ṣaḍ-viṃśatiṃ prāhur apare pañca-viṃśatiṃ
analyzed: kecid ṣaḍviṃśatim prāhuḥ apare pañcaviṃśatim

original: BhP_11.22.002/3 saptaike nava ṣaṭ kecic catvāry ekādaśāpare
analyzed: sapta eke nava ṣaṭ kecid catvāri ekādaśa apare

original: BhP_11.22.002/5 kecit saptadaśa prāhuḥ ṣoḍaśaike trayodaśa
analyzed: kecid saptadaśa prāhuḥ ṣoḍaśa eke trayodaśa

original: BhP_11.22.003/1 etāvattvaṃ hi saṅkhyānām ṛṣayo yad-vivakṣayā
analyzed: hi saṅkhyānām ṛṣayaḥ yat vivakṣayā

original: BhP_11.22.003/3 gāyanti pṛthag āyuṣmann idaṃ no vaktum arhasi
analyzed: gāyanti pṛthak āyuṣman idam naḥ vaktum arhasi

original: BhP_11.22.004/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.22.004/1 yuktaṃ ca santi sarvatra bhāṣante brāhmaṇā yathā
analyzed: yuktam ca santi sarvatra bhāṣante brāhmaṇāḥ yathā

original: BhP_11.22.004/3 māyāṃ madīyām udgṛhya vadatāṃ kiṃ nu durghaṭam
analyzed: māyām madīyām udgṛhya vadatām kim nu durghaṭam

original: BhP_11.22.005/1 naitad evaṃ yathāttha tvaṃ yad ahaṃ vacmi tat tathā
analyzed: na etat evam yathā āttha tvam yat aham vacmi tat tathā

original: BhP_11.22.005/3 evaṃ vivadatāṃ hetuṃ śaktayo me duratyayāḥ
analyzed: evam vivadatām hetum śaktayaḥ me duratyayāḥ

original: BhP_11.22.006/1 yāsāṃ vyatikarād āsīd vikalpo vadatāṃ padam
analyzed: yāsām vyatikarāt āsīt vikalpaḥ vadatām padam

original: BhP_11.22.006/3 prāpte śama-dame 'pyeti vādas tam anu śāmyati
analyzed: prāpte śama dame pyeti vādaḥ tam anu śāmyati

original: BhP_11.22.007/1 parasparānupraveśāt tattvānāṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: paraspara anupraveśāt tattvānām puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_11.22.007/3 paurvāparya-prasaṅkhyānaṃ yathā vaktur vivakṣitam
analyzed: paurvāparya prasaṅkhyānam yathā vaktuḥ vivakṣitam

original: BhP_11.22.008/1 ekasminn api dṛśyante praviṣṭānītarāṇi ca
analyzed: ekasmin api dṛśyante praviṣṭāni itarāṇi ca

original: BhP_11.22.008/3 pūrvasmin vā parasmin vā tattve tattvāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: pūrvasmin vā parasmin vā tattve tattvāni sarvaśas

original: BhP_11.22.009/1 paurvāparyam ato 'mīṣāṃ prasaṅkhyānam abhīpsatām
analyzed: paurvāparyam atas mīṣām prasaṅkhyānam abhīpsatām

original: BhP_11.22.009/3 yathā viviktaṃ yad-vaktraṃ gṛhṇīmo yukti-sambhavāt
analyzed: yathā viviktam yat vaktram gṛhṇīmaḥ yukti sambhavāt

original: BhP_11.22.010/1 anādy-avidyā-yuktasya puruṣasyātma-vedanam
analyzed: anādya vidyā yuktasya puruṣasya ātma vedanam

original: BhP_11.22.010/3 svato na sambhavād anyas tattva-jño jñāna-do bhavet
analyzed: svatas na sambhavāt anyaḥ tattva jñaḥ jñāna daḥ bhavet

original: BhP_11.22.011/1 puruṣeśvarayor atra na vailakṣaṇyam aṇv api
analyzed: puruṣa īśvarayoḥ atra na vailakṣaṇyam aṇu api

original: BhP_11.22.011/3 tad-anya-kalpanāpārthā jñānaṃ ca prakṛter guṇaḥ
analyzed: tad anya kalpanā pārthā jñānam ca prakṛteḥ guṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.012/1 prakṛtir guṇa-sāmyaṃ vai prakṛter nātmano guṇāḥ
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ guṇa sāmyam vai prakṛteḥ na ātmanaḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.22.012/3 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti sthity-utpatty-anta-hetavaḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti sthiti utpatti anta hetavaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.013/1 sattvaṃ jñānaṃ rajaḥ karma tamo 'jñānam ihocyate
analyzed: sattvam jñānam rajaḥ karma tamaḥ jñānam iha ucyate

original: BhP_11.22.013/3 guṇa-vyatikaraḥ kālaḥ svabhāvaḥ sūtram eva ca
analyzed: guṇa vyatikaraḥ kālaḥ svabhāvaḥ sūtram eva ca

original: BhP_11.22.014/1 puruṣaḥ prakṛtir vyaktam ahaṅkāro nabho 'nilaḥ
BhP_11.22.014/3 jyotir āpaḥ kṣitir iti tattvāny uktāni me nava
analyzed: jyotiḥ āpaḥ kṣitiḥ iti tattvāni uktāni me nava

original: BhP_11.22.015/1 śrotraṃ tvag darśanaṃ ghrāṇo jihveti jñāna-śaktayaḥ
analyzed: śrotram tvac darśanam ghrāṇaḥ jihvā iti jñāna śaktayaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.015/3 vāk-pāṇy-upastha-pāyv-aṅghriḥ karmāṇy aṅgobhayaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: vāc pāṇi upastha pāyu aṅghriḥ karmāṇi aṅga ubhayam manaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.016/1 śabdaḥ sparśo raso gandho rūpaṃ cety artha-jātayaḥ
analyzed: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rasaḥ gandhaḥ rūpam ca iti artha jātayaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.016/3 gaty-ukty-utsarga-śilpāni karmāyatana-siddhayaḥ
analyzed: gati ukti utsarga śilpāni karma āyatana siddhayaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.017/1 sargādau prakṛtir hy asya kārya-kāraṇa-rūpiṇī
analyzed: sarga ādau prakṛtiḥ hi asya kārya kāraṇa rūpiṇī

original: BhP_11.22.017/3 sattvādibhir guṇair dhatte puruṣo 'vyakta īkṣate
analyzed: sattva ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ dhatte puruṣaḥ vyakte īkṣate

original: BhP_11.22.018/1 vyaktādāyo vikurvāṇā dhātavaḥ puruṣekṣayā
analyzed: vyakta ādāyaḥ vikurvāṇāḥ dhātavaḥ puruṣa īkṣayā

original: BhP_11.22.018/3 labdha-vīryāḥ sṛjanty aṇḍaṃ saṃhatāḥ prakṛter balāt
analyzed: labdha vīryāḥ sṛjanti aṇḍam saṃhatāḥ prakṛteḥ balāt

original: BhP_11.22.019/1 saptaiva dhātava iti tatrārthāḥ pañca khādayaḥ
analyzed: sapta eva dhātavaḥ iti tatra arthāḥ pañca kha ādayaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.019/3 jñānam ātmobhayādhāras tato dehendriyāsavaḥ
analyzed: jñānam ātmā ubhaya ādhāraḥ tatas deha indriya asavaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.020/1 ṣaḍ ity atrāpi bhūtāni pañca ṣaṣṭhaḥ paraḥ pumān
analyzed: ṣaṣ iti atra api bhūtāni pañca ṣaṣṭhaḥ paraḥ pumān

original: BhP_11.22.020/3 tair yuita ātma-sambhūtaiḥ sṛṣṭvedaṃ samapāviśat
analyzed: taiḥ yuitaḥ ātma sambhūtaiḥ sṛṣṭvā idam samapāviśat

original: BhP_11.22.021/1 catvāry eveti tatrāpi teja āpo 'nnam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: catvāri eva iti tatra api tejaḥ āpaḥ nam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.021/3 jātāni tair idaṃ jātaṃ janmāvayavinaḥ khalu
analyzed: jātāni taiḥ idam jātam janma avayavinaḥ khalu

original: BhP_11.22.022/1 saṅkhyāne saptadaśake bhūta-mātrendriyāṇi ca
analyzed: saṅkhyāne saptadaśake bhūtamātra indriyāṇi ca

original: BhP_11.22.022/3 pañca pañcaika-manasā ātmā saptadaśaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: pañca pañca ekamanasāḥ ātmā saptadaśaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.023/1 tadvat ṣoḍaśa-saṅkhyāne ātmaiva mana ucyate
analyzed: tadvat ṣoḍaśa saṅkhyāne ātmā eva manaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_11.22.023/3 bhūtendriyāṇi pañcaiva mana ātmā trayodaśa
analyzed: bhūta indriyāṇi pañca eva manaḥ ātmā trayodaśa

original: BhP_11.22.024/1 ekādaśatva ātmāsau mahā-bhūtendriyāṇi ca
analyzed: ekādaśa tve ātmā asau mahābhūta indriyāṇi ca

original: BhP_11.22.024/3 aṣṭau prakṛtayaś caiva puruṣaś ca navety atha
analyzed: aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ ca eva puruṣaḥ ca navā iti atha

original: BhP_11.22.025/1 iti nānā-prasaṅkhyānaṃ tattvānām ṛṣibhiḥ kṛtam
analyzed: iti nānā prasaṅkhyānam tattvānām ṛṣibhiḥ kṛtam

original: BhP_11.22.025/3 sarvaṃ nyāyyaṃ yuktimattvād viduṣāṃ kim aśobhanam
analyzed: sarvam nyāyyam yuktimat tvāt viduṣām kim aśobhanam

original: BhP_11.22.026/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.22.026/1 prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś cobhau yady apy ātma-vilakṣaṇau
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ ca ubhau yadi api ātma vilakṣaṇau

original: BhP_11.22.026/3 anyonyāpāśrayāt kṛṣṇa dṛśyate na bhidā tayoḥ
analyzed: anyonya apāśrayāt kṛṣṇa dṛśyate na bhidā tayoḥ

original: BhP_11.22.026/5 prakṛtau lakṣyate hy ātmā prakṛtiś ca tathātmani
analyzed: prakṛtau lakṣyate hi ātmā prakṛtiḥ ca tathā ātmani

original: BhP_11.22.027/1 evaṃ me puṇḍarīkākṣa mahāntaṃ saṃśayaṃ hṛdi
analyzed: evam me puṇḍarīkākṣa mahāntam saṃśayam hṛdi

original: BhP_11.22.027/3 chettum arhasi sarva-jña vacobhir naya-naipuṇaiḥ
analyzed: chettum arhasi sarvajña vacobhiḥ naya naipuṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.22.028/1 tvatto jñānaṃ hi jīvānāṃ pramoṣas te 'tra śaktitaḥ
analyzed: tvattaḥ jñānam hi jīvānām pramoṣaḥ te śaktitaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.028/3 tvam eva hy ātma-māyāyā gatiṃ vettha na cāparaḥ
analyzed: tvam eva hi ātma māyāyāḥ gatim vettha na ca aparaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.22.029/1 prakṛtiḥ puruṣaś ceti vikalpaḥ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ ca iti vikalpaḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_11.22.029/3 eṣa vaikārikaḥ sargo guṇa-vyatikarātmakaḥ
analyzed: eṣa vaikārikaḥ sargaḥ guṇa vyatikara ātmakaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.030/1 mamāṅga māyā guṇa-mayy anekadhā vikalpa-buddhīś ca guṇair vidhatte
analyzed: mama aṅga māyā guṇa mayī anekadhā vikalpa buddhīḥ ca guṇaiḥ vidhatte

original: BhP_11.22.030/3 vaikārikas tri-vidho 'dhyātmam ekam athādhidaivam adhibhūtam anyat
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ trividhaḥ dhyātmam ekam atha adhidaivam adhibhūtam anyat

original: BhP_11.22.031/1 dṛg rūpam ārkaṃ vapur atra randhre parasparaṃ sidhyati yaḥ svataḥ khe
analyzed: rūpam ārkam vapuḥ atra randhre parasparam sidhyati yaḥ svatas khe

original: BhP_11.22.031/3 ātmā yad eṣām aparo ya ādyaḥ svayānubhūtyākhila-siddha-siddhiḥ
analyzed: ātmā yat eṣām aparaḥ yaḥ ādyaḥ svayā anubhūtyā akhila siddha siddhiḥ

original: BhP_11.22.032/1 evaṃ tvag-ādi śravaṇādi cakṣur
analyzed: evam tvac ādi śravaṇa ādi cakṣuḥ

original: BhP_11.22.032/2 jihvādi nāsādi ca citta-yuktam
analyzed: jihvā ādi nāsā ādi ca citta yuktam

original: BhP_11.22.033/1 yo 'sau guṇa-kṣobha-kṛto vikāraḥ pradhāna-mūlān mahataḥ prasūtaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sau guṇa kṣobha kṛtaḥ vikāraḥ pradhāna mūlāt mahataḥ prasūtaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.033/3 ahaṃ tri-vṛn moha-vikalpa-hetur vaikārikas tāmasa aindriyaś ca
analyzed: aham trivṛt moha vikalpa hetuḥ vaikārikaḥ tāmasaḥ aindriyaḥ ca

original: BhP_11.22.034/1 ātmāparijñāna-mayo vivādo hy astīti nāstīti bhidārtha-niṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: ātma a parijñāna mayaḥ vivādaḥ hi asti iti na asti iti bhidā artha niṣṭhaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.034/3 vyartho 'pi naivoparameta puṃsāṃ mattaḥ parāvṛtta-dhiyāṃ sva-lokāt
analyzed: na evā uparameta puṃsām mattaḥ parāvṛtta dhiyām sva lokāt

original: BhP_11.22.035/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.22.035/1 tvattaḥ parāvṛtta-dhiyaḥ sva-kṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ prabho
analyzed: tvattaḥ parāvṛtta dhiyaḥ sva kṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ prabho

original: BhP_11.22.035/3 uccāvacān yathā dehān gṛhṇanti visṛjanti ca
analyzed: uccāvacān yathā dehān gṛhṇanti visṛjanti ca

original: BhP_11.22.036/1 tan mamākhyāhi govinda durvibhāvyam anātmabhiḥ
analyzed: tat mama ākhyāhi govinda durvibhāvyam anātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.22.036/3 na hy etat prāyaśo loke vidvāṃsaḥ santi vañcitāḥ
analyzed: na hi etat prāyaśas loke vidvāṃsaḥ santi vañcitāḥ

original: BhP_11.22.037/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.22.037/1 manaḥ karma-mayaṃ ṇṝṇām indriyaiḥ pañcabhir yutam
analyzed: manaḥ karma mayam ṇṝṇām indriyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ yutam

original: BhP_11.22.037/3 lokāl lokaṃ prayāty anya ātmā tad anuvartate
analyzed: lokāt lokam prayāti anyaḥ ātmā tat anuvartate

original: BhP_11.22.038/1 dhyāyan mano 'nu viṣayān dṛṣṭān vānuśrutān atha
analyzed: dhyāyan manaḥ nu viṣayān dṛṣṭān vā anuśrutān atha

original: BhP_11.22.038/3 udyat sīdat karma-tantraṃ smṛtis tad anu śāmyati
analyzed: udyat sīdat karma tantram smṛtiḥ tat anu śāmyati

original: BhP_11.22.039/1 viṣayābhiniveśena nātmānaṃ yat smaret punaḥ
analyzed: viṣaya abhiniveśena na ātmānam yat smaret punar

original: BhP_11.22.039/3 jantor vai kasyacid dhetor mṛtyur atyanta-vismṛtiḥ
analyzed: jantoḥ vai kasyacid hetoḥ mṛtyuḥ atyanta vismṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.22.040/1 janma tv ātmatayā puṃsaḥ sarva-bhāvena bhūri-da
analyzed: janma tu ātma tayā puṃsaḥ sarva bhāvena bhūri da

original: BhP_11.22.040/3 viṣaya-svīkṛtiṃ prāhur yathā svapna-manorathaḥ
analyzed: viṣaya svīkṛtim prāhuḥ yathā svapna manorathaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.041/1 svapnaṃ manorathaṃ cetthaṃ prāktanaṃ na smaraty asau
analyzed: svapnam manoratham ca ittham prāktanam na smarati asau

original: BhP_11.22.041/3 tatra pūrvam ivātmānam apūrvam cānupaśyati
analyzed: tatra pūrvam iva ātmānam apūrvam ca anupaśyati

original: BhP_11.22.042/1 indriyāyana-sṛṣṭyedaṃ trai-vidhyaṃ bhāti vastuni
analyzed: indriyāyana sṛṣṭyā idam traividhyam bhāti vastuni

original: BhP_11.22.042/3 bahir-antar-bhidā-hetur jano 'saj-jana-kṛd yathā
analyzed: bahis antar bhidā hetuḥ sat jana kṛt yathā

original: BhP_11.22.043/1 nityadā hy aṅga bhūtāni bhavanti na bhavanti ca
analyzed: nityadā hi aṅga bhūtāni bhavanti na bhavanti ca

original: BhP_11.22.043/3 kālenālakṣya-vegena sūkṣmatvāt tan na dṛśyate
analyzed: kālena alakṣya vegena sūkṣma tvāt tat na dṛśyate

original: BhP_11.22.044/1 yathārciṣāṃ srotasāṃ ca phalānāṃ vā vanaspateḥ
analyzed: yathā arciṣām srotasām ca phalānām vā vanaspateḥ

original: BhP_11.22.044/3 tathaiva sarva-bhūtānāṃ vayo-'vasthādayaḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: tathā eva sarva bhūtānām vayaḥ vasthā ādayaḥ kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_11.22.045/1 so 'yaṃ dīpo 'rciṣāṃ yadvat srotasāṃ tad idaṃ jalam
analyzed: saḥ yam dīpaḥ rciṣām yadvat srotasām tat idam jalam

original: BhP_11.22.045/3 so 'yaṃ pumān iti nṛṇāṃ mṛṣā gīr dhīr mṛṣāyuṣām
analyzed: saḥ yam pumān iti nṛṇām mṛṣā gīḥ dhīḥ mṛṣā āyuṣām

original: BhP_11.22.046/1 mā svasya karma-bījena jāyate so 'py ayaṃ pumān
analyzed: mā svasya karma bījena jāyate saḥ u pi ayam pumān

original: BhP_11.22.046/3 mriyate vāmaro bhrāntyā yathāgnir dāru-saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: mriyate vā amaraḥ bhrāntyā yathā agniḥ dāru saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.047/1 niṣeka-garbha-janmāni bālya-kaumāra-yauvanam
analyzed: niṣeka garbha janmāni bālya kaumāra yauvanam

original: BhP_11.22.047/3 vayo-madhyaṃ jarā mṛtyur ity avasthās tanor nava
analyzed: vayaḥ madhyam jarā mṛtyuḥ iti avasthāḥ tanoḥ nava

original: BhP_11.22.048/1 etā manoratha-mayīr hānyasyoccāvacās tanūḥ
analyzed: etāḥ manoratha mayīḥ ha anyasya uccāvacāḥ tanūḥ

original: BhP_11.22.048/3 guṇa-saṅgād upādatte kvacit kaścij jahāti ca
analyzed: guṇa saṅgāt upādatte kvacid kaścid jahāti ca

original: BhP_11.22.049/1 ātmanaḥ pitṛ-putrābhyām anumeyau bhavāpyayau
analyzed: ātmanaḥ pitṛ putrābhyām anumeyau bhava apyayau

original: BhP_11.22.049/3 na bhavāpyaya-vastūnām abhijño dvaya-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: na bhava apyaya vastūnām abhijñaḥ dvaya lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.050/1 taror bīja-vipākābhyāṃ yo vidvāñ janma-saṃyamau
analyzed: taroḥ bīja vipākābhyām yaḥ janma saṃyamau

original: BhP_11.22.050/3 taror vilakṣaṇo draṣṭā evaṃ draṣṭā tanoḥ pṛthak
analyzed: taroḥ vilakṣaṇaḥ draṣṭā evam draṣṭā tanoḥ pṛthak

original: BhP_11.22.051/1 prakṛter evam ātmānam avivicyābudhaḥ pumān
analyzed: prakṛteḥ evam ātmānam a vivicya abudhaḥ pumān

original: BhP_11.22.051/3 tattvena sparśa-sammūḍhaḥ saṃsāraṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: tattvena sparśa sammūḍhaḥ saṃsāram pratipadyate

original: BhP_11.22.052/1 sattva-saṅgād ṛṣīn devān rajasāsura-mānuṣān
analyzed: sattva saṅgāt ṛṣīn devān rajasā asura mānuṣān

original: BhP_11.22.052/3 tamasā bhūta-tiryaktvaṃ bhrāmito yāti karmabhiḥ
analyzed: tamasā bhūta tiryaktvam bhrāmitaḥ yāti karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.22.053/1 nṛtyato gāyataḥ paśyan yathaivānukaroti tān
analyzed: nṛtyataḥ gāyataḥ paśyan yathā eva anukaroti tān

original: BhP_11.22.053/3 evaṃ buddhi-guṇān paśyann anīho 'py anukāryate
analyzed: evam buddhi guṇān paśyan anīhaḥ pi anukāryate

original: BhP_11.22.054/1 yathāmbhasā pracalatā taravo 'pi calā iva
analyzed: yathā ambhasā pracalatā taravaḥ pi calāḥ iva

original: BhP_11.22.054/3 cakṣusā bhrāmyamāṇena dṛśyate bhramatīva bhūḥ
analyzed: cakṣusā bhrāmyamāṇena dṛśyate bhramati iva bhūḥ

original: BhP_11.22.055/1 yathā manoratha-dhiyo viṣayṣānubhavo mṛṣā
analyzed: yathā manoratha dhiyaḥ mṛṣā

original: BhP_11.22.055/3 svapna-dṛṣṭāś ca dāśārha tathā saṃsāra ātmanaḥ
analyzed: svapna dṛṣṭāḥ ca dāśārha tathā saṃsāraḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.056/1 arthe hy avidyamāne 'pi saṃsṛtir na nivartate
analyzed: arthe hi a vidyamāne saṃsṛtiḥ na nivartate

original: BhP_11.22.056/3 dhyāyato viṣayān asya svapne 'narthāgamo yathā
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ viṣayān asya svapne nartha āgamaḥ yathā

original: BhP_11.22.057/1 tasmād uddhava mā bhuṅkṣva viṣayān asad-indriyaiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt uddhava mā bhuṅkṣva viṣayān asat indriyaiḥ

original: BhP_11.22.057/3 ātmāgrahaṇa-nirbhātaṃ paśya vaikalpikaṃ bhramam
analyzed: ātma agrahaṇa nirbhātam paśya vaikalpikam bhramam

original: BhP_11.22.058/1 kṣipto 'vamānito 'sadbhiḥ pralabdho 'sūyito 'tha vā
analyzed: kṣiptaḥ sadbhiḥ pralabdhaḥ vā

original: BhP_11.22.058/3 tāḍitaḥ sanniruddho vā vṛttyā vā parihāpitaḥ
analyzed: tāḍitaḥ san niruddhaḥ vā vṛttyā vā parihāpitaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.059/1 niṣṭhyuto mūtrito vājñair bahudhaivaṃ prakampitaḥ
analyzed: niṣṭhyutaḥ mūtritaḥ vā ajñaiḥ bahudhā evam prakampitaḥ

original: BhP_11.22.059/3 śreyas-kāmaḥ kṛcchra-gata ātmanātmānam uddharet
analyzed: śreyaskāmaḥ kṛcchra gataḥ ātmanā ātmānam uddharet

original: BhP_11.22.060/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.22.060/1 yathaivam anubudhyeyaṃ
analyzed: yathā evam anubudhyeyam

original: BhP_11.22.060/2 vada no vadatāṃ vara
analyzed: vada naḥ vadatām vara

original: BhP_11.22.061/1 su-duḥṣaham imaṃ manya ātmany asad-atikramam
analyzed: su duḥṣaham imam manye ātmani asat atikramam

original: BhP_11.22.061/3 viduṣām api viśvātman prakṛtir hi balīyasī
analyzed: viduṣām api viśvātman prakṛtiḥ hi balīyasī

original: BhP_11.22.061/5 ṛte tvad-dharma-niratān śāntāṃs te caraṇālayān
analyzed: ṛte tvad dharma niratān śāntān te caraṇa ālayān

original: BhP_11.23.001/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.23.001/1 sa evam āśaṃsita uddhavena bhāgavata-mukhyena dāśārha-mukhyaḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam āśaṃsitaḥ uddhavena bhāgavata mukhyena dāśārha mukhyaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.001/3 sabhājayan bhṛtya-vaco mukundas tam ābabhāṣe śravaṇīya-vīryaḥ
analyzed: sabhājayan bhṛtya vacaḥ mukundaḥ tam ābabhāṣe śravaṇīya vīryaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.002/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.23.002/1 bārhaspatya sa nāsty atra sādhur vai durjaneritaiḥ
analyzed: bārhaspatya sa nā asti atra sādhuḥ vai durjana īritaiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.002/3 duraktair bhinnam ātmānaṃ yaḥ samādhātum īśvaraḥ
analyzed: duraktaiḥ bhinnam ātmānam yaḥ samādhātum īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.23.003/1 na tathā tapyate viddhaḥ pumān bāṇais tu marma-gaiḥ
analyzed: na tathā tapyate viddhaḥ pumān bāṇaiḥ tu marma gaiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.003/3 yathā tudanti marma-sthā hy asatāṃ paruṣeṣavaḥ
analyzed: yathā tudanti marma sthāḥ hi asatām paruṣa iṣavaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.004/1 kathayanti mahat puṇyam itihāsam ihoddhava
analyzed: kathayanti mahat puṇyam itihāsam iha uddhava

original: BhP_11.23.004/3 tam ahaṃ varṇayiṣyāmi nibodha su-samāhitaḥ
analyzed: tam aham varṇayiṣyāmi nibodha su samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.005/1 kenacid bhikṣuṇā gītaṃ paribhūtena durjanaiḥ
analyzed: kenacid bhikṣuṇā gītam paribhūtena durjanaiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.005/3 smaratā dhṛti-yuktena vipākaṃ nija-karmaṇām
analyzed: smaratā dhṛti yuktena vipākam nija karmaṇām

original: BhP_11.23.006/1 avantiṣu dvijaḥ kaścid āsīd āḍhyatamaḥ śriyā
analyzed: avantiṣu dvijaḥ kaścid āsīt āḍhyatamaḥ śriyā

original: BhP_11.23.006/3 vārtā-vṛttiḥ kadaryas tu kāmī lubdho 'ti-kopanaḥ
analyzed: vārtāvṛttiḥ kadaryaḥ tu kāmī lubdhaḥ tikopanaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.007/1 jñātayo 'tithayas tasya vāṅ-mātreṇāpi nārcitāḥ
analyzed: jñātayaḥ tithayaḥ tasya vāc mātreṇa api na arcitāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.007/3 śūnyāvasatha ātmāpi kāle kāmair anarcitaḥ
analyzed: śūnya āvasathaḥ ātmā api kāle kāmaiḥ anarcitaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.008/1 duhśīlasya kadaryasya druhyante putra-bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: duhśīlasya kadaryasya druhyante putra bāndhavāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.008/3 dārā duhitaro bhṛtyā viṣaṇṇā nācaran priyam
analyzed: dārāḥ duhitaraḥ bhṛtyāḥ viṣaṇṇāḥ na ācaran priyam

original: BhP_11.23.009/1 tasyaivaṃ yakṣa-vittasya cyutasyobhaya-lokataḥ
analyzed: tasya evam yakṣa vittasya cyutasya ubhaya lokataḥ

original: BhP_11.23.009/3 dharma-kāma-vihīnasya cukrudhuḥ pañca-bhāginaḥ
analyzed: dharma kāma vihīnasya cukrudhuḥ pañca bhāginaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.010/1 tad-avadhyāna-visrasta- puṇya-skandhasya bhūri-da
analyzed: tad avadhyāna visrasta puṇya skandhasya bhūri da

original: BhP_11.23.010/3 artho 'py agacchan nidhanaṃ bahv-āyāsa-pariśramaḥ
analyzed: arthaḥ u pi agacchat nidhanam bahu āyāsa pariśramaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.011/1 jñātyo jagṛhuḥ kiñcit kiñcid dasyava uddhava
analyzed: jñātyaḥ jagṛhuḥ kiñcid kiñcid dasyavaḥ uddhava

original: BhP_11.23.011/3 daivataḥ kālataḥ kiñcid brahma-bandhor nṛ-pārthivāt
analyzed: daivataḥ kālataḥ kiñcid brahmabandhoḥ nṛpa arthivāt

original: BhP_11.23.012/1 sa evaṃ draviṇe naṣṭe dharma-kāma-vivarjitaḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam draviṇe naṣṭe dharma kāma vivarjitaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.012/3 upekṣitaś ca sva-janaiś cintām āpa duratyayām
analyzed: upekṣitaḥ ca sva janaiḥ cintām āpa duratyayām

original: BhP_11.23.013/1 tasyaivaṃ dhyāyato dīrghaṃ naṣṭa-rāyas tapasvinaḥ
analyzed: tasya evam dhyāyataḥ dīrgham naṣṭa rāyaḥ tapasvinaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.013/3 khidyato bāṣpa-kaṇṭhasya nirvedaḥ su-mahān abhūt
analyzed: khidyataḥ bāṣpa kaṇṭhasya nirvedaḥ su mahān abhūt

original: BhP_11.23.014/1 sa cāhedam aho kaṣṭaṃ vṛthātmā me 'nutāpitaḥ
analyzed: sa ca āha idam aho kaṣṭam vṛthak ātmā me nu tāpitaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.014/3 na dharmāya na kāmāya yasyārthāyāsa īdṛśaḥ
analyzed: na dharmāya na kāmāya yasya artha āyāsaḥ īdṛśaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.015/1 prāyeṇāthāḥ kadaryāṇāṃ na sukhāya kadācana
analyzed: prāyeṇa athāḥ kadaryāṇām na sukhāya kadācana

original: BhP_11.23.015/3 iha cātmopatāpāya mṛtasya narakāya ca
analyzed: iha ca ātma upatāpāya mṛtasya narakāya ca

original: BhP_11.23.016/1 yaśo yaśasvināṃ śuddhaṃ ślāghyā ye guṇināṃ guṇāḥ
analyzed: yaśaḥ yaśasvinām śuddham ślāghyāḥ ye guṇinām guṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.016/3 lobhaḥ sv-alpo 'pi tān hanti śvitro rūpam ivepsitam
analyzed: lobhaḥ su alpaḥ pi tān hanti śvitraḥ rūpam iva īpsitam

original: BhP_11.23.017/1 arthasya sādhane siddhe utkarṣe rakṣaṇe vyaye
analyzed: arthasya sādhane siddhe utkarṣe rakṣaṇe vyaye

original: BhP_11.23.017/3 nāśopabhoga āyāsas trāsaś cintā bhramo nṛṇām
analyzed: nāśa upabhogaḥ āyāsaḥ trāsaḥ cintā bhramaḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.23.018/1 steyaṃ hiṃsānṛtaṃ dambhaḥ kāmaḥ krodhaḥ smayo madaḥ
analyzed: steyam hiṃsā anṛtam dambhaḥ kāmaḥ krodhaḥ smayaḥ madaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.018/3 bhedo vairam aviśvāsaḥ saṃspardhā vyasanāni ca
analyzed: bhedaḥ vairam aviśvāsaḥ saṃspardhā vyasanāni ca

original: BhP_11.23.019/1 ete pañcadaśānarthā hy artha-mūlā matā nṛṇām
analyzed: ete pañcadaśa anarthāḥ hi artha mūlāḥ matāḥ nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.23.019/3 tasmād anartham arthākhyaṃ śreyo-'rthī dūratas tyajet
analyzed: tasmāt anartham artha ākhyam śreyaḥ arthī dūratas tyajet

original: BhP_11.23.020/1 bhidyante bhrātaro dārāḥ pitaraḥ suhṛdas tathā
analyzed: bhidyante bhrātaraḥ dārāḥ pitaraḥ suhṛdaḥ tathā

original: BhP_11.23.020/3 ekāsnigdhāḥ kākiṇinā sadyaḥ sarve 'rayaḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: eka asnigdhāḥ kākiṇinā sadyas sarve rayaḥ kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.021/1 arthenālpīyasā hy ete saṃrabdhā dīpta-manyavaḥ
analyzed: arthena alpīyasā hi ete saṃrabdhāḥ dīpta manyavaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.021/3 tyajanty āśu spṛdho ghnanti sahasotsṛjya sauhṛdam
analyzed: tyajanti āśu spṛdhaḥ ghnanti sahasā utsṛjya sauhṛdam

original: BhP_11.23.022/1 labdhvā janmāmara-prārthyaṃ mānuṣyaṃ tad dvijāgryatām
analyzed: labdhvā janma amara prārthyam mānuṣyam tat dvijāgrya tām

original: BhP_11.23.022/3 tad anādṛtya ye svārthaṃ ghnanti yānty aśubhāṃ gatim
analyzed: tat an ādṛtya ye sva artham ghnanti yānti aśubhām gatim

original: BhP_11.23.023/1 svargāpavargayor dvāraṃ prāpya lokam imaṃ pumān
analyzed: svarga apavargayoḥ dvāram prāpya lokam imam pumān

original: BhP_11.23.023/3 draviṇe ko 'nuṣajjeta martyo 'narthasya dhāmani
analyzed: draviṇe kaḥ nuṣajjeta martyaḥ na arthasya dhāmani

original: BhP_11.23.024/1 devarṣi-pitṛ-bhūtāni jñātīn bandhūṃś ca bhāginaḥ
analyzed: deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni jñātīn bandhūn ca bhāginaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.024/3 asaṃvibhajya cātmānaṃ yakṣa-vittaḥ pataty adhaḥ
analyzed: a saṃvibhajya ca ātmānam yakṣa vittaḥ patati adhas

original: BhP_11.23.025/1 vyarthayārthehayā vittaṃ pramattasya vayo balam
analyzed: vyarthayā artha īhayā vittam pramattasya vayaḥ balam

original: BhP_11.23.025/3 kuśalā yena sidhyanti jaraṭhaḥ kiṃ nu sādhaye
analyzed: kuśalāḥ yena sidhyanti jaraṭhaḥ kim nu sādhaye

original: BhP_11.23.026/1 kasmāt saṅkliśyate vidvān vyarthayārthehayāsakṛt
analyzed: kasmāt saṅkliśyate vidvān vyarthayā arthehayā asakṛt

original: BhP_11.23.026/3 kasyacin māyayā nūnaṃ loko 'yaṃ su-vimohitaḥ
analyzed: kasyacid māyayā nūnam lokaḥ yam su vimohitaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.027/1 kiṃ dhanair dhana-dair vā kiṃ kāmair vā kāma-dair uta
analyzed: kim dhanaiḥ dhana daiḥ vā kim kāmaiḥ vā kāma daiḥ uta

original: BhP_11.23.027/3 mṛtyunā grasyamānasya karmabhir vota janma-daiḥ
analyzed: mṛtyunā grasyamānasya karmabhiḥ vā uta janma daiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.028/1 nūnaṃ me bhagavāṃs tuṣṭaḥ sarva-deva-mayo hariḥ
analyzed: nūnam me bhagavān tuṣṭaḥ sarva deva mayaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_11.23.028/3 yena nīto daśām etāṃ nirvedaś cātmanaḥ plavaḥ
analyzed: yena nītaḥ daśām etām nirvedaḥ ca ātmanaḥ plavaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.029/1 so 'haṃ kālāvaśeṣeṇa śoṣayiṣye 'ṅgam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham kāla avaśeṣeṇa śoṣayiṣye ṅgam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.029/3 apramatto 'khila-svārthe yadi syāt siddha ātmani
analyzed: khila sva arthe yadi syāt siddhe ātmani

original: BhP_11.23.030/1 tatra mām anumoderan devās tri-bhuvaneśvarāḥ
analyzed: tatra mām anumoderan devāḥ tribhuvana īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.030/3 muhūrtena brahma-lokaṃ khaṭvāṅgaḥ samasādhayat
analyzed: muhūrtena brahma lokam khaṭvāṅgaḥ samasādhayat

original: BhP_11.23.031/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.23.031/1 ity abhipretya manasā hy āvantyo dvija-sattamaḥ
analyzed: iti abhipretya manasā hi āvantyaḥ dvijasattamaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.031/3 unmucya hṛdaya-granthīn śānto bhikṣur abhūn muniḥ
analyzed: unmucya hṛdaya granthīn śāntaḥ bhikṣuḥ abhūt muniḥ

original: BhP_11.23.032/1 sa cacāra mahīm etāṃ saṃyatātmendriyānilaḥ
analyzed: sa cacāra mahīm etām saṃyata ātma indriya anilaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.032/3 bhikṣārthaṃ nagara-grāmān asaṅgo 'lakṣito 'viśat
analyzed: bhikṣā artham nagara grāmān asaṅgaḥ lakṣitaḥ viśat

original: BhP_11.23.033/1 taṃ vai pravayasaṃ bhikṣum avadhūtam asaj-janāḥ
analyzed: tam vai pravayasam bhikṣum avadhūtam asat janāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.033/3 dṛṣṭvā paryabhavan bhadra bahvībhiḥ paribhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā paryabhavan bhadra bahvībhiḥ paribhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.034/1 kecit tri-veṇuṃ jagṛhur eke pātraṃ kamaṇḍalum
analyzed: kecid triveṇum jagṛhuḥ eke pātram kamaṇḍalum

original: BhP_11.23.034/3 pīṭhaṃ caike 'kṣa-sūtraṃ ca kanthāṃ cīrāṇi kecana
analyzed: pīṭham ca eke kṣa sūtram ca kanthām cīrāṇi kecana

original: BhP_11.23.034/5 pradāya ca punas tāni darśitāny ādadur muneḥ
analyzed: pradāya ca punar tāni darśitāni ādaduḥ muneḥ

original: BhP_11.23.035/1 annaṃ ca bhaikṣya-sampannaṃ bhuñjānasya sarit-taṭe
analyzed: annam ca bhaikṣya sampannam bhuñjānasya sarit taṭe

original: BhP_11.23.035/3 mūtrayanti ca pāpiṣṭhāḥ ṣṭhīvanty asya ca mūrdhani
analyzed: mūtrayanti ca pāpiṣṭhāḥ ṣṭhīvanti asya ca mūrdhani

original: BhP_11.23.036/1 yata-vācaṃ vācayanti tāḍayanti na vakti cet
analyzed: yata vācam vācayanti tāḍayanti na vakti ced

original: BhP_11.23.036/3 tarjayanty apare vāgbhiḥ steno 'yam iti vādinaḥ
analyzed: tarjayanti apare vāgbhiḥ stenaḥ yam iti vādinaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.036/5 badhnanti rajjvā taṃ kecid badhyatāṃ badhyatām iti
analyzed: badhnanti rajjvā tam kecid badhyatām badhyatām iti

original: BhP_11.23.037/1 kṣipanty eke 'vajānanta eṣa dharma-dhvajaḥ śaṭhaḥ
analyzed: kṣipanti eke eṣa dharma dhvajaḥ śaṭhaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.037/3 kṣīṇa-vitta imāṃ vṛttim agrahīt sva-janojjhitaḥ
analyzed: kṣīṇa vittaḥ imām vṛttim agrahīt sva jana ujjhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.038/1 aho eṣa mahā-sāro dhṛtimān giri-rāḍ iva
analyzed: aho eṣa mahā sāraḥ dhṛtimān giri rāj iva

original: BhP_11.23.038/3 maunena sādhayaty arthaṃ baka-vad dṛḍha-niścayaḥ
analyzed: maunena sādhayati artham baka vat dṛḍha niścayaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.039/1 ity eke vihasanty enam eke durvātayanti ca
analyzed: iti eke vihasanti enam eke durvātayanti ca

original: BhP_11.23.039/3 taṃ babandhur nirurudhur yathā krīḍanakaṃ dvijam
analyzed: tam babandhuḥ nirurudhuḥ yathā krīḍanakam dvijam

original: BhP_11.23.040/1 evaṃ sa bhautikaṃ duḥkhaṃ daivikaṃ daihikaṃ ca yat
analyzed: evam sa bhautikam duḥkham daivikam daihikam ca yat

original: BhP_11.23.040/3 bhoktavyam ātmano diṣṭaṃ prāptaṃ prāptam abudhyata
analyzed: bhoktavyam ātmanaḥ diṣṭam prāptam prāptam abudhyata

original: BhP_11.23.041/1 paribhūta imāṃ gāthām agāyata narādhamaiḥ
analyzed: paribhūtaḥ imām gāthām agāyata nara adhamaiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.041/3 pātayadbhiḥ sva dharma-stho dhṛtim āsthāya sāttvikīm
analyzed: pātayadbhiḥ sva dharma sthaḥ dhṛtim āsthāya sāttvikīm

original: BhP_11.23.042/0 dvija uvāca
analyzed: dvijaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.23.042/1 nāyaṃ jano me sukha-duḥkha-hetur na devatātmā graha-karma-kālāḥ
analyzed: na ayam janaḥ me sukha duḥkha hetuḥ na devatā ātmā graha karma kālāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.042/3 manaḥ paraṃ kāraṇam āmananti saṃsāra-cakraṃ parivartayed yat
analyzed: manaḥ param kāraṇam āmananti saṃsāra cakram parivartayet yat

original: BhP_11.23.043/1 mano guṇān vai sṛjate balīyas tataś ca karmāṇi vilakṣaṇāni
analyzed: manaḥ guṇān vai sṛjate balīyaḥ tatas ca karmāṇi vilakṣaṇāni

original: BhP_11.23.043/3 śuklāni kṛṣṇāny atha lohitāni tebhyaḥ sa-varṇāḥ sṛtayo bhavanti
analyzed: śuklāni kṛṣṇāni atha lohitāni tebhyaḥ savarṇāḥ sṛtayaḥ bhavanti

original: BhP_11.23.044/1 anīha ātmā manasā samīhatā hiraṇ-mayo mat-sakha udvicaṣṭe
analyzed: anīhaḥ ātmā manasā samīhatā hiraṇmayaḥ mad sakhaḥ udvicaṣṭe

original: BhP_11.23.044/3 manaḥ sva-liṅgaṃ parigṛhya kāmān juṣan nibaddho guṇa-saṅgato 'sau
analyzed: manaḥ sva liṅgam parigṛhya kāmān juṣan nibaddhaḥ sau

original: BhP_11.23.045/1 dānaṃ sva-dharmo niyamo yamaś ca śrutaṃ ca karmāṇi ca sad-vratāni
analyzed: dānam svadharmaḥ niyamaḥ yamaḥ ca śrutam ca karmāṇi ca sat vratāni

original: BhP_11.23.045/3 sarve mano-nigraha-lakṣaṇāntāḥ paro hi yogo manasaḥ samādhiḥ
analyzed: sarve manaḥ nigraha lakṣaṇa antāḥ paraḥ hi yogaḥ manasaḥ samādhiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.046/1 samāhitaṃ yasya manaḥ praśāntaṃ dānādibhiḥ kiṃ vada tasya kṛtyam
analyzed: samāhitam yasya manaḥ praśāntam dāna ādibhiḥ kim vada tasya kṛtyam

original: BhP_11.23.046/3 asaṃyataṃ yasya mano vinaśyad dānādibhiś ced aparaṃ kim ebhiḥ
analyzed: asaṃyatam yasya manaḥ vinaśyat dāna ādibhiḥ ced aparam kim ebhiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.047/1 mano-vaśe 'nye hy abhavan sma devā manaś ca nānyasya vaśaṃ sameti
analyzed: manaḥ vaśe nye hi abhavan sma devāḥ manaḥ ca na anyasya vaśam sameti

original: BhP_11.23.047/3 bhīṣmo hi devaḥ sahasaḥ sahīyān yuñjyād vaśe taṃ sa hi deva-devaḥ
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ hi devaḥ sahasaḥ sahīyān yuñjyāt vaśe tam sa hi devadevaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.048/1 tam durjayaṃ śatrum asahya-vegam arun-tudaṃ tan na vijitya kecit
analyzed: tam durjayam śatrum asahya vegam aruntudam tat na vijitya kecid

original: BhP_11.23.048/3 kurvanty asad-vigraham atra martyair mitrāṇy udāsīna-ripūn vimūḍhāḥ
analyzed: kurvanti asat vigraham atra martyaiḥ mitrāṇi udāsīna ripūn vimūḍhāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.049/1 dehaṃ mano-mātram imaṃ gṛhītvā mamāham ity andha-dhiyo manuṣyāḥ
analyzed: deham manaḥ mātram imam gṛhītvā mama aham iti andha dhiyaḥ manuṣyāḥ

original: BhP_11.23.049/3 eṣo 'ham anyo 'yam iti bhrameṇa duranta-pāre tamasi bhramanti
analyzed: eṣaḥ ham anyaḥ yam iti bhrameṇa duranta pāre tamasi bhramanti

original: BhP_11.23.050/1 janas tu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoś cet kim ātmanaś cātra hi bhaumayos tat
analyzed: janaḥ tu hetuḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ ced kim ātmanaḥ ca atra hi bhaumayoḥ tat

original: BhP_11.23.050/3 jihvāṃ kvacit sandaśati sva-dadbhis tad-vedanāyāṃ katamāya kupyet
analyzed: jihvām kvacid sandaśati svadadbhiḥ tad vedanāyām katamāya kupyet

original: BhP_11.23.051/1 duḥkhasya hetur yadi devatās tu kim ātmanas tatra vikārayos tat
analyzed: duḥkhasya hetuḥ yadi devatāḥ tu kim ātmanaḥ tatra vikārayoḥ tat

original: BhP_11.23.051/3 yad aṅgam aṅgena nihanyate kvacit krudhyeta kasmai puruṣaḥ sva-dehe
analyzed: yat aṅgam aṅgena nihanyate kvacid krudhyeta kasmai puruṣaḥ sva dehe

original: BhP_11.23.052/1 ātmā yadi syāt sukha-duḥkha-hetuḥ kim anyatas tatra nija-svabhāvaḥ
analyzed: ātmā yadi syāt sukha duḥkha hetuḥ kim anyatas tatra nija svabhāvaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.052/3 na hy ātmano 'nyad yadi tan mṛṣā syāt krudhyeta kasmān na sukhaṃ na duḥkham
analyzed: na hi ātmanaḥ nyat yadi tat mṛṣā syāt krudhyeta kasmāt na sukham na duḥkham

original: BhP_11.23.053/1 grahā nimittaṃ sukha-duḥkhayoś cet kim ātmano 'jasya janasya te vai
analyzed: grahāḥ nimittam sukha duḥkhayoḥ ced kim ātmanaḥ jasya janasya te vai

original: BhP_11.23.053/3 grahair grahasyaiva vadanti pīḍāṃ krudhyeta kasmai puruṣas tato 'nyaḥ
analyzed: grahaiḥ grahasya eva vadanti pīḍām krudhyeta kasmai puruṣaḥ tatas

original: BhP_11.23.054/1 karmāstu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoś cet kim ātmanas tad dhi jaḍājaḍatve
analyzed: karma astu hetuḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ ced kim ātmanaḥ tat hi jaḍa ajaḍa tve

original: BhP_11.23.054/3 dehas tv acit puruṣo 'yaṃ suparṇaḥ krudhyeta kasmai na hi karma mūlam
analyzed: dehaḥ tu acit puruṣaḥ yam suparṇaḥ krudhyeta kasmai na hi karma mūlam

original: BhP_11.23.055/1 kālas tu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoś cet kim ātmanas tatra tad-ātmako 'sau
analyzed: kālaḥ tu hetuḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ ced kim ātmanaḥ tatra tad ātmakaḥ sau

original: BhP_11.23.055/3 nāgner hi tāpo na himasya tat syāt krudhyeta kasmai na parasya dvandvam
analyzed: na agneḥ hi tāpaḥ na himasya tat syāt krudhyeta kasmai na parasya dvandvam

original: BhP_11.23.056/1 na kenacit kvāpi kathañcanāsya dvandvoparāgaḥ parataḥ parasya
analyzed: na kenacid kvāpi kathañcana asya dvandva uparāgaḥ paratas parasya

original: BhP_11.23.056/3 yathāhamaḥ saṃsṛti-rūpiṇaḥ syād evaṃ prabuddho na bibheti bhūtaiḥ
analyzed: yathā ahamaḥ saṃsṛti rūpiṇaḥ syāt evam prabuddhaḥ na bibheti bhūtaiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.057/1 etāṃ sa āsthāya parātma-niṣṭhām adhyāsitāṃ pūrvatamair maharṣibhiḥ
analyzed: etām saḥ āsthāya parātma niṣṭhām adhyāsitām pūrvatamaiḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.23.057/3 ahaṃ tariṣyāmi duranta-pāraṃ tamo mukundāṅghri-niṣevayaiva
analyzed: aham tariṣyāmi duranta pāram tamaḥ mukunda aṅghri niṣevayā eva

original: BhP_11.23.058/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.23.058/1 nirvidya naṣṭa-draviṇe gata-klamaḥ pravrajya gāṃ paryaṭamāna ittham
analyzed: nirvidya naṣṭa draviṇe gata klamaḥ pravrajya gām paryaṭamānaḥ ittham

original: BhP_11.23.058/3 nirākṛto 'sadbhir api sva-dharmād akampito 'mūṃ munir āha gāthām
analyzed: sadbhiḥ api svadharmāt akampitaḥ mūm muniḥ āha gāthām

original: BhP_11.23.059/1 sukha-duḥkha-prado nānyaḥ puruṣasyātma-vibhramaḥ
analyzed: sukha duḥkha pradaḥ na anyaḥ puruṣasya ātma vibhramaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.059/3 mitrodāsīna-ripavaḥ saṃsāras tamasaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: mitra udāsīna ripavaḥ saṃsāraḥ tamasaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.060/1 tasmāt sarvātmanā tāta nigṛhāṇa mano dhiyā
analyzed: tasmāt sarva ātmanā tāta nigṛhāṇa manaḥ dhiyā

original: BhP_11.23.060/3 mayy āveśitayā yukta etāvān yoga-saṅgrahaḥ
analyzed: mayi āveśitayā yuktaḥ etāvān yoga saṅgrahaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.061/1 ya etāṃ bhikṣuṇā gītāṃ brahma-niṣṭhāṃ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ etām bhikṣuṇā gītām brahma niṣṭhām samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.23.061/3 dhārayañ chrāvayañ chṛṇvan dvandvair naivābhibhūyate
analyzed: dhārayam śrāvayam chṛṇvan dvandvaiḥ na eva abhibhūyate

original: BhP_11.24.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.24.001/1 atha te sampravakṣyāmi sāṅkhyaṃ pūrvair viniścitam
analyzed: atha te sampravakṣyāmi sāṅkhyam pūrvaiḥ viniścitam

original: BhP_11.24.001/3 yad vijñāya pumān sadyo jahyād vaikalpikaṃ bhramam
analyzed: yat vijñāya pumān sadyas jahyāt vaikalpikam bhramam

original: BhP_11.24.002/1 āsīj jñānam atho artha ekam evāvikalpitam
analyzed: āsīt jñānam atho arthaḥ ekam eva a vikalpitam

original: BhP_11.24.002/3 yadā viveka-nipuṇā ādau kṛta-yuge 'yuge
analyzed: yadā viveka nipuṇāḥ ādau kṛta yuge yuge

original: BhP_11.24.003/1 tan māyā-phala-rūpeṇa kevalaṃ nirvikalpitam
analyzed: tat māyā phala rūpeṇa kevalam niḥ vikalpitam

original: BhP_11.24.003/3 vāṅ-mano-'gocaraṃ satyaṃ dvidhā samabhavad bṛhat
analyzed: vāc manaḥ gocaram satyam dvidhā samabhavat bṛhat

original: BhP_11.24.004/1 tayor ekataro hy arthaḥ prakṛtiḥ sobhayātmikā
analyzed: tayoḥ ekataraḥ hi arthaḥ prakṛtiḥ sā ubhaya ātmikā

original: BhP_11.24.004/3 jñānaṃ tv anyatamo bhāvaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'bhidhīyate
analyzed: jñānam tu anyatamaḥ bhāvaḥ puruṣaḥ saḥ abhidhīyate

original: BhP_11.24.005/1 tamo rajaḥ sattvam iti prakṛter abhavan guṇāḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ rajaḥ sattvam iti prakṛteḥ abhavan guṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.24.005/3 mayā prakṣobhyamāṇāyāḥ puruṣānumatena ca
analyzed: mayā prakṣobhyamāṇāyāḥ puruṣa anumatena ca

original: BhP_11.24.006/1 tebhyaḥ samabhavat sūtraṃ mahān sūtreṇa saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ samabhavat sūtram mahān sūtreṇa saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.006/3 tato vikurvato jāto yo 'haṅkāro vimohanaḥ
analyzed: tatas vikurvataḥ jātaḥ yaḥ haṅkāraḥ vimohanaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.007/1 vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś cety ahaṃ tri-vṛt
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca iti aham trivṛt

original: BhP_11.24.007/3 tan-mātrendriya-manasāṃ kāraṇaṃ cid-acin-mayaḥ
analyzed: tanmātra indriya manasām kāraṇam cit acit mayaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.008/1 arthas tan-mātrikāj jajñe tāmasād indriyāṇi ca
analyzed: arthaḥ tanmātrikāt jajñe tāmasāt indriyāṇi ca

original: BhP_11.24.008/3 taijasād devatā āsann ekādaśa ca vaikṛtāt
analyzed: taijasāt devatāḥ āsan ekādaśa ca vaikṛtāt

original: BhP_11.24.009/1 mayā sañcoditā bhāvāḥ sarve saṃhatya-kāriṇaḥ
analyzed: mayā sañcoditāḥ bhāvāḥ sarve saṃhatya kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.009/3 aṇḍam utpādayām āsur mamāyatanam uttamam
analyzed: aṇḍam utpādayām āsuḥ mama āyatanam uttamam

original: BhP_11.24.010/1 tasminn ahaṃ samabhavam aṇḍe salila-saṃsthitau
analyzed: tasmin aham samabhavam aṇḍe salila saṃsthitau

original: BhP_11.24.010/3 mama nābhyām abhūt padmaṃ viśvākhyaṃ tatra cātma-bhūḥ
analyzed: mama nābhyām abhūt padmam viśva ākhyam tatra ca ātmabhūḥ

original: BhP_11.24.011/1 so 'sṛjat tapasā yukto rajasā mad-anugrahāt
analyzed: saḥ sṛjat tapasā yuktaḥ rajasā mad anugrahāt

original: BhP_11.24.011/3 lokān sa-pālān viśvātmā bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti tridhā
analyzed: lokān sa pālān viśvātmā bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti tridhā

original: BhP_11.24.012/1 devānām oka āsīt svar bhūtānāṃ ca bhuvaḥ padam
analyzed: devānām okaḥ āsīt svar bhūtānām ca bhuvaḥ padam

original: BhP_11.24.012/3 martyādīnāṃ ca bhūr lokaḥ siddhānāṃ tritayāt param
analyzed: martya ādīnām ca bhūḥ lokaḥ siddhānām tritayāt param

original: BhP_11.24.013/1 adho 'surāṇāṃ nāgānāṃ bhūmer oko 'sṛjat prabhuḥ
analyzed: adhas surāṇām nāgānām bhūmeḥ okaḥ sṛjat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_11.24.013/3 tri-lokyāṃ gatayaḥ sarvāḥ karmaṇāṃ tri-guṇātmanām
analyzed: trilokyām gatayaḥ sarvāḥ karmaṇām triguṇa ātmanām

original: BhP_11.24.014/1 yogasya tapasaś caiva nyāsasya gatayo 'malāḥ
analyzed: yogasya tapasaḥ ca eva nyāsasya gatayaḥ malāḥ

original: BhP_11.24.014/3 mahar janas tapaḥ satyaṃ bhakti-yogasya mad-gatiḥ
analyzed: mahar janaḥ tapaḥ satyam bhakti yogasya mad gatiḥ

original: BhP_11.24.015/1 mayā kālātmanā dhātrā karma-yuktam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: mayā kāla ātmanā dhātrā karma yuktam idam jagat

original: BhP_11.24.015/3 guṇa-pravāha etasminn unmajjati nimajjati
analyzed: guṇa pravāhaḥ etasmin unmajjati nimajjati

original: BhP_11.24.016/1 aṇur bṛhat kṛśaḥ sthūlo yo yo bhāvaḥ prasidhyati
analyzed: aṇuḥ bṛhat kṛśaḥ sthūlaḥ yaḥ yaḥ bhāvaḥ prasidhyati

original: BhP_11.24.016/3 sarvo 'py ubhaya-saṃyuktaḥ prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca
analyzed: sarvaḥ pi ubhaya saṃyuktaḥ prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca

original: BhP_11.24.017/1 yas tu yasyādir antaś ca sa vai madhyaṃ ca tasya san
analyzed: yaḥ tu yasya ādiḥ antaḥ ca sa vai madhyam ca tasya san

original: BhP_11.24.017/3 vikāro vyavahārārtho yathā taijasa-pārthivāḥ
analyzed: vikāraḥ vyavahāra arthaḥ yathā taijasa pārthivāḥ

original: BhP_11.24.018/1 yad upādāya pūrvas tu bhāvo vikurute 'param
analyzed: yat upādāya pūrvaḥ tu bhāvaḥ vikurute param

original: BhP_11.24.018/3 ādir anto yadā yasya tat satyam abhidhīyate
analyzed: ādiḥ antaḥ yadā yasya tat satyam abhidhīyate

original: BhP_11.24.019/1 prakṛtir yasyopādānam ādhāraḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ yasya upādānam ādhāraḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_11.24.019/3 sato 'bhivyañjakaḥ kālo brahma tat tritayaṃ tv aham
BhP_11.24.020/1 sargaḥ pravartate tāvat paurvāparyeṇa nityaśaḥ
analyzed: sargaḥ pravartate tāvat paurvāparyeṇa nityaśas

original: BhP_11.24.020/3 mahān guṇa-visargārthaḥ sthity-anto yāvad īkṣaṇam
BhP_11.24.021/1 virāṇ mayāsādyamāno loka-kalpa-vikalpakaḥ
analyzed: virāj mayā āsādyamānaḥ loka kalpa vikalpakaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.021/3 pañcatvāya viśeṣāya kalpate bhuvanaiḥ saha
analyzed: pañcatvāya viśeṣāya kalpate bhuvanaiḥ saha

original: BhP_11.24.022/1 anne pralīyate martyam annaṃ dhānāsu līyate
analyzed: anne pralīyate martyam annam dhānāsu līyate

original: BhP_11.24.022/3 dhānā bhūmau pralīyante bhūmir gandhe pralīyate
analyzed: dhānāḥ bhūmau pralīyante bhūmiḥ gandhe pralīyate

original: BhP_11.24.023/1 apsu pralīyate gandha āpaś ca sva-guṇe rase
analyzed: apsu pralīyate gandhaḥ āpaḥ ca sva guṇe rase

original: BhP_11.24.023/3 līyate jyotiṣi raso jyotī rūpe pralīyate
analyzed: līyate jyotiṣi rasaḥ jyotiḥ rūpe pralīyate

original: BhP_11.24.024/1 rūpaṃ vāyau sa ca sparśe līyate so 'pi cāmbare
analyzed: rūpam vāyau sa ca sparśe līyate ca ambare

original: BhP_11.24.024/3 ambaraṃ śabda-tan-mātra indriyāṇi sva-yoniṣu
analyzed: ambaram śabda tanmātre indriyāṇi sva yoniṣu

original: BhP_11.24.025/1 yonir vaikārike saumya līyate manasīśvare
analyzed: yoniḥ vaikārike saumya līyate manasi īśvare

original: BhP_11.24.025/3 śabdo bhūtādim apyeti bhūtādir mahati prabhuḥ
analyzed: śabdaḥ bhūtādim apyeti bhūtādiḥ mahati prabhuḥ

original: BhP_11.24.026/1 sa līyate mahān sveṣu guṇesu guṇa-vattamaḥ
analyzed: sa līyate mahān sveṣu guṇesu guṇavattamaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.026/3 te 'vyakte sampralīyante tat kāle līyate 'vyaye
analyzed: te vyakte sampralīyante tat kāle līyate vyaye

original: BhP_11.24.027/1 kālo māyā-maye jīve jīva ātmani mayy aje
analyzed: kālaḥ māyā maye jīve jīvaḥ ātmani mayi aje

original: BhP_11.24.027/3 ātmā kevala ātma-stho vikalpāpāya-lakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: ātmā kevalaḥ ātma sthaḥ vikalpa apāya lakṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.028/1 evam anvīkṣamāṇasya kathaṃ vaikalpiko bhramaḥ
analyzed: evam anvīkṣamāṇasya katham vaikalpikaḥ bhramaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.028/3 manaso hṛdi tiṣṭheta vyomnīvārkodaye tamaḥ
analyzed: manasaḥ hṛdi tiṣṭheta vyomni iva arka udaye tamaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.029/1 eṣa sāṅkhya-vidhiḥ proktaḥ saṃśaya-granthi-bhedanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa sāṅkhya vidhiḥ proktaḥ saṃśaya granthi bhedanaḥ

original: BhP_11.24.029/3 pratilomānulomābhyāṃ parāvara-dṛśa mayā
analyzed: pratiloma anulomābhyām parāvara dṛśa mayā

original: BhP_11.25.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.25.001/1 guṇānām asammiśrāṇāṃ pumān yena yathā bhavet
analyzed: guṇānām asammiśrāṇām pumān yena yathā bhavet

original: BhP_11.25.001/3 tan me puruṣa-varyedam upadhāraya śaṃsataḥ
analyzed: tat me puruṣa varya idam upadhāraya śaṃsataḥ

original: BhP_11.25.002/1 śamo damas titikṣekṣā tapaḥ satyaṃ dayā smṛtiḥ
analyzed: śamaḥ damaḥ titikṣā īkṣā tapaḥ satyam dayā smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.002/3 tuṣṭis tyāgo 'spṛhā śraddhā hrīr dayādiḥ sva-nirvṛtiḥ
analyzed: tuṣṭiḥ spṛhā śraddhā hrīḥ dayā ādiḥ sva nirvṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.003/1 kāma īhā madas tṛṣṇā stambha āśīr bhidā sukham
analyzed: kāmaḥ īhā madaḥ tṛṣṇā stambhaḥ āśīḥ bhidā sukham

original: BhP_11.25.003/3 madotsāho yaśaḥ-prītir hāsyaṃ vīryaṃ balodyamaḥ
BhP_11.25.004/1 krodho lobho 'nṛtaṃ hiṃsā yācñā dambhaḥ klamaḥ kaliḥ
analyzed: krodhaḥ lobhaḥ nṛtam hiṃsā yācñā dambhaḥ klamaḥ kaliḥ

original: BhP_11.25.004/3 śoka-mohau viṣādārtī nidrāśā bhīr anudyamaḥ
analyzed: śoka mohau viṣāda ārtī nidrā āśā bhīḥ anudyamaḥ

original: BhP_11.25.005/1 sattvasya rajasaś caitās tamasaś cānupūrvaśaḥ
analyzed: sattvasya rajasaḥ ca etāḥ tamasaḥ ca anupūrvaśas

original: BhP_11.25.005/3 vṛttayo varṇita-prāyāḥ sannipātam atho śṛṇu
analyzed: vṛttayaḥ varṇita prāyāḥ sannipātam atho śṛṇu

original: BhP_11.25.006/1 sannipātas tv aham iti mamety uddhava yā matiḥ
analyzed: sannipātaḥ tu aham iti mama iti uddhava yā matiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.006/3 vyavahāraḥ sannipāto mano-mātrendriyāsubhiḥ
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ sannipātaḥ manaḥ mātra indriya asubhiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.007/1 dharme cārthe ca kāme ca yadāsau pariniṣṭhitaḥ
analyzed: dharme ca arthe ca kāme ca yadā asau pariniṣṭhitaḥ

original: BhP_11.25.007/3 guṇānāṃ sannikarṣo 'yaṃ śraddhā-rati-dhanāvahaḥ
analyzed: guṇānām sannikarṣaḥ yam śraddhā rati dhana āvahaḥ

original: BhP_11.25.008/1 pravṛtti-lakṣaṇe niṣṭhā pumān yarhi gṛhāśrame
analyzed: pravṛtti lakṣaṇe niṣṭhā pumān yarhi gṛhāśrame

original: BhP_11.25.008/3 sva-dharme cānu tiṣṭheta guṇānāṃ samitir hi sā
analyzed: svadharme ca anu tiṣṭheta guṇānām samitiḥ hi sā

original: BhP_11.25.009/1 puruṣaṃ sattva-saṃyuktam anumīyāc chamādibhiḥ
analyzed: puruṣam sattva saṃyuktam anumīyāt śama ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.009/3 kāmādibhī rajo-yuktaṃ krodhādyais tamasā yutam
analyzed: kāma ādibhiḥ rajaḥ yuktam krodha ādyaiḥ tamasā yutam

original: BhP_11.25.010/1 yadā bhajati māṃ bhaktyā nirapekṣaḥ sva-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: yadā bhajati mām bhaktyā nirapekṣaḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.010/3 taṃ sattva-prakṛtiṃ vidyāt puruṣaṃ striyam eva vā
analyzed: tam sattva prakṛtim vidyāt puruṣam striyam eva vā

original: BhP_11.25.011/1 yadā āśiṣa āśāsya māṃ bhajeta sva-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: yadā āśiṣaḥ āśāsya mām bhajeta sva karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.011/3 taṃ rajaḥ-prakṛtiṃ vidyāt hiṃsām āśāsya tāmasam
analyzed: tam rajaḥ prakṛtim vidyāt hiṃsām āśāsya tāmasam

original: BhP_11.25.012/1 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇā jīvasya naiva me
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ jīvasya nā eva me

original: BhP_11.25.012/3 citta-jā yais tu bhūtānāṃ sajjamāno nibadhyate
analyzed: citta jāḥ yaiḥ tu bhūtānām sajjamānaḥ nibadhyate

original: BhP_11.25.013/1 yadetarau jayet sattvaṃ bhāsvaraṃ viśadaṃ śivam
analyzed: yadā itarau jayet sattvam bhāsvaram viśadam śivam

original: BhP_11.25.013/3 tadā sukhena yujyeta dharma-jñānādibhiḥ pumān
analyzed: tadā sukhena yujyeta dharma jñāna ādibhiḥ pumān

original: BhP_11.25.014/1 yadā jayet tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ saṅgaṃ bhidā calam
analyzed: yadā jayet tamaḥ sattvam rajaḥ saṅgam bhidā calam

original: BhP_11.25.014/3 tadā duḥkhena yujyeta karmaṇā yaśasā śriyā
analyzed: tadā duḥkhena yujyeta karmaṇā yaśasā śriyā

original: BhP_11.25.015/1 yadā jayed rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamo mūḍhaṃ layaṃ jaḍam
analyzed: jayet

original: BhP_11.25.015/3 yujyeta śoka-mohābhyāṃ nidrayā hiṃsayāśayā
analyzed: yujyeta śoka mohābhyām nidrayā hiṃsayā āśayā

original: BhP_11.25.016/1 yadā cittaṃ prasīdeta indriyāṇāṃ ca nirvṛtiḥ
analyzed: yadā cittam prasīdeta indriyāṇām ca nirvṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.016/3 dehe 'bhayaṃ mano-'saṅgaṃ tat sattvaṃ viddhi mat-padam
analyzed: dehe bhayam manaḥ saṅgam tat sattvam viddhi mad padam

original: BhP_11.25.017/1 vikurvan kriyayā cā-dhīr anivṛttiś ca cetasām
analyzed: vikurvan kriyayā ca adhīḥ anivṛttiḥ ca cetasām

original: BhP_11.25.017/3 gātrāsvāsthyaṃ mano bhrāntaṃ raja etair niśāmaya
analyzed: gātra asvāsthyam manaḥ bhrāntam rajaḥ etaiḥ niśāmaya

original: BhP_11.25.018/1 sīdac cittaṃ vilīyeta cetaso grahaṇe 'kṣamam
analyzed: sīdat cittam vilīyeta cetasaḥ grahaṇe kṣamam

original: BhP_11.25.018/3 mano naṣṭaṃ tamo glānis tamas tad upadhāraya
analyzed: manaḥ naṣṭam tamaḥ glāniḥ tamaḥ tat upadhāraya

original: BhP_11.25.019/1 edhamāne guṇe sattve devānāṃ balam edhate
analyzed: edhamāne guṇe sattve devānām balam edhate

original: BhP_11.25.019/3 asurāṇāṃ ca rajasi tamasy uddhava rakṣasām
analyzed: asurāṇām ca rajasi tamasi uddhava rakṣasām

original: BhP_11.25.020/1 sattvāj jāgaraṇaṃ vidyād rajasā svapnam ādiśet
analyzed: sattvāt jāgaraṇam vidyāt rajasā svapnam ādiśet

original: BhP_11.25.020/3 prasvāpaṃ tamasā jantos turīyaṃ triṣu santatam
analyzed: prasvāpam tamasā jantoḥ turīyam triṣu santatam

original: BhP_11.25.021/1 upary upari gacchanti sattvena brāhmaṇā janāḥ
analyzed: upari upari gacchanti sattvena brāhmaṇāḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_11.25.021/3 tamasādho 'dha ā-mukhyād rajasāntara-cāriṇaḥ
analyzed: tamasā adhas dhaḥ āmukhyāt rajasā antara cāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.25.022/1 sattve pralīnāḥ svar yānti nara-lokaṃ rajo-layāḥ
analyzed: sattve pralīnāḥ svar yānti nara lokam rajaḥ layāḥ

original: BhP_11.25.022/3 tamo-layās tu nirayaṃ yānti mām eva nirguṇāḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ layāḥ tu nirayam yānti mām eva nirguṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.25.023/1 mad-arpaṇaṃ niṣphalaṃ vā sāttvikaṃ nija-karma tat
analyzed: mad arpaṇam niṣphalam vā sāttvikam nija karma tat

original: BhP_11.25.023/3 rājasaṃ phala-saṅkalpaṃ hiṃsā-prāyādi tāmasam
analyzed: rājasam phala saṅkalpam hiṃsā prāya ādi tāmasam

original: BhP_11.25.024/1 kaivalyaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ rajo vaikalpikaṃ ca yat
analyzed: kaivalyam sāttvikam jñānam rajaḥ vaikalpikam ca yat

original: BhP_11.25.024/3 prākṛtaṃ tāmasaṃ jñānaṃ man-niṣṭhaṃ nirguṇaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: prākṛtam tāmasam jñānam manniṣṭham nirguṇam smṛtam

original: BhP_11.25.025/1 vanaṃ tu sāttviko vāso grāmo rājasa ucyate
analyzed: vanam tu sāttvikaḥ vāsaḥ grāmaḥ rājasaḥ ucyate

original: BhP_11.25.025/3 tāmasaṃ dyūta-sadanaṃ man-niketaṃ tu nirguṇam
analyzed: tāmasam dyūta sadanam mad niketam tu nirguṇam

original: BhP_11.25.026/1 sāttvikaḥ kārako 'saṅgī rāgāndho rājasaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: sāttvikaḥ saṅgī rāga andhaḥ rājasaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.25.026/3 tāmasaḥ smṛti-vibhraṣṭo nirguṇo mad-apāśrayaḥ
analyzed: tāmasaḥ smṛti vibhraṣṭaḥ nirguṇaḥ mad apāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.25.027/1 sāttviky ādhyātmikī śraddhā karma-śraddhā tu rājasī
analyzed: sāttvikī ādhyātmikī śraddhā karma śraddhā tu rājasī

original: BhP_11.25.027/3 tāmasy adharme yā śraddhā mat-sevāyāṃ tu nirguṇā
analyzed: tāmasī adharme yā śraddhā mad sevāyām tu nirguṇā

original: BhP_11.25.028/1 pathyaṃ pūtam anāyastam āhāryaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: pathyam pūtam anāyastam āhāryam sāttvikam smṛtam

original: BhP_11.25.028/3 rājasaṃ cendriya-preṣṭhaṃ tāmasaṃ cārti-dāśuci
analyzed: rājasam ca indriya preṣṭham tāmasam ca ārti da aśuci

original: BhP_11.25.029/1 sāttvikaṃ sukham ātmotthaṃ viṣayotthaṃ tu rājasam
analyzed: sāttvikam sukham ātma uttham viṣaya uttham tu rājasam

original: BhP_11.25.029/3 tāmasaṃ moha-dainyotthaṃ nirguṇaṃ mad-apāśrayam
analyzed: tāmasam moha dainya uttham nirguṇam mad apāśrayam

original: BhP_11.25.030/1 dravyaṃ deśaḥ phalaṃ kālo jñānaṃ karma ca kārakaḥ
analyzed: dravyam deśaḥ phalam kālaḥ jñānam karma ca kārakaḥ

original: BhP_11.25.030/3 śraddhāvasthākṛtir niṣṭhā trai-guṇyaḥ sarva eva hi
analyzed: śraddhā avasthā ākṛtiḥ niṣṭhā traiguṇyaḥ sarve eva hi

original: BhP_11.25.031/1 sarve guṇa-mayā bhāvāḥ puruṣāvyakta-dhiṣṭhitāḥ
analyzed: sarve guṇa mayāḥ bhāvāḥ puruṣa avyakta dhiṣṭhitāḥ

original: BhP_11.25.031/3 dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ anudhyātaṃ buddhyā vā puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: dṛṣṭam śrutam anudhyātam buddhyā vā puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_11.25.032/1 etāḥ saṃsṛtayaḥ puṃso guṇa-karma-nibandhanāḥ
analyzed: etāḥ saṃsṛtayaḥ puṃsaḥ guṇa karma nibandhanāḥ

original: BhP_11.25.032/3 yeneme nirjitāḥ saumya guṇā jīvena citta-jāḥ
analyzed: yena ime nirjitāḥ saumya guṇāḥ jīvena citta jāḥ

original: BhP_11.25.032/5 bhakti-yogena man-niṣṭho mad-bhāvāya prapadyate
analyzed: bhakti yogena manniṣṭhaḥ mad bhāvāya prapadyate

original: BhP_11.25.033/1 tasmād deham imaṃ labdhvā jñāna-vijñāna-sambhavam
analyzed: tasmāt deham imam labdhvā jñāna vijñāna sambhavam

original: BhP_11.25.033/3 guṇa-saṅgaṃ vinirdhūya māṃ bhajantu vicakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: guṇa saṅgam vinirdhūya mām bhajantu vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_11.25.034/1 niḥsaṅgo māṃ bhajed vidvān apramatto jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: niḥsaṅgaḥ mām bhajet vidvān apramattaḥ jita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.25.034/3 rajas tamaś cābhijayet sattva-saṃsevayā muniḥ
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ ca abhijayet sattva saṃsevayā muniḥ

original: BhP_11.25.035/1 sattvaṃ cābhijayed yukto nairapekṣyeṇa śānta-dhīḥ
analyzed: sattvam ca abhijayet yuktaḥ nairapekṣyeṇa śānta dhīḥ

original: BhP_11.25.035/3 sampadyate guṇair mukto jīvo jīvaṃ vihāya mām
analyzed: sampadyate guṇaiḥ muktaḥ jīvaḥ jīvam vihāya mām

original: BhP_11.25.036/1 jīvo jīva-vinirmukto guṇaiś cāśaya-sambhavaiḥ
analyzed: jīvaḥ jīva vinirmuktaḥ guṇaiḥ ca āśaya sambhavaiḥ

original: BhP_11.25.036/3 mayaiva brahmaṇā pūrṇo na bahir nāntaraś caret
analyzed: mayā eva brahmaṇā pūrṇaḥ na bahis na antaraḥ caret

original: BhP_11.26.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.26.001/1 mal-lakṣaṇam imaṃ kāyaṃ labdhvā mad-dharma āsthitaḥ
analyzed: mad lakṣaṇam imam kāyam labdhvā mad dharmaḥ āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.001/3 ānandaṃ paramātmānam ātma-sthaṃ samupaiti mām
analyzed: ānandam parama ātmānam ātma stham samupaiti mām

original: BhP_11.26.002/1 guṇa-mayyā jīva-yonyā vimukto jñāna-niṣṭhayā
analyzed: guṇa mayyā jīva yonyā vimuktaḥ jñāna niṣṭhayā

original: BhP_11.26.002/3 guṇeṣu māyā-mātreṣu dṛśyamāneṣv avastutaḥ
analyzed: guṇeṣu māyā mātreṣu dṛśyamāneṣu avastutas

original: BhP_11.26.002/5 vartamāno 'pi na pumān yujyate 'vastubhir guṇaiḥ
analyzed: vartamānaḥ pi na pumān yujyate vastubhiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.26.003/1 saṅgaṃ na kuryād asatāṃ śiśnodara-tṛpāṃ kvacit
analyzed: saṅgam na kuryāt asatām śiśna udara tṛpām kvacid

original: BhP_11.26.003/3 tasyānugas tamasy andhe pataty andhānugāndha-vat
analyzed: tasya anugaḥ tamasi andhe patati andha anuga andha vat

original: BhP_11.26.004/1 ailaḥ samrāḍ imāṃ gāthām agāyata bṛhac-chravāḥ
analyzed: ailaḥ samrāj imām gāthām agāyata bṛhat śravāḥ

original: BhP_11.26.004/3 urvaśī-virahān muhyan nirviṇṇaḥ śoka-saṃyame
analyzed: urvaśī virahāt muhyan nirviṇṇaḥ śoka saṃyame

original: BhP_11.26.005/1 tyaktvātmānaṃ vrayantīṃ tāṃ nagna unmatta-van nṛpaḥ
analyzed: tyaktvā ātmānam vrayantīm tām nagnaḥ unmatta vat nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.005/3 vilapann anvagāj jāye ghore tiṣṭheti viklavaḥ
analyzed: vilapan anvagāt jāye ghore tiṣṭha iti viklavaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.006/1 kāmān atṛpto 'nujuṣan kṣullakān varṣa-yāminīḥ
analyzed: kāmān atṛptaḥ nujuṣan kṣullakān varṣa yāminīḥ

original: BhP_11.26.006/3 na veda yāntīr nāyāntīr urvaśy-ākṛṣṭa-cetanaḥ
analyzed: na veda yāntīḥ na a yāntīḥ urvaśī ākṛṣṭa cetanaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.007/0 aila uvāca
analyzed: ailaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.26.007/1 aho me moha-vistāraḥ kāma-kaśmala-cetasaḥ
analyzed: aho me moha vistāraḥ kāma kaśmala cetasaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.007/3 devyā gṛhīta-kaṇṭhasya nāyuḥ-khaṇḍā ime smṛtāḥ
analyzed: devyāḥ gṛhīta kaṇṭhasya na āyuḥ khaṇḍāḥ ime smṛtāḥ

original: BhP_11.26.008/1 nāhaṃ vedābhinirmuktaḥ sūryo vābhyudito 'muyā
analyzed: na aham veda abhinirmuktaḥ sūryaḥ vā abhyuditaḥ muyā

original: BhP_11.26.008/3 mūṣito varṣa-pūgānāṃ batāhāni gatāny uta
analyzed: mūṣitaḥ varṣa pūgānām bata ahāni gatāni uta

original: BhP_11.26.009/1 aho me ātma-sammoho yenātmā yoṣitāṃ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: aho me ātma sammohaḥ yena ātmā yoṣitām kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.009/3 krīḍā-mṛgaś cakravartī naradeva-śikhāmaṇiḥ
BhP_11.26.010/1 sa-paricchadam ātmānaṃ hitvā tṛṇam iveśvaram
analyzed: sa paricchadam ātmānam hitvā tṛṇam iva īśvaram

original: BhP_11.26.010/3 yāntīṃ striyaṃ cānvagamaṃ nagna unmatta-vad rudan
analyzed: yāntīm striyam ca anvagamam nagnaḥ unmatta vat rudan

original: BhP_11.26.011/1 kutas tasyānubhāvaḥ syāt teja īśatvam eva vā
analyzed: kutas tasya anubhāvaḥ syāt tejaḥ īśa tvam eva vā

original: BhP_11.26.011/3 yo 'nvagacchaṃ striyaṃ yāntīṃ khara-vat pāda-tāḍitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ nvagaccham striyam yāntīm khara vat pāda tāḍitaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.012/1 kiṃ vidyayā kiṃ tapasā kiṃ tyāgena śrutena vā
analyzed: kim vidyayā kim tapasā kim tyāgena śrutena vā

original: BhP_11.26.012/3 kiṃ viviktena maunena strībhir yasya mano hṛtam
analyzed: kim viviktena maunena strībhiḥ yasya manaḥ hṛtam

original: BhP_11.26.013/1 svārthasyākovidaṃ dhiṅ māṃ mūrkhaṃ paṇḍita-māninam
analyzed: sva arthasya akovidam dhik mām mūrkham paṇḍita māninam

original: BhP_11.26.013/3 yo 'ham īśvaratāṃ prāpya strībhir go-khara-vaj jitaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ham īśvara tām prāpya strībhiḥ go khara vat jitaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.014/1 sevato varṣa-pūgān me urvaśyā adharāsavam
analyzed: sevataḥ varṣa pūgān me urvaśyāḥ adharāsavam

original: BhP_11.26.014/3 na tṛpyaty ātma-bhūḥ kāmo vahnir āhutibhir yathā
analyzed: na tṛpyati ātma bhūḥ kāmaḥ vahniḥ āhutibhiḥ yathā

original: BhP_11.26.015/1 puṃścalyāpahṛtaṃ cittaṃ ko nv anyo mocituṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: puṃścalyā apahṛtam cittam kaḥ nu anyaḥ mocitum prabhuḥ

original: BhP_11.26.015/3 ātmārāmeśvaram ṛte bhagavantam adhokṣajam
