analyzed: ātma ārāma īśvaram ṛte bhagavantam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_11.26.016/1 bodhitasyāpi devyā me sūkta-vākyena durmateḥ
analyzed: bodhitasya api devyā me sūkta vākyena durmateḥ

original: BhP_11.26.016/3 mano-gato mahā-moho nāpayāty ajitātmanaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ gataḥ mahā mohaḥ na apayāti ajita ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.017/1 kim etayā no 'pakṛtaṃ rajjvā vā sarpa-cetasaḥ
analyzed: kim etayā na u pakṛtam rajjvā vā sarpa cetasaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.017/3 draṣṭuḥ svarūpāviduṣo yo 'haṃ yad ajitendriyaḥ
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ sva rūpa a viduṣaḥ yaḥ ham yat ajita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.018/1 kvāyaṃ malīmasaḥ kāyo daurgandhyādy-ātmako 'śuciḥ
analyzed: kva ayam malīmasaḥ kāyaḥ daurgandhya ādi ātmakaḥ śuciḥ

original: BhP_11.26.018/3 kva guṇāḥ saumanasyādyā hy adhyāso 'vidyayā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: kva guṇāḥ saumanasya ādyāḥ hi adhyāsaḥ vidyayā kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.019/1 pitroḥ kiṃ svaṃ nu bhāryāyāḥ svāmino 'gneḥ śva-gṛdhrayoḥ
analyzed: pitroḥ kim svam nu bhāryāyāḥ svāminaḥ gneḥ śva gṛdhrayoḥ

original: BhP_11.26.019/3 kim ātmanaḥ kiṃ suhṛdām iti yo nāvasīyate
analyzed: kim ātmanaḥ kim suhṛdām iti yaḥ na avasīyate

original: BhP_11.26.020/1 tasmin kalevare 'medhye tuccha-niṣṭhe viṣajjate
analyzed: tasmin kalevare medhye tuccha niṣṭhe viṣajjate

original: BhP_11.26.020/3 aho su-bhadraṃ su-nasaṃ su-smitaṃ ca mukhaṃ striyaḥ
analyzed: aho su bhadram su nasam su smitam ca mukham striyaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.021/1 tvaṅ-māṃsa-rudhira-snāyu- medo-majjāsthi-saṃhatau
analyzed: tvak māṃsa rudhira snāyu medaḥ majja asthi saṃhatau

original: BhP_11.26.021/3 viṇ-mūtra-pūye ramatāṃ kṛmīṇāṃ kiyad antaram
analyzed: viṣ mūtra pūye ramatām kṛmīṇām kiyat antaram

original: BhP_11.26.022/1 athāpi nopasajjeta strīṣu straiṇeṣu cārtha-vit
analyzed: atha api na upasajjeta strīṣu straiṇeṣu ca artha vid

original: BhP_11.26.022/3 viṣayendriya-saṃyogān manaḥ kṣubhyati nānyathā
analyzed: viṣaya indriya saṃyogāt manaḥ kṣubhyati na anyathā

original: BhP_11.26.023/1 adṛṣṭād aśrutād bhāvān na bhāva upajāyate
analyzed: a dṛṣṭāt a śrutāt bhāvāt na bhāvaḥ upajāyate

original: BhP_11.26.023/3 asamprayuñjataḥ prāṇān śāmyati stimitaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: a samprayuñjataḥ prāṇān śāmyati stimitam manaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.024/1 tasmāt saṅgo na kartavyaḥ strīṣu straiṇeṣu cendriyaiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt saṅgaḥ na kartavyaḥ strīṣu straiṇeṣu ca indriyaiḥ

original: BhP_11.26.024/3 viduṣāṃ cāpy avisrabdhaḥ ṣaḍ-vargaḥ kim u mādṛśām
analyzed: viduṣām ca api a visrabdhaḥ ṣaḍvargaḥ kim mādṛśām

original: BhP_11.26.025/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.26.025/1 evaṃ pragāyan nṛpa-deva-devaḥ sa urvaśī-lokam atho vihāya
analyzed: evam pragāyan nṛpa deva devaḥ saḥ urvaśī lokam atho vihāya

original: BhP_11.26.025/3 ātmānam ātmany avagamya māṃ vai upāramaj jñāana-vidhūta-mohaḥ
analyzed: ātmānam ātmani avagamya mām vai upāramat jñāana vidhūta mohaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.026/1 tato duḥsaṅgam utsṛjya satsu sajjeta buddhimān
analyzed: tatas duḥsaṅgam utsṛjya satsu sajjeta buddhimān

original: BhP_11.26.026/3 santa evāsya chindanti mano-vyāsaṅgam uktibhiḥ
analyzed: santaḥ eva asya chindanti manaḥ vyāsaṅgam uktibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.26.027/1 santo 'napekṣā mac-cittāḥ praśāntāḥ sama-darśinaḥ
analyzed: santaḥ mad cittāḥ praśāntāḥ sama darśinaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.027/3 nirmamā nirahaṅkārā nirdvandvā niṣparigrahāḥ
analyzed: nirmamāḥ nirahaṅkārāḥ nirdvandvāḥ niṣparigrahāḥ

original: BhP_11.26.028/1 teṣu nityaṃ mahā-bhāga mahā-bhāgeṣu mat-kathāḥ
analyzed: teṣu nityam mahābhāga mahābhāgeṣu mad kathāḥ

original: BhP_11.26.028/3 sambhavanti hi tā nṝṇāṃ juṣatāṃ prapunanty agham
analyzed: sambhavanti hi tāḥ nṝṇām juṣatām prapunanti agham

original: BhP_11.26.029/1 tā ye śṛṇvanti gāyanti hy anumodanti cādṛtāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ ye śṛṇvanti gāyanti hi anumodanti ca ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_11.26.029/3 mat-parāḥ śraddadhānāś ca bhaktiṃ vindanti te mayi
analyzed: mad parāḥ śraddadhānāḥ ca bhaktim vindanti te mayi

original: BhP_11.26.030/1 bhaktiṃ labdhavataḥ sādhoḥ kim anyad avaśiṣyate
analyzed: bhaktim labdhavataḥ sādhoḥ kim anyat avaśiṣyate

original: BhP_11.26.030/3 mayy ananta-guṇe brahmaṇy ānandānubhavātmani
analyzed: mayi ananta guṇe brahmaṇi ānanda anubhava ātmani

original: BhP_11.26.031/1 yathopaśrayamāṇasya bhagavantaṃ vibhāvasum
analyzed: yathā upaśrayamāṇasya bhagavantam vibhāvasum

original: BhP_11.26.031/3 śītaṃ bhayaṃ tamo 'pyeti sādhūn saṃsevatas tathā
analyzed: śītam bhayam tamaḥ pyeti sādhūn saṃsevataḥ tathā

original: BhP_11.26.032/1 nimajjyonmajjatāṃ ghore bhavābdhau paramāyaṇam
analyzed: nimajjya unmajjatām ghore bhava abdhau parama ayaṇam

original: BhP_11.26.032/3 santo brahma-vidaḥ śāntā naur dṛḍhevāpsu majjatām
analyzed: santaḥ brahma vidaḥ śāntā nauḥ dṛḍhā iva apsu majjatām

original: BhP_11.26.033/1 annaṃ hi prāṇināṃ prāṇa ārtānāṃ śaraṇaṃ tv aham
analyzed: annam hi prāṇinām prāṇaḥ ārtānām śaraṇam tu aham

original: BhP_11.26.033/3 dharmo vittaṃ nṛṇāṃ pretya santo 'rvāg bibhyato 'raṇam
analyzed: dharmaḥ vittam nṛṇām pretya santaḥ rvāk bibhyataḥ raṇam

original: BhP_11.26.034/1 santo diśanti cakṣūṃsi bahir arkaḥ samutthitaḥ
analyzed: santaḥ diśanti cakṣūṃsi bahis arkaḥ samutthitaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.034/3 devatā bāndhavāḥ santaḥ santa ātmāham eva ca
analyzed: devatāḥ bāndhavāḥ santaḥ santaḥ ātmā aham eva ca

original: BhP_11.26.035/1 vaitasenas tato 'py evam urvaśyā loka-niṣpṛhaḥ
analyzed: vaitasenaḥ pi evam urvaśyā loka niṣpṛhaḥ

original: BhP_11.26.035/3 mukta-saṅgo mahīm etām ātmārāmaś cacāra ha
analyzed: mukta saṅgaḥ mahīm etām ātma ārāmaḥ cacāra ha

original: BhP_11.27.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.27.001/1 kriyā-yogaṃ samācakṣva bhavad-ārādhanaṃ prabho
analyzed: kriyā yogam samācakṣva bhavat ārādhanam prabho

original: BhP_11.27.001/3 yasmāt tvāṃ ye yathārcanti sātvatāḥ sātvatarṣabha
analyzed: yasmāt tvām ye yathā arcanti sātvatāḥ sātvata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_11.27.002/1 etad vadanti munayo muhur niḥśreyasaṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: etat vadanti munayaḥ muhur niḥśreyasam nṛṇām

original: BhP_11.27.002/3 nārado bhagavān vyāsa ācāryo 'ṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: nāradaḥ bhagavān vyāsaḥ ācāryaḥ ṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.003/1 niḥsṛtaṃ te mukhāmbhojād yad āha bhagavān ajaḥ
analyzed: niḥsṛtam te mukha ambhojāt yat āha bhagavān ajaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.003/3 putrebhyo bhṛgu-mukhyebhyo devyai ca bhagavān bhavaḥ
analyzed: putrebhyaḥ bhṛgu mukhyebhyaḥ devyai ca bhagavān bhavaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.004/1 etad vai sarva-varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca sammatam
analyzed: etat vai sarva varṇānām āśramāṇām ca sammatam

original: BhP_11.27.004/3 śreyasām uttamaṃ manye strī-śūdrāṇāṃ ca māna-da
analyzed: śreyasām uttamam manye strī śūdrāṇām ca mānada

original: BhP_11.27.005/1 etat kamala-patrākṣa karma-bandha-vimocanam
analyzed: etat kamala patra akṣa karma bandha vimocanam

original: BhP_11.27.005/3 bhaktāya cānuraktāya brūhi viśveśvareśvara
analyzed: bhaktāya ca anuraktāya brūhi viśveśvara īśvara

original: BhP_11.27.006/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.27.006/1 na hy anto 'nanta-pārasya karma-kāṇḍasya coddhava
analyzed: na hi antaḥ nanta pārasya karmakāṇḍasya ca uddhava

original: BhP_11.27.006/3 saṅkṣiptaṃ varṇayiṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ
analyzed: saṅkṣiptam varṇayiṣyāmi yathāvat anupūrvaśas

original: BhP_11.27.007/1 vaidikas tāntriko miśra iti me tri-vidho makhaḥ
analyzed: vaidikaḥ tāntrikaḥ miśraḥ iti me trividhaḥ makhaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.007/3 trayāṇām īpsitenaiva vidhinā māṃ samarcaret
analyzed: trayāṇām īpsitena eva vidhinā mām samarcaret

original: BhP_11.27.008/1 yadā sva-nigamenoktaṃ dvijatvaṃ prāpya pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: yadā sva nigamena uktam dvija tvam prāpya pūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.008/3 yathā yajeta māṃ bhaktyā śraddhayā tan nibodha me
analyzed: yathā yajeta mām bhaktyā śraddhayā tat nibodha me

original: BhP_11.27.009/1 arcāyāṃ sthaṇḍile 'gnau vā sūrye vāpsu hṛdi dvijaḥ
analyzed: arcāyām sthaṇḍile gnau vā sūrye vā apsu hṛdi dvijaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.009/3 dravyeṇa bhakti-yukto 'rcet sva-guruṃ mām amāyayā
analyzed: dravyeṇa bhakti yuktaḥ rcet sva gurum mām amāyayā

original: BhP_11.27.010/1 pūrvaṃ snānaṃ prakurvīta dhauta-danto 'ṅga-śuddhaye
analyzed: pūrvam snānam prakurvīta dhauta dantaḥ ṅga śuddhaye

original: BhP_11.27.010/3 ubhayair api ca snānaṃ mantrair mṛd-grahaṇādinā
analyzed: ubhayaiḥ api ca snānam mantraiḥ mṛd grahaṇa ādinā

original: BhP_11.27.011/1 sandhyopāstyādi-karmāṇi vedenācoditāni me
analyzed: sandhyā upāsti ādi karmāṇi vedena a coditāni me

original: BhP_11.27.011/3 pūjāṃ taiḥ kalpayet samyak- saṅkalpaḥ karma-pāvanīm
analyzed: pūjām taiḥ kalpayet samyak saṅkalpaḥ karma pāvanīm

original: BhP_11.27.012/1 śailī dāru-mayī lauhī lepyā lekhyā ca saikatī
analyzed: śailī dāru mayī lauhī lepyā lekhyā ca saikatī

original: BhP_11.27.012/3 mano-mayī maṇi-mayī pratimāṣṭa-vidhā smṛtā
analyzed: manaḥ mayī maṇi mayī pratimā aṣṭavidhā smṛtā

original: BhP_11.27.013/1 calācaleti dvi-vidhā pratiṣṭhā jīva-mandiram
analyzed: calā acalā iti dvividhā pratiṣṭhā jīva mandiram

original: BhP_11.27.013/3 udvāsāvāhane na staḥ sthirāyām uddhavārcane
analyzed: udvāsa āvāhane na staḥ sthirāyām uddhava arcane

original: BhP_11.27.014/1 asthirāyāṃ vikalpaḥ syāt sthaṇḍile tu bhaved dvayam
analyzed: asthirāyām vikalpaḥ syāt sthaṇḍile tu bhavet dvayam

original: BhP_11.27.014/3 snapanaṃ tv avilepyāyām anyatra parimārjanam
analyzed: snapanam tu avilepyāyām anyatra parimārjanam

original: BhP_11.27.015/1 dravyaiḥ prasiddhair mad-yāgaḥ pratimādiṣv amāyinaḥ
analyzed: dravyaiḥ prasiddhaiḥ madya āgaḥ pratimā ādiṣu amāyinaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.015/3 bhaktasya ca yathā-labdhair hṛdi bhāvena caiva hi
analyzed: bhaktasya ca yathālabdhaiḥ hṛdi bhāvena ca eva hi

original: BhP_11.27.016/1 snānālaṅkaraṇaṃ preṣṭham arcāyām eva tūddhava
analyzed: snāna alaṅkaraṇam preṣṭham arcāyām eva tu uddhava

original: BhP_11.27.016/3 sthaṇḍile tattva-vinyāso vahnāv ājya-plutaṃ haviḥ
BhP_11.27.017/1 sūrye cābhyarhaṇaṃ preṣṭhaṃ salile salilādibhiḥ
analyzed: sūrye ca abhyarhaṇam preṣṭham salile salila ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.27.017/3 śraddhayopāhṛtaṃ preṣṭhaṃ bhaktena mama vāry api
analyzed: śraddhayā upāhṛtam preṣṭham bhaktena mama vāri api

original: BhP_11.27.018/1 bhūry apy abhaktopāhṛtaṃ na me toṣāya kalpate
analyzed: bhūri api a bhakta upāhṛtam na me toṣāya kalpate

original: BhP_11.27.018/3 gandho dhūpaḥ sumanaso dīpo 'nnādyaṃ ca kiṃ punaḥ
analyzed: gandhaḥ dhūpaḥ sumanasaḥ dīpaḥ nnādyam ca kim punar

original: BhP_11.27.019/1 śuciḥ sambhṛta-sambhāraḥ prāg-darbhaiḥ kalpitāsanaḥ
analyzed: śuciḥ sambhṛta sambhāraḥ prāc darbhaiḥ kalpita āsanaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.019/3 āsīnaḥ prāg udag vārced arcāyāṃ tv atha sammukhaḥ
analyzed: āsīnaḥ prāk udak vā arcet arcāyām tu atha sammukhaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.020/1 kṛta-nyāsaḥ kṛta-nyāsāṃ mad-arcāṃ pāṇināmṛjet
analyzed: kṛta nyāsaḥ kṛta nyāsām mad arcām pāṇinā āmṛjet

original: BhP_11.27.020/3 kalaśaṃ prokṣaṇīyaṃ ca yathāvad upasādhayet
analyzed: kalaśam prokṣaṇīyam ca yathāvat upasādhayet

original: BhP_11.27.021/1 tad-adbhir deva-yajanaṃ dravyāṇy ātmānam eva ca
analyzed: tat adbhiḥ devayajanam dravyāṇi ātmānam eva ca

original: BhP_11.27.021/3 prokṣya pātrāṇi trīṇy adbhis tais tair dravyaiś ca sādhayet
analyzed: prokṣya pātrāṇi trīṇi adbhiḥ taiḥ taiḥ dravyaiḥ ca sādhayet

original: BhP_11.27.022/1 pādyārghyācamanīyārthaṃ trīṇi pātrāṇi deśikaḥ
analyzed: pādya arghya ācamanīya artham trīṇi pātrāṇi deśikaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.022/3 hṛdā śīrṣṇātha śikhayā gāyatryā cābhimantrayet
analyzed: hṛdā śīrṣṇā atha śikhayā gāyatryā ca abhimantrayet

original: BhP_11.27.023/1 piṇḍe vāyv-agni-saṃśuddhe hṛt-padma-sthāṃ parāṃ mama
analyzed: piṇḍe vāyu agni saṃśuddhe hṛd padma sthām parām mama

original: BhP_11.27.023/3 aṇvīṃ jīva-kalāṃ dhyāyen nādānte siddha-bhāvitām
BhP_11.27.024/1 tayātma-bhūtayā piṇḍe vyāpte sampūjya tan-mayaḥ
analyzed: tayā ātma bhūtayā piṇḍe vyāpte sampūjya tad mayaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.024/3 āvāhyārcādiṣu sthāpya nyastāṅgaṃ māṃ prapūjayet
analyzed: āvāhya arcā ādiṣu sthāpya nyasta aṅgam mām prapūjayet

original: BhP_11.27.025/1 pādyopasparśārhaṇādīn upacārān prakalpayet
analyzed: pādya upasparśa arhaṇa ādīn upacārān prakalpayet

original: BhP_11.27.025/3 dharmādibhiś ca navabhiḥ kalpayitvāsanaṃ mama
analyzed: dharma ādibhiḥ ca navabhiḥ kalpayitvā āsanam mama

original: BhP_11.27.026/1 padmam aṣṭa-dalaṃ tatra karṇikā-kesarojjvalam
BhP_11.27.026/3 ubhābhyāṃ veda-tantrābhyāṃ mahyaṃ tūbhaya-siddhaye
analyzed: ubhābhyām veda tantrābhyām mahyam tu ubhaya siddhaye

original: BhP_11.27.027/1 sudarśanaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ gadāsīṣu-dhanur-halān
analyzed: sudarśanam pāñcajanyam gadā sīṣu dhanuḥ halān

original: BhP_11.27.027/3 muṣalaṃ kaustubhaṃ mālāṃ śrīvatsaṃ cānupūjayet
analyzed: muṣalam kaustubham mālām śrīvatsam ca anupūjayet

original: BhP_11.27.028/1 nandaṃ sunandaṃ garuḍaṃ pracaṇḍaṃ caṇḍaṃ eva ca
analyzed: nandam sunandam garuḍam pracaṇḍam caṇḍam eva ca

original: BhP_11.27.028/3 mahābalaṃ balaṃ caiva kumudaṃ kamudekṣaṇam
analyzed: mahābalam balam ca eva kumudam kamudekṣaṇam

original: BhP_11.27.029/1 durgāṃ vināyakaṃ vyāsaṃ viṣvakṣenaṃ gurūn surān
analyzed: durgām vināyakam vyāsam viṣvakṣenam gurūn surān

original: BhP_11.27.029/3 sve sve sthāne tv abhimukhān pūjayet prokṣaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: sve sve sthāne tu abhimukhān pūjayet prokṣaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.27.030/1 candanośīra-karpūra- kuṅkumāguru-vāsitaiḥ
BhP_11.27.030/3 salilaiḥ snāpayen mantrair nityadā vibhave sati
analyzed: salilaiḥ snāpayet mantraiḥ nityadā vibhave sati

original: BhP_11.27.031/1 svarṇa-gharmānuvākena mahāpuruṣa-vidyayā
analyzed: svarṇa gharmānuvākena mahāpuruṣa vidyayā

original: BhP_11.27.031/3 pauruṣeṇāpi sūktena sāmabhī rājanādibhiḥ
analyzed: pauruṣeṇa api sūktena sāmabhiḥ rājana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.27.032/1 vastropavītābharaṇa- patra-srag-gandha-lepanaiḥ
analyzed: patra sraj gandha lepanaiḥ

original: BhP_11.27.032/3 alaṅkurvīta sa-prema mad-bhakto māṃ yathocitam
analyzed: alaṅkurvīta sa prema mad bhaktaḥ mām yathocitam

original: BhP_11.27.033/1 pādyam ācamanīyaṃ ca gandhaṃ sumanaso 'kṣatān
analyzed: pādyam ācamanīyam ca gandham sumanasaḥ kṣatān

original: BhP_11.27.033/3 dhūpa-dīpopahāryāṇi dadyān me śraddhayārcakaḥ
analyzed: dhūpa dīpa upahāryāṇi dadyāt me śraddhayā arcakaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.034/1 guḍa-pāyasa-sarpīṃṣi śaṣkuly-āpūpa-modakān
analyzed: guḍa pāyasa sarpīṃṣi śaṣkulyā apūpa modakān

original: BhP_11.27.034/3 saṃyāva-dadhi-sūpāṃś ca naivedyaṃ sati kalpayet
analyzed: saṃyāva dadhi sūpān ca naivedyam sati kalpayet

original: BhP_11.27.035/1 abhyaṅgonmardanādarśa- danta-dhāvābhiṣecanam
analyzed: abhyaṅga unmardana ādarśa dantadhāva abhiṣecanam

original: BhP_11.27.035/3 annādya-gīta-nṛtyāni parvaṇi syur utānv-aham
analyzed: annādya gīta nṛtyāni parvaṇi syuḥ uta anvaham

original: BhP_11.27.036/1 vidhinā vihite kuṇḍe mekhalā-garta-vedibhiḥ
analyzed: vidhinā vihite kuṇḍe mekhalā garta vedibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.27.036/3 agnim ādhāya paritaḥ samūhet pāṇinoditam
analyzed: agnim ādhāya paritas samūhet pāṇinā uditam

original: BhP_11.27.037/1 paristīryātha paryukṣed anvādhāya yathā-vidhi
analyzed: paristīrya atha paryukṣet anvādhāya yathāvidhi

original: BhP_11.27.037/3 prokṣaṇyāsādya dravyāṇi prokṣyāgnau bhāvayeta mām
analyzed: prokṣaṇī āsādya dravyāṇi prokṣya agnau bhāvayeta mām

original: BhP_11.27.038/1 tapta-jāmbūnada-prakhyaṃ śaṅkha-cakra-gadāmbujaiḥ
analyzed: tapta jāmbūnada prakhyam śaṅkha cakra gadā ambujaiḥ

original: BhP_11.27.038/3 lasac-catur-bhujaṃ śāntaṃ padma-kiñjalka-vāsasam
analyzed: lasat catur bhujam śāntam padma kiñjalka vāsasam

original: BhP_11.27.039/1 sphurat-kirīṭa-kaṭaka kaṭi-sūtra-varāṅgadam
analyzed: sphurat kirīṭa kaṭaka kaṭi sūtra vara aṅgadam

original: BhP_11.27.039/3 śrīvatsa-vakṣasaṃ bhrājat- kaustubhaṃ vana-mālinam
analyzed: śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubham vanamālinam

original: BhP_11.27.040/1 dhyāyann abhyarcya dārūṇi haviṣābhighṛtāni ca
analyzed: dhyāyan abhyarcya dārūṇi haviṣā abhighṛtāni ca

original: BhP_11.27.041/3 prāsyājya-bhāgāv āghārau dattvā cājya-plutaṃ haviḥ
analyzed: prāsya ājyabhāgau āghārau dattvā ca ājya plutam haviḥ

original: BhP_11.27.041/1 juhuyān mūla-mantreṇa ṣoḍaśarcāvadānataḥ
analyzed: juhuyāt mūlamantreṇa ṣoḍaśa ṛca avadānataḥ

original: BhP_11.27.041/3 dharmādibhyo yathā-nyāyaṃ mantraiḥ sviṣṭi-kṛtaṃ budhaḥ
analyzed: dharma ādibhyaḥ yathānyāyam mantraiḥ su iṣṭi kṛtam budhaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.042/1 abhyarcyātha namaskṛtya pārṣadebhyo baliṃ haret
analyzed: abhyarcya atha namaskṛtya pārṣadebhyaḥ balim haret

original: BhP_11.27.042/3 mūla-mantraṃ japed brahma smaran nārāyaṇātmakam
analyzed: japet

original: BhP_11.27.043/1 dattvācamanam uccheṣaṃ viṣvakṣenāya kalpayet
analyzed: dattvā ācamanam uccheṣam viṣvakṣenāya kalpayet

original: BhP_11.27.043/3 mukha-vāsaṃ surabhimat tāmbūlādyam athārhayet
analyzed: mukha vāsam surabhimat tāmbūla ādyam atha arhayet

original: BhP_11.27.044/1 upagāyan gṛṇan nṛtyan karmāṇy abhinayan mama
analyzed: upagāyan gṛṇan nṛtyan karmāṇi abhinayan mama

original: BhP_11.27.044/3 mat-kathāḥ śrāvayan śṛṇvan muhūrtaṃ kṣaṇiko bhavet
analyzed: mad kathāḥ śrāvayan śṛṇvan muhūrtam kṣaṇikaḥ bhavet

original: BhP_11.27.045/1 stavair uccāvacaiḥ stotraiḥ paurāṇaiḥ prākṛtair api
analyzed: stavaiḥ uccāvacaiḥ stotraiḥ paurāṇaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ api

original: BhP_11.27.045/3 stutvā prasīda bhagavann iti vandeta daṇḍa-vat
analyzed: stutvā prasīda bhagavan iti vandeta daṇḍavat

original: BhP_11.27.046/1 śiro mat-pādayoḥ kṛtvā bāhubhyāṃ ca parasparam
analyzed: śiraḥ mad pādayoḥ kṛtvā bāhubhyām ca parasparam

original: BhP_11.27.046/3 prapannaṃ pāhi mām īśa bhītaṃ mṛtyu-grahārṇavāt
analyzed: prapannam pāhi mām īśa bhītam mṛtyu graha arṇavāt

original: BhP_11.27.047/1 iti śeṣāṃ mayā dattāṃ śirasy ādhāya sādaram
analyzed: iti śeṣām mayā dattām śirasi ādhāya sa ādaram

original: BhP_11.27.047/3 udvāsayec ced udvāsyaṃ jyotir jyotiṣi tat punaḥ
analyzed: udvāsayet ced udvāsyam jyotiḥ jyotiṣi tat punar

original: BhP_11.27.048/1 arcādiṣu yadā yatra śraddhā māṃ tatra cārcayet
analyzed: arcā ādiṣu yadā yatra śraddhā mām tatra ca arcayet

original: BhP_11.27.048/3 sarva-bhūteṣv ātmani ca sarvātmāham avasthitaḥ
analyzed: sarva bhūteṣu ātmani ca sarva ātmā aham avasthitaḥ

original: BhP_11.27.049/1 evaṃ kriyā-yoga-pathaiḥ pumān vaidika-tāntrikaiḥ
analyzed: evam kriyā yoga pathaiḥ pumān vaidika tāntrikaiḥ

original: BhP_11.27.049/3 arcann ubhayataḥ siddhiṃ matto vindaty abhīpsitām
analyzed: arcan ubhayatas siddhim mattaḥ vindati abhīpsitām

original: BhP_11.27.050/1 mad-arcāṃ sampratiṣṭhāpya mandiraṃ kārayed dṛḍham
analyzed: mad arcām sampratiṣṭhāpya mandiram kārayet dṛḍham

original: BhP_11.27.050/3 puṣpodyānāni ramyāṇi pūjā-yātrotsavāśritān
analyzed: puṣpa udyānāni ramyāṇi pūjā yātrā utsava āśritān

original: BhP_11.27.051/1 pūjādīnāṃ pravāhārthaṃ mahā-parvasv athānv-aham
analyzed: pūjā ādīnām pravāha artham mahā parvasu atha anvaham

original: BhP_11.27.051/3 kṣetrāpaṇa-pura-grāmān dattvā mat-sārṣṭitām iyāt
analyzed: kṣetrāpaṇa pura grāmān dattvā matsa ārṣṭi tām iyāt

original: BhP_11.27.052/1 pratiṣṭhayā sārvabhaumaṃ sadmanā bhuvana-trayam
analyzed: pratiṣṭhayā sārvabhaumam sadmanā bhuvana trayam

original: BhP_11.27.052/3 pūjādinā brahma-lokaṃ tribhir mat-sāmyatām iyāt
BhP_11.27.053/1 mām eva nairapekṣyeṇa bhakti-yogena vindati
analyzed: mām eva nairapekṣyeṇa bhakti yogena vindati

original: BhP_11.27.053/3 bhakti-yogaṃ sa labhata evaṃ yaḥ pūjayeta mām
analyzed: bhakti yogam sa labhate evam yaḥ pūjayeta mām

original: BhP_11.27.054/1 yaḥ sva-dattāṃ parair dattāṃ hareta sura-viprayoḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sva dattām paraiḥ dattām hareta sura viprayoḥ

original: BhP_11.27.054/3 vṛttiṃ sa jāyate viḍ-bhug varṣāṇām ayutāyutam
analyzed: vṛttim sa jāyate viṣ bhuj varṣāṇām ayuta ayutam

original: BhP_11.27.055/1 kartuś ca sārather hetor anumoditur eva ca
analyzed: kartuḥ ca sāratheḥ hetoḥ anumodituḥ eva ca

original: BhP_11.27.055/3 karmaṇāṃ bhāginaḥ pretya bhūyo bhūyasi tat-phalam
analyzed: karmaṇām bhāginaḥ pretya bhūyas bhūyasi tad phalam

original: BhP_11.28.001/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.28.001/1 para-svabhāva-karmāṇi na praśaṃsen na garhayet
analyzed: para svabhāva karmāṇi na praśaṃset na garhayet

original: BhP_11.28.001/3 viśvam ekāmakaṃ paśyan prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca
analyzed: viśvam ekāmakam paśyan prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca

original: BhP_11.28.002/1 para-svabhāva-karmāṇi yaḥ praśaṃsati nindati
analyzed: para svabhāva karmāṇi yaḥ praśaṃsati nindati

original: BhP_11.28.002/3 sa āśu bhraśyate svārthād asaty abhiniveśataḥ
analyzed: saḥ āśu bhraśyate sva arthāt asati abhiniveśataḥ

original: BhP_11.28.003/1 taijase nidrayāpanne piṇḍa-stho naṣṭa-cetanaḥ
analyzed: taijase nidrayā āpanne piṇḍa sthaḥ naṣṭacetanaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.003/3 māyāṃ prāpnoti mṛtyuṃ vā tadvan nānārtha-dṛk pumān
analyzed: māyām prāpnoti mṛtyum vā tadvat nānā artha dṛś pumān

original: BhP_11.28.004/1 kiṃ bhadraṃ kim abhadraṃ vā dvaitasyāvastunaḥ kiyat
analyzed: kim bhadram kim abhadram vā dvaitasya avastunaḥ kiyat

original: BhP_11.28.004/3 vācoditaṃ tad anṛtaṃ manasā dhyātam eva ca
analyzed: vāc uditam tat anṛtam manasā dhyātam eva ca

original: BhP_11.28.005/1 chāyā-pratyāhvayābhāsā hy asanto 'py artha-kāriṇaḥ
BhP_11.28.005/3 evaṃ dehādayo bhāvā yacchanty ā-mṛtyuto bhayam
analyzed: evam deha ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ yacchanti āmṛtyutaḥ bhayam

original: BhP_11.28.006/1 ātmaiva tad idaṃ viśvaṃ sṛjyate sṛjati prabhuḥ
analyzed: ātmā eva tat idam viśvam sṛjyate sṛjati prabhuḥ

original: BhP_11.28.006/3 trāyate trāti viśvātmā hriyate haratīśvaraḥ
analyzed: trāyate trāti viśvātmā hriyate harati īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_11.28.007/1 tasmān na hy ātmano 'nyasmād anyo bhāvo nirūpitaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt na hi ātmanaḥ nyasmāt anyaḥ bhāvaḥ nirūpitaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.007/3 nirūpite 'yaṃ tri-vidhā nirmūla bhātir ātmani
analyzed: nirūpite yam trividhā nirmūla bhātiḥ ātmani

original: BhP_11.28.007/5 idaṃ guṇa-mayaṃ viddhi tri-vidhaṃ māyayā kṛtam
analyzed: idam guṇa mayam viddhi trividham māyayā kṛtam

original: BhP_11.28.008/1 etad vidvān mad-uditaṃ jñāna-vijñāna-naipuṇam
analyzed: etat vidvān mad uditam jñāna vijñāna naipuṇam

original: BhP_11.28.008/3 na nindati na ca stauti loke carati sūrya-vat
analyzed: na nindati na ca stauti loke carati sūrya vat

original: BhP_11.28.009/1 pratyakṣeṇānumānena nigamenātma-saṃvidā
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa anumānena nigamena ātma saṃvidā

original: BhP_11.28.009/3 ādy-antavad asaj jñātvā niḥsaṅgo vicared iha
analyzed: ādi anta vat asat jñātvā niḥsaṅgaḥ vicaret iha

original: BhP_11.28.010/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.28.010/1 naivātmano na dehasya saṃsṛtir draṣṭṛ-dṛśyayoḥ
analyzed: na eva ātmanaḥ na dehasya saṃsṛtiḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ

original: BhP_11.28.010/3 anātma-sva-dṛśor īśa kasya syād upalabhyate
analyzed: anātma sva dṛśoḥ īśa kasya syāt upalabhyate

original: BhP_11.28.011/1 ātmāvyayo 'guṇaḥ śuddhaḥ svayaṃ-jyotir anāvṛtaḥ
analyzed: ātmā avyayaḥ guṇaḥ śuddhaḥ svayam jyotiḥ anāvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.011/3 agni-vad dāru-vad acid dehaḥ kasyeha saṃsṛtiḥ
analyzed: agni vat dāru vat acit dehaḥ kasya iha saṃsṛtiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.012/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.28.012/1 yāvad dehendriya-prāṇair ātmanaḥ sannikarṣaṇam
analyzed: yāvat deha indriya prāṇaiḥ ātmanaḥ sannikarṣaṇam

original: BhP_11.28.012/3 saṃsāraḥ phalavāṃs tāvad apārtho 'py avivekinaḥ
analyzed: saṃsāraḥ phalavān tāvat apārthaḥ pi avivekinaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.013/1 arthe hy avidyamāne 'pi saṃsṛtir na nivartate
analyzed: arthe hi a vidyamāne saṃsṛtiḥ na nivartate

original: BhP_11.28.013/3 dhyāyato viṣayān asya svapne 'narthāgamo yathā
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ viṣayān asya svapne nartha āgamaḥ yathā

original: BhP_11.28.014/1 yathā hy apratibuddhasya prasvāpo bahv-anartha-bhṛt
analyzed: yathā hi a pratibuddhasya prasvāpaḥ bahu anartha bhṛt

original: BhP_11.28.014/3 sa eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate
analyzed: saḥ eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate

original: BhP_11.28.015/1 śoka-harṣa-bhaya-krodha- lobha-moha-spṛhādayaḥ
analyzed: śoka harṣa bhaya krodha lobha moha spṛhā ādayaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.015/3 ahaṅkārasya dṛśyante janma-mṛtyuś ca nātmanaḥ
analyzed: ahaṅkārasya dṛśyante janma mṛtyuḥ ca na ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.016/1 dehendriya-prāṇa-mano-'bhimāno jīvo 'ntar-ātmā guṇa-karma-mūrtiḥ
analyzed: deha indriya prāṇa manaḥ abhimānaḥ jīvaḥ ntarātmā guṇa karma mūrtiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.016/3 sūtraṃ mahān ity urudheva gītaḥ saṃsāra ādhāvati kāla-tantraḥ
analyzed: sūtram mahān iti urudhā iva gītaḥ saṃsāraḥ ādhāvati kāla tantraḥ

original: BhP_11.28.017/1 amūlam etad bahu-rūpa-rūpitaṃ mano-vacaḥ-prāṇa-śarīra-karma
analyzed: amūlam etat bahu rūpa rūpitam manaḥ vacaḥ prāṇa śarīra karma

original: BhP_11.28.017/3 jñānāsinopāsanayā śitena cchittvā munir gāṃ vicaraty atṛṣṇaḥ
analyzed: jñāna asinā upāsanayā śitena chittvā muniḥ gām vicarati atṛṣṇaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.018/1 jñānaṃ viveko nigamas tapaś ca pratyakṣam aitihyam athānumānam
analyzed: jñānam vivekaḥ nigamaḥ tapaḥ ca pratyakṣam aitihyam atha anumānam

original: BhP_11.28.018/3 ādy-antayor asya yad eva kevalaṃ kālaś ca hetuś ca tad eva madhye
analyzed: ādi antayoḥ asya yat eva kevalam kālaḥ ca hetuḥ ca tat eva madhye

original: BhP_11.28.019/1 yathā hiraṇyaṃ sv-akṛtaṃ purastāt paścāc ca sarvasya hiraṇ-mayasya
analyzed: yathā hiraṇyam svakṛtam purastāt paścāt ca sarvasya hiraṇmayasya

original: BhP_11.28.019/3 tad eva madhye vyavahāryamāṇaṃ nānāpadeśair aham asya tadvat
analyzed: tat eva madhye vyavahāryamāṇam nānā apadeśaiḥ aham asya tadvat

original: BhP_11.28.020/1 vijñānam etat triy-avastham aṅga guṇa-trayaṃ kāraṇa-karya-kartṛ
analyzed: vijñānam etat aṅga guṇa trayam kāraṇa karya kartṛ

original: BhP_11.28.020/3 samanvayena vyatirekataś ca yenaiva turyeṇa tad eva satyam
analyzed: samanvayena vyatirekataḥ ca yena eva turyeṇa tat eva satyam

original: BhP_11.28.021/1 na yat purastād uta yan na paścān madhye ca tan na vyapadeśa-mātram
analyzed: na yat purastāt uta yat na paścāt madhye ca tat na vyapadeśa mātram

original: BhP_11.28.021/3 bhūtaṃ prasiddhaṃ ca pareṇa yad yat tad eva tat syād iti me manīṣā
analyzed: bhūtam prasiddham ca pareṇa yat yat tat eva tat syāt iti me manīṣā

original: BhP_11.28.022/1 avidyamāno 'py avabhāsate yo vaikāriko rājasa-sarga esaḥ
analyzed: a vidyamānaḥ pi avabhāsate yaḥ vaikārikaḥ rājasa sargaḥ esaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.022/3 brahma svayaṃ jyotir ato vibhāti brahmendriyārthātma-vikāra-citram
analyzed: brahma svayam jyotiḥ atas vibhāti brahma indriyārtha ātma vikāra citram

original: BhP_11.28.023/1 evaṃ sphutaṃ brahma-viveka-hetubhiḥ
analyzed: evam sphutam brahma viveka hetubhiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.023/2 parāpavādena viśāradena
analyzed: para apavādena viśāradena

original: BhP_11.28.023/3 chittvātma-sandeham upārameta
analyzed: chittvā ātma sandeham upārameta

original: BhP_11.28.023/4 svānanda-tuṣṭo 'khila-kāmukebhyaḥ
analyzed: su ānanda tuṣṭaḥ khila kāmukebhyaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.024/1 nātmā vapuḥ pārthivam indriyāṇi devā hy asur vāyur jalam hutāśaḥ
analyzed: na ātmā vapuḥ pārthivam indriyāṇi devāḥ hi asuḥ vāyuḥ jalam hutāśaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.024/3 mano 'nna-mātraṃ dhiṣaṇā ca sattvam ahaṅkṛtiḥ khaṃ kṣitir artha-sāmyam
analyzed: manaḥ nna mātram dhiṣaṇā ca sattvam ahaṅkṛtiḥ kham kṣitiḥ artha sāmyam

original: BhP_11.28.025/1 samāhitaiḥ kaḥ karaṇair guṇātmabhir
analyzed: samāhitaiḥ kaḥ karaṇaiḥ guṇa ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.025/2 guṇo bhaven mat-suvivikta-dhāmnaḥ
analyzed: guṇaḥ bhavet mad su vivikta dhāmnaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.025/3 vikṣipyamāṇair uta kiṃ nu dūṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: vikṣipyamāṇaiḥ uta kim nu dūṣaṇam

original: BhP_11.28.025/4 ghanair upetair vigatai raveḥ kim
analyzed: ghanaiḥ upetaiḥ vigataiḥ raveḥ kim

original: BhP_11.28.026/1 yathā nabho vāyv-analāmbu-bhū-guṇair
analyzed: yathā nabhaḥ vāyu anala ambu bhū guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.026/2 gatāgatair vartu-guṇair na sajjate
analyzed: gata āgataiḥ vā ṛtu guṇaiḥ na sajjate

original: BhP_11.28.026/3 tathākṣaraṃ sattva-rajas-tamo-malair
analyzed: tathā akṣaram sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ malaiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.026/4 ahaṃ-mateḥ saṃsṛti-hetubhiḥ param
analyzed: ahaṃmateḥ saṃsṛti hetubhiḥ param

original: BhP_11.28.027/1 tathāpi saṅgaḥ parivarjanīyo guṇeṣu māyā-raciteṣu tāvat
analyzed: tathā api saṅgaḥ parivarjanīyaḥ guṇeṣu māyā raciteṣu tāvat

original: BhP_11.28.027/3 mad-bhakti-yogena dṛḍhena yāvad rajo nirasyeta manaḥ-kaṣāyaḥ
analyzed: mad bhakti yogena dṛḍhena yāvat rajaḥ nirasyeta manaḥ kaṣāyaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.028/1 yathāmayo 'sādhu cikitsito nṛṇāṃ punaḥ punaḥ santudati prarohan
analyzed: yathā āmayo sādhu cikitsitaḥ nṛṇām punar punar santudati prarohan

original: BhP_11.28.028/3 evaṃ mano 'pakva-kaṣāya-karma kuyoginaṃ vidhyati sarva-saṅgam
analyzed: evam mano pakva kaṣāya karma ku yoginam vidhyati sarva saṅgam

original: BhP_11.28.029/1 kuyogino ye vihitāntarāyair manuṣya-bhūtais tridaśopasṛṣṭaiḥ
analyzed: ku yoginaḥ ye vihita antarāyaiḥ manuṣya bhūtaiḥ tridaśa upasṛṣṭaiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.029/3 te prāktanābhyāsa-balena bhūyo yuñjanti yogaṃ na tu karma-tantram
analyzed: te prāktana abhyāsa balena bhūyas yuñjanti yogam na tu karma tantram

original: BhP_11.28.030/1 karoti karma kriyate ca jantuḥ kenāpy asau codita ā-nipatāt
analyzed: karoti karma kriyate ca jantuḥ kena api asau coditaḥ ānipatāt

original: BhP_11.28.030/3 na tatra vidvān prakṛtau sthito 'pi nivṛtta-tṛṣṇaḥ sva-sukhānubhūtyā
analyzed: na tatra vidvān prakṛtau sthitaḥ pi nivṛtta tṛṣṇaḥ sva sukha anubhūtyā

original: BhP_11.28.031/1 tiṣṭhantam āsīnam uta vrajantaṃ śayānam ukṣantam adantam annam
analyzed: tiṣṭhantam āsīnam uta vrajantam śayānam ukṣantam adantam annam

original: BhP_11.28.031/3 svabhāvam anyat kim apīhamānam ātmānam ātma-stha-matir na veda
analyzed: svabhāvam anyat kim api īhamānam ātmānam ātma stha matiḥ na veda

original: BhP_11.28.032/1 yadi sma paśyaty asad-indriyārthaṃ nānānumānena viruddham anyat
analyzed: yadi sma paśyati asat indriya artham nānā anumānena viruddham anyat

original: BhP_11.28.032/3 na manyate vastutayā manīṣī svāpnaṃ yathotthāya tirodadhānam
analyzed: na manyate vastu tayā manīṣī svāpnam yathā utthāya tirodadhānam

original: BhP_11.28.033/1 pūrvaṃ gṛhītaṃ guṇa-karma-citram ajñānam ātmany aviviktam aṅga
analyzed: pūrvam gṛhītam guṇa karma citram ajñānam ātmani aviviktam aṅga

original: BhP_11.28.033/3 nivartate tat punar īkṣayaiva na gṛhyate nāpi visṛyya ātmā
analyzed: nivartate tat punar īkṣayā eva na gṛhyate na api visṛyyaḥ ātmā

original: BhP_11.28.034/1 yathā hi bhānor udayo nṛ-cakṣuṣāṃ tamo nihanyān na tu sad vidhatte
analyzed: yathā hi bhānoḥ udayaḥ nṛ cakṣuṣām tamaḥ nihanyāt na tu sat vidhatte

original: BhP_11.28.034/3 evaṃ samīkṣā nipuṇā satī me hanyāt tamisraṃ puruṣasya buddheḥ
analyzed: evam samīkṣā nipuṇā satī me hanyāt tamisram puruṣasya buddheḥ

original: BhP_11.28.035/1 eṣa svayaṃ-jyotir ajo 'prameyo mahānubhūtiḥ sakalānubhūtiḥ
analyzed: eṣa svayam jyotiḥ ajaḥ prameyaḥ mahā anubhūtiḥ sakala anubhūtiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.035/3 eko 'dvitīyo vacasāṃ virāme yeneṣitā vāg-asavaś caranti
analyzed: ekaḥ dvitīyaḥ vacasām virāme yena iṣitāḥ vāgasavaḥ caranti

original: BhP_11.28.036/1 etāvān ātma-sammoho yad vikalpas tu kevale
analyzed: etāvān ātma sammohaḥ yat vikalpaḥ tu kevale

original: BhP_11.28.036/3 ātman ṛte svam ātmānam avalambo na yasya hi
analyzed: ātman ṛte svam ātmānam avalambaḥ na yasya hi

original: BhP_11.28.037/1 yan nāmākṛtibhir grāhyaṃ pañca-varṇam abādhitam
analyzed: yat nāma ākṛtibhiḥ grāhyam pañca varṇam a bādhitam

original: BhP_11.28.037/3 vyarthenāpy artha-vādo 'yaṃ dvayaṃ paṇḍita-māninām
analyzed: vyarthena api artha vādaḥ yam dvayam paṇḍita māninām

original: BhP_11.28.038/1 yogino 'pakva-yogasya yuñjataḥ kāya utthitaiḥ
analyzed: yoginaḥ pakva yogasya yuñjataḥ kāyaḥ utthitaiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.038/3 upasargair vihanyeta tatrāyaṃ vihito vidhiḥ
analyzed: upasargaiḥ vihanyeta tatra ayam vihitaḥ vidhiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.039/1 yoga-dhāraṇayā kāṃścid āsanair dhāraṇānvitaiḥ
analyzed: yoga dhāraṇayā kāṃścid āsanaiḥ dhāraṇā anvitaiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.039/3 tapo-mantrauṣadhaiḥ kāṃścid upasargān vinirdahet
analyzed: tapaḥ mantra auṣadhaiḥ kāṃścid upasargān vinirdahet

original: BhP_11.28.040/1 kāṃścin mamānudhyānena nāma-saṅkīrtanādibhiḥ
analyzed: kāṃścid mama anudhyānena nāma saṅkīrtana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.28.040/3 yogeśvarānuvṛttyā vā hanyād aśubha-dān śanaiḥ
BhP_11.28.041/1 kecid deham imaṃ dhīrāḥ su-kalpaṃ vayasi sthiram
analyzed: kecid deham imam dhīrāḥ su kalpam vayasi sthiram

original: BhP_11.28.041/3 vidhāya vividhopāyair atha yuñjanti siddhaye
analyzed: vidhāya vividha upāyaiḥ atha yuñjanti siddhaye

original: BhP_11.28.042/1 na hi tat kuśalādṛtyaṃ tad-āyāso hy apārthakaḥ
analyzed: na hi tat kuśala ādṛtyam tad āyāsaḥ hi apārthakaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.042/3 antavattvāc charīrasya phalasyeva vanaspateḥ
analyzed: antavat tvāt śarīrasya phalasya iva vanaspateḥ

original: BhP_11.28.043/1 yogaṃ niṣevato nityaṃ kāyaś cet kalpatām iyāt
analyzed: yogam niṣevataḥ nityam kāyaḥ ced kalpa tām iyāt

original: BhP_11.28.043/3 tac chraddadhyān na matimān yogam utsṛjya mat-paraḥ
analyzed: tat śraddadhyāt na matimān yogam utsṛjya mad paraḥ

original: BhP_11.28.044/1 yoga-caryām imāṃ yogī vicaran mad-apāśrayaḥ
analyzed: yoga caryām imām yogī vicaran mad apāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_11.28.044/3 nāntarāyair vihanyeta niḥspṛhaḥ sva-sukhānubhūḥ
analyzed: na antarāyaiḥ vihanyeta niḥspṛhaḥ sva sukha anubhūḥ

original: BhP_11.29.001/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.29.001/1 su-dustarām imāṃ manye yoga-caryām anātmanaḥ
analyzed: su dustarām imām manye yoga caryām anātmanaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.001/3 yathāñjasā pumān siddhyet tan me brūhy añjasācyuta
analyzed: yathā añjasā pumān siddhyet tat me brūhi añjasā acyuta

original: BhP_11.29.002/1 prāyaśaḥ puṇdarīkākṣa yuñyanto yogino manaḥ
analyzed: prāyaśas puṇdarīkākṣa yuñyantaḥ yoginaḥ manaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.002/3 viṣīdanty asamādhānān mano-nigraha-karśitāḥ
analyzed: viṣīdanti asamādhānāt manaḥ nigraha karśitāḥ

original: BhP_11.29.003/1 athāta ānanda-dughaṃ padāmbujaṃ haṃsāḥ śrayerann aravinda-locana
analyzed: atha atas ānanda dugham pada ambujam haṃsāḥ śrayeran aravinda locana

original: BhP_11.29.003/3 sukhaṃ nu viśveśvara yoga-karmabhis tvan-māyayāmī vihatā na māninaḥ
analyzed: sukham nu viśveśvara yoga karmabhiḥ tvad māyayā amī vihatāḥ na māninaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.004/1 kiṃ citram acyuta tavaitad aśeṣa-bandho dāseṣv ananya-śaraṇesu yad ātma-sāttvam
analyzed: kim citram acyuta tava etat aśeṣa bandho dāseṣu an anya śaraṇesu yat ātmasāt tvam

original: BhP_11.29.004/3 yo 'rocayat saha mṛgaiḥ svayam īśvarāṇāṃ śrīmat-kirīṭa-taṭa-pīḍita-pāda-pīṭhaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ rocayat saha mṛgaiḥ svayam īśvarāṇām śrīmat kirīṭa taṭa pīḍita pāda pīṭhaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.005/1 taṃ tvākhilātma-dayiteśvaram āśritānāṃ
analyzed: tam tvā akhila ātma dayita īśvaram āśritānām

original: BhP_11.29.005/2 sarvārtha-daṃ sva-kṛta-vid visṛjeta ko nu
analyzed: sarva artha dam svakṛta vid visṛjeta kaḥ nu

original: BhP_11.29.005/3 ko vā bhajet kim api vismṛtaye 'nu bhūtyai
analyzed: kaḥ vā bhajet kim api vismṛtaye nu bhūtyai

original: BhP_11.29.005/4 kiṃ vā bhaven na tava pāda-rajo-juṣāṃ naḥ
analyzed: kim vā bhavet na tava pāda rajaḥ juṣām naḥ

original: BhP_11.29.006/1 naivopayanty apacitiṃ kavayas taveśa
analyzed: na eva upayanti apacitim kavayaḥ tava īśa

original: BhP_11.29.006/2 brahmāyuṣāpi kṛtam ṛddha-mudaḥ smarantaḥ
analyzed: brahma āyuṣā api kṛtam ṛddha mudaḥ smarantaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.006/3 yo 'ntar bahis tanu-bhṛtām aśubhaṃ vidhunvann
analyzed: yaḥ ntar bahis tanubhṛtām aśubham vidhunvan

original: BhP_11.29.006/4 ācārya-caittya-vapuṣā sva-gatiṃ vyanakti
analyzed: ācārya caittya vapuṣā sva gatim vyanakti

original: BhP_11.29.007/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.29.007/1 ity uddhavenāty-anurakta-cetasā pṛṣṭo jagat-krīḍanakaḥ sva-śaktibhiḥ
analyzed: iti uddhavena ati anurakta cetasā pṛṣṭaḥ jagatkrīḍanakaḥ sva śaktibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.29.007/3 gṛhīta-mūrti-traya īśvareśvaro jagāda sa-prema-manohara-smitaḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta mūrti trayaḥ īśvara īśvaraḥ jagāda sa prema manohara smitaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.008/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.29.008/1 hanta te kathayiṣyāmi mama dharmān su-maṅgalān
analyzed: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi mama dharmān su maṅgalān

original: BhP_11.29.008/3 yān śraddhayācaran martyo mṛtyuṃ jayati durjayam
analyzed: yān śraddhayā ācaran martyaḥ mṛtyum jayati durjayam

original: BhP_11.29.009/1 kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi mad-arthaṃ śanakaiḥ smaran
analyzed: kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi mad artham śanakais smaran

original: BhP_11.29.009/3 mayy arpita-manaś-citto mad-dharmātma-mano-ratiḥ
analyzed: mayi arpita manaḥ cittaḥ mad dharma ātma manoratiḥ

original: BhP_11.29.010/1 deśān puṇyān āśrayeta mad-bhaktaiḥ sādhubhiḥ śritān
analyzed: deśān puṇyān āśrayeta mad bhaktaiḥ sādhubhiḥ śritān

original: BhP_11.29.010/3 devāsura-manuṣyeṣu mad-bhaktācaritāni ca
analyzed: deva asura manuṣyeṣu mad bhakta ācaritāni ca

original: BhP_11.29.011/1 pṛthak satreṇa vā mahyaṃ parva-yātrā-mahotsavān
analyzed: pṛthak satreṇa vā mahyam parva yātrā mahā utsavān

original: BhP_11.29.011/3 kārayed gīta-nṛtyādyair mahārāja-vibhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: kārayet gīta nṛtya ādyaiḥ mahā rāja vibhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.29.012/1 mām eva sarva-bhūteṣu bahir antar apāvṛtam
analyzed: mām eva sarva bhūteṣu bahis antar apāvṛtam

original: BhP_11.29.012/3 īkṣetātmani cātmānaṃ yathā kham amalāśayaḥ
analyzed: īkṣeta ātmani ca ātmānam yathā kham amala āśayaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.013/1 iti sarvāṇi bhūtāni mad-bhāvena mahā-dyute
analyzed: iti sarvāṇi bhūtāni mad bhāvena mahā dyute

original: BhP_11.29.013/3 sabhājayan manyamāno jñānaṃ kevalam āśritaḥ
analyzed: sabhājayan manyamānaḥ jñānam kevalam āśritaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.014/1 brāhmaṇe pukkase stene brahmaṇye 'rke sphuliṅgake
analyzed: brāhmaṇe pukkase stene brahmaṇye rke sphuliṅgake

original: BhP_11.29.014/3 akrūre krūrake caiva sama-dṛk paṇḍito mataḥ
analyzed: akrūre krūrake ca eva samadṛś paṇḍitaḥ mataḥ

original: BhP_11.29.015/1 nareṣv abhīkṣṇaṃ mad-bhāvaṃ puṃso bhāvayato 'cirāt
analyzed: nareṣu abhīkṣṇam mad bhāvam puṃsaḥ cirāt

original: BhP_11.29.015/3 spardhāsūyā-tiraskārāḥ sāhaṅkārā viyanti hi
analyzed: spardhā asūyā tiraskārāḥ sa ahaṅkārāḥ viyanti hi

original: BhP_11.29.016/1 visṛjya smayamānān svān dṛśaṃ vrīḍāṃ ca daihikīm
analyzed: visṛjya smayamānān svān dṛśam vrīḍām ca daihikīm

original: BhP_11.29.016/3 praṇamed daṇḍa-vad bhūmāv ā-śva-cāṇḍāla-go-kharam
analyzed: praṇamet daṇḍa vat bhūmau āśva cāṇḍāla go kharam

original: BhP_11.29.017/1 yāvat sarveṣu bhūteṣu mad-bhāvo nopajāyate
analyzed: yāvat sarveṣu bhūteṣu mad bhāvaḥ na upajāyate

original: BhP_11.29.017/3 tāvad evam upāsīta vāṅ-manaḥ-kāya-vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: tāvat evam upāsīta vāc manaḥ kāya vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.29.018/1 sarvaṃ brahmātmakaṃ tasya vidyayātma-manīṣayā
analyzed: sarvam brahma ātmakam tasya vidyayā ātma manīṣayā

original: BhP_11.29.018/3 paripaśyann uparamet sarvato muita-saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: paripaśyan uparamet sarvatas

original: BhP_11.29.019/1 ayaṃ hi sarva-kalpānāṃ sadhrīcīno mato mama
analyzed: ayam hi sarva kalpānām sadhrīcīnaḥ mataḥ mama

original: BhP_11.29.019/3 mad-bhāvaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu mano-vāk-kāya-vṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: mad bhāvaḥ sarva bhūteṣu manaḥ vāc kāya vṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.29.020/1 na hy aṅgopakrame dhvaṃso mad-dharmasyoddhavāṇv api
analyzed: na hi aṅga upakrame dhvaṃsaḥ mad dharmasya uddhava aṇu api

original: BhP_11.29.020/3 mayā vyavasitaḥ samyaṅ nirguṇatvād anāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: mayā vyavasitaḥ samyak nirguṇa tvāt an āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.021/1 yo yo mayi pare dharmaḥ kalpyate niṣphalāya cet
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ mayi pare dharmaḥ kalpyate niṣphalāya ced

original: BhP_11.29.021/3 tad-āyāso nirarthaḥ syād bhayāder iva sattama
analyzed: tad āyāsaḥ nirarthaḥ syāt bhaya ādeḥ iva sattama

original: BhP_11.29.022/1 eṣā buddhimatāṃ buddhir manīṣā ca manīṣiṇām
analyzed: eṣā buddhimatām buddhiḥ manīṣā ca manīṣiṇām

original: BhP_11.29.022/3 yat satyam anṛteneha martyenāpnoti māmṛtam
analyzed: yat satyam anṛtena iha martyena āpnoti mā amṛtam

original: BhP_11.29.023/1 eṣa te 'bhihitaḥ kṛtsno brahma-vādasya saṅgrahaḥ
analyzed: eṣa te bhihitaḥ kṛtsnaḥ brahma vādasya saṅgrahaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.023/3 samāsa-vyāsa-vidhinā devānām api durgamaḥ
BhP_11.29.024/1 abhīkṣṇaśas te gaditaṃ jñānaṃ vispaṣṭa-yuktimat
analyzed: abhīkṣṇaśas te gaditam jñānam vispaṣṭa yuktimat

original: BhP_11.29.024/3 etad vijñāya mucyeta puruṣo naṣṭa-saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: etat vijñāya mucyeta puruṣaḥ naṣṭa saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.025/1 su-viviktaṃ tava praśnaṃ mayaitad api dhārayet
analyzed: su viviktam tava praśnam mayā etat api dhārayet

original: BhP_11.29.025/3 sanātanaṃ brahma-guhyaṃ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati
analyzed: sanātanam brahma guhyam param brahma adhigacchati

original: BhP_11.29.026/1 ya etan mama bhakteṣu sampradadyāt su-puṣkalam
analyzed: yaḥ etat mama bhakteṣu sampradadyāt su puṣkalam

original: BhP_11.29.026/3 tasyāhaṃ brahma-dāyasya dadāmy ātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: tasya aham brahma dāyasya dadāmi ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_11.29.027/1 ya etat samadhīyīta pavitraṃ paramaṃ śuci
analyzed: yaḥ etat samadhīyīta pavitram paramam śuci

original: BhP_11.29.027/3 sa pūyetāhar ahar māṃ jñāna-dīpena darśayan
analyzed: sa pūyeta ahar ahar mām jñāna dīpena darśayan

original: BhP_11.29.028/1 ya etac chraddhayā nityam avyagraḥ śṛṇuyān naraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ etat śraddhayā nityam avyagraḥ śṛṇuyāt naraḥ

original: BhP_11.29.028/3 mayi bhaktiṃ parāṃ kurvan karmabhir na sa badhyate
analyzed: mayi bhaktim parām kurvan karmabhiḥ na sa badhyate

original: BhP_11.29.029/1 apy uddhava tvayā brahma sakhe samavadhāritam
analyzed: api uddhava tvayā brahma sakhe samavadhāritam

original: BhP_11.29.029/3 api te vigato mohaḥ śokaś cāsau mano-bhavaḥ
analyzed: api te vigataḥ mohaḥ śokaḥ ca asau manobhavaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.030/1 naitat tvayā dāmbhikāya nāstikāya śaṭhāya ca
analyzed: na etat tvayā dāmbhikāya nāstikāya śaṭhāya ca

original: BhP_11.29.030/3 aśuśrūṣor abhaktāya durvinītāya dīyatām
analyzed: a śuśrūṣoḥ abhaktāya durvinītāya dīyatām

original: BhP_11.29.031/1 etair doṣair vihīnāya brahmaṇyāya priyāya ca
analyzed: etaiḥ doṣaiḥ vihīnāya brahmaṇyāya priyāya ca

original: BhP_11.29.031/3 sādhave śucaye brūyād bhaktiḥ syāc chūdra-yoṣitām
analyzed: sādhave śucaye brūyāt bhaktiḥ syāt śūdra yoṣitām

original: BhP_11.29.032/1 naitad vijñāya jijñāsor jñātavyam avaśiṣyate
analyzed: na etat vijñāya jijñāsoḥ jñātavyam avaśiṣyate

original: BhP_11.29.032/3 pītvā pīyūṣam amṛtaṃ pātavyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate
analyzed: pītvā pīyūṣam amṛtam pātavyam na avaśiṣyate

original: BhP_11.29.033/1 jñāne karmaṇi yoge ca vārtāyāṃ daṇḍa-dhāraṇe
analyzed: jñāne karmaṇi yoge ca vārtāyām daṇḍa dhāraṇe

original: BhP_11.29.033/3 yāvān artho nṛṇāṃ tāta tāvāṃs te 'haṃ catur-vidhaḥ
analyzed: yāvān arthaḥ nṛṇām tāta tāvān te haṃ caturvidhaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.034/1 martyo yadā tyakta-samasta-karmā niveditātmā vicikīrṣito me
analyzed: martyaḥ yadā tyakta samasta karmā nivedita ātmā vicikīrṣitaḥ me

original: BhP_11.29.034/3 tadāmṛtatvaṃ pratipadyamāno mayātma-bhūyāya ca kalpate vai
analyzed: tadā amṛta tvam pratipadyamānaḥ mayā ātmabhūyāya ca kalpate vai

original: BhP_11.29.035/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.29.035/1 sa evam ādarśita-yoga-mārgas tadottamaḥśloka-vaco niśamya
analyzed: saḥ evam ādarśita yoga mārgaḥ tadā uttamaḥ śloka vacaḥ niśamya

original: BhP_11.29.035/3 baddhāñjaliḥ prīty-uparuddha-kaṇṭho na kiñcid ūce 'śru-pariplutākṣaḥ
analyzed: baddhāñjaliḥ prīti uparuddha kaṇṭhaḥ na kiñcid ūce śru paripluta akṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.036/1 viṣṭabhya cittaṃ praṇayāvaghūrṇaṃ dhairyeṇa rājan bahu-manyamānaḥ
analyzed: viṣṭabhya cittam praṇaya avaghūrṇam dhairyeṇa rājan bahu manyamānaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.036/3 kṛtāñjaliḥ prāha yadu-pravīraṃ śīrṣṇā spṛśaṃs tac-caraṇāravindam
analyzed: kṛtāñjaliḥ prāha yadu pravīram śīrṣṇā spṛśan tad caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_11.29.037/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.29.037/1 vidrāvito moha-mahāndhakāro ya āśrito me tava sannidhānāt
analyzed: vidrāvitaḥ moha mahā andhakāraḥ yaḥ āśritaḥ me tava sannidhānāt

original: BhP_11.29.037/3 vibhāvasoḥ kiṃ nu samīpa-gasya śītaṃ tamo bhīḥ prabhavanty ajādya
analyzed: vibhāvasoḥ kim nu samīpa gasya śītam tamaḥ bhīḥ prabhavanti aja adya

original: BhP_11.29.038/1 pratyarpito me bhavatānukampinā bhṛtyāya vijñāna-mayaḥ pradīpaḥ
analyzed: pratyarpitaḥ me bhavatā anukampinā bhṛtyāya vijñāna mayaḥ pradīpaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.038/3 hitvā kṛta-jñas tava pāda-mūlaṃ ko 'nyaṃ samīyāc charaṇaṃ tvadīyam
analyzed: hitvā kṛtajñaḥ tava pāda mūlam kaḥ samīyāt śaraṇam tvadīyam

original: BhP_11.29.039/1 vṛkṇaś ca me su-dṛḍhaḥ sneha-pāśo dāśārha-vṛṣṇy-andhaka-sātvateṣu
analyzed: vṛkṇaḥ ca me su dṛḍhaḥ sneha pāśaḥ dāśārha vṛṣṇi andhaka sātvateṣu

original: BhP_11.29.039/3 prasāritaḥ sṛṣṭi-vivṛddhaye tvayā sva-māyayā hy ātma-subodha-hetinā
analyzed: prasāritaḥ sṛṣṭi vivṛddhaye tvayā sva māyayā hi ātma su bodha hetinā

original: BhP_11.29.040/1 namo 'stu te mahā-yogin prapannam anuśādhi mām
analyzed: namaḥ stu te mahā yogin prapannam anuśādhi mām

original: BhP_11.29.040/3 yathā tvac-caraṇāmbhoje ratiḥ syād anapāyinī
analyzed: yathā tvad caraṇa ambhoje ratiḥ syāt anapāyinī

original: BhP_11.29.041/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.29.041/1 gacchoddhava mayādiṣṭo badary-ākhyaṃ mamāśramam
analyzed: gaccha uddhava mayā ādiṣṭaḥ badarī ākhyam mama āśramam

original: BhP_11.29.041/3 tatra mat-pāda-tīrthode snānopasparśanaiḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: tatra mad pāda tīrtha ude snāna upasparśanaiḥ śuciḥ

original: BhP_11.29.042/1 īkṣayālakanandāyā vidhūtāśeṣa-kalmaṣaḥ
analyzed: īkṣaya alakanandāyāḥ vidhūta aśeṣa kalmaṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.042/3 vasāno valkalāny aṅga vanya-bhuk sukha-niḥspṛhaḥ
analyzed: vasānaḥ valkalāni aṅga vanya bhuj sukha niḥspṛhaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.043/1 titikṣur dvandva-mātrāṇāṃ suśīlaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: titikṣuḥ dvandvamātrāṇām su śīlaḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.043/3 śāntaḥ samāhita-dhiyā jñāna-vijñāna-saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: śāntaḥ samāhita dhiyā jñāna vijñāna saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.044/1 matto 'nuśikṣitaṃ yat te viviktam anubhāvayan
analyzed: mattaḥ nu śikṣitam yat te viviktam anubhāvayan

original: BhP_11.29.044/3 mayy āveśita-vāk-citto mad-dharma-nirato bhava
analyzed: mayi āveśita vāc cittaḥ mad dharma nirataḥ bhava

original: BhP_11.29.044/5 ativrajya gatīs tisro mām eṣyasi tataḥ param
analyzed: ativrajya gatīḥ tisraḥ mām eṣyasi tatas param

original: BhP_11.29.045/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.29.045/1 sa evam ukto hari-medhasoddhavaḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ taṃ parisṛtya pādayoḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam uktaḥ harimedhasā uddhavaḥ pradakṣiṇam tam parisṛtya pādayoḥ

original: BhP_11.29.045/3 śiro nidhāyāśru-kalābhir ārdra-dhīr nyaṣiñcad advandva-paro 'py apakrame
analyzed: śiraḥ nidhāya aśru kalābhiḥ ārdra dhīḥ nyaṣiñcat a dvandva paraḥ pi apakrame

original: BhP_11.29.046/1 su-dustyaja-sneha-viyoga-kātaro na śaknuvaṃs taṃ parihātum āturaḥ
analyzed: su dustyaja sneha viyoga kātaraḥ na śaknuvan tam parihātum āturaḥ

original: BhP_11.29.046/3 kṛcchraṃ yayau mūrdhani bhartṛ-pāduke bibhran namaskṛtya yayau punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: kṛcchram yayau mūrdhani bhartṛ pāduke bibhran namaskṛtya yayau punar punar

original: BhP_11.29.047/1 tatas tam antar hṛdi sanniveśya gato mahā-bhāgavato viśālām
analyzed: tatas tam antar hṛdi sanniveśya gataḥ mahābhāgavataḥ viśālām

original: BhP_11.29.047/3 yathopadiṣṭāṃ jagad-eka-bandhunā tapaḥ samāsthāya harer agād gatim
analyzed: yathā upadiṣṭām jagadekabandhunā tapaḥ samāsthāya hareḥ agāt gatim

original: BhP_11.29.048/1 ya etad ānanda-samudra-sambhṛtaṃ jñānāmṛtaṃ bhāgavatāya bhāṣitam
analyzed: yaḥ etat ānanda samudra sambhṛtam jñāna amṛtam bhāgavatāya bhāṣitam

original: BhP_11.29.048/3 kṛṣṇena yogeśvara-sevitāṅghriṇā sac-chraddhayāsevya jagad vimucyate
analyzed: kṛṣṇena yoga īśvara sevita aṅghriṇā sat śraddhayā āsevya jagat vimucyate

original: BhP_11.29.049/1 bhava-bhayam apahantuṃ jñāna-vijñāna-sāraṃ
analyzed: bhava bhayam apahantum jñāna vijñāna sāram

original: BhP_11.29.049/2 nigama-kṛd upajahre bhṛṅga-vad veda-sāram
analyzed: nigama kṛt upajahre bhṛṅga vat veda sāram

original: BhP_11.29.049/3 amṛtam udadhitaś cāpāyayad bhṛtya-vargān
analyzed: amṛtam udadhitaḥ ca apāyayat bhṛtya vargān

original: BhP_11.29.049/4 puruṣam ṛṣabham ādyaṃ kṛṣṇa-saṃjñaṃ nato 'smi
analyzed: puruṣam ṛṣabham ādyam kṛṣṇa saṃjñam nataḥ smi

original: BhP_11.30.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_11.30.001/1 tato mahā-bhāgavata uddhave nirgate vanam
analyzed: tatas mahābhāgavate uddhave nirgate vanam

original: BhP_11.30.001/3 dvāravatyāṃ kim akarod bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: dvāravatyām kim akarot bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.002/1 brahma-śāpopasaṃsṛṣṭe sva-kule yādavarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: brahma śāpa upasaṃsṛṣṭe sva kule yādava ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.002/3 preyasīṃ sarva-netrāṇāṃ tanuṃ sa katham atyajat
analyzed: preyasīm sarva netrāṇām tanum sa katham atyajat

original: BhP_11.30.003/1 pratyākraṣṭuṃ nayanam abalā yatra lagnaṃ na śekuḥ
analyzed: pratyākraṣṭum nayanam abalāḥ yatra lagnam na śekuḥ

original: BhP_11.30.003/2 karṇāviṣṭaṃ na sarati tato yat satām ātma-lagnam
analyzed: karṇa āviṣṭam na sarati tatas yat satām ātma lagnam

original: BhP_11.30.003/3 yac-chrīr vācāṃ janayati ratiṃ kiṃ nu mānaṃ kavīnāṃ
analyzed: yat śrīḥ vācām janayati ratim kim nu mānam kavīnām

original: BhP_11.30.003/4 dṛṣṭvā jiṣṇor yudhi ratha-gataṃ yac ca tat-sāmyam īyuḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā jiṣṇoḥ yudhi ratha gatam yat ca tad sāmyam īyuḥ

original: BhP_11.30.004/0 śrī ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.30.004/1 divi bhuvy antarikṣe ca mahotpātān samutthitān
analyzed: divi bhuvi antarikṣe ca mahā utpātān samutthitān

original: BhP_11.30.004/3 dṛṣṭvāsīnān su-dharmāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prāha yadūn idam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā āsīnān sudharmāyām kṛṣṇaḥ prāha yadūn idam

original: BhP_11.30.005/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.30.005/1 ete ghorā mahotpātā dvārvatyāṃ yama-ketavaḥ
analyzed: ete ghorāḥ mahā utpātāḥ dvārvatyām yama ketavaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.005/3 muhūrtam api na stheyam atra no yadu-puṅgavāḥ
analyzed: muhūrtam api na stheyam atra naḥ yadu puṅgavāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.006/1 striyo bālāś ca vṛddhāś ca śaṅkhoddhāraṃ vrajantv itaḥ
analyzed: striyaḥ bālāḥ ca vṛddhāḥ ca śaṅkhoddhāram vrajantu itas

original: BhP_11.30.006/3 vayaṃ prabhāsaṃ yāsyāmo yatra pratyak sarasvatī
analyzed: vayam prabhāsam yāsyāmaḥ yatra pratyak sarasvatī

original: BhP_11.30.007/1 tatrābhiṣicya śucaya upoṣya su-samāhitāḥ
analyzed: tatra abhiṣicya śucayaḥ upoṣya su samāhitāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.007/3 devatāḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ snapanālepanārhaṇaiḥ
analyzed: devatāḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ snapana ālepana arhaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.008/1 brāhmaṇāṃs tu mahā-bhāgān kṛta-svastyayanā vayam
analyzed: brāhmaṇān tu mahābhāgān kṛta svastyayanāḥ vayam

original: BhP_11.30.008/3 go-bhū-hiraṇya-vāsobhir gajāśva-ratha-veśmabhiḥ
analyzed: go bhū hiraṇya vāsobhiḥ gaja aśva ratha veśmabhiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.009/1 vidhir eṣa hy ariṣṭa-ghno maṅgalāyanam uttamam
analyzed: vidhiḥ eṣa hi ariṣṭa ghnaḥ maṅgalāyanam uttamam

original: BhP_11.30.009/3 deva-dvija-gavāṃ pūjā bhūteṣu paramo bhavaḥ
analyzed: deva dvija gavām pūjā bhūteṣu paramaḥ bhavaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.010/1 iti sarve samākarṇya yadu-vṛddhā madhu-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: iti sarve samākarṇya yadu vṛddhāḥ madhudviṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.010/3 tatheti naubhir uttīrya prabhāsaṃ prayayū rathaiḥ
analyzed: tathā iti naubhiḥ uttīrya prabhāsam prayayuḥ rathaiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.011/1 tasmin bhagavatādiṣṭaṃ yadu-devena yādavāḥ
analyzed: tasmin bhagavatā ādiṣṭam yadudevena yādavāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.011/3 cakruḥ paramayā bhaktyā sarva-śreyopabṛṃhitam
analyzed: cakruḥ paramayā bhaktyā sarva śreyaḥ upabṛṃhitam

original: BhP_11.30.012/1 tatas tasmin mahā-pānaṃ papur maireyakaṃ madhu
analyzed: tatas tasmin mahā pānam papuḥ maireyakam madhu

original: BhP_11.30.012/3 diṣṭa-vibhraṃśita-dhiyo yad-dravair bhraśyate matiḥ
analyzed: diṣṭa vibhraṃśita dhiyaḥ yad dravaiḥ bhraśyate matiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.013/1 mahā-pānābhimattānāṃ vīrāṇāṃ dṛpta-cetasām
analyzed: mahā pāna abhimattānām vīrāṇām dṛpta cetasām

original: BhP_11.30.013/3 kṛṣṇa-māyā-vimūḍhānāṃ saṅgharṣaḥ su-mahān abhūt
analyzed: kṛṣṇa māyā vimūḍhānām saṅgharṣaḥ su mahān abhūt

original: BhP_11.30.014/1 yuyudhuḥ krodha-saṃrabdhā velāyām ātatāyinaḥ
analyzed: yuyudhuḥ krodha saṃrabdhāḥ velāyām ātatāyinaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.014/3 dhanurbhir asibhir bhallair gadābhis tomararṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: dhanurbhiḥ asibhiḥ bhallaiḥ gadābhiḥ tomara ṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.015/1 patat-patākai ratha-kuñjarādibhiḥ kharoṣṭra-gobhir mahiṣair narair api
analyzed: patat patākaiḥ ratha kuñjara ādibhiḥ khara uṣṭra gobhiḥ mahiṣaiḥ naraiḥ api

original: BhP_11.30.015/3 mithaḥ sametyāśvataraiḥ su-durmadā nyahan śarair dadbhir iva dvipā vane
analyzed: mithas sametya aśvataraiḥ su durmadāḥ nyahan śaraiḥ dadbhiḥ iva dvipāḥ vane

original: BhP_11.30.016/1 pradyumna-sāmbau yudhi rūḍha-matsarāv
analyzed: pradyumna sāmbau yudhi rūḍha matsarau

original: BhP_11.30.016/2 akrūra-bhojāv aniruddha-sātyakī
analyzed: akrūra bhojau aniruddha sātyakī

original: BhP_11.30.016/3 subhadra-saṅgrāmajitau su-dāruṇau
analyzed: subhadra saṅgrāma jitau su dāruṇau

original: BhP_11.30.016/4 gadau sumitrā-surathau samīyatuḥ
analyzed: gadau sumitrā surathau samīyatuḥ

original: BhP_11.30.017/1 anye ca ye vai niśaṭholmukādayaḥ sahasrajic-chatajid-bhānu-mukhyāḥ
analyzed: anye ca ye vai niśaṭha ulmuka ādayaḥ sahasrajit śatajit bhānu mukhyāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.017/3 anyonyam āsādya madāndha-kāritā jaghnur mukundena vimohitā bhṛśam
analyzed: anyonyam āsādya mada andhakāritāḥ jaghnuḥ mukundena vimohitāḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_11.30.018/1 dāśārha-vṛṣṇy-andhaka-bhoja-sātvatā
analyzed: dāśārha vṛṣṇi andhaka bhoja sātvatā

original: BhP_11.30.018/2 madhv-arbudā māthura-śūrasenāḥ
analyzed: madhvarbudāḥ māthura śūrasenāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.018/3 visarjanāḥ kukurāḥ kuntayaś ca
analyzed: visarjanāḥ kukurāḥ kuntayaḥ ca

original: BhP_11.30.018/4 mithas tu jaghnuḥ su-visṛjya sauhṛdam
analyzed: mithas tu jaghnuḥ su visṛjya sauhṛdam

original: BhP_11.30.019/1 putrā ayudhyan pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiś ca
analyzed: putrāḥ ayudhyan pitṛbhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ ca

original: BhP_11.30.019/2 svasrīya-dauhitra-pitṛvya-mātulaiḥ
analyzed: svasrīya dauhitra pitṛvya mātulaiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.019/3 mitrāṇi mitraiḥ suhṛdaḥ suhṛdbhir
analyzed: mitrāṇi mitraiḥ suhṛdaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.019/4 jñātīṃs tv ahan jñātaya eva mūḍhāḥ
analyzed: jñātīn tu ahan jñātayaḥ eva mūḍhāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.020/1 śareṣu hīyamāeṣu bhajyamānesu dhanvasu
analyzed: śareṣu hīyamāeṣu bhajyamānesu dhanvasu

original: BhP_11.30.020/3 śastreṣu kṣīyamāneṣu muṣṭibhir jahrur erakāḥ
analyzed: śastreṣu kṣīyamāneṣu muṣṭibhiḥ jahruḥ erakāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.021/1 tā vajra-kalpā hy abhavan parighā muṣṭinā bhṛtāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ vajra kalpāḥ hi abhavan parighāḥ muṣṭinā bhṛtāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.021/3 jaghnur dviṣas taiḥ kṛṣṇena vāryamāṇās tu taṃ ca te
analyzed: jaghnuḥ dviṣaḥ taiḥ kṛṣṇena vāryamāṇāḥ tu tam ca te

original: BhP_11.30.022/1 pratyanīkaṃ manyamānā balabhadraṃ ca mohitāḥ
analyzed: pratyanīkam manyamānāḥ balabhadram ca mohitāḥ

original: BhP_11.30.022/3 hantuṃ kṛta-dhiyo rājann āpannā ātatāyinaḥ
analyzed: hantum kṛta dhiyaḥ rājan āpannāḥ ātatāyinaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.023/1 atha tāv api saṅkruddhāv udyamya kuru-nandana
analyzed: atha tau api saṅkruddhau udyamya kuru nandana

original: BhP_11.30.023/3 erakā-muṣṭi-parighau carantau jaghnatur yudhi
analyzed: erakā muṣṭi parighau carantau jaghnatuḥ yudhi

original: BhP_11.30.024/1 brahma-śāpopasṛṣṭānāṃ kṛṣṇa-māyāvṛtātmanām
analyzed: brahma śāpa upasṛṣṭānām kṛṣṇa māyā āvṛta ātmanām

original: BhP_11.30.024/3 spardhā-krodhaḥ kṣayaṃ ninye vaiṇavo 'gnir yathā vanam
analyzed: spardhā krodhaḥ kṣayam ninye vaiṇavaḥ gniḥ yathā vanam

original: BhP_11.30.025/1 evaṃ naṣṭeṣu sarveṣu kuleṣu sveṣu keśavaḥ
analyzed: evam naṣṭeṣu sarveṣu kuleṣu sveṣu keśavaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.025/3 avatārito bhuvo bhāra iti mene 'vaśeṣitaḥ
analyzed: avatāritaḥ bhuvaḥ bhāraḥ iti mene vaśa īṣitaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.026/1 rāmaḥ samudra-velāyāṃ yogam āsthāya pauruṣam
analyzed: rāmaḥ samudra velāyām yogam āsthāya pauruṣam

original: BhP_11.30.026/3 tatyāja lokaṃ mānuṣyaṃ saṃyojyātmānam ātmani
analyzed: tatyāja lokam mānuṣyam saṃyojya ātmānam ātmani

original: BhP_11.30.027/1 rāma-niryāṇam ālokya bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: rāma niryāṇam ālokya bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.027/3 niṣasāda dharopasthe tuṣṇīm āsādya pippalam
analyzed: niṣasāda dharā upasthe tuṣṇīm āsādya pippalam

original: BhP_11.30.028/1 bibhrac catur-bhujaṃ rūpaṃ bhrāyiṣṇu prabhayā svayā
analyzed: bibhrat catur bhujam rūpam bhrāyiṣṇu prabhayā svayā

original: BhP_11.30.028/3 diśo vitimirāḥ kurvan vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ vitimirāḥ kurvan vidhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.029/1 śrīvatsāṅkaṃ ghana-śyāmaṃ tapta-hāṭaka-varcasam
analyzed: śrīvatsa aṅkam ghanaśyāmam tapta hāṭaka varcasam

original: BhP_11.30.029/3 kauśeyāmbara-yugmena parivītaṃ su-maṅgalam
analyzed: kauśeya ambara yugmena parivītam su maṅgalam

original: BhP_11.30.030/1 sundara-smita-vaktrābjaṃ nīla-kuntala-maṇḍitam
BhP_11.30.030/3 puṇḍarīkābhirāmākṣaṃ sphuran makara-kuṇḍalam
BhP_11.30.031/1 kaṭi-sūtra-brahma-sūtra- kirīṭa-kaṭakāṅgadaiḥ
BhP_11.30.031/3 hāra-nūpura-mudrābhiḥ kaustubhena virājitam
analyzed: hāra nūpura mudrābhiḥ kaustubhena virājitam

original: BhP_11.30.032/1 vana-mālā-parītāṅgaṃ mūrtimadbhir nijāyudhaiḥ
analyzed: vanamālā parīta aṅgam mūrtimadbhiḥ nija āyudhaiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.032/3 kṛtvorau dakṣiṇe pādam āsīnaṃ paṅkajāruṇam
analyzed: kṛtvā ūrau dakṣiṇe pādam āsīnam paṅkaja aruṇam

original: BhP_11.30.033/1 muṣalāvaśeṣāyaḥ-khaṇḍa- kṛteṣur lubdhako jarā
analyzed: kṛta iṣuḥ lubdhakaḥ jarā

original: BhP_11.30.033/3 mṛgāsyākāraṃ tac-caraṇaṃ vivyādha mṛga-śaṅkayā
analyzed: mṛga āsya ākāram tad caraṇam vivyādha mṛga śaṅkayā

original: BhP_11.30.034/1 catur-bhujaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa kṛta-kilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: catur bhujam tam puruṣam dṛṣṭvā sa kṛta kilbiṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.034/3 bhītaḥ papāta śirasā pādayor asura-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: bhītaḥ papāta śirasā pādayoḥ asuradviṣaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.035/1 ajānatā kṛtam idaṃ pāpena madhusūdana
analyzed: a jānatā kṛtam idam pāpena madhusūdana

original: BhP_11.30.035/3 kṣantum arhasi pāpasya uttamaḥśloka me 'nagha
analyzed: kṣantum arhasi pāpasya uttamaḥśloka me nagha

original: BhP_11.30.036/1 yasyānusmaraṇaṃ nṛṇām ajñāna-dhvānta-nāśanam
analyzed: yasya anusmaraṇam nṛṇām ajñāna dhvānta nāśanam

original: BhP_11.30.036/3 vadanti tasya te viṣṇo mayāsādhu kṛtaṃ prabho
analyzed: vadanti tasya te viṣṇo mayā asādhu kṛtam prabho

original: BhP_11.30.037/1 tan māśu jahi vaikuṇṭha pāpmānaṃ mṛga-lubdhakam
analyzed: tat mā āśu jahi vaikuṇṭha pāpmānam mṛga lubdhakam

original: BhP_11.30.037/3 yathā punar ahaṃ tv evaṃ na kuryāṃ sad-atikramam
analyzed: yathā punar aham tu evam na kuryām sat atikramam

original: BhP_11.30.038/1 yasyātma-yoga-racitaṃ na vidur viriñco
analyzed: yasya ātma yoga racitam na viduḥ viriñco

original: BhP_11.30.038/2 rudrādayo 'sya tanayāḥ patayo girāṃ ye
analyzed: rudra ādayaḥ tanayāḥ patayaḥ girām ye

original: BhP_11.30.038/3 tvan-māyayā pihita-dṛṣṭaya etad añjaḥ
analyzed: tvad māyayā pihita dṛṣṭayaḥ etat añjas

original: BhP_11.30.038/4 kiṃ tasya te vayam asad-gatayo gṛṇīmaḥ
analyzed: kim tasya te vayam asat gatayaḥ gṛṇīmaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.039/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_11.30.039/1 mā bhair jare tvam uttiṣṭha kāma eṣa kṛto hi me
analyzed: mā bhaiḥ jare tvam uttiṣṭha kāmaḥ eṣa kṛtaḥ hi me

original: BhP_11.30.039/3 yāhi tvaṃ mad-anujñātaḥ svargaṃ su-kṛtināṃ padam
analyzed: yāhi tvam mad anujñātaḥ svargam su kṛtinām padam

original: BhP_11.30.040/1 ity ādiṣṭo bhagavatā kṛṣṇenecchā-śarīriṇā
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭaḥ bhagavatā kṛṣṇena icchā śarīriṇā

original: BhP_11.30.040/3 triḥ parikramya taṃ natvā vimānena divaṃ yayau
analyzed: tris parikramya tam natvā vimānena divam yayau

original: BhP_11.30.041/1 dārukaḥ kṛṣṇa-padavīm anvicchann adhigamya tām
analyzed: dārukaḥ kṛṣṇa padavīm anvicchan adhigamya tām

original: BhP_11.30.041/3 vāyuṃ tulasikāmodam āghrāyābhimukhaṃ yayau
analyzed: vāyum tulasikā āmodam āghrāya abhimukham yayau

original: BhP_11.30.042/1 taṃ tatra tigma-dyubhir āyudhair vṛtaṃ
analyzed: tam tatra tigma dyubhiḥ āyudhaiḥ vṛtam

original: BhP_11.30.042/2 hy aśvattha-mūle kṛta-ketanaṃ patim
analyzed: hi aśvattha mūle kṛta ketanam patim

original: BhP_11.30.042/3 sneha-plutātmā nipapāta pādayo
analyzed: sneha pluta ātmā nipapāta

original: BhP_11.30.042/4 rathād avaplutya sa-bāṣpa-locanaḥ
analyzed: rathāt avaplutya sa bāṣpa locanaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.043/1 apaśyatas tvac-caraṇāmbujaṃ prabho dṛṣṭiḥ praṇaṣṭā tamasi praviṣṭā
analyzed: a paśyataḥ tvad caraṇa ambujam prabho dṛṣṭiḥ praṇaṣṭā tamasi praviṣṭā

original: BhP_11.30.043/3 diśo na jāne na labhe ca śāntiṃ yathā niśāyām uḍupe praṇaṣṭe
analyzed: diśaḥ na jāne na labhe ca śāntim yathā niśāyām uḍupe praṇaṣṭe

original: BhP_11.30.044/1 iti bruvati sūte vai ratho garuḍa-lāñchanaḥ
analyzed: iti bruvati sūte vai rathaḥ garuḍa lāñchanaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.044/3 kham utpapāta rājendra sāśva-dhvaja udīkṣataḥ
analyzed: kham utpapāta rāja indra sa aśva dhvajaḥ udīkṣataḥ

original: BhP_11.30.045/1 tam anvagacchan divyāni viṣṇu-praharaṇāni ca
analyzed: tam anvagacchan divyāni viṣṇu praharaṇāni ca

original: BhP_11.30.045/3 tenāti-vismitātmānaṃ sūtam āha janārdanaḥ
analyzed: tena ati vismita ātmānam sūtam āha janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.046/1 gaccha dvāravatīṃ sūta jñātīnāṃ nidhanaṃ mithaḥ
analyzed: gaccha dvāravatīm sūta jñātīnām nidhanam mithas

original: BhP_11.30.046/3 saṅkarṣaṇasya niryāṇaṃ bandhubhyo brūhi mad-daśām
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇasya niryāṇam bandhubhyaḥ brūhi mad daśām

original: BhP_11.30.047/1 dvārakāyāṃ ca na stheyaṃ bhavadbhiś ca sva-bandhubhiḥ
analyzed: dvārakāyām ca na stheyam bhavadbhiḥ ca sva bandhubhiḥ

original: BhP_11.30.047/3 mayā tyaktāṃ yadu-purīṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati
analyzed: mayā tyaktām yadu purīm samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati

original: BhP_11.30.048/1 svaṃ svaṃ parigrahaṃ sarve ādāya pitarau ca naḥ
analyzed: svam svam parigraham sarve ādāya pitarau ca naḥ

original: BhP_11.30.048/3 arjunenāvitāḥ sarva indraprasthaṃ gamiṣyatha
analyzed: arjunena avitāḥ sarve indraprastham gamiṣyatha

original: BhP_11.30.049/1 tvaṃ tu mad-dharmam āsthāya jñāna-niṣṭha upekṣakaḥ
analyzed: tvam tu mad dharmam āsthāya jñāna niṣṭhaḥ upekṣakaḥ

original: BhP_11.30.049/3 man-māyā-racitām etāṃ vijñayopaśamaṃ vraja
analyzed: mad māyā racitām etām vijñayā upaśamam vraja

original: BhP_11.30.050/1 ity uktas taṃ parikramya namaskṛtya punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tam parikramya namaskṛtya punar punar

original: BhP_11.30.050/3 tat-pādau śīrṣṇy upādhāya durmanāḥ prayayau purīm
analyzed: tad pādau śīrṣṇi upādhāya durmanāḥ prayayau purīm

original: BhP_11.31.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_11.31.001/1 atha tatrāgamad brahmā bhavānyā ca samaṃ bhavaḥ
analyzed: atha tatra agamat brahmā bhavānyā ca samam bhavaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.001/3 mahendra-pramukhā devā munayaḥ sa-prajeśvarāḥ
analyzed: mahendra pramukhāḥ devāḥ munayaḥ sa prajā īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.002/1 pitaraḥ siddha-gandharvā vidyādhara-mahoragāḥ
analyzed: pitaraḥ siddha gandharvāḥ vidyādhara mahā uragāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.002/3 cāraṇā yakṣa-rakṣāṃsi kinnarāpsaraso dvijāḥ
analyzed: cāraṇāḥ yakṣa rakṣāṃsi kinnara apsarasaḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.003/1 draṣṭu-kāmā bhagavato niryāṇaṃ paramotsukāḥ
analyzed: draṣṭu kāmāḥ bhagavataḥ niryāṇam parama utsukāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.003/3 gāyantaś ca gṛṇantaś ca śaureḥ karmāṇi janma ca
analyzed: gāyantaḥ ca gṛṇantaḥ ca śaureḥ karmāṇi janma ca

original: BhP_11.31.004/1 vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi vimānāvalibhir nabhaḥ
analyzed: vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi vimāna āvalibhiḥ nabhaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.004/3 kurvantaḥ saṅkulaṃ rājan bhaktyā paramayā yutāḥ
analyzed: kurvantaḥ saṅkulam rājan bhaktyā paramayā yutāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.005/1 bhagavān pitāmahaṃ vīkṣya vibhūtīr ātmano vibhuḥ
analyzed: bhagavān pitāmaham vīkṣya vibhūtīḥ ātmanaḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_11.31.005/3 saṃyojyātmani cātmānaṃ padma-netre nyamīlayat
analyzed: saṃyojya ātmani ca ātmānam padma netre nyamīlayat

original: BhP_11.31.006/1 lokābhirāmāṃ sva-tanuṃ dhāraṇā-dhyāna-maṅgalam
BhP_11.31.006/3 yoga-dhāraṇayāgneyyā- dagdhvā dhāmāviśat svakam
analyzed: yoga dhāraṇayā āgneyyā dagdhvā dhām āviśat svakam

original: BhP_11.31.007/1 divi dundubhayo neduḥ petuḥ sumanasaś ca khāt
analyzed: divi dundubhayaḥ neduḥ petuḥ sumanasaḥ ca khāt

original: BhP_11.31.007/3 satyaṃ dharmo dhṛtir bhūmeḥ kīrtiḥ śrīś cānu taṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: satyam dharmaḥ dhṛtiḥ bhūmeḥ kīrtiḥ śrīḥ ca anu tam yayuḥ

original: BhP_11.31.008/1 devādayo brahma-mukhyā na viśantaṃ sva-dhāmani
analyzed: deva ādayaḥ brahma mukhyāḥ na viśantam sva dhāmani

original: BhP_11.31.008/3 avijñāta-gatiṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dadṛśuś cāti-vismitāḥ
analyzed: a vijñāta gatim kṛṣṇam dadṛśuḥ ca ati vismitāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.009/1 saudāmanyā yathāklāśe yāntyā hitvābhra-maṇḍalam
analyzed: saudāmanyāḥ yathā klāśe yāntyāḥ hitvā abhra maṇḍalam

original: BhP_11.31.009/3 gatir na lakṣyate martyais tathā kṛṣṇasya daivataiḥ
analyzed: gatiḥ na lakṣyate martyaiḥ tathā kṛṣṇasya daivataiḥ

original: BhP_11.31.010/1 brahma-rudrādayas te tu dṛṣṭvā yoga-gatiṃ hareḥ
analyzed: brahma rudra ādayaḥ te tu dṛṣṭvā yoga gatim hareḥ

original: BhP_11.31.010/3 vismitās tāṃ praśaṃsantaḥ svaṃ svaṃ lokaṃ yayus tadā
analyzed: vismitāḥ tām praśaṃsantaḥ svam svam lokam yayuḥ tadā

original: BhP_11.31.011/1 rājan parasya tanu-bhṛj-jananāpyayehā
analyzed: rājan parasya tanubhṛt janana apyaya īhā

original: BhP_11.31.011/2 māyā-viḍambanam avehi yathā naṭasya
analyzed: māyā viḍambanam avehi yathā naṭasya

original: BhP_11.31.011/3 sṛṣṭvātmanedam anuviśya vihṛtya cānte
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā ātmanā idam anuviśya vihṛtya ca ante

original: BhP_11.31.011/4 saṃhṛtya cātma-mahinoparataḥ sa āste
analyzed: saṃhṛtya ca ātma mahinā uparataḥ saḥ āste

original: BhP_11.31.012/1 martyena yo guru-sutaṃ yama-loka-nītaṃ
analyzed: martyena yaḥ guru sutam yama loka nītam

original: BhP_11.31.012/2 tvāṃ cānayac charaṇa-daḥ paramāstra-dagdham
analyzed: tvām ca anayat śaraṇa daḥ parama astra dagdham

original: BhP_11.31.012/3 jigye 'ntakāntakam apīśam asāv anīśaḥ
analyzed: jigye ntaka antakam api īśam asau anīśaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.012/4 kiṃ svāvane svar anayan mṛgayuṃ sa-deham
analyzed: kim sva vane svar anayat mṛgayum sa deham

original: BhP_11.31.013/1 tathāpy aśeṣa-sthiti-sambhavāpyayeṣv
analyzed: tathā api aśeṣa sthiti sambhava apyayeṣu

original: BhP_11.31.013/2 ananya-hetur yad aśeṣa-śakti-dhṛk
BhP_11.31.013/3 naicchat praṇetuṃ vapur atra śeṣitaṃ
analyzed: na aicchat praṇetum vapuḥ atra śeṣitam

original: BhP_11.31.013/4 martyena kiṃ sva-stha-gatiṃ pradarśayan
analyzed: martyena kim svastha gatim pradarśayan

original: BhP_11.31.014/1 ya etāṃ prātar utthāya kṛṣṇasya padavīṃ parām
analyzed: yaḥ etām prātar utthāya kṛṣṇasya padavīm parām

original: BhP_11.31.014/3 prayataḥ kīrtayed bhaktyā tām evāpnoty anuttamām
analyzed: prayataḥ kīrtayet bhaktyā tām eva āpnoti anuttamām

original: BhP_11.31.015/1 dāruko dvārakām etya vasudevograsenayoḥ
analyzed: dārukaḥ dvārakām etya vasudeva ugrasenayoḥ

original: BhP_11.31.015/3 patitvā caraṇāv asrair nyaṣiñcat kṛṣṇa-vicyutaḥ
analyzed: patitvā caraṇau asraiḥ nyaṣiñcat kṛṣṇa vicyutaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.016/1 kathayām āsa nidhanaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ kṛtsnaśo nṛpa
analyzed: kathayām āsa nidhanam vṛṣṇīnām kṛtsnaśas nṛpa

original: BhP_11.31.016/3 tac chrutvodvigna-hṛdayā janāḥ śoka-virmūrcchitāḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā udvigna hṛdayāḥ janāḥ śoka virmūrcchitāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.017/1 tatra sma tvaritā jagmuḥ kṛṣṇa-viśleṣa-vihvalāḥ
analyzed: tatra sma tvaritāḥ jagmuḥ kṛṣṇa viśleṣa vihvalāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.017/3 vyasavaḥ śerate yatra jñātayo ghnanta ānanam
analyzed: vyasavaḥ śerate yatra jñātayaḥ ghnantaḥ ānanam

original: BhP_11.31.018/1 devakī rohiṇī caiva vasudevas tathā sutau
analyzed: devakī rohiṇī ca eva vasudevaḥ tathā sutau

original: BhP_11.31.018/3 kṛṣṇa-rāmāv apaśyantaḥ śokārtā vijahuḥ smṛtim
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmau a paśyantaḥ śoka ārtāḥ vijahuḥ smṛtim

original: BhP_11.31.019/1 prāṇāṃś ca vijahus tatra bhagavad-virahāturāḥ
analyzed: prāṇān ca vijahuḥ tatra bhagavat viraha āturāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.019/3 upaguhya patīṃs tāta citām āruruhuḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: upaguhya patīn tāta citām āruruhuḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.020/1 rāma-patnyaś ca tad-deham upaguhyāgnim āviśan
analyzed: rāma patnyaḥ ca tad deham upaguhya agnim āviśan

original: BhP_11.31.020/3 vasudeva-patnyas tad-gātraṃ pradyumnādīn hareḥ snuṣāḥ
analyzed: vasudeva patnyaḥ tad gātram pradyumna ādīn hareḥ snuṣāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.020/5 kṛṣṇa-patnyo 'viśann agniṃ rukmiṇy-ādyās tad-ātmikāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa patnyaḥ viśan agnim rukmiṇī ādyāḥ tad ātmikāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.021/1 arjunaḥ preyasaḥ sakhyuḥ kṛṣṇasya virahāturaḥ
analyzed: arjunaḥ preyasaḥ sakhyuḥ kṛṣṇasya viraha āturaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.021/3 ātmānaṃ sāntvayām āsa kṛṣṇa-gītaiḥ sad-uktibhiḥ
analyzed: ātmānam sāntvayām āsa kṛṣṇa gītaiḥ sat uktibhiḥ

original: BhP_11.31.022/1 bandhūnāṃ naṣṭa-gotrāṇām arjunaḥ sāmparāyikam
analyzed: bandhūnām naṣṭa gotrāṇām arjunaḥ sāmparāyikam

original: BhP_11.31.022/3 hatānāṃ kārayām āsa yathā-vad anupūrvaśaḥ
analyzed: hatānām kārayām āsa yathāvat anupūrvaśas

original: BhP_11.31.023/1 dvārakāṃ hariṇā tyaktāṃ samudro 'plāvayat kṣaṇāt
analyzed: dvārakām hariṇā tyaktām samudraḥ plāvayat kṣaṇāt

original: BhP_11.31.023/3 varjayitvā mahā-rāja śrīmad-bhagavad-ālayam
analyzed: varjayitvā mahā rāja śrīmat bhagavat ālayam

original: BhP_11.31.024/1 nityaṃ sannihitas tatra bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: nityam sannihitaḥ tatra bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.024/3 smṛtyāśeṣāśubha-haraṃ sarva-maṅgala-maṅgalam
BhP_11.31.025/1 strī-bāla-vṛddhān ādāya hata-śeṣān dhanañjayaḥ
analyzed: strī bāla vṛddhān ādāya hata śeṣān dhanañjayaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.025/3 indraprasthaṃ samāveśya vajraṃ tatrābhyaṣecayat
analyzed: indraprastham samāveśya vajram tatra abhyaṣecayat

original: BhP_11.31.026/1 śrutvā suhṛd-vadhaṃ rājann arjunāt te pitāmahāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā suhṛd vadham rājan arjunāt te pitāmahāḥ

original: BhP_11.31.026/3 tvāṃ tu vaṃśa-dharaṃ kṛtvā jagmuḥ sarve mahā-patham
analyzed: tvām tu vaṃśa dharam kṛtvā jagmuḥ sarve mahāpatham

original: BhP_11.31.027/1 ya etad deva-devasya viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi janma ca
analyzed: yaḥ etat devadevasya viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi janma ca

original: BhP_11.31.027/3 kīrtayec chraddhayā martyaḥ sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
analyzed: kīrtayet śraddhayā martyaḥ sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: BhP_11.31.028/1 itthaṃ harer bhagavato rucirāvatāra-
analyzed: ittham hareḥ bhagavataḥ rucira avatāra

original: BhP_11.31.028/2 vīryāṇi bāla-caritāni ca śantamāni
analyzed: vīryāṇi bāla caritāni ca śantamāni

original: BhP_11.31.028/3 anyatra ceha ca śrutāni gṛṇan manuṣyo
analyzed: anyatra ca iha ca śrutāni gṛṇan manuṣyaḥ

original: BhP_11.31.028/4 bhaktiṃ parāṃ paramahaṃsa-gatau labheta
analyzed: bhaktim parām paramahaṃsa gatau labheta
